dvāvādhāravacanau śeṣau | atra tilavanasaraḥpadayoḥ snehanirbharatvasarasatvalakṣaṇaguṇadvārakaiva sukhāsikāmukhapaṅkajayorvṛttiḥ | mukhapaṅkajasarasītyatra yadyapi padadvayaṃ gauṇaṃ tathāpi paṅkajapadasya vṛttirabhidhātulyeti na kavisaṃrambhagocarastena vyavahāro 'yuktaḥ | ‘sāvaṇa-bhaddavaa-māhava-maggasiru’ iti catvāro māsavacanāḥ | te ca svārthasaṃbandhavyavahitaṃ varṣāprabhṛtisabhudāyaṃ lakṣayantīti vakṣyamāṇarītyā varṣādayaḥ ṣaḍādheyavacanāste ca virahavatīśarīre yugapaccāsaṃbhavadavasthitayo jalādisaṃpadādisvasvapravṛttinimittādhyāsena prayujyamānāstadbhāvāpattirūpāṃ vṛttimāsādayanti | asyāśca vivartapariṇāmādhyāsādayaḥ ṣaṭprakārā gauravabhiyā na darśitāḥ | śrutārthānupapattimūlā kalpanā śrutārthāpattiḥ | rājāderāsite āvāsitaśabdo mukhyavṛttyaiva viśeṣaṇatayā rūḍhaḥ | sa svaviśeṣaguṇavyavahite 'rthāntare prayukto gauṇīvṛttimanubhavan vasantāderapi viśeṣaṇatāmāsādayati | lakṣaṇāvyavahitā lakṣaṇā lakṣitalakṣaṇā | sā kathamāvāsitetiśabde saṃpadyata ityata āha—sa upacāreṇeti | kathaṃcitsārūpyeṇa śrāvaṇādiṣu prayogādupacārastamupajīvya prayuktaḥ svārthāvinābhūtaṃ mahattvādikaṃ prakṛteṣu lakṣaṇayā saṃkrāmayatīti | ādyā lakṣaṇā tavdyavahitāṃ dvitīyāmāha—prastutāyā apīti | āvāsitasyāpi hi yathoktaviśeṣaṇasya
paradurgagrahaṇādau mahānanubandho dṛṣṭaḥ | sa iha prastutāyāṃ virahavatīsaṃtāpalakṣaṇāyāṃ pravṛttau lakṣyata ityekalakṣaṇāvyavadhāneneyaṃ lakṣaṇā | evaṃ lakṣaṇādvayavyavadhānenāpi bhavatītyāha—te ceti | śrāvaṇādayaḥ svadharmasaṃpado nirantaravarṣaṇādeḥ svārthāvinābhāvena lakṣitāyāḥ pratyāsannā sadṛśī teṣāṃ locanādīnāṃ dharmasaṃpadaśruprabhāvādilakṣaṇā lakṣyata iti dvitīyā lakṣaṇā | tatpuraḥsarāṃ tṛtīyāmāha—asāvasāviti | evaṃ lakṣaṇātrayapūrvāpi lakṣaṇā boddhavyetyāha—kamitarīti | snehapratītyā tu vibhāvādisaṃvalitayā raso vyajyate, na tu lakṣyata ityanyatra vistaraḥ | kasyāḥ punaḥ svadharmasaṃpadaḥ pratyāsannā kā taddharmasaṃpadityato vivecayati—tatreti | yadi śrāvaṇādipadeṣu samudāyalakṣaṇā na syāttadā māsānupakramya ṛtūnāmabhidhāne prakramabhedo bhavet ! na bhavecca tattadṛtupratīta ṛtusaṃpatpratītiḥ kvaciditi yuktaiva samudāyalakṣaṇā | etābhyāmiti | pratyekaṃ na tu padadvaye lakṣaṇā saṃbhavati | vibhaktiśrutyeti | saptamīprathamāvibhaktibhyāmādhārādheyabhāvaḥ svaśaktyā pratipādyate tadanupapattyārthāntaralakṣaṇā prādurbhavati | evaṃ caitravaiśākhasamudāyātmano vasantasyottarāvayavo vaiśākhastadvācake 'pi mādhavapade samudāyalakṣaṇādvāreṇa lakṣaṇā bhavati | praśaṃsāvacanasyāpīti | garbhīkṛtasārūpyā hi vyāghrādaya upameyavācibhiḥ samasyante | tacca sārūpyaṃ prakarṣalakṣaṇameveti praśaṃsāparatve sthitenābhidheyamapratītyasārūpyaṃ vā rūpāntaraṃ vā pratyetuṃ na śakyata ityabhidheyapratītyanuniṣpādinī ghaṇṭānusvānasodarā svadharmasaṃpadyathoktā pratīyate | svane kila śaradākāśakusumahaṃsādikā svasaṃpadvistāryate | na mukhacandrādivatsukhāsikātilavanayoḥ sādṛśyapratītirna ca tadabhidhīyamānaṃ kiṃcidatrāstīti pṛcchati—kā punariti | mā bhūttathā prasiddhiḥ kaverabhiprāyārụ̄dhā tu pratīyata ityuttaramāha—yeyamiti | na sneho nāma dvayorekaḥ kaścidasti na cānabhidhīyamānamapi sādṛśyaṃ śabdasāmānyamāśrayata ityataḥ prakārāntaramāha—abhisārikāṇāṃ ceti | kathametadavagatamityata āha—yaditthamiti | nanu kamalinīśabdasyātra bahumānagocaratā pratipāditā, na tu tilavanasyetyata āha—ata eveti | upamānopameyayordvayorapi kāminībahumānagocaratāṃ vitarantī śiśireṇa sāṃprataṃ tilavāṭikālavanamapi vartata ityabhipraitīti bhāvaḥ | ‘mukhamardhaṃ śarīrasya’ ityādinyāyena mukhaśabdaḥ prādhānyaṃ lakṣayati, tato mukhapaṅkajasarasi śiśira iti tadbhāvāpattyā hemantasyāpi ṛtuṣu prathamatayā prādhānyameva dyotitamiti | taduktam—‘paḍikammadūipesaṇabhāṇaggahaṇesubhāsurapahuyyanto | hemantio suhāaï maliṇamiaṅko vi kāmiṇīṇayaoso ||’
kākusvarapadacchedabhedābhinayakāntibhiḥ |
pāṭho yo 'rthaviśeṣāya paṭhitiḥ seha ṣaḍvidhā || 56 ||
sā kākvā yathā—
‘yadi me vallabhā dūtī tadāhamapi vallabhā |
yadi tasyāḥ priyā vācastanmamāpi priya priyā || 78 ||’
atraikayā kākvā vidhiranyayā niṣedhaḥ pratīyate ||
kākusvareti | kiṃcidekaparatayā pravṛttamuccāraṇamarthāntaravivakṣayā yadanyathā kriyate sā paṭhitiḥ | anyathākaraṇaṃ ca kākuprabhṛtibhiḥ ṣaḍ‌bhiriti | tatra ‘bhinnakaṇṭhadhvanirdhīraiḥ kākurityabhidhīyate |’ sā dvidhā—vidhikākuḥ, niṣedhakākuśca | tayorniṣedhe paroccāraṇānyathākaraṇena vidhiparyavasāyinī vidhikākuḥ | yathā—‘śalyamapi skhaladantaḥ sọdhuṃ śakyeta hālahaladigdham | dhīrairna punarakāraṇakupitakhalālīkakaṭuvacanam ||’ evaṃ vidhiparoccāraṇānyathākaraṇena niṣedhavyañjikā niṣedhakākuḥ | tāmudāharati—yadīti | yadi dūtī priyā tadāhamapi priyetyādi ṛjūktyā śaṭhanāyakaviṣayā kṛtrimā prītiḥ pratīyate, kākvā tu tavaiva nāhaṃ priyetīrṣyāroṣaḥ ||
svareṇa yathā—
‘subhrūstvaṃ kupitetyapāstamaśanaṃ tyaktā kathā yoṣitāṃ dūrādeva mayojjhitāḥ surabhayaḥ sraggandhadhūpādayaḥ |
rāgaṃ rāgiṇi muñca mayyavanate dṛṣṭe prasīdādhunā satyaṃ tvadvirahādbhavanti dayite sarvā mamānghā diśaḥ || 79 ||’
atra dṛṣṭe ityatra plutasvarakaraṇātkupitakāntāprasādanaparamapīdaṃ vākyamutkupitadṛṣṭiprasādanatāṃ pratipadyate ||
svarāḥ plutādaya udāttādayaśca | nāmīṣāṃ veda iva kāvye bhūyānprayoga iti kiṃcidudāharati—subhrūstvamiti | caraṇatalāgrapatite mayi dṛṣṭe sati tvaṃ prasīdeti dīrghamātroccāraṇe kupitakāntāprasādaparatvaṃ, yathoktaplutakaraṇe tu dūrāhvānādau tadanuśāsanātkupitadṛṣṭisaṃbodhanavuddhirupajāyate | aśanādayo hi dvayoḥ sādhāraṇā
‌eveti śleṣopādānameveti | evaṃ hrasvasya dīrghakaraṇena dīrghasya hrasvakaraṇenārthāntarapratītiravaseyā | yathā—‘viśvāmitro viśvānaraḥ’ iti ṛṣirājarṣiviśeṣau pratīyete tathā yuvatīti saṃbodhanapratītiḥ | evamudāttādayo 'pi yathādarśanamutprekṣaṇīyāḥ ||
padacchedena yathā—
‘sarvakṣitibhṛtāṃ nātha dṛṣṭā sarvāṅgasundarī |
rāmā ramye vanānte 'sminmayā virahitā tvayā || 80 ||’
atra mayā virahitetyetāvati padacchede purūravasastvayetyetāvati tu parvatasya vākyabhedo bhavati ||
śṛṅkhalā bhaṅgaḥ parivartakaḥ cūrṇamiti catvāraśchedāḥ | tatra pūrvāparavarṇānāmanyonyasaṃkalanayā sthitiḥ śṛṅkhalā | yathā—‘kāntāratarutalāsitamṛgayuvaracitāntarā-’ iti paṭhitiḥ, tadā priyāsaṃbhogamaṇitaharṣitalubdhakapracuracchannamadhyeti pratīyate | seyamanyonyaṃ varṇasaṃkalanayā śṛṅkhaletyucyate | ekasya śabdasya madhye vicchedena dvaidhīkaraṇamātraṃ bhaṅgaḥ | tamudāharati—sarveti | mayā virahitetyetāvati samudāye madviyogavatī tvayā dṛṣṭetyaṣṭamakāmāvasthāviṣṭasya purūravasaḥ parvataviṣayaṃ praśnavākyaṃ bhavati | yadā tu mayeti vicchidya pūrvavākyasaṃbandhi kriyate tadā tvayā virahitā satī mayā dṛṣṭeti parvatasyottaravākyaṃ saṃpadyate | varṇāntarakalpanā parivartaḥ | yathā—‘kalikāmadhugarhaṇā’ iti | atra yathāśrutavarṇaparigrahe—‘kalikāmadhuno garhaṇā nindā’ iti pratīyate, yadā tu ‘kalikāmadhug arhaṇā’ iti varṇāntarakalpanayā chedaḥ, tadā pūjaiva ‘kalau kāmadhenuḥ’ iti | piṇḍākṣaravibhāgaścūrṇam | yathā—‘paśya salilaṃ payodherdūrasamunmuktaśuktimīnāṅkāntam’ iti | atra yathāśrute duḥkhena rasanīyamudbhrāntaśuktikoṣaṃ matsyāṅkitaparyantamiti pratīyate, yadā tu dūrasamunmuktaśuktimīnāṅkāntamiti piṇḍacūrṇanena cchedaḥ, tadātyantaharṣayukteti tyaktaśoketi ca saṃbodhanadvayaṃ kṛṣṇasya pratīyate ||
padabhedena yathā—
‘yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purā 'strīkṛto yo gaṅgāṃ ca dadhe 'ndhakakṣayakaro yo barhipatrapriyaḥ |
yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ so 'vyādiṣṭabhujaṅgahāravalayastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ || 81 ||’
atra yena dhvastamanobhavenetyāderyena dhvastamano 'bhavenetyādeśca padabhedādumādhavo mādhava ityarthadvayaṃ pratīyate | tayośca dvayorapi prādhānyenopapādanādaṅgāṅgibhāvena prakṛtāprakṛtarūpatayā cānavasthānātparasparamasaṃbandhenāyaṃ śleṣaḥ | padabhedena tu pāṭhe paryāyato 'rthadvayapratīteriyaṃ śleṣopasarjanā padabhedapaṭhitiḥ ||
yeneti | dhvastamanobhavena dagdhakāmena balijito nārāyaṇasya kāyaḥ purā tripuradāhavyatikare 'strīkṛtaḥ śaratāṃ nītaḥ, gaṅgāṃ bhāgīrathīṃ dadhe, andhako daityaviśeṣastasya kṣayo vināśaḥ, barhipatro mayūravāhanaḥ kārtikeyaḥ, śaśimaccandrakalāṅkitaṃ śiro viśvamohacchidurasya hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāma, bhujaṅgā eva hāravalayāni yasya, sarvadā sarvakālamiti umādhavapakṣe | mādhavapakṣe tu—yena dhvastaṃ vināśitamana: śakaṭam, abhavena saṃsārabandharahitena,baliṃ jitavānyaḥ kāyaḥ sa pūrvaṃ samudramathanāvasare 'bhṛtagṛhayāludaityavyāmohanāya strīrūpatāṃ nītaḥ, agaṃ govardhanākhyaṃ gāṃ pṛthivīmekārṇavamagnāmuddhṛtavān | andhakā yaduviśeṣāsteṣāṃ kṣayo nivāsaḥ | barhiṇo mayūrasya pattraṃ picchaṃ tatpriyaḥ ‘barhipattrakṛtāpīḍam’ iti gopāladhyāne gautamenābhidhānāt | śaśinaṃ manthātīti kvip | śaśimadrāhustasya śirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāma | bhujaṅgahā garuḍaḥ sa iṣṭo yasya | rave śabdabrahmaṇi layo yasya saḥ, tathā sarvado yāvadabhimataprada iti | nanu vibhinnarūpāṇāṃ śabdānāmuccāraṇe tantratayā śleṣa evāyaṃ na paṭhitirityata āha—tayośceti | śleṣo hi śliṣyamāṇayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhe bhavati | sa ca saṃbandho rūpatātparyasaṃbandhalakṣaṇo vā aṅgāṅgibhāvovā upamānopameyabhāvo vā yathāgre vakṣyate | na cāyameko 'trābhimataḥ kiṃtvekaparamevoccāraṇe padabhedenārthāntaraṃ gamayatīti paṭhitireveyam | etena samādhyuktisamāsoktibhyāmapi bheda uktaḥ | tatkimuccāraṇatantratā nāstyevetyata āha—śleṣopasarjaneti | yatra hi yasya prādhānyena vivakṣā tatra tena vyapadeśo yuktaḥ, ata eva vivakṣāntareṇa śleṣavyavahāro 'pyatra samarthanīya eva ||
abhinayena yathā—
‘eddahamettatthaṇiā eddahamettehiṃ acchivattehim |
eddahamettāvatthā eddahamettehiṃ diahehim || 82 ||’
[etāvanmātrastanī etāvanmātrābhyāmakṣipatrābhyām |
etāvanmātrāvasthā etāvanmātrairdivasaiḥ ||]
atra iyanmātrastanādīnāṃ tathābhūtahastābhinayaiḥ saha paṭhanāttathāvi dhārthaviśeṣo gamyate ||
apadeśo 'pyabhinayaviśeṣa eva | yathā—
‘itaḥ sa daityaḥ prāptaśrīrneta evārhati kṣayam |’
ityātmānamapadiśya brūte ||'
eddahametteti | atra sarvapadānāmarthāntarasādhāraṇatayā na tāvadabhimataparimāṇaviśeṣapratītirupajāyate, yāvaduccāraṇasahakāribhūtaprasāritakaradvayakoṣaprasṛtibhidaṅguliprasāritāṅgulīgaṇanārūpābhinayapratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavati | tenābhinayapaṭhitiriyam, sākṣādiva vastusvarūpabodhikā kriyābhimukhyanayanādabhinaya ityucyate | tadidamāha—tathābhūtetyādi | apadeśo 'pīti | ātmanirdeśikā kriyāpadeśaḥ | asyābhinayaviśeṣatve 'pi kāntikaratayā pṛthagupādānam | yāvacca svarūpasamuccāraṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ nānusaṃdhīyate na tāvacchrīprāptikṣamayoḥ kāraṇaviśeṣaḥ pratīyata iti ||
kāntyā yathā—
‘yasyārijātaṃ nṛpaterapaśyadavalambanam |
yayau nirjharasaṃbhogairapaśyadabalaṃ vanam || 83 ||’
atrāvalambanamabalaṃ vanamiti pade padadvaye vā dvitīyacaturthasthānayoryau vakārabakārau tayorantaḥsthapavargābhyāṃ pavargāntaḥsthābhyāṃ ca kāntimati pāṭhe 'rthabhedo jāyate ||
yasyārijātamiti | kāntiśchāyā sā apratihatarūpā padavadvarṇeṣu na saṃbhavatīti śrutirūpā gṛhyate | tathāhi | avalambanamityatra dvitīyacaturthasthānasthayorvakārabakārayoḥ krameṇāntaḥsthapavargabhāvānusaṃdhāne 'valambanamityekapadatāyāṃ trāṇahetumapaśyadityarthaḥ pratīyate | yadā tu dvitīye 'balaṃ vanamityatra tayoreva pavargāntaḥsthabhāvānusaṃdhānaṃ bhavati tadā balaṃ vanamiti cchedena padadvayasaṃpattau balarahitaṃ sadvanamaraṇyaṃ yayāvityarthāntarapratītirupajāyate | tadidamuktam—pade padadvaye
veti | apaśyat śayanabhojanaśūnyam | śayanaṃ śīḥ, adanaṃ at, nirjharasaṃbhogaiḥ nirjharajalamātropabhogairapyapagataṃ ata eva balarahitam | atra ca yamakena saṃsṛṣṭirasya boddhavyā | āvṛttimādāya yamakamanyathā bhaviṣyati ||
apare punaḥ paṭhitimanyathā kathayanti—
padapādārdhabhāṣāṇāmanyathākaraṇena yaḥ |
pāṭhaḥ pūrvoktasūktasya paṭhitiṃ tāṃ pracakṣate || 57 ||
apare punariti | anyathetyataḥ paramapi śabdo 'dhyāhāryaḥ | pādādyanyathākaraṇenāpi hi prakṛtamuccāraṇameva viśiṣyate | yadāha—pūrvoktasūktasyeti | ata eva ślokānyathākaraṇena paṭhitirna saṃbhavati | tena prāguktabhedaiḥ saha dvādaśaprakārā paṭhitiriti tātparyam | yadyapi ca pādādyanyathākaraṇamapi padabhedaprakāra eva tathāpi na tatra pūrvoktatyāgaḥ, iha tu tatparityāgena padāntarakalpanamityetāvānviśeṣaḥ ||
tatra padānyathākaraṇaṃ dvidhā—prakṛtitaḥ, vibhaktitaśca |
tatra prakṛtito yathā—
‘asakalahasitatvātkṣālitānīva kāntyā mukulitanayanatvājjñātakarṇotpalāni |
pibatu madhusugandhīnyānanāni priyāṇāṃ tvayi vinihitabhāraḥ kuntalānāmadhīśaḥ || 84 ||’
atra tvayītyasya sthāne mayīti yadā paṭhyate, tadaitatprārthanāvākyamapyanumativākyaṃ bhavati ||
vibhaktito yathā—
‘sahabhṛtyagaṇaṃ sabāndhavaṃ sahamitraṃ sasutaṃ sahānujam |
svabalena nihanti saṃyuge nacirātpāṇḍusutaḥ suyodhanam || 85 ||’
atra yadā pāṇḍusutaḥ suyodhanamityasya sthāne ‘pāṇḍusutaṃ suyodhanam’ iti paṭhyate, tadaitadamaṅgalārthamapi suyodhane maṅgalārthaṃ bhavati ||
tatra padaṃ vibhattkyantaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedena dvidhā kriyate ityāha—padānyathākaraṇaṃ dvidheti ||
pādānyathākaraṇena yathā—
‘ekānte vijane rātrāvantarveśmani sāhase |
nyāsāpahnavane caiva divyā saṃbhavati kriyā || 86 ||’
atra tṛtīyapādasthāne ‘tanvaṅgī yadi labhyeta’ iti pāṭho bhavati, tadaitatparīkṣaupayikamapi kāmaupayikaṃ bhavati ||
ekānta iti | sāhase pracchannābhisāralakṣaṇe prakāśātpracchanno garīyāniti nyāyāt | divyā svabhogasodarā kriyāvallakṣaṇā ||
ardhānyathākaraṇena yathā—
‘tattāvadeva śaśinaḥ sphuritaṃ mahīyo yāvanna tigmarucimaṇḍalamabhyudeti |
abhyudyate sakaladhāmanidhau tu tasminnindoḥ sitābhraśakalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ || 87 ||’
atra yadā madhyamapādayoḥ sthāne ‘yāvanna tāḥ kimapi gauritarā hasanti | tābhiḥ punarvihasitānanapaṅkajābhiḥ’ iti paṭhyate, tadaitadvīrārthoktirūpamapi śṛṅgāroktirūpaṃ saṃpadyate ||
gauritareti | ‘gharūpa—‘ityādinā pūrvapadahrasvaḥ ||
pādatrayasya cānyathākaraṇena yathā—
‘tyāgena yuktā divamutpatanti tyāgena hīnā narakaṃ vrajanti |
na tyāgināṃ duṣkaramasti kiṃcittyāgo hi sarvavyasanāni hanti || 88 ||’
atra turīyapādamevopādāya pādatrayasya cānyathākaraṇena vakṣyamāṇaḥ pāṭho bhavati | tadaitattyāgapraśaṃsārthamapi tyāganindārthaṃ jāyate | yathā—
‘tyāgo hi sarvavyasanāni hantītyalīkametadbhuvi saṃpratīdam |
jātāni sarvavyasanāni tasyāstyāgena me mugdhavilocanāyāḥ || 89 ||’
eteṣāṃ ca padādyanyathākaraṇānāṃ parasparasaṃkaro 'pi bhavatītyāvedayati ||
bhāṣānyathākaraṇena yathā—
‘kiṃ tādeṇa narendaseharasihālīḍhaggapādeṇa me kiṃ vā me sasureṇa vāsavasahāsīhāsaṇaddhāsiṇā |
te desā giriṇo a te vaṇamahī sa jjea me vallahā kosallātaṇaassa jattha calane vandāmi ṇandāmi a || 90 ||’
atra yadi bhāṣāntareṇa paṭhyate tadaitacchaurasenībhāṣayā sītāvākyaṃ saṃskṛtabhāṣāyāṃ sumantreṇa daśarathāya niveditam | tadyathā—
‘kiṃ tātena narendraśekharaśikhālị̄dhāgrapādena me kiṃ vā me śvaśureṇa vāsavasabhāsiṃhāsanādhyāsinā |
te deśā girayaśca te vanamahī sā caiva me vallabhā kausalyātanayasya yatra caraṇau vandāmi nandāmi ca || 91 ||’
seyamevaṃprakārā paṭhitiḥ ||
bhāṣābhedena kathaṃ strīpuṃsavacanatā gamyata ityata āha—tadaitacchaurasenīti | vibhāganyūnatāmāśaṅkya yathoktaprakāreṇa samādhānamabhisaṃdhāyāha—seyamevaṃprakāra paṭhitiriti ||
vibhinnārthaikarūpāyā yā vṛttirvarṇasaṃhateḥ |
avyapetavyapetātmā yamakaṃ tannigadyate || 58 ||
athāvṛttyupajīvino 'laṃkārā lakṣayitavyāḥ | teṣāṃ samagrakāvyaparyantāvṛttisamāśrayaṇādyamakaṃ pradhānamityāśayenāha—vibhinneti | vibhinnārthetyarthābhedavyatirekaparam | tena dvayorekasya vā nirarthakatve 'pi yamakamupagṛhītaṃ bhavati | evamapi ‘saro rasaḥ’ ityādāvatiprasaṅga ityata uktam—ekarūpeti | rūpamānupūrvī, vibhinnārthā cāsāvekarūpā ceti vigrahaḥ | vividhadhavetyādāvekavarṇāvṛttāvapyāvṛttisamudāya eva yamakakramamullikhatītyabhisaṃdhāya saṃhaterityuktam | vibhinnārthaikarūpāyā varṇasaṃhateryā āvṛttiḥ sā yamakamiti vyavahitenānvayaḥ ||
āvṛttirdvidhā—anāvṛttā vyavahitāvyavahitā ceti |
tadavyapatayamakaṃ vyapetayamakaṃ tathā |
sthānāsthānavibhāgābhyāṃ pādabhedācca bhidyate || 59 ||
yatra pādādimadhyāntāḥ sthānaṃ teṣūpakalpyate |
yadavyapetamanyadvā tatsthānayamakaṃ viduḥ || 60 ||
sāmānyato vibhajate—avyapeteti | vyavāyo vyavadhānam | tadetadubhayamapi sthānādibhedena tridhā bhavatīti pūrvoktānuvādapūrvakamavāntaravibhāgamāha—taditi | pāda ādimadhyāntā arthādeteṣu viśeṣato 'nullikhanādasthānayamakamuktaṃ bhavati | etadapi dvidhā ||
catustrivdyekapādeṣu yamakānāṃ vikalpanāḥ |
ādimadhyāntamadhyāntamadhyādyantāśca sarvataḥ || 61 ||
caturādipādavikalpena viṣayato bhidyata ityāha—catustrīti | ādiśca madhyaścāntaśceti ādimadhyāntāstrayaḥ śuddhāḥ | madhyāntau madhyādī ādyantau ādimadhyāntāśceti militvā catvāraḥ saṃkīrṇāḥ | sarvata iti sārvavibhaktikastasiḥ ||
atyantabahavasteṣāṃ bhedāḥ saṃbhedayonayaḥ |
sukarā duṣkarāścaiva darśyante tatra kecana || 62 ||
evaṃ pādavikalpānāmādyādivikalpānāṃ ca parasparayojane 'nye 'pi bahavaḥ prakārā granthagauravakāriṇo bhavantītyāha—atyanteti | na ca kaṭhoranīrasatvādavaśyavaktavyā ityāha—duṣkarā iti | śiṣyavyutpattaye tu katipaye darśanīyā ityāha—tatra kecaneti ||
tatra catuṣpādayamakeṣu avyapetamādiyamakaṃ yathā—
‘rājīvarājīvaśalolabhṛṅgaṃ muṣṇantamuṣṇaṃ tatibhistarūṇām |
kāntālakāntā lalanāḥ surāṇāṃ rakṣobhirakṣobhitamudvahantam || 92 ||’
rājīvarājī padmapaṅktistadvaśā lolāḥ saspṛhā bhṛṅgā yatra tam | yatastatibhistarūṇāṃ paṅktibhiruṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ muṣṇantamapaharantam | kānto manojño 'lakāntaścūrṇakuntalacchaṭā yāsāṃ tāḥ | yasmādrakṣobhī rākṣasairakṣobhitamadharṣitam | atra prathame pāde pūrvaṃ sārthakamaparamanarthakam | dvitīyādiṣu dvayamapyanarthakam | evamanyatrāpi yathāyathamavagantavyam ||
tadeva madhyayamakaṃ yathā—
‘dadhatamākaribhiḥ karibhiḥ kṣataiḥ samavatārasamairasamaistaṭaiḥ |
vividhakāmahitā mahitāmbhasaḥ sphuṭasarojavanā javanā nadīḥ || 93 ||’
ākaribhiḥ praśastākarayuktaiḥ karibhiḥ pariṇatikrīḍāsaktaiḥ | vividhebhyaḥ kāmebhyo hitāḥ | mahitaṃ pūjitam | javanā vegavatīḥ ||
tadevamantyayamakaṃ yathā—
‘vyathitasindhumanīraśanaiḥ śanairamaralokavadhūjaghanairghanaiḥ |
phaṇavatāma bhito vitataṃ tataṃ dayitaramyalatābakulaiḥ kulaiḥ || 94 ||’
anīraśanairna nirgatā dūrībhūtā raśanāḥ kṣudraghaṇṭikā yebhyastaiḥ kāñcīguṇayuktaiḥ | tena sthapuṭakarkaśaratnādiracanayā sindhuvyathāpoṣaḥ | śanairmandam | ghanairmāṃsalaiḥ | abhito vitataṃ sarvato vistīrṇam | phaṇavatāṃ kulaistataṃ vyāptam | lavaṅgabakulamālatīsurabhiśītalatayā phaṇabhṛtpriṃyatvam ||
ādimadhyayamakaṃ yathā—
‘ghanāghanābhasya mahīmahīyasaḥ surāsurāṇāṃ dayitasya tasya sā |
dharādharākāragṛhā gṛhārthino babhūva bhūmernagarī garīyasīḥ || 95 ||’
ghanāghano meghastadābhaḥ śyāmaḥ | mahī pṛthivī tasyāṃ mahīyān pūjyaḥ | dharādharaḥ parvatastadākāragṛhāḥ ||
ādyantayamakaṃ yathā—
‘drutaṃ drutaṃ vahnisamāgataṃ gataṃ mahīmahīnadyutirocitaṃ citam |
samaṃ samantādapagopuraṃ puraṃ paraiḥ parairapyanirākṛtaṃ kṛtam || 96 ||’
vahnisamāgataṃ sad drutaṃ vilīnamata eva drutaṃ śīghraṃ mahīṃ gataṃ pṛthivyāṃ vistīrya patitamahīnayā dyutyā rocitaṃ śobhitam | citaṃ nibiḍena saṃniveśena sthāpitam | samantātsarvataḥ samaṃ salakṣmīkamasthapuṭaṃ vā | paraiḥ śatrubhiḥ paraiḥ śreṣṭhairanirākṛtaṃ yadāsīttadeva vahninā hemamayaṃ puramapagopuramapagatadvāraṃ mahīṃ gataṃ ca kṛtamiti saṃbandhaḥ ||
madhyāntayamakaṃ yathā—
‘udayi te dayite jaghanaṃ ghanaṃ stanak‍tī navatīrthatanustanuḥ |
sumanasāmanasā sadṛśau dṛśau dyukurume kuru me 'bhimukhaṃ mukham || 97 ||’
udaya udbhavo vistāravattvarūpastadyuktamudayi | ghanaṃ māṃsalam | navena tīrthena rajasā tanūkṛtā | ‘strīrajaḥśāstrayostīrtham' | sumanasāṃ kusumānāmanaḥ śakaṭaṃ tena sadṛśau | ‘sumanasāṃ manasām’ iti pāṭhe sumanasaḥ sahṛdayāstanmanasāṃ sadṛśau saṃvādinyau | dyauśca kuśca dyukū dyāvāpṛthivyau tayorumā lavaṇākaro lāvaṇyaviśrāntisthānatvāt ||
ādimadhyāntayamakaṃ yathā—
‘sīmāsī mānabhūmiḥ phaṇibalavalanodbhāvirājīvirājī hārī hārītavadbhiḥ parisarasaraṇāvastamālaistamālaiḥ |
devādevāptarakṣaḥkṛtabhava bhavato 'gre na dīno nadīno muktāmuktāccharatnaḥ sitarucirucirollāsamudraḥ samudraḥ || 98 ||’
sīmā maryādā tasyāmāsanaśīlaḥ | mānaṃ parimāṇātiśayaḥ mānaḥ pūjā vā, tadbhūmiḥ | phaṇibalaṃ bhujaṅgasamudāyastasya yadvalanaṃ tenodbhāvinī yā rājī rekhā tayā virājanaśīlaḥ | hārītāḥ pakṣiviśeṣāstadyuktaiḥ | parisarasaraṇistīramārgastatrāstamālaiḥ kṣiptamālāsanniveśaiḥ | khaṇḍarūpatāmāpannairiti yāvat | īdṛśaistamālaiḥ hārī manohara iti saṃbandhaḥ | devādevāḥ devāsurāstairabhṛtalābhenāntaravasthānena cāptā rakṣā yasmātsa tathā kṛtabhavaḥ saṃpāditodbhavaḥ | nadīnāminaḥ svāmī samudro bhavato 'gre na dīnaḥ? kākvā dīna eva | muktābhiramuktānyacchāni ratnāni yatra sa tathā | sitaruciścandrastena rucirā manoharā ullāsamudrā vṛddhikāṣṭhā yasya | tadeteṣāmudāharaṇānāṃ caturṣvapi pādeṣu yathoktaṃ yamakamastīti catuṣpādayamakaprapañjo 'yam ||
tripādayamakeṣvavyapetamādiyamakaṃ yathā—
‘viśadā viśadāmattasārase sārase jale |
kurute kurute neyaṃ haṃsī māmantakāmiṣam || 99 ||’
nāsya caturaḥ prayoga iti śeṣabhedā nodāhriyante ||
evaṃ tripādayamakaprapañco 'pi bhavatītyāha—tripādayamakeṣviti | viśadā dhavalā | viśanta āmattāḥ sārasā yatra tasmin | sārasaṃ saraḥsaṃbandhi | manmathonmāthadāyitayā kutsitaṃ rutaṃ kurutam | madhyāntādīni tripādayamakāni kimiti nodāhṛtānītyata āha—nāsyeti ||
dvipādayamakeṣvavyapetamādiyamakaṃ yathā—
‘karoti sahakārasya kalikotkalikottaram |
manmano manmano 'pyeṣa mattakokilaniḥsvanaḥ || 100 ||’
utkalikā utkaṇṭhā taduttaraṃ taṭaṃ kūlam | manmano 'vyaktamadhuraḥ | manmano madīyaṃ manaḥ ||
tadeva madhyayamakaṃ yathā—
‘tulayati sma vilocanatārakāḥ kurabakastabakavyatiṣaṅgiṇi |
guṇavadāśrayalabdhaguṇodaye malinimālini mādhavayoṣitām || 101 ||’
alini yo malinimā kajjalābhatvaṃ sa mādhavayoṣitāṃ yādavastrīṇāṃ vilocanatārakāstulayati smeti saṃbandhaḥ ||
antayamakaṃ yathā—
‘khaṇḍitāśaṃsayā teṣāṃ parāṅmukhatayā tayā |
āviveśa kṛpā ketūkṛtoccairvānaraṃ naram || 102 ||’
evamādimadhyānyapi draṣṭavyāni | ekapādayamakeṣvavyapetamādyantayoranullekhīti nodāhriyate ||
khaṇḍiteti | ketūkṛto dhvajatāṃ nītaḥ | uccairvānaro hanūmān | naro 'rjunaḥ || ādyantayoranullekhīti | mahākaviprayogeṣu viśeṣaśobhākaratayā prasiddherabhāvo 'nullekho na tvasaṃbhava eva | evaṃ madhyayamakaṃ tvityādau boddhavyam ||
madhyayamakaṃ tu caturthapādaṃ evollikhati | yathā—
‘vilulitālakasaṃhatirāmṛśanmṛgadṛśāṃ śramavāri lalāṭajam |
tanutaraṅgatatīḥ sarasāṃ dalatkuvalayaṃ valayaṃ marudāvavau || 103 ||’
﻿
āmarśanaṃ proñchanam | dalatkuvalayamiti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | taraṅgāṇāmitastato calanena prauḍhatarakuvalayakalikāsphuṭanajātiḥ ||
evamāvṛttyādhikye 'pyavyapetamudāhāryam | yathā—
‘viyadviyadvṛṣṭiparaṃparaṃ paraṃ ghanāghanālī rasitāsitā sitā |
saraḥsarasyaḥ svarasārasārasā sabhā sabhā rātriratāratāratā || 104 ||’
āvṛttiḥ sakṛdāvartanenaiva nirvahati tatkimasakṛdāvṛttau yamakaṃ na bhavatītyata āha—evamiti | āvṛttisāmānyamadhikamanadhikaṃ vā dvayamapyāvṛttipadenābhimatamityarthaḥ | viyadākāśam | viyatī apagacchantī vṛṣṭiparaṃparā yasmāttattathā | paramutkṛṣṭaramaṇīyam | ghanāghanālī meghapaṅiktaḥ | rasite stanite āsitāvalambitā | sitā śubhrā | sarāṃsi ca sarasyaśca saraḥsarasyaḥ | svarasārāstatkālonmiṣitakūjitakāntipradhānāḥ sārasāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra tāstathābhūtāḥ | sabhā gṛharūpā jalasamudāyo vā | sabhāḥ sadīptiḥ | tārāṇāṃ tāratā nirmalatāprakarṣaḥ kiṃciddhanarodhasadbhāvādīṣatāratā yasyāṃ sā tathā ||
āvṛttyekarūpatāyāmapi | tatrādiyamakaṃ yathā—
‘yāma yāmatrayādhīnāyāmayā maraṇaṃ niśā |
yāmayāma dhiyāsvartyāyā mayā mathitaiva sā || 105 ||’
āvṛttīti | yajjātīyamādyapāde padamāvṛttaṃ tajjātīyameva dvitīyādipādeṣvapi yathāsthānamāvartata iti prakārāntaramapyāvṛttipadenaiva saṃgṛhītamityarthaḥ | yāmatrayādhīnāyāmayā praharatrayaviśrāntiyāvaddīrghatāprakārayā niśā rātryā maraṇaṃ yāmeti viyogakhinnasya prārthanā | kimityevamamaṅgalamāśāsyata ityāha—yāmiti | dhiyā vudhdyā yāmayāṃ jīvitasarvasvābhimānagocaratāmanaiṣaṃ sā anayā kalpakoṭiśatāyamānayāmayā rajanyā asūnāṃ prāṇānāmārtiḥ pīḍā tayā dvārabhūtayā prāyeṇa mathitaiva bhaviṣyatīti sukumāratarakāntājīvitānadhyavasāyoktiriyam | atra yāmetyeva padaṃ pādacatuṣṭaye 'pyāvṛttam | evamuttaratra ||
tathaiva madhyayamakaṃ yathā—
‘sthirāyate yatendriyo na hīyate yaterbhavān |
‘namāyate’ kaamāyateyate 'pyabhūtsukhāya te 'yate kṣayam || 106 ||’ ﻿
āyatiruttarakālaviśuddhiḥ | yatendriyo vijitendriyagrāmaḥ | evaṃbhūto bhavānyaterna hīyate | yatitulya eva bhavatītyarthaḥ | apiśabdo bhinnakramaḥ | amāyatā māyāśūnyatvaṃ sāpi tava iyate paricchettumaśakyāya kṣayaṃ vināśamayate 'gacchate sukhāyābhūt ||
tadevāntayamakaṃ yathā—
‘bhavādṛśā nātha na jānate nate rasaṃ viruddhe khalu sannatenate |
ya eva dīnāḥ śirasā natena te carantyalaṃ dainyarasena tena te || 107 ||’
tadetatsarvamapyavahitāvṛtteravyapetayamakaṃ bhavati ||
nateḥ kupitakāminīprasādarūpāyā raso vipralambhapṛṣṭhabhāvī madhurataraḥ saṃbhogaḥ kimiti tādṛśā rasaṃ na jānate | yasmāt sannatā avasādayogitvaminatā prabhutā, ete dve viruddhe naikatra saṃbhavataḥ | nahi prabhavo namanti | etadeva vyatirekeṇa draḍhayati—ya eveti | ye dīnāsta eva natena śirasā lakṣitāstena hetunā dainyarasenālamatyantaṃ caranti vyavaharantīti | avyapetapadārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe—tadetatsarvamiti ||
atha caturṣu pādeṣu vyapetamādiyamakaṃ yathā—
‘kāñcipratolīmanu kāminīṃ tāṃ kāñcisravantīvanamātariśvā |
kāñciprabhṛtyābharaṇojjhitānāṃ kāṃcillunīte surataśramārtim || 108 ||’
kramaprāptaṃ vyapetamudāhartavyamityāha—atheti | kāñcirnagarī tasyāḥ pratolī rājarathyā tāmanu lakṣīkṛtya | kena pānīyenāñcanaśīlā yā sravantī nadī tadvanamātariśvā vāyuḥ | kāñciprabhṛtīni mekhalāpramukhāni | kāṃcitsarvāṅgīṇālasabhāvasamarpikāmata eva mekhalāprabhṛtibhūṣaṇatyāgaḥ | atra pratipādaṃ kāñcīkāñcītyādi nairantaryeṇāvartanena vyapetam, sāntaratvena punarādimadhyayamakameva syāditi pādabhedenaivāsya saṃbhavaḥ ||
tadeva madhyayamakaṃ yathā—
‘madanadāruṇa utthita ucchikho madhumadāruṇahūṇamukhacchaviḥ |
taruṇidāruṇa eṣa diśaḥ samaṃ mama hṛdāruṇadāmravaṇānalaḥ || 109 ||’
﻿
madana eva dāru kāṣṭhaṃ tata utthitaḥ | śikhā mañjarīcchaṭā jvālā ca | svabhāvatāmrameva madhumadena yavddiguṇamaruṇaṃ hūṇamukhaṃ tacchavirdāruṇo bhayaṃkaro mama hṛdā samaṃ diśo 'ruṇadruddhavān | āmravaṇameva tāpakāritayānalo vahniḥ | atra yadyapi pratipādamapi vyavāyena madhyayamakaṃ saṃbhavati, tathāpi na tathollekhīti pūrvāparasadṛśamevodāhṛtam ||
antayamakaṃ yathā—
‘tava priyā saccaritāpramatta yā vibhūṣaṇaṃ dhāryamihāṃśumattayā |
ratotsavāmodaviśeṣamatyā na me phalaṃ kiṃcana kāntimattayā || 110 ||’
saccaritāpramatteti | sotprāptaṃ saṃbodhanadvayam | yā tava priyā ratotsavāmodaviśeṣeṇa ratikeliharṣaprakarṣeṇa mattā tayedamaṃśumanmaṇikiraṇakarambitaṃ vibhūṣaṇaṃ dhāryam | arhe kṛtyaḥ | tvayā ki miti na dhāryamityata āha—na me bhūṣaṇasaṃpādyayā kāntyā kiṃcana phalam | ‘kāmināṃ maṇḍanaśrīrvrajati hi saphalatvaṃ vallabhālokanena’ iti nyāyāt ||
ādimadhyayamakaṃ yathā—
‘ghanagirīndravilaṅghanaśālinā vanagatā vanajadyutilocanā |
janamatā dadṛśe janakātmajā tarumṛgeṇa tarusthalaśāyinī || 111 ||’
atrāpi sāntaranirantaraprasaṅge pādabheda eva saṃkaraḥ | saṃkīrṇavya petāni tu pratipādameva saṃbhavantītyudāharati—ādimadhyeti | ghanā girīndrā mālyavantamārabhya suvelaṃ yāvadgiriparamparā | vanajaṃ padmam | janānāṃ matā saṃmatā | tarumṛgaḥ śākhāmṛgo hanūmān | atra ghanetyādiśabdabhāgaḥ pādacatuṣṭaye 'pi girīndretyādyanāvṛttavyavahita evādimadhyayorāvartata iti ||
ādyantayamakaṃ yathā—
‘vihagāḥ kadambasurabhāviha gāḥ kalayantyanukṣaṇamanekalayam |
bhramayannupaiti muhurabhramayaṃ pavanaśca dhūtanavanīpavanaḥ || 112 ||’
gāḥ kūjitāni kadambasaurabhānītavarṣartupayodāḥ kalayanti kalarūpatāṃ nayanti | kūjitakriyāntarālakālo drutamadhyavilambitātmāneko layaḥ | abhraṃ meghaḥ | nīpaḥ ﻿
kadambaḥ | kadambavanadhūnanena sarvataḥ saurabhasaṃcāropapattiḥ | atra vihagā ityādikaṃ pratipādamādyantayoranāvṛttavarṇaṣaṭa‍kavyavahitamevāvartate ||
madhyāntayamakaṃ yathā—
‘mitamavadadudāraṃ tāṃ hanūmānmudāraṃ raghuvṛṣabhasakāśaṃ devi yāmi prakāśam |
tava viditaviṣādo dṛṣṭakṛtsnāmiṣādaḥ śriyamaniśamavantaṃ parvataṃ mālyavantam || 113 ||’
mitamalpākṣaramaramatyarthamudāramalpākṣaravyañjakaṃ mudā harṣeṇa raghuvṛṣabho rāmastasya sakāśo vāsabhūmistayā puraskṛtaḥ | āmiṣādā rākṣasāḥ | atra dāramityādi pratipādaṃ madhyāntayorevānāvṛttavarṇapañcakavyapetamāvartate ||
ādimadhyāntayamakaṃ yathā—
‘samaṃ sa sainyena samantataḥ samaṃ puraṃdaraśrīḥ puramuccagopuram |
madālasāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ susaṃmadāṃ yayau nidhāyākṣayayauvanā yayau || 114 ||’
samaṃ saha | samaṃ saśrīkam | saṃmado harṣaḥ | yayuraśvamedhīyo 'śvaḥ | atra pratipādaṃ samamityādikamādimadhyānteṣu yathoktānāvṛttavarṇavyavahitamāvartante ||
tripādayamakeṣu vyapetamādiyamakaṃ yathā—
‘kareṇa te raṇeṣva‘cchānta’ khantakareṇa dviṣatāṃ hatāḥ |
kareṇavaḥ kṣaradraktā bhānti saṃdhyāghanā iva || 115 ||’
asyāpi nātipracuraḥ prayoga iti viśeṣabhedā nodāhriyante ||
dviṣatāṃ śatrūṇāmantakareṇa vināśakāriṇā | kareṇa hastena | kareṇavo hastinaḥ | evaṃ dvitīyādipādagocaraṃ madhyādiyamakaṃ ca kimiti nodāhiyata ityata āha—asyāpītiṣa ||
dvipādayamakeṣu vyapetamādiyamakaṃ yathā—
‘mudā ramaṇamanvītamudāramaṇibhūṣaṇāḥ |
madabhramadṛśaḥ kartumadabhrajaghanāḥ kṣamāḥ || 116 ||’ ﻿
madhyayamakaṃ punaranullekhīti parihriyate ||
ramaṇaṃ vallabhaṃ mudā harṣeṇānvītaṃ saṃgataṃ kartuṃ kṣamā ityanvayaḥ | udāramutkṛṣṭam | madena bhramantī śyāmāntā | adabhraṃ vipulam | atra yadyapi caturṣu pādeṣu yamakamasti, tathāpi dvayordvayorevāvṛttiḥ paryavasyatītyudāharaṇadvayamidaṃ draṣṭavyam | evaṃ prathamatṛtīyayoḥ prathamacaturthayordvitīyatṛtīyayordvitīyacaturthayośca vyapetamādiyamakamavaseyam | anullekho vyākhyāta eva ||
antayamakaṃ yathā—
‘iha muhurmuditaiḥ kalabhai ravaḥ pratidiśaṃ kriyate kalabhairavaḥ |
sphurati cānuvanaṃ camarīcayaḥ kanakaratnabhavāṃ ca marīcayaḥ || 117 ||’
kalabhāḥ kariśāvakāḥ | ravaḥ śabdaḥ | kalo madhurāvyaktaḥ | bhairavo bhayaṃkaraḥ | anuvanamiti vīpsāyāmavyayībhāvaḥ | camarī camaragavī | cayaḥ samūhaḥ | marīcayaḥ kiraṇāḥ | atrāpi pūrvavadeva dvipādayamakaṃ vyākhyeyamiti ||
ekapādayamakamiha śuddhaṃ na saṃbhavati, tasya sthāne dvipādayamakamevodāhiyate | tadādiyamakaṃ yathā—
‘madhureṇadṛśāṃ mānaṃ madhureṇa sugandhinā |
sahakārodgamenaiva śabdaśeṣaṃ kariṣyati || 118 ||’
ihāpi madhyayamakamanullekhīti parihniyate |
ekapādayamakamiti | nairantaryeṇāvṛttāvavyapetatvam | sāntaratve tvādimadhyādibhāvaprasaṅga iti śuddhaṃ na bhavati tatkimanudāharaṇīyamevaitadita āha—tasyeti | āvṛttirekatraiva saṃbhavatītyekapādagocaratā | sā tu pratiyogitayā dvitīyamapekṣata iti pādāntarasvīkāra iti kathaṃcitprakṛtigaṇanāsamādhānametat | madhuścaitraḥ | anena pūrvāvayavena vasanto lakṣyate | eṇadṛśāṃ hariṇalocanānām | madhureṇa madhurāsvādena | sahakārodgamenaivetyevakāreṇāsatāmatīva tāvadvikhyātaprabhāvātiśayāḥ pikapañcamādayaḥ | sahakāraprathamodbhedamātreṇaiva tu māninīmānagrahavārtā niravaśeṣitetyuddīpanatāprakarṣo dhvanyate ||
﻿
antayamakaṃ yathā—
‘yasyāhuratigambhīragaladapratimaṅgalam |
sa vaḥ karotu niḥsaṅgamudayaṃ prati maṅgalam || 119 ||’
gambhīro māṃsalaḥ | galaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ | maṅgalaṃ kalyāṇam | niḥsaṅgamapratyūham | udayaḥ saṃyattaṃ prati ||
evamāvṛttyādhikye 'pi yathā—
‘avasitaṃ hasitaṃ prasitaṃ mudā vilasitaṃ hrasitaṃ smarabhāsitam |
na samadāḥ pramadā hatasaṃmadāḥ purahitaṃ vihitaṃ na samīhitam 120’
avasitaṃ samāptam | mudā prasitamanubaddham | vilasitaṃ hrasitaṃ bhraṣṭam | smareṇa bhāsitaṃ śobhitam | saṃmado harṣaḥ | atra pratipādaṃ sitaṃ sitamityādi dvābhyāmeva yamakaṃ nirvyūḍham | tṛtīyaṃ tu sitamityādikamādhikyameva prayojayati, tacca sarvamanāvṛtti vyavahitamiti vyapetayamakameva bhavati ||
āvṛttyekarūpatāyāmapi | tatrādimadhyayamakaṃ yathā—
‘sārayantamurasā ramayantī sārabhūtamurusāradharātam |
sārasānukṛtasārasakāñci sā rasāyanamasāramavaiti || 121 ||’
sārayantamātmasamīpamānayantam | urasā ghanatarastanạ̄dhyena | sārabhūtaṃ jīvitasarvasvatāmāpannam | ururmahān | sāra utkarṣaḥ | anukṛtasārasā sārasakūjitasaṃvādinī | sārasā saśabdā kāñcirmekhalā yasyāḥ sā tathā | sārasānukṛteti ‘jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ parā niṣṭhā vaktavyā’ iti niṣṭhāyāḥ paranipātaḥ | rasāyanaṃ sarvopadravaharaṃ bheṣajam ||
madhyāntayamakaṃ yathā—
‘līlāsmitena śucinā mṛdunoditena vyālokitena laghunā guruṇā gatena |
vyājṛmbhitena jaghanena ca darśitena sā hanti tena galitaṃ mama jīvitena || 122 ||’
﻿
ādyantayamakamādimadhyāntayamakaṃ cehāsthānayamakatvaprasaṅgānna saṃgacchate | ādimadhyāntayamakāni tu prathamamevodāhṛtāni ||
śucinā kāntena | mṛdunā komalena | uditaṃ bhāṣitam | laghunā taralena | guruṇā stanajaghanabhārālasena | vyājṛmbhitena prakaṭībhūtavistāraprakarṣeṇa | atra tena teneti madhyāntayorāvṛttam | ihetyāvṛttyekarūpatāyāmekasyādāvitarasyānte vartamānamekarūpasaṃdhipātitvādasthānayamakameva bhavati | evasādimadhyāntayamakamapi nātra saṃgacchate tarhi saṃdhivinākṛtamudāhriyatāmityata āha—ādimadhyānteti ||
āvṛttyekarūpatāyāmāvṛttyādhikye ca madhyayamakaṃ yathā—
‘sabhāsu rājannasurāhatairmukhairmahīsurāṇāṃ vasurājitaiḥ stutāḥ |
na bhāsurā yānti surānna te guṇāḥ prajāsu rāgātmasu rāśitāṃ gatāḥ 123’
tadetatsarvamapi vyavahitāvṛttervyapetayamakaṃ bhavati ||
āvṛttyādhikya iti | ekaikasminpāde tṛtīyādyāvṛttyā pūrvamādhikyaṃ pādāntarāvṛttisarūpatayā sārūpyaṃ coktam | iha tu sarūpāvṛttyaivādhikyaṃ nirūpyata iti saṃkaraprakāropalakṣaṇamidam | sabhāsu janasamavāyeṣu | asurāhatairmadirāpānaparābhūtaiḥ | mahīsurāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānām | vasunā tejasā rājitaiḥ śobhitaiḥ | bhāsurā dīptāḥ | surān devān | na na yānti niṣedhadvayena yāntyevetyarthaḥ | rāgo 'nurāgastatpraghāna ātmā yāsāṃ tāsu prajāsu rāśitāṃ puñjatāṃ gatāḥ | vyapetamupasaṃharati—tadetaditi ||
nādau na madhye nānte yatsaṃdhau vā yatprakāśate |
avyapetavyapetaṃ tadasthānayamakaṃ viduḥ || 63 ||
pāde śloke ca tatprāyaḥ pādasaṃdhau ca badhyate |
svabhede cānyabhede ca sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca sūribhiḥ || 64 ||
kramaprāptamasthānayamakaṃ lakṣayati—nādāviti | ādāvevetyādiniyamena sthānayamakamuktaṃ tadabhāve tvasthānayamakaṃ bhavati | tatkimādyādisthānamidaṃ nāśrayata eva | netyāha—saṃdhau veti | saṃdhau pādasaṃdaṃśe ekasyādiparasyānta iti | nedaṃ sthānayamakaṃ taddhi pratipādaṃ sthānaniyamena nirūpyata ityuktaprāyam | avyapeta-﻿
vyapetamiti | dvābhyāmapyanvīyate | tatprathamaṃ pādaślokatayā dvividhamityāha—pāde śloke ceti | pādasaṃdhau ca yadbadhyate tatsvabhede cānyabhede ca sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca bhavatītyarthaḥ | etadyathāsthānaṃ vivariṣyate—sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ceti pūrveṇāpi saṃbadhyate | bahuvarṇāvṛtti sthūlam, abahuvarṇāvṛtti sūkṣmam ||
atra pāde sthūlāvyapetaṃ yathā—
‘vīnāṃ vṛndaṃ caitatkūṭe samaruti sutaruṇi samaruti sutaruṇi |
cittaṃ vā tena kroḍe 'sminsuramaṇiguṇaruci suramaṇi guṇaruci 124 ||’
atra sthūlenaivāvṛttidvayena ślokapādayorvyāptatvādādimadhyāntatā na saṃbhavatītyasthānayamakamidaṃ sthūlāvyapetamucyate ||
vīnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ vṛndam | kūṭe śrṛṅge | samaruti mārutasahite | sutaruṇi śobhanavṛkṣe | kūṭaviśeṣaṇadvayamidam | samaruti samānakūjite | sutaruṇīti priyāsaṃbodhanam | vāśabda ivārthe | suramaṇīnāṃ devamaṇīnāṃ guṇena dāmnā rocate śobhata iti kvip | tasminkroḍe | suramaṇīti saṃbodhanam | guṇeṣu ruciryasya tadguṇaruci cittam | atra samaruti sutaruṇi suramaṇi guṇarucīti dvitīyacaturthapādayorvarṇāṣṭakāvṛttidvayamiti pādavyāpakamavyapetamucyate ||
pāda eva sūkṣmāvyapetaṃ yathā—
‘svasthaḥ śaile paśyāste 'sau rururururutiratitanutanu matimati |
loko yadvaddaityānīkaṃ guru gurumayi mayi taritari satisati || 125 ||’
atra punaḥ sūkṣmeṇāvṛttyaṣṭakena ślokapādau vyāptāviti asthānayamakamidaṃ sūkṣmāvyapetamucyate ||
rururbahuśrṛṅgo mṛgaḥ | ururatirupacitaprītiḥ atitanuratikṛśā tanuryasyā iti saṃbodhanahrasvaḥ | matimati matirucitajñānaṃ tadvatītyapi saṃbodhanam | paśyeti vākyārthakarmakam | guru vipulam | guruḥ śukraḥ | mayo daityaviśeṣaḥ | tadyuktaṃ taritari vijayamāne mayi sati | satīti saṃbodhanam | satī śobhanā | yathā mayadaityānīkavijaye loko 'yaṃ sukhamāste tathāsau rururiti vākyārtho 'bhimataḥ | tadidaṃ varṇadvayāvṛttyā sūkṣmaṃ na cānyonyavyavahitamavyavahitamityavyapetaṃ ca bhavati | tadetadekasminnapi pāde 'nuktadvayādipādavikalpena ca boddhavyam ||
﻿
śloke sthūlāvyapetaṃ yathā—
‘nagajā na gajā dayitā dayitā vigataṃ vigataṃ lalitaṃ lalitam |
pramadāpramadāmahatā mahatāmaraṇaṃ maraṇaṃ samayātsamayāt || 126 ||’
atrāvṛttyaṣṛkena śloko 'pi vyāpta ityasthānayamakamidaṃ śloke sthūlāvyapetamucyate ||
nagajāḥ parvatajāḥ | dayitā vallabhāḥ | evaṃvidhā api gajā hastino na dayitā na rakṣitāḥ | vīnāṃ haṃsaprabhṛtīnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ gataṃ caṅkramaṇaṃ vigatamapagatam | lalitaṃ vilasitam | lalitaṃ bhraṣṭam | pramadā kāntā | apramadā harṣaśūnyā | āmaścittavyathārūpo rogastena hatā | mahatāṃ prakarṣaśālinām | araṇaṃ saṅgrāmavarjitam | maraṇaṃ vināśaḥ | samayāddaivāt | samayātsaṃgatamāsīt ||
śloka eva sūkṣmāvyapetaṃ yathā—
‘vividhadhavavanā nāgagardharddhanānāvivitatagaganānānāmamajjajjanānā |
ruruśaśalalanānā nāvabandhundhunānā mama hi hitatanānānānana svasvanānā || 127 ||’
atra sūkṣmatarābhiraṣṭāviṃśatyāvṛttibhiḥ śloko vyāpta ityasthānayamakamidaṃ śloke sūkṣmāvyapetamucyate ||
[etatkoṣṭakāntargatapāṭhaḥ kāśīmudritapustake prakāśakapramādānmūle patita upalabhyatebalabhadraṃ prati kṛṣṇavākyaṃ samudratīrabhūvarṇanaparam | vividhāni dhavānāṃ tarubhedānāṃ vanāni yasyāṃ sā | nāgeṣu sarpeṣu gardhenābhilāṣeṇa bubhukṣayā ṛddhaiḥ sabhṛddhairnānāvidhairvibhiḥ pakṣibhirvitataṃ vyāptaṃ gaganaṃ yasyāṃ sā | anāmena anamanena majjanto janā yasyāṃ sā | bahūdaketyarthaḥ | yadvā asya viṣṇornāma nimajjantaḥ | tatparā iti yāvat | tādṛśā janā yasyāṃ sā | avidyamānā naro 'rvācīnā manuṣyā yasyāṃ sā | samāsāntavidheranityatvāt ‘nadyṛtaśca’ iti na kap | yadvā | avidyamāna o viṣṇuryasyāṃ sā | yadvā | anāmani viṣṇunāmani majjabhdyastatparebhyo jātaṃ nānaṃ yasyāṃ sā | naṃ jñānam | tattvajñānamiti yāvat | na naṃ anaṃ na anaṃ nānam | rurūṇāṃ ﻿
śaśānāṃ ca lalanaṃ krīḍanaṃ yatra sā | nau āvayorabandhuṃ vairiṇaṃ dhunānā nāśayantī hi niścitaṃ mama hitaṃ tanoti sā | avidyamānamānanaṃ mukhaṃ yasya saḥ | mukhaṃ vinaiva jāyamāna ityarthaḥ | īdṛśo yaḥ svasvanaḥ śabdastatra anāḥ prāṇā yasyāṃ sā | udakaśabdavatītyarthaḥ ||]
vividheti | vividhāni dhavavanāni yasyāṃ sā tathā | dhavo viṭkhadiraḥ | nāgān sarpān hastino vā gṛdhyantyabhilaṣantīti nāgagardhāḥ | arddhā upacitā nānāvayo vicitrāḥ pakṣiṇastairvitataṃ vyāptaṃ gaganaṃ yasyāṃ sā tathā | kallolaparamparābhiranāmaṃ namanaśūnyam | majjantaḥ snānto janā yasyāṃ sā | anā strīrūpā | rurūṇāṃ śaśānāṃ ca lalanamutphālo yasyāṃ sā tathābhūtā | nau āvayorabandhuṃ śatruṃ dhunānā kṣipantī | hariprabodhe balabhadrasya kṛṣṇaṃ pratyuktiḥ | yasmānmama hitatanā hitaṃ tanoti | anānano mukhaśūnyaḥ yaḥ sva ātmā tena svanānā śabdāyamānā | śīle cānaś | ‘anityamāgamaśāsanam’ iti mugabhāvaḥ | yadi vā anānano mukhaṃ vinā kṛtaḥ svakīyaḥ svano yasyāḥ sā | anitītyanā prāṇayuktā | antarṇītevārthaṃ caitat | varṇadvayaparyantamāvṛttiḥ sūkṣmatā | saivaikavarṇagocarā sūkṣmatarā ||
pādasaṃdhāvanyabhedocchedena sthūlaṃ yathā—
‘upoḍharāgāpyabalā madena sā madenasā manyurasena yojitā |
na yojitātmānamanaṅgatāpitāṃ gatāpi tāpāya mamāsa neyate || 128 ||’
atrāntādisaṃdaṃśādavyapetaṃ pravartate | vyapetaṃ tu pādasaṃdhiṣu nivartata ityasthānayamakamidaṃ sthūlāvṛtteḥ, saṃdhisthūlāvyapetamucyate ||
pādasaṃdhāviti | ‘svabhede cānyabhede ca’ ityatra vyapetāvyapetayoḥ svatvamanyatvaṃ ca vyākhyeyaṃ prakaraṇāt | tattve prasaṅge ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ saptamī yojanīyā | madena prāptarāgāpi tata eva manmathonmādena tāpitā uttāpaṃ gatāpi yadātmānamabalā na yojitavatī tannūnaṃ madenasā madīyaduritena bhūyo 'pi mānarasaṃ prāpitā syāt | ata eveyate vaktumaśakyāya saṃtāpāya nāseti kākvā tāpaprakarṣabhaṇanam | yojiteti | yojayatergatyarthatvamāśritya kartari ktaḥ | ‘gatyarthākarmaka-’ ityādau cakārasyānuktasamuccayārthatvādvā | atra prathamadvitīyayostṛtīyacaturthayoścāntarato vicchidya pāṭhe kriyamāṇe saṃdhiṣu vyapetaprasaṅgaḥ syāt | nirantarapaṭhitau tu sa nivartate | ﻿
yathaiva ca vṛttaucitīvaśātsaubhāgyamunmiṣati, tena vyapetabādhādavyapetapuraskārastadidamāha—atretyādi | saṃdaṃśaḥ saṃdhānam ||
anyabhedānucchedena sūkṣmaṃ yathā—
‘matāṃ dhunānāramatāmakāmatāmatāpalabdhāgrimatānulomatā |
matāvayatyuttamatāvilomatāmatāmyataste samatā na vāmatā || 129 ||’
atra vyapetānucchedenaiva pādasaṃdhiṣvavyapetamutpadyate ityasthānayamakamidaṃ sūkṣmāvṛtteḥ saṃdhisūkṣmāvyapetamucyate ||
matāṃ saṃmatāmāramatāṃ yogināmakāmatāṃ vītarāgatāṃ dhunānādhaḥkurvāṇā | atāpo 'nāyāsastena labdhe 'grimatānulomate śreṣṭhatānukūlye yayā sā | ataevottamatāyā vilomatāmatirekamayatī na gacchantī īdṛśī tavātāmyataḥ saṃsārakhedenābādhyamānasya matau samatā na tu vāmatā vaiṣamyamiti | atra pratipādamādimadhyānteṣu vyapetayamakamupalabhyate | saṃdhiṣu ca saṃdaṃśapāṭhādasthānayamakavyapetaṃ ca | na ca pūrvopalabdhaṃ bādhyate | na vā saṃdhau viratiriti prasaṅgaḥ saṃgacchate | tena vyapetānucchedakametadavyapetam | atrāpi vṛttaucitī sarvasvāyate ||
svabhede pūrvabhedānucchedena sthūlaṃ yathā—
‘satamāḥ satamālo yaḥ pārāpārāyataḥ sa dāvo 'dāvaḥ |
lokālokānukṛtiḥ sahyaḥ sahyayamanabhrakūṭaiḥ kūṭaiḥ || 130 ||’
atra viṣamapādayoḥ samapādāvante 'vatiṣṭhamānāvādiyamakādyantayamakayorādimadhyāntayamakatāmāpādayantaḥ pārāpāreti sahyaḥ sahya ityāvṛttī sthūle evādimadhyayamakavyapadeśaṃ ca labhete ityasthānayamakamidam | svabhede pūrvabhedānucchedi sthūlāvyapetamucyate ||
satameti | tamo 'tra gahanatā tayā satamāḥ sāndhakāram | pārā nāma nadī tasyāḥ pāre āyato vistīrṇo dāvo vanaṃ tadbahulatvādadāvo vanavahniprabhāvarahito lokālokaścakravālākhyaḥ parvatastadanukṛtistatsadṛśo yaḥ so 'yaṃ sahyanāmā girirabhrakūṭaśūnyaiḥ kūṭaiḥ śṛṅgairlakṣitaḥ | hiśabdo vākyālaṃkāre | atra prathamatṛtīyayorādau dvitīyacaturthayorādyantayorvyapetayamakameva vartate | tadanucchedenaiva saṃdaṃśa-﻿
pāṭhādiyamakayorādyantayamakayoścāvyapetādimadhyāntayamakatā prakāśate | yato dvitīyacaturthapādayorādimadhyāntayamakameva madhyayamakabhūmikāmavagāhate | atrāpi vṛttaucitī gaveṣaṇīyā | tadetadvivaraṇe vyaktameveti ||
tadeva svānyabhedocchedi sūkṣmaṃ yathā—
‘sanākavanitaṃ nitambaruciraṃ ciraṃ suninadairnadairvṛtamamum |
mahāphaṇavato 'vato rasaparā parāstavasudhā sudhādhivasati || 131 ||’
atra pādāntādiṣu vyapetaṃ yadā madhyeṣvavyapetaṃ tadubhayamapi pādāntādisaṃhitāyāmavyapetamabhinnajātīyaṃ jāyate | na ca prācīnāṃ madhyayamakatāṃ jahātītyasthānayamakamidaṃ sūkṣmāvṛtteranyato bhedena svabhedānucchedi sūkṣmāvyapetamucyate | ubhayamapi caitadevaṃvidheṣveva chandaḥsu draṣṭavyam ||
sanāketi | nākavanitāḥ svargastriyastābhiḥ sahitam, yato nitambe svacchandaviharaṇocite ruciraṃ manojñam, suninadaiḥ śobhanaśabdairmahāphaṇavān vāsukiravato rakṣato rasaparā rasanīyeṣu śreṣṭhā | parāstavasudhā tyaktabhūbhāgā | sudhā pīyūṣam | atra pratipādaṃ nitaṃ nitamityādikamavyapetam | saṃdhiṣu ca viratipāṭhe ciraṃ ciramityādi vyapetaṃ pratīyate | tatra saṃdaṃśe kriyamāṇe vyapetaṃ nivartate | avyapetaṃ tu madhyayamakamavatiṣṭhata eva | tatsarvamidamavyapetameva jāyate | atrāpi vṛttaucitī pūrvavadeva śaraṇamityupasaṃhāre darśayati—ubhaṃyamapi caitaditi | sthūlasūkṣmabhāvena saṃdhiyamakamubhayam ||
pāde sthūlavyapetaṃ yathā—
‘akhidyatāsannamudagratāpaṃ raviṃ dadhāne 'pyaravindadhāne |
bhṛṅgāvaliryasya taṭe nipītarasā namattāmarasā na mattā || 132 ||’
atra mā bhūdavyapetaprasaṅga ityekamevākṣaraṃ vihāya sthūlāvṛttidvayena ślokapādayorvyāptatvādādimadhyāntatā na saṃbhavatītyasthānayamakamidaṃ sthūlavyapetamucyate ||
akhidyateti | yasya girestaṭe ravimādityamudagratāpaṃ dadhāne 'pi bhṛṅgāvalirbhramaramālā nākhidyata | yato 'ravindadhāne padmānāṃ nidhānabhūte nipītarasā āsvādita﻿-
makarandā | ata eva mattā namanti tāmarasāni yasyāḥ sakāśātsā tathā | bharanamitapadmakuharapraveśānmadhurasasevayā ca bhramaramālayā khedo nādhigataḥ | atra dvitīyacaturthapādayoḥ ‘raviṃ dadhāne ravindradhāne’ iti, ‘rasā namattā rasā na mattā’ iti dvābhyāmeva vṛttibhyāṃ vyāptatvādādyādivibhāgāsaṃbhave asthānayamakamevedam | vyapetaṃ tu kathaṃ bhavatītyata āha—mā bhūditi ||
pāda eva sūkṣmavyapetaṃ yathā—
‘kareṇuḥ prasthito 'neko reṇurghaṇṭāḥ sahasraśaḥ |
kare 'ṇuḥ śīkaro jajñe reṇustena śamaṃ yayau || 133 ||’
atra viṣamapādayoḥ kareṇuḥ kare 'ṇurityādāvāvṛttam | samapādayostu reṇureṇuriti | tattu svāpekṣayā na madhyamanyāpekṣayā nādirityasthānayamakamidaṃ sūkṣmavyapetamucyate ||
kareti | kareṇurhastī prasthitaścalitastena ghaṇṭā reṇuraśabdāyanta | sahasraśa iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | sthūlahaste 'ṇuḥ sītkāravikīrṇatayā paramāṇusādbhūtaḥ | tena śīkareṇa | nanu viṣamapādayorādyakṣareṇa vinākaraṇena madhye samapādayoḥ punarādāveva reṇurityāvṛttirasti tatkathamasthānayamakamidamityata āha—tattviti | anto vṛttairasaṃbhāvitatvādādau madhye vā sā vācyā | na ceyamapi saṃbhavati | reṇureṇuriti śabdabhāgamapekṣya pravṛttāyāmāvṛttau tadvirahāt ||
śloke sthūlavyapetaṃ yathā—
‘jayanti te sadā dehaṃ namasyanti jayanti te |
bhavānyato namasyanti sadādehaṃ bhavānyataḥ || 134 ||’
atra sthūlavyapetāvṛtticatuṣṭayena śloko 'pi vyāpta ityādimadhyāntābhāvādasthānayamakamidaṃ sthūlavyapetamucyate ||
he jayanti, ye tava dehaṃ durgātārādirūpeṇa prapañcamānāṃ mūrtiṃ sadā namasyanti te jayanti sarvotkarṣeṇa vartante | yatasta eva bhavānsaṃsārasaraṇimasyanti kṣipanti | bhavātparameśvarāt anyatā bhedastenonamataḥ śreyasa ādānaṃ grahaṇaṃ yatra tādṛśī īhā ceṣṭā yatreti dvayamasanakriyāviśeṣaṇam | atra jayanti te iti prathamadvitīyayorādyantau ﻿
sadādehamiti prathamacaturthayorantādī namasyantīti dvitīyatṛtīyayorbhavānyata iti ca tṛtīyacaturthayorādyantau ca sthūlāvṛttyā vyāptāviti anāvṛttabhāgābhāvācchloke sthūlavyapetamasthānayamakamidam ||
śloka eva sūkṣmamavyapetaṃ yathā—
‘yāmānītānītāyāmā lokādhīrādhīrālokā |
senāsannāsannā senāsāraṃ hatvāha tvā sāram || 135 ||’
atra yadyapi yāmāyāmetyādau vyapetamādyantayamakaṃ nītānītetyādau ca madhyayamakamavyapetaṃ vidyate, tathāpi maṇḍūkaplutyā gatapratyāgateryateśca naitadullikhati api tu śloko 'pi dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāmakṣarābhyāṃ sūkṣmavṛttyā vyāpta iva lakṣyate | tenāsthānayamakamidamādimadhyāntānāmabhāvātsūkṣmāvṛtteḥ sūkṣmavyapetamucyate ||
yāmeti | mānibhiritā saṃgatā | yadvā yāmena praharamātreṇānītā prāpitā | śatrūñjitvetyarthaḥ | ānītaḥ prāpita āyāmo vṛddhiryasyāḥ sā tathā | pālanena lokānāmādhimīrayati kṣipatīti lokādhīrādhīrairaprāptasamarasaṃbhramairālokyata iti dhīrālokā | saha inā senānyā vartata iti senā, asannā avasādarahitā evaṃbhūtā yā senā sā āsannā nikaṭavartinī satī āramarisamūhaṃ hatvā tvā tvāṃ sāraṃ kāryasiddhiṃ āha bravīti | nanu yāmā yāmā, lokāloketyādikamādyantayornītānītetyādikaṃ tu padacatuṣṭayasyāpi madhya iti vyapetam, ādyantavyapetayamakaṃ tu madhyayamakamiti sthānayamakamevedam | saṃkaro 'pi na pṛthag yamakatāṃ prayojayatītyata āha—atra yadyapīti | yāmetyādikamādāvanusaṃdhāya varṇacatuṣkavyavadhinā pādānte 'nusaṃdhīyamānaṃ maṇḍūkaplutiṃ prayojayatīti na tathā sollekham | yāmānītetyādisthūlacatuṣkapratyāgatena nītāyāmetyādinātyantamudbhaṭena yamakacchāyā tirodhīyata iti ca na sollekham | madhyādikamavyapetaṃ sollekhamityapi na vācyam | yāmānītetyādibandhacchāyārthakayatikaraṇenānullekhatvāt | ślokastu dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāmāvṛttibhyāṃ vyāpta iti samudāyasollekhataiva | tadidamuktaṃ maṇḍūkaplutyā gatapratyāgateryateśceti madhye yatikṛto vyavāyo boddhavyaḥ | atrāpi vṛttaucityamanusaraṇīyam ||
﻿
pādasaṃdhau sthūlavyapetaṃ yathā—
‘haṭhapītamahārāṣṭrīdaśanacchadapāṭalā |
pāṭalākalikānekairekaikā lilihe 'libhiḥ || 136 ||’
atrāpi prāgvadeva yativicchedātpūrvottarārdhayorasaṃhitāyāṃ pāṭalā pāṭaletyāvṛtternāvyapetayamakatvam | na caitatpādayorādāvante vā śakyate vaktum | api tvekasyādāvanyasya vāntyasthāne yamakamidaṃ sthūlāvṛtteḥ sthūlavyapetamucyate | na caitadvācyamupoḍharāgetyādau kāñcīyamake 'pyayaṃ nyāya iti | tasyaiva tathābhūtalakṣaṇatvāt ||
haṭheti | haṭhapānena tāmbūlarāgo niḥśeṣitastena prāptaparabhāgasahajarāgonmeṣaḥ | vyavadhāyakaśabdābhāve kathamidaṃ vyapetamityata āha—atrāpi prāgvaditi | nanūpoḍharāgetyādau pūrvodāhṛte 'pi yativicchedādasti vyavadhānātko 'sya viśeṣa ityāśaṅkyāha—na ceti |
kāñcīyamaka evāvyapetāsthānayamakabhede sūkṣmavyapetaṃ yathā—
‘dharādharākāradharā dharābhujāṃ bhujā mahīṃ pātumahīnavikramāḥ |
kramātsahante sahasā hatārayo rayoddhurā yānadhurāvalambinaḥ || 137 ||’
atrāntyapāde dhurā dhureti sūkṣmavyapetaṃ vartate |
dharādharaḥ śeṣo mahīṃ pātuṃ sahata ityanvayaḥ ||
svabhedānyabhedayoḥ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca yathā—
‘sālaṃ vahantī suratāpanīyaṃ sālaṃ taḍidbhāsuratāpanīyam |
rakṣobharakṣobharasatrikūṭā laṅkākalaṅkākalikādrikūṭā || 138 ||’
atra sālaṃ sālamiti svabhede suratāpanīyaṃ suratāpanīyamiti sthūlaḥ | rakṣobharakṣobha laṅkākalaṅketi anyabhede kūṭā kūṭeti sūkṣmavyapete bhedo vartate | tadidamasthānayamakaṃ sthūlasūkṣmamucyate ||
sālamiti | sālaḥ prākāraḥ | surāṇāṃ tāpanaṃ saṃtāpajananaṃ tasmai hitamala﻿-
matyarthaṃ sā laṅkā | tapanīyaṃ suvarṇam | tāpanīyaṃ ca tadbhāsuraṃ ceti karmadhārayaḥ | rakṣasāṃ bharaḥ samūhastasya kṣobhaḥ prakarṣajaḥ kolāhalaḥ | trikūṭaḥ suvelaḥ | akalaṅkā doṣarahitā | akalikāni kalirahitānyadrikūṭāni suvelaśikharāṇi yasyāṃ sā tathā |
yatsūkṣmaṃ bhāgaṃ bahvāvṛtti tadapi sthūlasūkṣmameva | yathā—
‘madhurayā madhubodhitamādhavī madhusamṛddhisamedhitamedhayā |
madhukarāṅganayā muhurunmadadhvanibhṛtā nibhṛtākṣaramujjage || 139 ||’
yatsūkṣmaṃ bhāgamiti | bhāgaśo vivicyamānaṃ sūkṣmameva, vṛttibhūyastayā tu sthūlamiva prathata iti sūkṣmekṣikayābhidhānam ||
sthānāsthānavibhāgo 'yamavyapetavyapetayoḥ |
krameṇoktastayoreva pādabhedo 'tha kathyate || 65 ||
kramaprāptamidānīṃ pādayamakamudāhiyata ityāha—sthānāsthāneti ||
tatra vyapetabhedeṣu prathamapādayorāvṛttiryathā—
‘na mandayāvarjitamānasātmayā namandayāvarjitamānasātmayā |
urasyupāstīrṇapayodharadvayaṃ mayā samāliṅgyata jīviteśvaraḥ || 140 ||’
na mandeti | mandayā tatkālocitapratipattividhurayā āvarjito māna īrṣyāroṣalakṣaṇo yayā sā tathā | sātmā ātmavatī | anayoḥ karmadhārayaḥ | namanpādānte luṭhannapi dayāvarjitau mānasātmānau yasyā iti bahuvrīherḍāp ||
tatraiva dvitīyatṛtīyayoryathā—
‘dṛś‍yastvayāyaṃ purataḥ payasvānānākalālī rucireṇa netrā |
nānākalālī rucireṇanetrā devī yadasmādajani svayaṃ śrīḥ || 141 ||
ānākaṃ svargāvadhi lalanamullāsastacchīlaḥ rucireṇa manohareṇa netrā nāyakena nānākalānāṃ cātuḥṣaṣṭikīnāmālī paramparā | eṇanetrā hariṇalocanā | dvayamapi śrīviśeṣaṇam ||
evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthayorapi yathā—
‘smarānalo mānavivardhito yaḥ sa nirvṛtiṃ te kimapākaroti |
samaṃ tatastāmarase kṣaṇena samantatastāmarasekṣaṇe na || 142 ||’
﻿
samaṃ samakālaṃ kṣaṇena tato vistīrṇastāmanubhavaikasākṣicintānuvṛttilakṣaṇāṃ nirvṛtimarase iti sopālambhasaṃbodhanam | samantataḥ sarvatastāmarasekṣaṇe kamalanetre na kimapākarotīti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ ||
vyapetabhedeṣu prathamatṛtīyayoryathā—
‘sabhā surāṇāmabalā vibhūṣitā guṇaistavārohi mṛṇālanirmalaiḥ |
sa bhāsurāṇāmabalā vibhūṣitā vihārayannirviśa saṃpadaḥ purām || 143 ||’
abalā balākhyena dānavena rahitā vibhunā śakreṇādhyāsitā surāṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhā mṛṇālanirmalaistava guṇairārohi yataḥ, ataḥ sa tvaṃ purāmabalā vibhūṣitāḥ striyo 'laṃkṛtā vihārayan bhāsurāṇāṃ satāṃ saṃpado nirviśetyāśaṃsā ||
tatraiva prathamacaturthayoryathā—
‘kalaṃ kamuktaṃ tanumadhyanāmikāstanadvayīṃ ca tvadṛte na hantyataḥ |
na yāti bhūtaṃ gaṇane bhavanmukhe kalaṅkamuktaṃ tanumadhyanāmikā || 144 ||’
kalaṃ madhurāvyaktaṃ uktaṃ bhāṣitaṃ tanormadhyasya bhareṇa nāmikāstanadvayīṃ ca tvāṃ vihāya kaṃ nāyakaṃ hanti vaśīkaroti | ato jitendriyeṣu prathamagaṇanīye tvayi sati kalaṅkamuktaṃ nirdoṣaṃ tanumadhi śarīramadhikṛtya bhūtamanāmikā 'nāmikāṅguliḥ na yāti parasya tvatsadṛśasyābhāvāt | nirdoṣo hi loke ūrdhvāṅgulyā nirdiś‍yate ||
evaṃ dvitīyacaturthayorapi yathā—
‘yā bibharti kalavallakīguṇasvānamānamatikālimālayā |
nātra kāntamupagītayā tayāsvānamā namati kālimālayā || 145 ||’
vallakīguṇasvāno vīṇāśabdastasya mānaṃ yā bibharti | kālimnaḥ ś‍yāmatāyā ālayā kajjalaprabhṛtīnatītya varṇaprakarṣeṇa yā sthitā, tayā gātumupakrāntayā bhramaramālayā hetubhūtayā kā nāmātra parvataṃ kāntaṃ na namati na praṇamatīti na, na sukhena ānamyate iti asvānamā yā prāgāsīt sāpyuddīpanaprakarṣe niḥśeṣitamānā namatītyarthaḥ ||
ardhābhyāsaḥ samudgaḥ syāttasya bhedāstrayo matāḥ |
vyapetaścāvyapetaśca ubhayātmā ca sūribhiḥ || 66 ||
﻿
teṣu vyapeto yathā—
‘anekapādabhramadabhrasālaṃ mānye dṛśābhīrupatattrikūṭam |
anekapādabhramadabhrasālaṃ mānye dṛśā bhīru patattrikūṭam || 146 ||’
anekeṣu pādeṣu pratyantaparvateṣu bhramantyabhrāṇi meghā eva sālo varaṇaḥ prākāraḥ, mānyāḥ pūjārhā īdṛśā yathādṛś‍yaṃ tathaiva manohāriṇo 'bhīravo bhayarahitāḥ patattrikūṭāḥ pakṣisaṅghā yatra, anekapā hastinasteṣāmadabhra utkaṭo madastaṃ bharanti dhārayantīti mūlavibhujāditvātkapratyaye anekapādabhramadabhrāḥ sālā vṛkṣā yatra | mānye bhīrviti saṃbodhanadvayam | mānaḥśṛṅgārabhāvastadarhā dṛśā trikūṭaṃ parvatamālokayeti ||
avyapeto yathā—
‘ghanaṃ vidāryārjunabāṇapūgaṃ ghanaṃ vidāryārjunabāṇapūgam |
sasāra bāṇo 'yugalocanasya sasārabāṇo 'yugalocanasya || 147 ||’
vidārī kandabhedaḥ, arjunaḥ kakubhaḥ, bāṇo gulmaviśeṣaḥ, pūgo guvākaḥ | vṛkṣadvandvatvātpākṣika ekavadbhāvaḥ | arjunaḥ pārthastasya bāṇapūgaṃ śaऱsamūhastaṃ vidārya bhittvā | ayugalocanastrinetraḥ kirātasvarūpadharastasya sasāra gataḥ sārabāṇa utkṛṣṭaśabdastena sahito 'yugadvitīyaḥ, alocanasya durjñānasya ||
vyapetāvyapeto yathā—
‘kalāpināṃ cārutayopayānti vṛndāni lāpoḍhaghanāgamānām |
vṛndānilāpoḍhaghanāgamānāṃ kalāpināṃ cārutayo 'payānti || 148 ||’
pādatrayābhyāsastu nātisundara iti tadbhedā nodāhriyante ||
ke pānīye lapanaśīlā haṃsāsteṣāṃ vṛndāni cārutayā manojñabhāvenopayānti saṃgacchante | lāpena parasparasaṃlāpamātreṇoḍhaḥ prāpto ghano nirantara āgama āgamanaṃ yeṣām | vṛndānilo vātyā tenāpọdho nirākṛto ghanāgamo meghadurdinaṃ kalāpino mayūrā ārutayaḥ samantataḥ kekāyitāni apayānti tirobhavanti | ekaśloke pādatrayābhyāsasyāsaṃbhavācchlokāntare ca tathā saundaryābhāvātpādatrayābhyāso na cintanīya ityata āha—pādatrayeti ||
ekākāracatuṣpādaṃ mahāyamakamucyate |
ślokābhyāsaśca tatrādyaṃ punarabhyāsamarhati || 67 || ﻿
idānīṃ kramaprāptaṃ mahāyamakaṃ lakṣayannāha—ekākāreti | dvividhamekākāraṃ bhavati | ekabhāvṛtticatuṣkeṇa, aparabhāvṛttyaṣṭakena | tadidamuktamādyaṃ punaranāvṛttamiti | pratipādamavāntarāvṛttibhedenaivāṣṭakanirvāhāt ||
tatrāvyapetabhede mahāyamakaṃ yathā—
‘sabhāsamānāsahasāparāgātsabhāsamānā sahasā parāgāt |
sabhāsamānā sahasāparāgātsabhāsamānā sahasāparāgāt || 149 ||’
bhāsaḥ kāntiḥ, mānaścittasamunnatiḥ pūjā vā, āsaḥ śatruvidhūnanam, hasaḥ smeratā, etaiḥ saha vartate iti sabhāsamānāsahasā yato 'parāgaṃ cittakāluṣyamatti | bhāsamānaiḥ śobhamānaiḥ saha vartate sabhāsamānā | sahasā mārgaśīrṣeṇa hetunā prāvṛḍ‌vi cchedaprādurbhūtān parāgān rajaḥkaṇānatati prāpnotīti parāgāt | bhā kāntistayā samānā sarūpāstaiḥ saha vartata iti sabhāsamānā | ṣo 'ntakarmaṇi | syanti parāniti sāḥ, taiḥ saha vartata iti sahasā | evaṃbhūtā asamānā anupamā sabhā janasamavāyo 'parāgādaparasmātparvatāt sahasā śīghraṃ parāgātparāgateti ||
vyapetabhede dvitīyaṃ mahāyamakaṃ yathā—
‘pravaṇamadabhramadacaladviparājitamūḍhavimalamahitataraṅgaṃ virasaṃ sadātimiśritamacyutadhāma pratītaśikhicaritavanam |
pravaṇamadabhramadacaladviparājitamūḍhavimalamahitataraṅgaṃ virasaṃ sadātimiśritamacyutadhāmapratītaśikhicaritavanam || 150 ||’
pravaṇaṃ prakṛṣṭataravanam | ‘pranirantaḥśara—’ ityādinā ṇatvam | adabhreṇa mahatā madena darpeṇa calanto ye vayaḥ pakṣiṇastaiḥ parājitā mūḍhavayobālāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra tam, alamatyarthaṃ pūrvoktarūpānamụ̄dhān vīn pakṣiṇo malate dhārayatīti vā | ahitataraṅgaṃ bhujaṅgavyāptāvartasthānam | virasamatalasparśatayā bhūbhāgarahitam | sadā sarvakālaṃ timibhirmahāmatsyaiḥ śritamāśritam | acyutasya bhagavato nārāyaṇasya dhāma viśrāntisthānam | pratītaḥ prakhyātaḥ śikhī vaḍavānalastena caritavanaṃ bhakṣitajalotpīḍamiti prathamaḥ ślokārthaḥ | pravaṇamadāḥ madāyattadarpāḥ satatanisyandamānamadajalāśca bhramanto ye mainākaprabhṛtayo 'calā dvipāḥ karimakarāśca taiḥ śobhitam | ụ̄dhā vimalā svabhāvanirmalā mahitāḥ pūjitāstaraṅgā yena tam | virasaṃ kṣāram | satībhiḥ śobha﻿-
nābhirātibhiḥ pakṣiviśeṣairbhiśritaṃ karambitam | na cyutaṃ dhāma tejo yasya tam | pratītāḥ pratyāgatāḥ śikhino mayūrāstaiścaritavanaṃ bhrāntatīrakānanaṃ samudraṃ paś‍yeti vākyāntaravartikriyayā saṃbandha iti dvitīyaḥ ślokārthaḥ ||
avyapetabhede ādyasya punarabhyāso yathā—
‘samāna yāsamānayā sa mānayā samānayā |
samānayāsamānayā samānayāsamānayā || 151 ||’
samāneti | he samāna sakhe, yāsamānayā avinayavatīnāṃ dhuri gaṇanīyayā anayā samānayā samāno yāsaḥ prayatno māna īrṣyāroṣastau samānau yasyāstayā, tathā samānayā cittānusbhṛtisārūpyaṃ bhajamānayā pūjāsihatayā asamānayā anupamayā sa tvaṃ mā māṃ samānaya saṃgamayeti manmathonmādāviṣṭasya kasyacidvayasyasya prārthanā ||
ekarūpeṇa vākyena dvayorbhaṇanamarthayoḥ |
tantreṇa yatsa śabdajñaiḥ śleṣa ityabhiśabditaḥ || 68 ||
bandhāvṛttisāmānyādyamakānantaraṃ śleṣaṃ lakṣayati—ekarūpeṇeti | arthabhedena śabdā bhidyanta iti naye kathamekena vākyena dvayoruktirityata āha—tantreṇeti | śleṣo hi saṃbhedalakṣaṇaḥ | sa cātra bhinnānāmapi śabdānāmuccāraṇasāmyena pravartate | anekasaṃbandhānāmaikarūpyeṇa vartanaṃ tantramityucyate |
prakṛtipratyayotthau dvau vibhaktivacanāśrayau |
padabhāṣodbhavau ceti śabdaśleṣā bhavanti ṣaṭ || 69 ||
dvayoriti saṃkhyā na vivakṣitā, triprabhṛtīnāmapi śleṣasaṃbhavāt | vibhāgavākye vibhaktīnāṃ sākṣādupādānātpratyapadaṃ tadanyaparaṃ, viśeṣaśobhākaratvaṃ ca viśeṣopādānaprayojanam ||
teṣu prakṛtiśleṣo yathā—
‘ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca pratāpastava kīrtinut |
bhayakṛdbhūpate bāhurdviṣāṃ ca suhṛdāṃ ca te || 152 ||’
atra kīrtinudityatra nauti-nudatyorbhayakṛdityatra karoti-kṛntatyoḥ prakṛtyoḥ kvipi tulyaṃ rūpamiti prakṛtiśleṣo 'yam ||
ātmanaḥ kīrti nauti stauti | pareṣāṃ śatrūṇāṃ ca nudati kṣipati | dviṣāṃ bhayaṃ karoti janayati | suhṛdāṃ ca bhinattīti dhāturūpaprakṛtibhedādevārthabhedaḥ kvippratyayasya sādhāraṇyāt ||
liṅgaśleṣo 'pi prakṛtiśleṣa eva | sa yathā—
‘kuvalayadaladyutāsau dṛśā ca vapuṣā ca kaṃ na darśayate |
adharīkṛtapravālaśriyāṅghriṇāsyena na natabhrūḥ || 153 ||’
atra dṛgvapuṣorāsyacaraṇayośca kuvalayadaladyutetyadharīkṛtapravālaśriyeti ca liṅgabhede 'pi tulyarūpe viśeṣaṇe iti liṅgaśleṣo 'yam ||
nanu ‘varṇapadaliṅgabhāṣāprakṛtipratyayavibhaktivacanānām’ iti kaiścitparisaṃkhyātam, tataścāṣṭadhā śleṣo bhaviṣyatītyata āha—liṅgaśleṣo 'pīti | tadidamudāharaṇīyamityāha—sa yatheti | darśayata ityātmanepadena taṭasthamapi kaṃ na haṭhāddarśanāya prerayatīti vyajyate | adharīkṛtā jitādharatvamāpāditā ca | nanu ca kuvalayadaladyuteti adharīkṛtapravālaśriyeti ca prakṛtibhāgo na bhidyate, tatkathamayaṃ prakṛtiśleṣa iti | naitat | āviṣṭaliṅgadvayaviśeṣyaliṅgadvayasaṃnidhānādanāviṣṭaliṅgaṃ viśeṣaṇamavaś‍yamubhayaliṅgagrāhi vācyam | pañcakaprātipadikārthapakṣe vibhaktirdyotikaiva tathā ca liṅgabheda iti vibhinne viśeṣaṇaprakṛtī mithaḥsaṃśliṣṭe iti | atretyādi ||
pratyayaśleṣaḥ sodbhedo nirudbhedaśca | tayorādyo yathā—
‘tasyā vināpi hāreṇa nisargādeva hāriṇau |
janayāmāsatuḥ kasya vismayaṃ na payodharau || 154 ||’
atra hāriṇāviti iniṇinipratyayayorekarūpatvādvināpi hāreṇeti ca matvarthīyodbhedātsodbhedapratyayaśleṣo 'yam ||
tadvākyasthaśabdāntaraprakāśitaḥ sodbhedaḥ, atathābhūto nirudbhedaḥ | matvarthāyenipratyaye hāravantau hāriṇau | āvaś‍yakārthaṇinipratyaye sahṛdayānāṃ mano harata iti hāriṇau | ānandaghanarasacarvaṇārūpo vismayo 'dbhutaṃ ca | apiśabdena virādhadyotakena hārahīnayorapi hārasaṃbandho vismayarasārpaka iti matvarthīyonmudraṇātsodbhedaḥ | pratyayaśleṣastu kathaṃ bhavatītyata āha—iniṇinipratyayoriti ||
﻿
dvitīyo yathā—
‘tvaduddhṛtāmayasthānarūḍhavraṇakiṇākṛtiḥ |
vibhāti hariṇībhūtā śaśino lāñchanacchāviḥ || 155 ||’
atra hariṇībhūteti cverṅīpaśca tulyarūpatāyāṃ tadudbhedo nāstītyanudbhedaḥ pratyayaśleṣo 'yam ||
vraṇarụ̄dhisthānaṃ ś‍yāmaṃ bhavatīti lāñchanacchāyābhūtā kīdṛśī hariṇī haritā | varṇādanudāttāttopadhātto naḥ’ iti ṅīpi nādeśe ca rūpam | seyaṃ pratīyamānaguṇanotprekṣā | ahariṇarūpāpi vyavahārārūḍhahariṇatāmāpanneti cvipratyaye ca hariṇībhūte rūpam | atra ḍīpaścvervā na kiṃcidbhedakaṃ nibaddhamiti nirudbhedaḥ pratyayaśleṣo 'yam | haritahariṇarūpe prakṛtī api saṃbhinne eva | saṃkarasyādūṣaṇatvāt | evaṃ pūrvodāharaṇe 'pi ||
vibhaktiśleṣo dvidhā—bhinnajātīyayoḥ, abhinnajātīyayośca | tayorādyo yathā—
‘viṣaṃ nijagale yena babhre ca bhujagaprabhuḥ |
dehe yenāṅgajo dadhre jāyā ca sa jayatyajaḥ || 156 ||’
atra yenaviṣaṃ nijagale, bhujagarājaśca nijagale babhre, aṅgajo dehe, jāyā ca dadhre iti tiṅsubvibhaktyoḥ liḍātmanepadaprathamapuruṣaikavacanasaptamyekavacanāntayorekarūpatvādvibhinnārthakatvādbhinnajātīyasuptiṅvibhaktiśleṣo 'yam ||
nijagala iti girateḥ karmaṇi liṭi rūpam | yena viṣaṃ kālakūṭākhyaṃ nigīrṇam, nije ca gale kaṇṭhe bhujagarājo dhṛtaḥ | deha iti dahatestatraiva [karmaṇi liṭi] rūpam | aṅgajaḥ kāmo yena dagdhaḥ, nije ca dehe śarīre jāyā pārvatī dhṛtā sa jayatīti | vivaraṇagranthaḥ subodha eva ||
﻿
dvitīyo yathā—
‘tvameva dhātuḥ pūrvo 'si tvameva pratyayaḥ paraḥ |
anākhyātaṃ na te kiṃcinnātha kenopamīyase || 157 ||’
atra dhāturiti prathamāntasya ṣaṣṭhyantasya caikarūpatvādbhinnārthakatvāccābhinnajātīyasubvibhaktiśleṣo 'yam ||
dhāturjagannirmāturapi pūrva ityanenānāditvamuktam | paraḥ pratyayaḥ kāraṇatrayarūpaṃ na kiṃcidanākhyātam | śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu prasiddhāvadānatvāt | dvitīyasyābhāvānna kenacidupamānam | arthāntare tu dhātuḥ kriyāvacanaśabdarūpaḥ pūrva eva prakṛtitvāttataḥ paraḥ pratyayaḥ tiṅādiḥ | ataḥ sarvamākhyātameva padaṃ niṣpadyate | tena ca kathaṃ tiṅantenopamānamasti bhinnārthatvācceti śabdamedadṛ̣dhīkaraṇārthamuktam | evaṃ tiṅāmapi saṃbheda udāharaṇīyaḥ | yathā—
‘mādyantu nāma kavayastathāpi viditaśramāḥ |
veda vidyā patirvācāmahaṃ vācorivāntaram ||’
atra vedeti prathamottamayoḥ puruṣayorekavacane śliṣyete ||
vacanaśleṣo dvidhā—sodbhedaḥ niruddhedaśca | tayoḥ sodbhedo yathā—
‘prājyaprabhāvaḥ prabhavo dharmasyāstarajastamāḥ |
muktātmā naḥ śivaṃ nemiranye 'pi dadatāṃ jināḥ || 158 ||’
atra nemirityanye 'pīti ekavacanabahuvacanābhyāṃ dadatāmityatra tiṅante prājyaprabhāvaḥ prabhava ityādiṣu ca subanteṣvekavacanabahuvacanayorudbheda ityayaṃ sodbhedo nāma vacanaśleṣaḥ ||
nirudbhedo yathā—
‘tanutvaramaṇī yasya madhyasya ca bhujasya ca |
abhavannitarāṃ tasyā valayaḥ kāntivṛddhaye || 159 ||’
atrābhavanniti valaya iti padayostiṅantasubantayorekavacanabahuvacane anudbhinne eva śliṣyete ityayaṃ nirudbhedo nāma vacanaśleṣaḥ || ﻿
ekavacanabahuvacanābhyāṃ viśeṣaṇeṣu saṃbandhayogyatākṣepāttiṅvacaneṣu subvacaneṣu ca yathāyathamarthadvayonmīlanācchabdarūpadvayodbhedaḥ | ekavacanena valayaḥ kaṅkaṇaṃ bahuvacanena ca madhyarekhā iti subantapade | etadaucitye tiṅantapade cābhavanniti vacanadvayalābhaḥ | na cānayoḥ kiṃcidudbhedakaṃ nibaddhamiti nirudbhedo 'yam | tadetadāha—atretyādi ||
padaśleṣo yathā—
‘aribhedaḥ palāśaśca bāhuḥ kalpadrumaśca te |
bālevodyānamāleyaṃ sālakānanaśobhinī || 160 ||’
atra prakṛtipratyayavibhaktivacanānāṃ pṛthagabhidhānādabhidhānamāloktāni prātipadikānyeva padaśabdenocyante | tena pūrvārdhe śatrubhedomāṃsādaste bāhurityarthenāribhedapalāśākhyavṛkṣanāmnī śliṣyete | uttarārdhe ca sālānāṃ kānanena śobhata ityevaṃśīleyamudyānamāleva vdyarthena sālakenānanena śobhata ityevaṃśīlā bāletyupamānārthaḥ śliṣyate | sa eṣa padaśleṣā nāma śabdaśleṣaḥ ||
arīṇāṃ bhedaḥ śarīradhātubhedaḥ, palaṃ māṃsamaśnāti yaḥ sa tathā, cakāra uttaravākyāpekṣayā | aribhedo viṭa‍khadiraḥ palāśaḥ kiṃśukaḥ sālāstaruviśeṣāsteṣāṃ kānanam, alakāścūrṇakuntalāstatsahitamānanaṃ ca | pūrvottarārdhayornaikavākyatvamudāharaṇatvāt | nanu vibhaktyantānnānyatpadaṃ tatra pūrvabhāgena prakṛtiśleṣa uttarabhāgena ca pratyayaśleṣa uddiṣṭa eva, tatko 'nya, padaśleṣa ityata āha—atreti | prakṛtipratyayabhāvavivakṣāvirahe nāmamāloktāni prātipadikānyevāvaśiṣyanta ityarthaḥ ||
varṇaśleṣo 'pi padaśleṣa eva | sa yathā—
‘tvameva deva pātālamāśānāṃ tvaṃ nibandhanam |
tvaṃ cāmaramarudbhūmireko lokatrayātmakaḥ || 161 ||’
atra tvameva pātālamityakāraḥ pāścātye, tvaṃ ca amaramarudbhūmiriti cakāraḥ paurastye 'kṣare śliṣṭaḥ pātālaṃ cāmare iti ca padaṃ racayati | so 'yaṃ padaśleṣa eva varṇaśleṣa ityucyate || ﻿
‘alaṃkāraḥ śaṅkākaranarakapālaṃ parijano viśīrṇāṅgo bhṛṅgī vasu ca vṛṣa eko bahuvayāḥ |
avastheyaṃ sthāṇorapi bhavati sarvāmaraguro- rvidhau vakre mūrdhni sthitavati vayaṃ ke punaramī ||’
iti varṇaśleṣaḥ kāś‍mīrakaiḥ pṛthagudāhṛtaḥ | ata āha—varṇaśleṣo 'pīti | avayavābhede samudāyasaṃbhavādavayavabhede ca samudāyabhedadhrauvyātpadaśleṣavyavasthitau tatraivāsyāntarbhāvo yukta iti bhāvaḥ | alamatyarthaṃ pātā rakṣitā, āśānāṃ nibandhanaṃ manorathasaphalīkaraṇabījaṃ, āśānāṃ diśāṃ saṃśleṣasthānam, cāmaramarudbhūmiḥ svarloko 'marāṇāmindrādīnāṃ bhūmiramarāvatyādirmarutāṃ ca vivahādīnāṃ bhūmirvaimānikapathaścāmaramarudbhūmiścāmaramarutāmāśrayaśca | kathamatra varṇaśleṣa ityata āha—atretyādi | ‘paticaṇḍibhyāmālañ’ iti paterālañ‌pratyaye pātālamiti rūpasiddhāvākāra eva madhyavartivarṇaḥ, tatraiva punarekadeśapratisaṃdhāne pātālamityākāraśca pratīyate | atra ca ‘ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ’ iti vacanādākāra eva śrūyate tenottaraḥ paurastyena saṃbhinnaḥ | evaṃ cakārasyottarasaṃbhedo vyākhyeyaḥ ||
bhāṣāśleṣo yathā—
‘kuru lālasabhūlehe mahimohahare tuhārivicchinne |
hariṇārisāradehe vare varaṃ hara ume bhāvam || 162 ||’
atra—
‘dhyānānītāṃ ca rudrāṇīṃ kāntāṃ ca purataḥ sthitām |
raṇecchuḥ kaścidānarca divyaprākṛtayā girā || 163 ||’
tatra rudrāṇīpakṣe—he ume, hare bhave varaṃ śreṣṭha bhāvaṃ kuru | kiṃbhūte | lālasabhūlehe lālasabhūḥ kāmastaṃ lẹdhi yastasmin | tathā mahimrā prabhāveṇohaṃ vitarkamapaharati yastasminmahimohahare | maheśvarasaṃnidhau hi sarvajñānābhibhava iti śrūyate | ataeva tohanti ardayanti tuhā arayastairvicchinne virahite | aparamapyarīṇāṃ vicchedakāraṇamāha—hariṇārisāradehe hariṇāriḥ siṃhastasya sāro balaṃ sa dehe yasya tasmin | vare pari﻿-
ṇetarīti | umāyā eva vā imāni saṃbodhanaviśeṣaṇāni | kāntāpakṣe tu—he kānte, tava yo 'yaṃ harināryāḥ śriyāḥ sāra utkṛṣṭo dehastatra yadvaraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vilocanānanastanajaghanādi tanme bhāvamabhilāṣaṃ haratu | kāmānpūrayatvityarthaḥ | kiṃbhūte dehe | kuṭilālasabhrūlekhe mahimohahare gṛhe hāriṇi vicchinne ca tanumadhyatvādibhiriti ||
divyā saṃskṛtā | prākṛtā mahārāṣṭrī | bhāvaścetaso layaḥ | lālasa icchā tasmādbhavatīti lālasabhūḥ saṃkalpa़yonitvātkāmastaṃ lẹdhīti karmaṇyaṇ | ūhastarkaḥ saṃśayapṛṣṭhabhāvī viparītapratyayaviśeṣaḥ | kathaṃ taṃ haratītyata āha—maheśvarasaṃnidhāviti | saṃnidhiḥ sākṣātkārarūpaḥ | sarvajñānāni saṃskārapravartakāni | ‘tuhira ardane’ tohatīti igupadhatvātkapratyaye tuhā arayaḥ | te dvidhā-āntarāḥ, bāhyāśca | āntarā madamānādayaḥ ṣaṭ, bāhyāḥ kṣetrāpahārakādayaḥ | tatra pūrvāvacchede ca hariṇārisāradehatvaṃ heturuktaḥ | hariṇārisāra iva sāro yasyetyuttarapadalope hariṇārisāro deho yasyeti vigrahavākyamavaseyam | yathāśrutyarthakathanamātramumāyā evetyatra lālasabhūleha ityaca‍pratyaye vyākhyeyam | tuśabdastavārthe | ‘tutuvatuhmatubbhatujjhā ḍasaḥ’ iti sūtrāt | harinārī lakṣmīstasyāḥ sakāśāt sāraḥ prakarṣaśālī dehaḥ | ‘pañcamī’ iti yogavibhāgātsamāsaḥ | kurulāścūrṇakuntalāḥ | mahīśabdena bhūgolavartinaḥ prāṇino 'bhimatāsteṣāṃ mohagṛha iti vyākhyeyam | vicchinno vibhaktāvayavaḥ ||
yathā vā—
rucirañjitārihetiṃ jananamitaṃ sāmakāyamakalaṅkam |
santamamitaṃ ca mānaya kamalāsanamabhivirājantam || 164 ||’
‘bhūtasaṃskṛtabhāṣābhyāṃ dvirnamaskṛtya mādhavam |
jagāma samaraṃ ko 'pi kasya śreyasi tṛptayaḥ || 165 ||’
tatra bhūtabhāṣāyāṃ yathā—
ruciraṃ manoharaṃ jitārihetiṃ bhagnasapatnāyudhaṃ janairnamitaṃ ś‍yāmakāya﻿-
makalaṅaṃ‍ka śāntaṃ śāntarūpaṃ amitamanantam | caḥ samuccaye | kamalāsanaṃ brahmāṇamabhilakṣīkṛtya virājantaṃ śobhamānaṃ mānaya pūjayeti ||
saṃskṛtabhāṣāyāṃ yathā—
rucibhī rañjitā ārihetayaścakradīptayo yena tam, jananairdaśabhiravatārairbhitaṃ paricchinnam, sāmāni kāyati gāyati yaḥ sa sāmakāyastam, na vidyate kalā yasya so 'kalastam, kaṃ santaṃ brahmāṇaṃ aṃ viṣṇumitaṃ gatam, abhivirājaṃ garutmantamabhi taṃ prasiddhaṃ kamalāsanaṃ śriyā saṃsaktaṃ mā māṃ naya prāpayeti ||
evaṃ paiśācādibhirapi saṃskṛtasya prākṛtādeśca parasparasaṃbhedanācchleṣo gaveṣaṇīya ityāśayavānāha—yathā veti | akalaṅkaṃ doṣarahitaṃ mānayeti dhātvarthasya bhāvyatvenānvayātpūjāṃ kurvityarthaḥ | brahmāṇamabhilakṣīkṛtyeti | rucaya ātmīyāḥ | arā vidyante yasya tadari cakram | hetayaḥ kiraṇāḥ | jananaṃ janma | sāmāni kāyati kīrtayatīti ‘apavādaviṣaye kvacidutsargaḥ pravartate’ iti karmaṇyam | kalā avayavāḥ prasiddhāḥ | vīnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ rājā garuḍastabhabhi itaṃ gatam | kamalā lakṣmīstasyā āsanamadhiṣṭhānaṃ mā māṃ nayeti ||
āvṛttiryā tu varṇānāṃ nātidūrāntarasthitā |
alaṃkāraḥ sa vidvadbhiranuprāsaḥ pradarś‍yate || 70 ||
anudbhaṭāvṛtteścitrādudbhaṭāvṛttimanuprāsaṃ pūrvaṃ lakṣayati—āvṛttiriti | varṇānāmiti vacanamatantram | ‘sāraḥ sārasvatī mūrttiḥ’ ityādāvekavarṇāvṛtterapyanuprāsatvāt | tena yamakavyatiriktā varṇāvṛttiranuprāsa iti lakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhavati | na ca śleṣe 'tiprasaṅgaḥ | tantrābhyāṃ viśeṣāt | pūrvajātipratibimbanena bandhacchāyārthakatayānuprāso 'laṃkārapadavīmadhyāste | naca nirnimittameva pratibimbanamata āha—nātidūreti | asti kaściduñcāraṇasya jñānasya vā viśeṣo yaḥ śīghrameva saṃskāramudbodhayatīti tadvatī varṇāvṛttirabhipretā | ata eva prācīnavarṇajātyanugataḥ sahṛdayāvarjakatayā prakṛṣṭaśca varṇānāmanuprāsa iti kāś‍mīrikā niruktiḥ ||
﻿
śrutibhirvṛttibhirvarṇaiḥ padairnāmadviruktibhiḥ |
lāṭānāmuktibhiścāyaṃ ṣaṭprakāraḥ prakāśate || 71 ||
evaṃ sthite sāmānyalakṣaṇavibhāgamāha—śrutibhiriti | āvṛttirdvidhā—varṇamātrāvalambinī, samudāyagocarā ca | ādyāpi dvidhā—sāmānyataḥ rūpataśca | sāmānyamapi dvidhā—sthānataḥ, vyāpārataśca | tatra sthānaṃ kaṇṭhādilakṣaṇaṃ saiva śrutiḥ | śrūyate hi tayābhivyakto varṇavyāpāro 'bhivyañjanarūpaḥ, sa eva rasaviṣaye vartanaṃ vṛttirucyate | śrutibhirityādau itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā ||
prāyeṇa śrutyanuprāsasteṣvanuprāsanāyakaḥ |
sanāthaiva hi vaidarbhī bhāti tena vicitritā || 72 ||
prāyeṇeti | śrutyanuprāso hi śleṣaghaṭakaḥ | śleṣaśca guṇāntarasamakakṣatayāvatiṣṭhamāno vaidarbhī prayojayati | anuprāsāntaraṃ tu praụdhiṃ vā mādhuryaṃ vā prakarṣayatīti na tathānukūlyam | kaviśaktivaśāttu kvacittadapi prayojayatīti prāyapadena sūcitam | sthitiprayojako loke nātha ityucyate, teṣu nāyaka ityeva vaktavye punaranuprāsapadamanuprāsāntarasādhāraṇyenaiva śabdālaṃkāratvaṃ darśayitumiti samādheyam | vicitritā ālekhyamiva lekhayā camatkārakāritvamānītā ||
niveśayati vāgdevī pratibhānavataḥ kaveḥ |
puṇyairamumanuprāsaṃ sasamādhini cetasi || 73 ||
kathaṃ punarasyānuprāsasya pṛthakprayatnānusaṃdheyasyāpi rasaprakāśasāmagryāmantarbhāva ityata āha—niveśayatīti | akliṣṭapadavākyārthasphuraṇaṃ pratibhānam | tadeva kathamityata āha—sasamādhinīti | puṇyairiti | tena rasavattvavyavasthitasya kaverahaṃpūrvikākṛṣṭo 'nuprāso na pṛthakprayatnanirvartya iti tātparyam | grāmyādibhedo 'gre vivariṣyate ||
sa tridhā—grāmyaḥ, nāgaraḥ, upanāgaraśca | teṣu grāmyaścaturdhā—masṛṇaḥ, varṇamasṛṇaḥ, varṇotkaṭaḥ, varṇānutkaṭaśca |
teṣāṃ masṛṇo yathā—
‘eṣa rājā dayālakṣmīṃ prāptavānbrāhmaṇapriyaḥ |
tadā prabhṛti dharmasya loke 'sminnutsavo 'bhavat || 166 ||’ ﻿
atra sthānataḥ samānaśrutīnāṃ mūrdhanyatālavyadantyauṣṭhyakaṇṭhyavarṇānāṃ prathamatṛtīyapādayornirantarā dvitīyacaturthayośca sāntarā paṭa iva sragdāmnīva vā varṇapradānānmasṛṇaivāvṛttiḥ | so 'yaṃ śrutyanuprāso masṛṇa ityucyate ||
ekapadapratibhāsamātrānumeyo masṛṇaḥ | rūpasājātye 'pi masṛṇatānyagbhūto varṇamasṛṇaḥ | udbhaṭarūpasājātyānuviddho varṇotkaṭaḥ | anudbhaṭasājātyānurodhena kiṃcidabhibhūtamasṛṇabhāvo varṇānutkaṭaḥ | eṣa rājetyādāvudāharaṇe ṣakārarephau mūrdhanyau, jakārayakārau tālavyau, dakāralakārau dantyāviti prathamapāde | takāradakārau dantyau, pakārabhakārāvauṣṭhyau, takāradhakārau dantyāviti tṛtīyapāde ca | nirantaraṃ dvitīyapāde rephaṇakārau mūrdhanyau | caturthapāde lakārasakārau dantyāvityādi | vinā krameṇa sāntaramāvartanaṃ navarūpasājātyaṃ kvacidullikhatīti masṛṇa evāyam ||
varṇamasṛṇo yathā—
‘sthitāḥ kṣaṇaṃ pakṣmasu tāḍitādharāḥ payodharotsedhanipātacūrṇitāḥ |
valīṣu tasyāḥ skhalitāḥ prapedire cireṇa nābhiṃ prathamodabindavaḥ 167’
atra dantyau mūrdhanyāvoṣṭhyau ḍalayoraikyena dantyapañcakaṃ mūrdhanya ityādinā krameṇa yadyapi pūrvavatsthānataḥ samānaśrutitayā masṛṇaivāvṛttiḥ, tathāpi citrapaṭa iva mālyagrathana iva vā yo 'yaṃ kṣaṇaṃ pakṣmasu tāḍitādharāḥ, payodharaḥ, valīḥ, skhalitāḥ prapedire cireṇa nābhiṃ prathamodabindavaḥ, iti nānāvarṇātmakaḥ sūtrāntarasyeva puṣpāntarasyeva vā sthānabhedena masṛṇa eva niveśastenaiṣa śrutyanuprāso varṇamasṛṇa ityucyate ||
atra citratantumayaḥ paṭaḥ | ekajātīyakusumagrathanātprāk sthitā ityādi | atra thakāratakārau dantyau, ṣakāraṇakārau mūrdhanyau, pakāramakārāvoṣṭhyau | tāḍitetyatra ḍakāre lakārakalpanayā sanalatadhāḥ pañca dantyāśca repho mūrdhanya iti prathamapāde | dvitīyapāde ca dhakārasakārau nakāratakārau dantyāvityādinā krameṇa sāntarā nirantarā ca śrutita eva varṇāvṛttiḥ pūrvavadupalabhyate | kiṃtu takārādīnāṃ rūpato 'pi sthāne sthāne pūrvamasṛṇatānyagbhūtaivāvṛttistenāyaṃ varṇamasṛṇaḥ | śrutisājātyaṃ ca na kvacidvighaṭate | atraiva nidarśanadvayam ||
﻿
varṇotkaṭo yathā—
‘vimucya sā hāramahāryaniścayā viloladṛṣṭiḥ praviluptacandanā |
bavandha bālāruṇababhruvalkalaṃ payodharotsedhaviśīrṇasahatiḥ || 168 ||’
atra sarvaṃ pūrvavat | kiṃtu tṛtīyapāde babandha bālāruṇababhruvalkalamiti varṇādhikyayogaḥ | so 'yaṃ varṇotkaṭo nāma śrutyanuprāsaḥ ||
vimucyeti | hārocitasaṃniveśayorapi stanayoranucitavalkalabandhasaṃbhāvane heturahāryaniścayeti | ata eva sā māṃ ko 'pi vārayediti kātaratāprādurbhāvāditastato viloladṛṣṭiḥ | atra hakāramakārāvoṣṭhyau, cakārayakārau tālavyāvityādinā krameṇa masṛṇā hakārādīnāṃ rūpasājātye 'pi masṛṇatāprādhānyādvarṇamasṛṇā cāvṛttirityāha—atra sarvamiti | varṇotkaṭatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe—varṇādhikyayoga iti | udbhaṭaṃ hi rūpasājātyaṃ varṇotkaṭatvam | tacca sarūpavarṇāvṛttyādhikyenetyarthaḥ ||
varṇānutkaṭo yathā—
‘tataḥ prabhṛtyunmadanā piturgṛhe lalāṭikācandanadhūsarālakā |
na jātu bālā labhate sma nirvṛtiṃ tuṣārasaṃghātaśilātaleṣvapi || 169 ||’
atra dantyavarṇaprāyatayātimasṛṇatve śilātaleṣviti dantyavarṇābhyāmeva varṇastomo dattaḥ |so 'yaṃ varṇānutkaṭo nāma śrutyanuprāsaḥ | te 'mī catvāro 'pyatiprasiddhatayā grāmyā ucyante ||
tataḥ prabhṛtīti | tāpodrekāddattaṃ dattameva candanamāśyānabhāvena reṇubhiralakacchaṭāsu viśīryata iti dvitīyakāmāveśo dhvanitaḥ | atra takāranakārau dakāranakārāvityādinā krameṇa ślokasamāptiṃ yāvadbahavo dantyāḥ | tenaikaśrutivyāptasya saṃdarbhasya masṛṇatāyāmatiśayaḥ | śilātaleti rūpasājātyena lakārāvudbhūtaśrutikau | na cādhikāvṛttiratrāstītyanutkaṭatā | na ca śruterudbhave 'pi masṛṇatā na prakṛṣyata iti varṇānutkaṭo 'yam | grāmyatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe—te 'mī catvāro 'pīti | śrutisājātyasya śabdānuśāsane 'pi prasiddheratiprasiddhatvam ||
grāmyavaiparītyena nātiprasiddho nāgaraḥ | yathocyate—
ekatvabuddhirbhede 'pi tattve 'pyekatvanihnavaḥ |
yasya varṇasya taṃ prāhuranuprāsasya jīvitam || 74 ||
﻿
tatra bhede 'pyekatvabudhdyā samānasthānayoryathā—
‘harerlaṅghitagharmāṃśurvyomni dīrgheṇa raṃhasā |
balibandhanaghoro 'ṅghriraṃhaḥsaṅghaṃ nihantu vaḥ || 170 ||’
atra hakārasya tulyasyātulyasthānena ghakāreṇa saha bhede 'pyekatvabuddhestulyaśrutitvamiti bhede 'pyekatvabudhdyā nāgarānuprāso 'yam ||
grāmyavaiparītyeneti | grāmyaviruddhasvabhāvo hi loke nāgara ityucyate | atiprasiddherabhāvo virodhastenālaṃkārasamayopajīvipañcaṣaprasiddhiranatiprasiddhirityuktaṃ bhavati | etadeva pūrvācāryamatena viśadayati—yathocyata iti | ekaśrutikatayā bhānaṃ hi śrutisājātyamabhimatam | śrutiśca vāstavī pratipādanamātrārụ̄dhā veti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ | tato bhede 'pyekatvabudhdyānuprāsasiddhiḥ | tattve ekatve | āpātataḥ sājātyānavabhāse 'pi sahṛdayapraṇidhānenāvabhāsanaṃ śrutyanuprāsaprayojakameva | anuprāsasya | anuprāsavataḥ saṃdarbhasyetyarthaḥ | vijātīyayorekajātyapratibimbanaṃ dvidhā bhavati sthānasāmye tadasāmye ca | tayorādyamudāharati—tatreti | dīrgheṇa raṃhaseti, ghoro 'ṅghririti, raṃhaḥsaṅghamiti, ghakārahakārāṇāṃ sthānasāmye 'pi vaijātyamastyeva | tathā paṭhitau tulyavacchrutiḥ pratibhātīti sahṛdayahṛdayasākṣiko 'yamarthaḥ ||
tathaivāsamānasthānayoryathā—
‘ucchalanmatsyapucchāgradaṇḍapātāhatāmbhasi |
jagadudyānamambhodhāvunmamajja mamajja ca || 171 ||’
atrocchalanmatsyapucchāgretyatra tsyacchakārayoriva tsyakārasyāpi tulyaśrutitvamityasamānasthānatvena bhede 'pyekatvabudhdyā nāgarānuprāso 'yam ||
atra tsyacchakārayoriti | cachau tālavyau, tasau dantyāviti sthānabhedaḥ prakāśa eva | tathāpi piṇḍībhūtābhyāṃ ca stambībhūtamadhyapatitau tasau samānaśrutikāviti paṭhitau saubhāgyamarpayataḥ | tenāyamasamānasthānayorekatvabudhdyā nāgarānuprāsa iti ||
tattve 'pyekanihnavena ḍakāravakārayakārāṇāṃ yathā—
‘kroḍe mā ḍimbhamādāya caṇḍi pīḍaya vakṣasā |
karṇe brūhi vayasyāyā yuvā yadayamucyate || 172 ||’
﻿
atra ḍakārādīnāmīṣatspṛṣṭatādibhirekatve 'pi bhedāvabhāsa iti tattve 'pyekatvanihnavena nāgarānuprāso 'yam ||
tattve 'pīti | drutādau vṛttimātraṃ bhidyate, na tu rūpamiti mahābhāṣyakāroktadiśā yeṣāmekasthānatve 'pīṣatspṛṣṭataratvādikṛtā bhedaprathā te ḍakārādayaḥ | katipaye 'sya viṣayāstānuddiśya krameṇodāharati—kroḍa ityādi | aṅkagatasya bālakasya vakṣasā pīḍanaṃ saṃkrāntakamāliṅganamāmananti | anena kila pracchannapriyagocaro gạ̄dhāliṅganamanorathaḥ prakaṭito bhavati | karṇayorupāṃśu yadabhidhīyate tena tulyamidamiti vidagdhasahacarīparihāsoktiriyam | atra ca kroḍaḍimbhetyādau ḍakāravakārayakārāṇāmīṣatspṛṣṭataratvādibhedaḥ śrutisājātyaṃ ca suprasiddhameveti ||
tathaiva ḍhakāravakāralakārāṇāṃ yathā—
‘navọdhe tvaṃ kucạ̄dhyāpi nopagụ̄dhāya ̣dhaukase |
vahanbāhulate hrīṇo varaḥ pulakalaṅghite || 173 ||’
atra ḍhakārādīnāmīṣatspṛṣṭatādibhirekatve 'pi bhedāvabhāsa iti tattve 'pyekatvanihnavena nāgarānuprāso 'yam ||
ḍhakāravakāralakārāṇāmiti | vakārodāharaṇaṃ dattamapi varṇāntarasaralatayā punardīyate | upagūḍhamāliṅganam | apiśabdo bhinnakramaḥ | upagụ̄dhāyāpi na ̣dhaukase | dūre patataḥ kacagrahādikeliṣu pravṛttirlaṅghanena sarvāṅgīṇaḥ pulakodbhedo bahirvyāvartanamantaranuvartanaṃ ca mugdhāṅganājātiḥ | atrāpi ḍhakārādīnāmīṣatspṛṣṭatādibhedaḥ subodha eva ||
ubhayaguṇayogānnātyaprasiddha upanāgaraḥ | yathocyate—
ḍalayoraikyamityādivākyairyasyānumīyate |
samānaśrutitānyonyaṃ so 'nuprāsaḥ praśasyate || 75 ||
sa ḍalayoraikyena yathā—
‘śayane yasya śeṣāhiḥ sanīḍe vaḍavānalaḥ |
mahāsāhasināmagryaṃ tamīḍe jaḍaśāyinam || 174 ||’
so 'yamupanāgaraḥ śrutyanuprāsaḥ || ﻿
ubhayaguṇayogāditi | prasidhdyaprasiddhī dvau guṇau | atra pratyakṣānumānarūpopāyabhedādavirodhaḥ | tadetadanyamatena vivṛṇoti—ḍalayoraikyamiti | sanīḍaḥ samīpaṃ jalamajjanaśeṣāhivaḍavānalānāmanarthanidānatayā prakhyātānāmapi sevayā mahāsāhasikānāmagryatā | atra ḍakāralakārayorbhinnaśrutitā pratyakṣata eva | śrutisāmyaṃ punaranumānātpratīyate | evamuttarodāharaṇeṣvapi boddhavyam ||
naṇayoraikyena yathā—
‘bāṇaiḥ kṣuṇṇeṣu sainyeṣu tvayā deva raṇāṅgaṇe |
hataśeṣāḥ śrayantīme śūnyāraṇyāni vidviṣaḥ || 175 ||’
atra kṣuṇṇeṣu sainyeṣu śūnyāraṇyānīti nakāraṇakārayoḥ svalpaśrutitvamekatvaṃ vā bhāsata iti upanāgaro 'yaṃ śrutyanuprāsaḥ ||
kṣuṇṇeṣu sainyeṣviti | granthimahimnā nakāraṇakārayoḥ sāmyapratibhāsaḥ | raṇāṅgaṇa iti | madhyavartināṃ saṃyogena sāmyonmudraṇam | aṅgaṇaśabdo 'dhikaraṇalyuḍantaḥ | pṛṣodarāditvāṇṇatvavyutpādanamanārṣam | evaṃ śūnyāraṇyānītyatra vyākhyeyam | ādyantavyākhyānamupalakṣaṇamavaseyam ||
ralayoraikyena yathā—
‘vibhinnavarṇā garuḍāgrajena sūryasya rathyāḥ paritaḥ sphurantyā |
ratnaiḥ punaryatra rucā rucaṃ svāmāninyire vaṃśakarīranīlaiḥ || 176 ||’
atra karīranīlairiti rephalakārayoraikyena tulyaśrutyā caturṣvapi pādeṣvanuprāsanirvahaṇamityupanāgaro 'yaṃ śrutyanuprāsaḥ ||
nirantararephagrathanālīḍhasyeva lakārasya śrutisājātyamullikhatīti tadidamāha—atra karīranīlairiti | etadanuprāsasidhdyā caturṣvapi pādeṣu rephānuprāsanirvahaṇamapi kaviśaktivyutpattivyañjakamupapannaṃ bhavatītyāha—caturṣvapīti ||
dantyatālavyānāmaikyena yathā—
‘vidyāsyando vāgvidāṃ yaḥ prasannaḥ puṇyāṃ vācaṃ devatāṃ tāṃ namāmaḥ |
yāṃ brahmāṇaścintayante viśokāḥ sā no deyātsūnṛtā sūnṛtāni || 177 ||’
﻿
atra dantyatālavyānāmaikyena tulyaśrutinetyupanāgaro 'yaṃ śrutyanuprāsaḥ | sarve 'pi cānuprāsāḥ prāyeṇa visadṛśavarṇāntaritā eva svadante ityauṣṭhyakaṇṭhyādīnāmihānupraveśo bhavati ||
vidyāsyandaḥ sārasvatapravāhaḥ saiva vāgdevatā śabdabrahmarūpā taccintayā parabrahmādhigamaniḥśreṇībhūtayā śokasya iṣṭahānijakhedasya vicchedaḥ | atra syandaḥ prasanna iti dantyau sakārau, brahmāṇaścetayanto viśokā ityādeśānādeśau śakārau tālavyau, punarante sā sūnṛtāmīti trayo dantyāḥ, sarveṣāṃ saṃbhūya pāṭhe tulyaśrutitaiva pratibhāsata iti | nanu sajātīyānāṃ nirantaramāvāpe kartavye kimiti vijātīyavyavahitairāvṛttirudāhriyata ityata āha—sarve 'pīti ||
yathā jyotsnā candramasaṃ yathā lāvaṇyamaṅganām |
anuprāsastathā kāvyamalaṃkartumayaṃ kṣamaḥ || 76 ||
śleṣanirvāhakatayā śrutyanuprāso 'laṃkāra ityuktam, tacca saṃdarbhavyāpakatayaiva nirvahatītyāha—yatheti | jyotsnālāvaṇyayoḥ sarvāṅgīṇā śleṣasubhagayorevālaṃkāratāprasiddhiḥ ||
anuprāsaḥ kavigirāṃ padavarṇamayo 'pi yaḥ |
so 'pyanena stabakitaḥ śriyaṃ kāmapi puṣyati || 77 ||
nanvevamanuprāsāntaraviṣaye 'pi śrutyanuprāsaḥ prasaktastatra ca kimanena kariṣyata ityata āha—anuprāsaḥ kavigirāmiti | uktaṃ hi—‘na ghaṭanāmantareṇa kāvyabhāvaḥ | na ca kāvyamapahāya varṇānuprāsādīnāmātmalābhaḥ’ iti ||
muhurāvartyamāneṣu yaḥ svavargyeṣu vartate |
kāvyavyāpī sa saṃdarbho vṛttirityabhidhīyate || 78 ||
svavargyeṣviti | svaśabda ātmīyavacanaḥ | svavarge bhavāḥ svavargyāḥ kaca ṭatapāntaḥsthoṣmopalakṣitāḥ saptavargāḥ | svavargyeṣu vartata ityarthakathanam | māṇikyastabakitahāralatāvadanyonyālambanena parabhāgalābha ityabhiprāyatayā ca kāvyavyāpakenaiva saṃdarbheṇa nirūpyamāṇā vargyā vṛttirvṛttyanuprāsa iti paryavasito 'rthaḥ ||
kārṇāṭī kauntalī kauṅkī kauṅkaṇī bāṇavāsikā |
drāviḍī māthurī mātsī māgadhī tāmraliptikā || 79 || ﻿
auṇḍrī pauṇḍrīti vidvadbhiḥ sā dvādaśavidheṣyate |
atha lakṣaṇametāsāṃ sodāharaṇamucyate || 80 ||
varṇānuprāsādbhedo vakṣyate—karṇāṭādiprabhavakavihevākagocarāḥ kārṇāṭīprabhṛtayo na tu vṛttīnāṃ deśaiḥ kaścidupakāraḥ | baṇavāsanāmā dakṣiṇāpathe ratnābhagavatīcihnito deśaḥ | [kuṇḍalāntaragato 'yaṃ bhāgo 'nanvitaḥ pratīyate |bhrama dhātoriti | vidhimiti iti parāyaṇam ||]
tāsu varṇānuprāsavatī kārṇāṭī yathā—
‘kānte kuṭilamālokya karṇakaṇḍūyanena kim |
kāmaṃ kathaya kalyāṇi kiṃkaraḥ karavāṇi kim || 178 ||’
cavargānuprāsavatī kauntalī yathā—
‘jvalajjaṭiladīptārcirañjanoccayacāravaḥ |
