campakeṣu cakorākṣi cañcarīkāścakāsati || 179 ||’
avahitthaprastāve karṇakaṇḍūyitamoṭṭāyitākhyaḥ śrṛṅgārabhāvajo vikāraḥ ||
ṭavargānuprāsavatī kauṅkī yathā—
‘kumbhakūṭāṭṭakuṭṭākakuṭilotkaṭapāṇiruṭ |
hariḥ karaṭipeṭena na draṣṭumapi ceṣṭyate || 180 ||’
kumbhakūṭaṃ kumbhāgraṃ tadeva aṭṭo 'ṭṭālakaḥ | ‘ruṣa hiṃsāyām’ | yathoktena pāṇinā ruṣatīti kkip | peṭaḥ samūhaḥ ||
tavargānuprāsavatī kauṅkaṇī yathā—
‘madhurmadhūni gāndharvamandiraṃ madirekṣaṇā |
induraindīvaraṃ dāma kāmamānandayanti naḥ || 181 ||’
madhurvasantaḥ | gāndharvaṃ gītam | atra dhakāradakārānuprāsairāsamāpti nirvahaṇam ||
pavargānuprāsavatī bāṇavāsikā yathā—
‘priyā pragalbhā tāmbūlaṃ parisrutphullamutpalam |
pṛṣatkāḥ pañcabāṇasya pañcamaḥ pañcamadhvaniḥ || 182 ||’ ﻿
parisrut madirā | pṛṣatkā bāṇāḥ | pañcamaḥ svaraviśeṣastadbhūyiṣṭho dhvaniḥ pañcamadhvaniḥ ||
antaḥsthānuprāsavatī drāviḍī yathā—
‘priyālalavalītālatamālailāvanāvalī |
bhāti patralahintālakṛtapuṇḍrā vadhūriva || 183 ||’
patralāḥ sāndrapatrāḥ | sidhmāderākṛtigaṇatvāllac | puṇḍraṃ tilakaḥ | atra lakāravakārānuprāsābhyāṃ saṃdarbhanirvāhaḥ ||
ūṣmānuprāsavatī māthurī yathā—
‘puṣṇatī puṣpadhanuṣaṃ muṣṇatī ploṣavipruṣaḥ |
miṣantī nirnimeṣeṇa cakṣuṣā mānuṣī na sā || 184 ||’
ploṣo virahadāhastasya vipruṣastīkṣṇā bhāgāḥ | te 'mī sapta śuddhā eva vṛttyanuprāsāḥ ||
dvitrivargānuprāsavatī mātsī yathā—
‘kokilālāpavācālo māmeti malayānilaḥ |
ucchalacchīkarācchācchanirjharāmbhaḥkaṇokṣitaḥ || 185 ||’
saṃkīrṇāḥ punaranye pañca bhavanti | tatra saṃkaro dvidhā—vijātīyasaṃvalanam, mithaḥ saṃbhedena saṃyogarūpatā ca | kokilālāpetyādau kavargāntaḥsthacavargānuprāsāḥ sphuṭā eva | saṃyogastu vidyamāno 'pi na vivakṣitaḥ ||
dvābhyāṃ vidarbhitaikavargyā māgadhī yathā—
‘aghaughaṃ no nṛsiṃhasya ghanāghanaghanaghvaniḥ |
hanyāddhurughurāghoraḥ sudīrgho ghoraghargharaḥ || 186 ||’
vidarbhitaḥ svāntarāyeṇa vaidarbhīprapañcaśobhāmānītaḥ | ghurughuretyavyaktānukaraṇam | atrāsamāpti kavargānuprāsastavargāntaḥsthānuprāsābhyāṃ vidarbhitaḥ | evamanyatrāpi vaidarbhī gaveṣaṇīyā ||
svāntyasaṃyogivargyā tāmraliptikā yathā—
‘śiñjānamañjumañjīrāścārukāñcanakāñcayaḥ |
kaṅkaṇāṅkabhujā bhānti jitānaṅga tavāṅganāḥ || 187 ||’
﻿
saṃyogo dvividhaḥ—sajātīyena, anyena ca | ādyastrividhaḥ—svargyāntasarūpatadanyasaṃyogabhedāt | ete yathākramaṃ vṛttitrayaṃ prayojayantītyāha—svāntyetyādi | śiñjānā madhuraṃ śabdāyamānāḥ | mañjīrā nūpurāḥ | atra pūrvārdhe svāntyasaṃyoginau cavargau, uttarārdhe tu kavargāviti ||
sarūpasaṃyogigrathitauṇḍrī yathā—
‘sallatāpallavollāsī cittavi(vṛ)ttaharo nṛṇām |
majjatījjalasajjāsu nadīṣu malayānilaḥ || 188 ||’
santaḥ kamanīyā latānāṃ pallavāstadullāsanamātrapravīṇatayā tīvratāvyatirekaḥ | ata eva nṛṇāṃ vidagdhamithunānāṃ cittameva sarvasvabhūtaṃ vittaṃ haratīti | ijjalā niculāstaiḥ sajjāḥ sannaddhāḥ | niculanikuñjasannaddhanadīmajjanena śītalatvamunmīlitam ||
asarūpasaṃyogagrathitā pauṇḍrī yathā—
‘astamastakaparyastasamastārkāṃśusaṃstarā |
pīnastanasthitā tāmrakamravastreva vāruṇī || 189 ||’
asto 'stācalaḥ | kamraṃ kamanīyam ||
akaṭhorākṣarādānaṃ nātinirvahaṇaiṣiṇaḥ |
aśaithilyaṃ ca satkartuṃ vuttyanuprāsamīśate || 81 ||
vṛttyanuprāsarasikasya kaveḥ prasajamānaṃ doṣamapākartuṃ śikṣāmāha—akaṭhoreti | taduktam— ‘paruṣābhidhāyivacanādanukaraṇāccāparatra no paruṣam | racayedathāgatiḥ syāttatrāpi hrādayo hreṣāḥ ||’ atinirvāhe vyaktameva vairasyam | taduktam—‘sarva evānuprāsāḥ prāyeṇe'tyādi | komalamātravargyanirvahaṇe tu śaithilyasaṃbhāvanamiti ||
kvacidasti kvacinnāsti kvacidasti na cāsti ca |
varṇānuprāsa eṣā tu sarvato 'stīti bhidyate || 82 ||
nanvanuprāsād vṛttīnāṃ ko viśeṣa ityata āha—kvaciditi | kvacidavṛttibhāge caraṇādyātmake bhavatyeva | kvacitpunaraṃśabhedena bhavati na bhavati ca | tāvataiva tasyālaṃkāratvam | vṛttiśarīravyāpakatayā nirūpyamāṇastu vargyānto 'nya eva | ayaṃ varṇānuprāsādvṛttyanuprāsa ityarthaḥ ||
﻿
anye punaranyathā vṛttiṃ vyācakṣate—
sparśādīnāmasaṃbandhaḥ saṃbandho vāpi yo mithaḥ |
sphuṭādibandhasaṃsidhdyai seha vṛttirnigadyate || 83 ||
anye punariti | varṇānāṃ vartanaṃ vartanādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vartipadenābhimatam | ādye saṃghaṭanavighaṭanābhyāṃ dvidhā | samastavyastabhedena saṃghaṭanavighaṭane dvidhā | kādayo māvasānāḥ sparśāḥ | ādigrahaṇādantaḥsthoṣmaṇoḥ saṃghaṭanabahulaḥ saṃdarbhaḥ prasphuṭaḥ | vighaṭanabahulaḥ komalaḥ | ubhayabahula unmiśraḥ ||
kāvyavyāpī ca saṃdarbho vṛttirityabhidhīyate |
saukumāryamatha praụdhirmadhyamatvaṃ ca tadguṇāḥ || 84 ||
gambhīraujasvinī praụdhā madhurā niṣṭhurā ślathā |
kaṭhorā komalā miśrā parūṣā lalitāmitā || 85 ||
dvitīyaṃ vṛttiśabdārthamāha—kāvyavyāpī ceti | atrāpi doṣaprasaṅgāpākaraṇārthamāha—saukumāryamiti | ata eva [saukumāryapraụdhimadhyamatvāni] guṇāḥ | śaithilyaparuṣatve tu doṣāvityarthaḥ ||
iti dvādaśadhā bhinnā kavibhiḥ paripaṭhyate |
kāraṇaṃ punarutpattesta evāsāṃ vijānate || 86 ||
yogāsaṃyogayoḥ pratiyogivyavasthāvirahātkathaṃ dvādaśaprakāratā vyavasthitirityāśayavānāha—kāraṇaṃ punariti ||
tāsu gambhīrā yathā—
‘apphundanteṇa ṇahaṃ mahiṃ ca taḍi uddhamāiadiseṇa |
dundubhigambhīraravaṃ duṇḍuhiaṃ ambuvāheṇa || 190 ||’
[āspandatā nabho mahīṃ ca taḍidudhmāpitadiśā |
dundubhigambhīraravaṃ dundubhitamambuvāhena ||]
saiṣā prāyastavargapavargayostṛtīyacaturthānāṃ pakāraphakārayośca svasaṃyogabinduyogāmyāṃ jāyate || ﻿
dūṣaṇapratipattisaukaryāttatprasidhdyaiva pṛthagudāhriyata ityāha—tāsviti | apphundanteṇa vyāptavatā | uddhamāiaṃ vyāptam | dundubhirantargatakāṃsyabhājano niḥsvānaviśeṣaḥ | duṇḍuhiaṃ śabdāyitam | dakāradhakārau tavargasya bakārabhakārau pavargasya tṛtīyacaturthau ||
ojasvinī yathā—
‘pattā a sībharāhaadhāuśilāalaṇisaṇṇarāiajalaam |
sañjaṃ ojjurapahasidadarimuhaṇimmahiavaülamaïrāmodam || 191 ||’
[prāptāśca śīkarāhatadhātuśilājalaniṣaṇṇarājitajalajam |
sahyaṃ nirjharaprahasitadarīmukhanirmathitabakulamadirāmodam ||]
seyaṃ mūrdhanyānāṃ prathamacaturthapañcamadvitraistadāvṛttyā ca prāyo jāyate ||
satataśīkarasicyamānagairikaśilātalaluṇṭhanena jaladānāṃ rañjanam | viśīrya patanenātyantadhavalā nirjharā eva hāso yasya tādṛśena darīmukhenāntaḥprarūḍhabakulakusumāmodaniḥsaraṇarañjitajaladharapratibimbabhūtatāmranayanonmudraṇāt | hāsabakulāmodābhyāṃ ca kṣībatāroparūpā samāsoktirdhvanyata ityārādhyāḥ | ojjuro nirjharaḥ | ṇimmahiaṃ niḥsṛtam ||
praụdhā yathā—
‘kṛtvā puṃvatpātamuccairbhṛgubhyāṃ mūrdhni grāvṇāṃ jarjarā nirjharaughāḥ |
kurvanti dyāmutpatantaḥ smarārtaṃ svarlokastrīgātranirvāṇamatra || 192 ||’
saiṣā prāyeṇa mūrdhanyānāmantaḥsthānāṃ saṃyogātpūrvagurutvena jāyate ||
bhṛgavastaṭāḥ | bhṛgupātasya surastrīsaṃgamaḥ phalam | atra kurvansvarlokanirvartyeteṣu mūrdhanyānāmantaḥsthasaṃyogā uccaiḥśabda ityādau svabhāvagurūṇāmapi pūrvarūpasaṃyogasannidhau chāyāviśeṣo bhavatītyāhuḥ kecit ||
madhurā yathā—
‘kiñjalkasaṅgiśiñjānabhṛṅgalāñchitacampakaḥ |
ayaṃ madhurupaiti tvāṃ caṇḍi paṅkajadanturaḥ || 193 ||’
saiṣā prāyo 'nusvārapurovartisparśatayā jāyate || ﻿
anusvārapurovartīti | anusvārasvarūpatadādeśāvanusvārapadena gṛhyete | tena śamitahāsetyādāvanusvārābhāve 'pi na lakṣaṇamudāharaṇam ||
niṣṭhurā yathā—
‘svāṅgaśliṣṭādrijanmānaṃ netrārciḥ pluṣṭamanmatham |
staumi tryakṣaṃ dyuṣajjyeṣṭhaṃ daityaśreṇyarcitāṅghrikam || 194 ||’
saiṣā prāyaḥ saṃyogabhūyastvenotpadyate ||
svāṅgeti | divi sīdantīti dyuṣado devāḥ | suṣāmāditvātṣatvam | atraikāntaritāḥ saṃyogāḥ saṃdarbhavyāpakāḥ pratīyante | so 'yamasyāḥ saṃyujyamānāviśeṣe 'pi vṛttyantarādviśeṣo niṣṭhurādvaiparītyena śleṣodāharaṇaṃ sugamam ||
ślathā yathā—
‘dayitajanavirahavigalitanayanodakapītahariṇamadatilakam |
vadanamapagatamṛgamadaśaśikaraṇiṃ vahati loladṛśaḥ || 195 ||’
seyaṃ prāyo vyañjanā nāma saṃyogena janyate ||
karaṇiḥ sādṛśyam ||
kaṭhorā yathā—
‘nisarganirgatānarghaghargharadhvanihāstikam |
cakre cakraṃ yudhi krāmannalarkaḥ karkaśārkaruk || 196 ||’
saiṣā prāyaḥ kaṇṭhyarephādisaṃyogādutpadyate ||
saiṣā prāyaḥ kaṇṭhyeti | kaṇṭhyarephayoḥ kvacidanyasyāpyādipadopāttasya saṃyogo 'vaseyaḥ ||
komalā yathā—
‘dāruṇaraṇe raṇantaṃ karidāraṇakāraṇaṃ kṛpāṇaṃ te |
ramaṇakṛte raṇaraṇakī paśyati taruṇījano divyaḥ || 197 ||’
seyaṃ rephaṇakārādyasaṃyuktakomalavarṇaviracanayā niṣpadyate || ﻿
miśrā yathā—
‘pinaṣṭīva taraṅgāgrairudadhiḥ phenacandanam |
tadādāya karairindurlimpatīva digaṅganāḥ || 198 ||’
saiṣā prāyaḥ kaṭhorāṇāmoṣṭhyakaṇṭhyamūrdhanyānāṃ bāhulyādibhirupalabhyate ||
bāhulyādibhiriti | bāhulyālpatvamiśraṇaiḥ prādeśikairityarthaḥ ||
paruṣā yathā—
‘jahre nihrādihrādo 'sau kahlārāhlāditahradaḥ |
prasahya mahyā garhyatvamarhaṇāhaḥ śaranmarut || 199 ||’
saiṣā prāyeṇoṣmaṇāmantaḥsthādisaṃyogairavasthāpyate ||
lalitā yathā—
‘drāviḍīnāṃ dhruvaṃ līlārecitabhrūlate mukhe |
āsajya rājyabhāraṃ svaṃ sukhaṃ svapiti manmathaḥ || 200 ||’
saiṣā prāyeṇa dantyauṣṭhyatālavyānāṃ madhye 'ntaḥsthādisaṃyogaiḥ sthāpyate ||
drāviḍīnāmiti | kiṃcidunnamanaṃ recitam | tenādhijyakodaṇḍakriyākāribhrūlatāsanāthe duḥkharājyabhārāropaḥ | sugamamudāharaṇam ||
amitā yathā—
‘bakulakalikālalāmani kalakaṇṭhīkalakalākule kāle |
kalayā kalāvato 'pi hi kalayati kalitāstratāṃ madanaḥ || 201 ||’
seyamamitayoreva kakāralakārabandhayoranuprāsena prasūyate ||
iti dvādaśadhā vṛttiḥ kaiścidyā kathiteha sā |
na guṇebhyo na vṛttibhyaḥ pṛthaktvenāvabhāsate || 87 ||
tadetatsarveṣāṃ mataṃ dūṣayati—na guṇebhya iti | samatāsaukumāryādiguṇeṣu bhāratīprabhṛtiṣu ca vṛttiṣu yathāyathamantarbhāvo 'vagantavyaḥ ||
﻿
śrutyanuprāsavarṇānuprāsayorapi duṣkarāḥ |
kvacidbhedāḥ pṛthakkartumasyāsteneha neṣyate || 88 ||
śrutyanuprāsavarṇānuprāsayoriti | viṣayasaptamī | varṇāvṛttervṛttyanuprāsasādhāraṇatvāt ||
yathāmrātakapuṣpādisragādervarṇa ucyate |
varṇāvṛttistathā vācāṃ varṇānuprāsa ucyate || 89 ||
tato varṇānuprāsaṃ viśeṣayannāha—yathāmrātaketi | sragādervarṇasthānīyā varṇāvṛttirvarṇānuprāsaḥ | tatropamānabhūtavarṇavivaraṇaṃ samānajātīyakusumādiviracitamālāpaṭaprabhṛtiṣu yadantarāntarā vijātīyāmrātakakusumādisaṃniveśanaṃ tadvarṇa ityucyate | tadvatyā vācā varṇāvṛttiḥ | saiva varṇānuprāsa iti sūtrārthaḥ | sa dvidhā—saṃyuktāsaṃyuktavarṇanirūpyatvāt | yathāyathametadubhayaprapañcanam ||
sa tu stabakavānsthānī garbho vivṛtasaṃvṛtaḥ |
gṛhītamuktaḥ kramavānviparyasto 'tha saṃpuṭaḥ || 90 ||
stabakavadādayo dvādaśa prakārāsteṣu kvacitkvacitsaṃyogāvṛttiḥ stabakavān | anuprāsavinyāsāditi saṃyogānuprāsavinyāsataḥ ||
mithunaṃ veṇikā citro vicitraśceti varṇyate |
varṇāvṛttiprayogebhyastebhyastebhyo manīṣibhiḥ || 91 ||
teṣu sthāne sthāne 'nuprāsavinyāsataḥ stabakavānyathā—
‘yasyāvāsīkṛtahimagirerguñjatāṃ kuñjarāṇā- māviścakre vanagajamadāghrāṇaghorāyitāni |
darpotphullasphuraṇavikaṭākāṇḍakaṇḍūlagaṇḍa- svecchākāṣavraṇitasaralānokahaskandhagandhaḥ || 202 ||’
atra guñjatāṃ kuñjarāṇāmityādervarṇastabakasya sthāne sthāne vinyāsādayaṃ varṇānuprāsastabakavānityucyate ||
guñjatāṃ kuñjarāṇāmakāṇḍakaṇḍūlagaṇḍaskandhagandha ityatrāvṛtticatuṣkeṇa stabakanirvāhaḥ ||
﻿
niyatavivakṣitasthānaviśeṣaḥ sthānī yathā—
‘bāle māleyamuccairna bhavati gaganavyāpinī nīradānāṃ kiṃ tvaṃ pakṣmāntarālairmalinayasi sudhāvakramaśrupravāhaiḥ |
eṣā prodvṛttamattadvipakaṭakaṣaṇakṣuṇṇavindhyopalābhā dāvāgnervyomalagnā malinayati diśāṃ maṇḍalaṃ dhūmarekhā || 203 ||’
atra prathamatribhāgasthāneṣu bāle māleyamityādiniyamena vṛttiḥ | so 'yaṃ varṇānuprāsaḥ sthānītyucyate ||
sthānīti | ślokapāde 'pi prathamādibhāgakalpanayā sthānaniyamavivakṣā | tathāhi—bāle māleyamiti | prathamo bhāgo nīnī iti pratibhāsārūḍhastṛtīyādi prathamapāde | evaṃ pakṣmāntarālamalinasudhāśruprabhṛtīnāṃ dvitīyādipādeṣu prathamādibhāgakalpanāvaseyā ||
āvṛttervarṇāntarāyeṇa garbho yathā—
‘kālaṃ kapālamālāṅkamekamandhakasūdanam |
vande varadamīśānaṃ śāsanaṃ puṣpadhanvanaḥ || 204 ||’
atra kālaṃ kapālamāleti, aṅkamekamiti, vande varadamīśānaṃ śāsanamityādiṣu pakārarephakakāragarbhādhānādayaṃ varṇānuprāso garbha ityucyate ||
kālaṃ kālasvarūpam | ekamadvitīyam | kālaṃ kapāletyatra lakārāvṛttiḥ kakāreṇa vyavadhāne prakṛte kapāle 'nyatra pakāro | varṇāntaragarbhāyamāṇa upalakṣyate | evaṃ mālāṅkamityādau lakārādigarbhīkaraṇamavaseyam | vivṛtasaṃvṛtau nigadenaiva vyākhyātau ||
sthāne sthāne vikāsasaṃkocābhyāṃ vivṛtasaṃvṛto yathā—
‘na mālatīdāma vimardayogyaṃ na prema navyaṃ sahate 'parādhān |
mlānāpi na mlāyati kesarasragdevī na khaṇḍapraṇayā kathaṃcit || 205 ||’
atra prathamapāde na mālatīdāmetyādibhirvikāsaḥ, dvitīyapāde premetyākārāvṛttyā saṃkocaḥ, tṛtīyapāde mlānāpi na mlāyatītyetābhyāṃ ca vikāsaḥ, caturthe neti saṃkocaḥ | so 'yaṃ varṇānuprāso vivṛtasaṃvṛta ityucyate || ﻿
na mālatīdāmetyādau prathamapāde makārāvṛttirdvayena vivaraṇam, dvitīyapāde sakṛtprayogeṇa tasyaiva saṃvṛtiḥ tṛtīyapāde nakārasakārayorāvṛttyā vivṛtiḥ, caturthe neti saṃvaraṇam | tadiha bhūyovikāsa-kiṃcitsaṃkoca-kiṃcidvikāsa-sarvathāsaṃkocaparipāṭyā saṃdarbhanirvahaṇaṃ śobhākaramiti vyācaṣṭe—atreti ||
cakravālavaddhānopādānābhyāṃ gṛhītamukto yathā—
‘lolallavaṅgalavalīvalayā nikuñcakūjatkapiñjalakulā mukulāvanaddhāḥ |
adhyūṣire kanakacampakarājikāntā yenāparāntavijaye jaladherupāntaḥ || 206 ||’
atra cakravālakramaḥ suvyakta eva | so 'yaṃ varṇānuprāso gṛhītamukta ityucyate ||
loladiti | kapiñjalo gauratittiriḥ | aparānto deśaviśeṣaḥ | pūrvavalanenottaragrahaṇaṃ cakravālaṃ vyañjanamātravalanamabhipretam, tena valī valetyatrāpi cakravālasiddhiḥ | evamuttaratra ||
krameṇa dvitrāṇāṃ tricaturāṇāṃ varṇānāmasaṃyogasvaravarṇānāmāvṛttiḥ kramavānyathā—
‘nitambagurvī guruṇā prayuktā vadhūrvidhātṛpratimeva tena |
cakāra sā mattacakoranetrā lajjāvatī lājavimokamagnau || 207 ||’
atra gurvī guruṇā prayukteti, vadhūrvidhātṛ iti, cakāra cakoreti, lajjāvatī lājavimokamiti dvayostrayāṇāṃ ca svarasaṃyogavarṇānāṃ krameṇāvṛttiḥ, so 'yaṃ varṇānuprāsaḥ kramavānityucyate ||
krameṇeti | dvāvārabhyaiva kramasaṃbhava ūrdhvaṃ caturbhyo virasāyate | tena pañcaṣāṇāmityādinoktamasaṃyogasvarāṇāmityavivakṣitasaṃyogasvarāṇām | guruṇetyanullaṅghanīyājñatā | tathā calatpraktyā durvahanitambabhārālasāyā api kathaṃcitpadavinyāsena kāntiviśeṣo dhvanyate | svabhāvatāmrayorapi netrayostatkāle dhūmāśleṣād ﻿
dviguṇo rāga iti upamāne mattapadapoṣaḥ pūrvārdhe dvayordvayorūttarārdhe trayāṇāmanullaṅghitakramāṇāmeva vyañjanānāmāvṛttiriti sphuṭaṃ vivaraṇam ||
kramavatāṃ viparyayopanyāsādviparyayo yathā—
‘praṇavaḥ pravaṇe yatra prathamaḥ pramatheṣu yaḥ |
raṇavānvāraṇamukhaḥ sa vaḥ pātu vināyakaḥ || 208 ||’
atra vyutkramo vyakta eva | so 'yaṃ varṇānuprāso viparyaya ityucyate ||
kramavatāmupakrāntakiṃcitkramāṇāmāvṛttau tatkramaviparyāso vyutkramaḥ ||
svādyavarṇavartinā svareṇa saha pādamadhyāntayoranuprāsaḥ saṃpuṭaṃ yathā—
‘sthirāpāyaḥ kāyaḥ praṇayiṣu sukhaṃ sthairyavimukhaṃ mahārogābhogaḥ kuvalayadṛśaḥ sarpasadṛśaḥ |
gṛhāveśaḥ kleśaḥ prakṛticapalā śrīrapi khalā yamaḥ svairī vairī tadapi na hitaṃ karma vihitam || 209 ||’
tadetallakṣaṇenaiva vyākhyātam | so 'yaṃ varṇānuprāsaḥ saṃpuṭa ityucyate ||
svādyeti | āvartanīyo varṇaḥ svapadenābhimatastasya pūrvo yo varṇastadvartinā svareṇa saha tasyāvṛttiḥ | pādamadhyāntayoriti | madhyasaṃśliṣṭoparitanabhāgaghaṭitasamudgakatulyatayā saṃpuṭo 'nuprāsaḥ ||
antapādamupasaṃhāropakramayorvivakṣitaḥ sasvarānuprāso mithunaṃ yathā—
‘tyaja manasi sadāhe he smara sthānamasmi- nnanu kirasi śarīre re kimindo mayūkhān |
api parihara vāyo yogamaṅgairmadīyaiḥ praṇayini samavete te bhavantaḥ sakhāyaḥ || 210 ||’
tadetannigadenaiva vyākhyātam | so 'yaṃ varṇānuprāso mithunamityucyate ||
antapādamiti | vṛttaucitīvaśācca dvikhaṇḍalabdhaśobhāviśeṣeṣu pādeṣu mithunasiddhiravaseyā | tadidamuktamupakramopasaṃhārayoriti | mithunaṃ dvandvam ||
﻿
āvākyaparisamāptervarṇānuprāsanirvāho veṇikā yathā—
‘vidrāṇe rudravṛnde savitari tarale vajriṇi dhvastavajre jātāśaṅke śaśāṅke viramati maruti tyaktavaire kubere |
vaikuṇṭhe kuṇṭhitāstre mahiṣamatiruṣaṃ pauruṣopaghnanighnaṃ nirvighnaṃ nighnatī vaḥ śamayatu duritaṃ bhūribhāvā bhavānī || 211 ||’
tadetannātidurbodham | so 'yaṃ varṇānuprāso veṇiketyucyate ||
vidrāṇa iti | upaghna āśrayaḥ | nighnaḥ paravaśaḥ | anuprāsajāterāsamāpti nirvāho 'bhimataḥ | vyaktayaḥ punaranyā anyā evābhimatāstena vṛttyanuprāsādbhedaḥ | ata eva veṇītulyatā | tatra hi kila keśagrathanā nirvyụ̄dhaiva bhaktiḥ punaranyānyeti ||
uktalakṣaṇebhyo 'nyaścitro yathā—
‘nīte nirvyājadīrghā maghavati maghavadvajranidrānidāne nidrā drāgeva devadbiṣi muṣitaruṣaḥ saṃsmarantyāḥ svabhāvam |
devyā dṛgbhyastisṛbhyastraya iva galitā rāśayo raktatāyā rakṣantu tvāṃ triśūlakṣatikuharabhuvo lohitāmbhaḥsamudrāḥ || 212 ||’
evamanye 'pi draṣṭavyāḥ ||
uktalakṣaṇebhya iti | pūrvoktavarṇānuprāsebhya iti | tathāhi prakṛtodāharaṇe sthāne sthāne stabakāvivakṣāyāṃ na stabakavān, vibhāgaparihāreṇa na sthānī, varṇāntarāyānupapattau na garbhaḥ, saṃkocavikāsābhāvena na vivṛtasaṃvṛtaḥ, cakravālakramābhāvena na gṛhītamuktaḥ | evaṃ kramaviparyastamithunabahirbhāvo 'vagantavyaḥ | āsamāptinirvahaṇābhāve veṇībhedaḥ sphuṭa eva ||
ekavarṇāvṛttervṛttyanuprāsasya varṇāntaravaicitryeṇa vicitro yathā—
‘cañcatkāñjanakāñcayo layavalaccolāñcalairvañcitāścārīsaṃcaraṇaikacārucaraṇāḥ siñcanti cittaṃ mama |
līlācañcuracañcarīkarucibhiścūlālakaiścarcitāḥ kiṃciccandanacandracampakarucāṃ cauryo mṛgīlocanāḥ || 213 ||’
﻿
ekavarṇāvṛtteriti | vargyāvṛttau hi kadācidekavarṇāvṛttirapi saṃdarbhavyāpinī saṃbhāvyate | tasyāṃ pratīyamānāyāmevāntarāntarā nānājātīye varṇāvṛttiścitraśobhādāyinī vicitrānuprāsa ityucyate | tathā hi | prakṛtodāharaṇe saṃdarbhasamāptiṃ yāvadāvartamāne eva cakāre kāñcana kāñceti layavaladityādiṣu kakāralakārādyanuprāsodbhaṭabhāvenava varṇāvṛtternyagbhāva iva prakāśate | cārī saṃcaraṇaprakāraḥ | sā bhaumī ākāśī ca | cañcuro manoharaḥ | cañcarīko bhramaraḥ ||
anye punaranyathā citravicitrayorlakṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣate | tatra yamakacchāyānukārī citraḥ | sa eva varṇānuprāsavānvicitra iti | tatra citro yathā—
‘sarvāśārudhi dagdhavīrudhi sadā sāraṅgabaddhakrudhi kṣāmakṣmāruhi mandamunmadhulihi svacchandakandadruhi |
śuṣyatsrotasi taptabhūrirajasi jvālāyamānāmbhasi jyeṣṭhe māsi kharārkatejasi kathaṃ pāntha vrajañjīvasi || 214 ||’
anye punariti | vibhinnārthaikarūpatvaṃ sthānavibhāgālambanaṃ vyapetāvyapetabhāvaśca yamakacchāyāvarṇānuprāsavāniti atiśāyane matup | sarvāśārudhītyādau viprabhṛtīnāṃ vibhinnārthaikarūpāṇāṃ vyapetānāmeva pādamadhyāntayoravasthitiḥ | evamavyapetamapyunneyam | nātra varṇānuprāsa utkaṭa iti vicitrādbhedaḥ ||
vicitro yathā—
‘udyadbarhiṣi dardurāravapuṣi prakṣīṇapānthāyuṣi cyotadvipluṣi candraruṅ‌muṣi sakhe haṃsadviṣi prāvṛṣi |
mā muñcoccakucāntasaṃnatagaladbāṣpākulāṃ bālikāṃ kāle kālakarālanīlajaladavyāluptabhāsvattviṣi || 215 ||’
ata evottaratra sphuṭavarṇānuprāsamudāharati ||
varṇāvṛttiranuprāsa iti yaḥ kṛtalakṣaṇaḥ |
so 'yaṃ dvādaśadhā bhedaiḥ pravibhajya pradarśitaḥ || 92 ||
te 'mī śuddhavarṇā vṛttiprakārāḥ ṣaṭratriṃśallakṣitāḥ, sāṃprataṃ dvādaśatāpannavarṇāvṛttayo lakṣyanta ityāha—varṇāvṛttiranuprāsa iti | dvādaśadheti vīpsā draṣṭavyā ||
﻿
samagramasamagraṃ vā yasminnāvartate padam |
padāśrayeṇa sa prāyaḥ padānuprāsa ucyate || 93 ||
samagramiti | padālambano 'nuprāsaḥ padānuprāsastena padāvayavamālālambano 'pi padālambana eva | tadidamāha—padāśrayeṇeti ||
visargabindusaṃyogasvarasthānāvivakṣayā |
anirvāhācca sa prāyo yamakebhyo vibhidyate || 94 ||
masṛṇo danturaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ saṃpuṭaṃ saṃpuṭāvalī |
khinnaḥ stabakavānsthānī mithunaṃ mithunāvalī || 95 ||
gṛhītamuktanāmānyastato 'nyaḥ punaruktimān |
iti dvādaśabhedo 'yaṃ manīṣibhiriheṣyate || 96 ||
nanu yadi padāvṛttirabhinnārthā tadā punaruktireva, bhinnārthā cedyamakānna bhidyata ityata āha—visargeti | binduranusvāraḥ | sthānaṃ kaṇṭhādikam | vṛtteḥ pādādiyamakatābhāvo nirvāhaḥ prāyonirvāha iti yojanā ||
teṣu masṛṇo yathā—
‘saraṇe vāraṇāsyasya daśane 'śanisaṃnibhe |
cakāra valayākāraṃ bhujaṃ bhujagabhīṣaṇam || 216 ||’
so 'yamasaṃyuktavarṇāvṛtteḥ padānuprāso masṛṇa ityucyate ||
vāraṇāsyo vināyakaḥ | atra raṇeraṇeti śaneśanīti kārakāramiti bhujaṃbhujeti padaṃ tadekadeśāvṛttiḥ sphuṭamupalabhyate | masṛṇastu kathamityata āha—so 'yamiti ||
danturo yathā—
‘sa naiṣadhasyādhipateḥ sutāyāmutpādayāmāsa niṣiddhaśatruḥ |
anūnasāraṃ niṣadhānnarendrātputraṃ yamāhurriṣadhākhyameva || 217 ||’
atra niṣiddhaśatruriti pade saṃyogādhikyena danyuratā | so 'yaṃ padānuprāso dantura ityucyate || ﻿
sa naiṣadhetyādau niṣadharūpo varṇasamudāyaḥ padaikadeśatāmāpannaḥ sādhāraṇa eva | tadatra danturatā kīdṛśītyata āha—atra niṣiddheti |
ślakṣṇo yathā—
‘apyehi kānte vaidehi dehi prativaco mama |
aravindākṣi dākṣiṇyamalaṃkāro hi yoṣitām || 218 ||’
atra svareṇa sahāvṛtteḥ ślakṣṇatā | so 'yaṃ padānuprāsaḥ ślakṣṇa ityucyate ||
saṃpuṭaṃ yathā—
‘sadarpa iva kaṃdarpastaralā mādṛśāṃ matiḥ |
asāra iva saṃsāraḥ kuruṣva madanugraham || 219 ||’
atrevaśabdasyāpavādatvenāvyavadhāyakatvādanuprāso 'yaṃ saṃpuṭa ityucyate ||
saṃpuṭavadekarūpasyaiva khaṇḍasya nirantaramāvartanaṃ saṃpuṭam | tatkathamiva kaṃsaṃśabdairantarāye saṃpadyata ityata āha—atrevaśabdasyeti ||
saṃpuṭāvalī yathā—
‘karoti kiṃ kirāto 'yaṃ samākṛṣya śilīmukhān |
śilīmukhānsamākṛsya kiṅkirātaḥ karoti yat || 220 ||’
atra karoti karotītyekaṃ saṃpuṭam, kiṃ kirātaḥ kiṅkirāta iti dvitīyam, samākṛṣya samākṛṣyeti tṛtīyam, śilīmukhāñchilīmukhāniti caturtham | so 'yaṃ padānuprāsaḥ saṃpuṭāvalītyucyate ||
karoti kiṃ kirāto 'yamityādau madhye śilīmukhāñchilīmukhāniti prathamaṃ saṃpuṭam | tasya bahirāvaraṇabhūtaṃ samākṛṣya samākṛṣyeti dvitīyam | tasyāpi kiṃ kirātaḥ kiṅkirāta iti tṛtīyam | tasyāpi karotīti caturtham | tadetadviparītavyākhyayā vyañjayannāha—atra karotītyādi ||
﻿
BREAK
khinno yathā—
‘kulajātisamākulīkṛtānāṃ sukhadasukhāśayamūḍhacetanānām |
abhavavibhavalābhalolubhānāṃ bhava bhavabandhavibhedanāya bhūyaḥ || 221 ||’
atra rīteranirvāhātkhinnatā | so 'yaṃ padānuprāsaḥ khinna ityucyate ||
kuleti | atra prathamapāde kuleti avivakṣitasvarādivarṇayugmamakṣaracatuṣṭayavyavadhānena kulītyāvṛttam | dvitīyatṛtīyapādayostu sukhadasukheti abhavavibhaveti caikavarṇavyavadhānenāvṛttiḥ | caturthapāde tu bhavabhaveti rītibhaṅgo na ca doṣaḥ | pratītyavyavadhānāt ||
stabakavānyathā—
‘bhāsayatyapi bhāṣādau kavivarge jagattrayīm |
ke na yānti nibandhāraḥ kālidāsasya dāsatām || 222 ||’
so 'yaṃ varṇānuprāsavatpadānuprāso 'pi sthāne sthāne viniveśātstabakavānityucyate ||
vaicitrīviśeṣeṇālaṃkārabhāvo bhāsayatītyādāvādyantayordūrāntaritaivāvṛttiḥ | sthānaniyamastu na vivakṣitaḥ | tadidamuktam—sthāne sthāna iti ||
sthānī yathā—
‘paraṃ joṇhā uṇhā garalasariso candaṇaraso khadakkhāro hāro malaapavaṇā dehatavaṇā |
muṇālī vāṇālī jaladi a jaladdā taṇuladā variṭṭhā jaṃ diṭṭhā kamalaṇaaṇā sā suvaaṇā || 223 ||’
[paraṃ jyotsnā uṣṇāṃ garalasadṛśaścandarasaḥ kṣatakṣāro hāro malayapavanā dehatapanāḥ |
mṛṇālī bāṇālī jvalati ca jalārdrā tanulatā variṣṭhā yaddṛṣṭā kamalanayanā sā suvadanā ||]
so 'yaṃ padānuprāsaḥ sthānaniyamātsthānītyucyate ||﻿
joṇhā uṇhā riso raso ityādikā pratipādaṃ madhyāntasthānaniyamenāvṛttiḥ | kṣato 'rpitaḥ kṣāraḥ | jalārdrā jalārdre vastre ||
mithunaṃ yathā—
‘puraḥ pārā 'pārātaṭabhuvi vihāraḥ puravaraṃ tataḥ sindhuḥ sindhuḥ phaṇipativanaṃ pāvanamataḥ |
tadagre tūdagro giririti giristasya purato viśālā śālābhirlalitalalanābhirvijayate || 224 ||’
tadetatpratipādaṃ dvayordvayoḥ padānuprāsayorvinyāsānbhithunam ||
pārābhidhānā nadī | apārā pārarahitā | sindhurnadī sindhunāmā | viśālā ujjayinī | śālābhiritītthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇeṃ tṛtīyā | atra pārāpāreti sindhuḥ sindhuriti dagre dagra iti śālāśāleti krameṇa prathamādipādeṣu dvayorevānuprāsayorvinyāsaḥ | yadyapi tṛtīyapāde girigirīti dvitīyamapi miṃthunaṃ saṃbhavati tathāpi varṇadvayavyavadhānādanullekhītyupekṣitavān ||
mithunāvalī yathā—
‘śirasi śarabhaḥ kroḍe kroḍaḥ karī karaṭe raṭa- nnurasi ca rururmarmaṇyeṇaḥ śikhī mukharo mukhe |
kavirapi hṛdi hrādī dūrāddharirdvipajiddhato dhanuṣi laghutā lakṣye 'pūrvo jayo 'sya yaśasvinaḥ || 225 ||’
seyaṃ dvayoḥ pādayornirantaramāvṛttirmithunāvalītyucyate ||
śirasīti | śarabho 'ṣṭāpadaḥ | kroḍo varāhaḥ | rururbahuśṛṅgo mṛgaḥ | hariḥ siṃha | svarabhāgavivakṣāyāṃ vyañjanayugalāvṛttirmithunam | tadevāvṛttibhūmnā mithunāvalī śaraśareti kroḍakroḍeti karakareti davadavetyādinā krameṇa supratyabhijñānaiva ||
gṛhītamukto yathā—
‘puṃnāganāgakesarakesaraparivāsavāsanāsurabhiḥ |
surabhirmadhuramadhupriyaṣaṭcaraṇācaraṇavānprāptaḥ || 226 ||’
so 'yaṃ cakravālavadanuprāso gṛhītamukta ityucyate || ﻿
gṛhītamukto yatheti | puṃnāgaḥ puṃgaja iti prasiddhaḥ | kesaro bakulaḥ | bhāvanā vāsanā | surabhirvasantaḥ | nānāmadhupānalālasānāmitastataḥ ṣaṭcaraṇānāṃ caraṇaṃ bhramaṇam | atra cakravālakramo vyakta eva | āvṛttyādhikyābhāvācca gṛhītamātrasyaiva mocanam ||
punaruktimānyathā—
‘dhūmāi dhūmakaluse jalaha jalantā buhatthajīābandhe |
paḍiraapaḍiuṇṇadise rasaï rasantisihare dhaṇummi ṇahaalam || 227 ||’
[dhūmāyate dhūmakaluṣe jvalati jvaladāttahastajīvābandhe |
pratiravapratipūrṇadiśi rasati rasacchikhare dhanuṣi nabhastalam ||]
atra dhūmādīnāṃ punarvacanātpadānuprāso 'yaṃ punaruktimānucyate ||
punaruktimāniti | vācyābhedātpunaruktiḥ sā yasminnāvṛttilakṣaṇenānuprāse sa punaruktimān | tātparyabhedāñca na doṣaḥ | dhūmajvalanarasanānāmākāśadeśavyāpitayā dhanuḥprakarṣadvāreṇa rāmabhadragatotsāhaśaktidhvananātprakṛtavīrarasapoṣaḥ | atra dhūmadhūmetyādinā vācyabhedaḥ ||
nanu varṇāvṛttiranuprāsasāmānyalakṣaṇayuktā na cāsau padādyāvṛttāvastītyata āha—
varṇāvṛttiranuprāsaḥ pādeṣu ca padeṣu ca |
pūrvānubhavasaṃskārabodhinī padyadūratā || 97 ||
varṇāvṛttiriti | samudāyāvṛttirapi varṇāvṛttireva | nahi varṇātiriktaḥ samudāyo nāma | iyāṃstu viśeṣo yatpūrvajātīyavṛttānusaṃdhānamalaṃkāratāṃ prayojayati | tatra ca kāryānumeyaḥ samayasaṃnikarṣaviśeṣa eva prayojaka iti | tadidaṃ diṅmātramuktam ||
lāṭānuprāsavargasya yāvadvā lakṣyate gatiḥ |
padānuprāsavarge 'pi tāvadeva prapañcate || 98 ||
anye 'pi padānuprāsaprakārāḥ svayamutprekṣitavyā ityāha—lāṭeti | gatiḥ prakāraḥ ||
svabhāvataśca gauṇyā ca vīpsābhīkṣṇyādibhiśca sā |
nāmnā dviruktibhirvākye tadanuprāsa ucyate || 99 ||
kramaprāptaṃ nāmadviruktyanuprāsaṃ vibhajate—svabhāvata iti | yadyapi padānu-
prāsādau nāmadviruktirativyāpikā tathāpyarthopakṣepopanipātinī saha vivakṣitā | artho dvividhaḥ—ābhidhānikaḥ, upādhiśca | ādyo gauṇamuṃkhyabhedena dviprakāraḥ, dvitīyo 'pi vīpsābhīkṣṇyādiranekavidhaḥ | dvaruktirapi nāma śarīrasaṃpādikā nāmnaḥ sataśceti dvayī boddhavyā | ata eva dviruktasyaivābhidhāśaktiyogātsvabhāvata ityuktam ||
sā svabhāvato yathā—
‘kurvanto 'mī kalakalaṃ mārutena calācalāḥ |
prātargulugulāyante gajā iva ghanāghanāḥ || 228 ||’
atra kalakalamityādiṣu svābhāviki punaruktirupadiśyate ||
kurvanta iti | calācalāścañcalāḥ | calateracrapratyaye 'bhyāsasyāki rūpam | gulu ityavyaktānukaraṇasya ḍāci dvirvacane ca guluguleti nāmasiddhiḥ | atra kalakalādipadānāmarthavaśāyātadviruktiśarīrāṇāṃ svabhāvata eva yathoktarūpavyavasthitiḥ ||
gauṇyā yathā—
‘amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraścandrastathāmbujamambujaṃ ratirapi ratiḥ kāmaḥ kāmo madhūni madhūnyāpi |
iti na bhajate vastu prāyaḥ parasparasaṃkaraṃ tadiyamabalā kāntiṃ dhatte kutaḥ sakalātmikām || 229 ||’
atrāmṛtamamṛtamityādiṣvabhede 'pi bhedopacāreṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhācaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvādbhavanpunaruktivadbhāsate ||
amṛtamiti | atra dvitīyāntānāmamṛtādipadānāṃ dviruktidoṣeṇa tātparyāparyavasānādamṛtādiguṇaparatve kalpanīye 'pi nikṛṣṭaguṇaparāṇāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattestattadasādhāraṇaguṇopabṛṃhitāmṛtādiniṣṭhānāmādyapadopāttasāmānyāpekṣo viśeṣyabhāvaśca viśeṣaṇatvaṃ ca nirvahati | na ca paryāyaniveśe 'rthāntarasaṃkramitavācyatā saṃbhavatīti pūrvācāryāḥ | seyaṃ gauṇārthaparavaśā nāma dviruktiḥ ||
vīpsā yathā—
‘śaile śaile na māṇikyaṃ mauktikaṃ na gaje gaje |
deśe deśe na vidvāṃsaścandanaṃ na vane vane || 230 ||’
﻿
seyaṃ dravyavīpsā nāma dviruktiḥ | evaṃ guṇajātikriyāvīpsāyāmapi draṣṭavyam ||
vīpseti | nānārthānāṃ yugapadekaikena padena kenacidvakturvyāptivivakṣā vīpsā | sa prayoktṛdharmo dviruktyā vyajyate | ata eva yā kācidarthasāmarthyākṛṣṭā dviruktiḥ sā saptavarṇādivannāmadviruktisamākhyayā pratipādyate | śaile śaila iti | atra kiṃcidekamasādhāraṇaguṇāśrayaṃ vivakṣan taditarasya tajjātīyasya guṇasaṃsparśamasahamāno 'prastutameva śailādikaṃ prastutavān | rohaṇādivyatiriktāsu vyaktiṣu māṇikyādyabhāvaguṇavyāptiryugapadeva vivakṣitā | śabdādupasarjanatayā pratīyamānaḥ siddhasvabhāvaḥ padārtho guṇa ityucyate | evaṃ kriyayāpi vyāptiravaseyā | seyaṃ dravyavīpseti | śailādīnāṃ dravyāṇāmekena guṇādinā vyāptumicchetyarthaḥ ||
‘prakāre guṇavacanasya 8|1|12’ ityādirapi vīpsāprakāra eva |
yathā—
māninījanavilocanapātānuṣmabāṣpakaluṣānpratigṛhṇan |
mandamandamuditaḥ prayayau khaṃ bhītabhīta iva śītamayūkha || 231 ||’
prakāre guṇavacanasyeti | prakāraḥ sādṛśyaṃ tatpūrṇaguṇena nyūnaguṇasya sādhāraṇaguṇānvaye bhavati | evaṃ cāsti samānaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ ca vyāptiḥ | iyāṃstu viśeṣo yadekatra siddhasyānyatra pratibimbanaṃ sādṛśyaṃ, śuddhavīpsāyāṃ tu yugapadekasya nānāpadārthasaṃbandha iti | so 'yaṃ vīpsāprakāraśabdārthaḥ | ata eva ‘prakāre guṇavacanasya 8|1|12’ iti pṛthaksūtritam | iha tu vīpsāpadenaivāyamartha upagrāhya ityābhiprāyaḥ | mandaṃ mandamivodita iti kriyāviśeṣaṇamupamitam | evaṃ bhīta bhīta iti kartṛviśeṣaṇamapi | sādṛśyalakṣaṇaguṇotprekṣāyāmivaśabdaḥ ||
ābhīkṣṇyena yathā—
‘śleṣaṃ śleṣaṃ mṛgadṛśā dattamānanapaṅkajam |
mayā mukulitākṣeṇa pāyaṃ pāyamaramyata || 232 ||’
so 'yamābhīkṣṇye ṇamul | sa cānuprayujyata iti punaruktiḥ ||
ābhīkṣṇyeneti | ‘nityavīpsayoḥ8|1|4’ ityanena nityatvamābhīkṣṇyamuktam | yāṃ kila kriyāṃ kartā prādhānyenānuparatyā ca kartumicchati tadrūpamābhīkṣṇyam | ata eva tiṅavyayakṛtāṃ ca dviruktiriyamasādhāraṇī | ubhayatraiva kriyāprādhānyapratīteḥ | ﻿
siddhe hi vastuni paunaḥpunyapratītiḥ kriyopādhite eva na svarūpeṇa | nanu ṇamulaivābhīkṣṇyābhidhānātkiṃ dviruktiḥ kariṣyata ityata āha—so 'yamiti | na cābhīkṣṇyaṃ ṇamulo vācyam | k‍tvārthe tasyābhidhānāt | dviruktisahitasyaiva tasyānuparativyañjakatvāt | svarūpārthābhyāmantaratamaśabdadvayarūpa ādeśo vā dviruccāraṇaṃ vā dviruktiśabdārthaḥ ||
kriyāpadābhīkṣṇyāddviruktau tu punarukterapi punaruktiḥ | yathā—
‘jayati jayati devaḥ śyāmakaṇṭhaḥ pinākī jayati jayati devī lokamātā bhavānī |
jayati jayati dhanyaḥ so 'pi bhaktastayoryaḥ kimaparamiha dhanyaṃ varṇyate tāvadeva || 233 ||’
na cāvaśyaṃ dvāveva śabdau prayoktavyau kiṃtu yāvadbhirabhimato 'rthaḥ pratīyate tāvanto 'bhīkṣṇyaśabdāḥ prayoktavyāste nāvyayakṛtsu dṛśyante kiṃtu tiṅpadeṣvevetyāha—kriyāpadeti | yadyapyekavākyārthasaṃgatyā kriyāpadasya dvayamevoccāraṇaṃ tathāpi kāvyāpekṣayā bāhulyamavaseyam ||
ādigrahaṇena nimūlasaṃbhramādayaḥ parigṛhyante | teṣu nimūlādiryathā—
‘nimūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati svāntamanta smarajvare |
lājasphoṭaṃ skuṭantyāśu hṛdaye hārayaṣṭayaḥ || 234 ||’
ādigrahaṇeneti | tattaditaraprakaraṇaprāpitānāṃ dviruktiprakārāṇābhādipadenopagraho vidheyaḥ | tadyathā—‘arvāgarvāgbalavadupalagranthayaḥ kṣetraśailā dūre dūre maṇimayadṛṣanmekhalo ratnasānuḥ | ārādārānnidhirayamapāṃ yaddavīyo davīyāndugdhāmbhodhistadayamasadṛkchilpa evādiśilpī ||’ atrānupūrvye dve bhavata iti dviruktiḥ | evaṃ svārthe 'vadhāryamāṇe ityādayo 'pi dviruktiprakārāḥ svayamavaseyā ityāśayavānupalakṣaṇatayā kiṃcidudāharati—nimūlakāṣamiti | ‘kaṣādiṣu yathāvidhyanuprayogaḥ’ iti tasminneva prayukte dviruktisiddhiḥ ||
saṃbhrameṇa yathā—
‘asthīnyasthīnyajinamajinaṃ bhasma bhasmendurindu- rgaṅgā gaṅgoraga uraga ityākulāḥ saṃbhrameṇa |’ ﻿
bhūṣāveṣopakaraṇagaṇaprāpaṇavyāpṛtānāṃ nṛtyārambhapraṇayini śive pāntu vāco gaṇānām || 235 ||’
saṃbhrameṇeti | bhayasaṃvegādarātmakaḥ saṃbhramaḥ saṃvegastvarā | saiva prakṛtodāharaṇe dviruktiṃ prayojayati ||
harṣāvegavismayādayo 'pi saṃbhramasyopādhayo bhavanti | teṣu harṣasaṃbhrameṇa yathā—
‘rurudhuḥ kautukottālāstatastāmamarāvatīm |
kvārjunaḥ kvārjuna iti bruvantyo nākayoṣitaḥ || 236 ||’
nanu harṣādīnāṃ mahākaviprabandheṣu dviruktirupalabhyate | sā kathamupagrāhyetyata āha—harṣeti | harṣādayo 'pi saṃbhramaprayojakāstairasādhāraṇatāmāpannairavacchidyamānaḥ saṃbhramo 'nyonyo bhavati na ca saṃbhramatā jahātīti saṃbhramadviruktiprakāra evāyamityarthaḥ ||
āvegasaṃbhrameṇa yathā—
‘kañcukaṃ kañcukaṃ muñca hāraṃ hāraṃ parityaja |
hā hā dahati dāvāgnirvastraṃ vastramapākuru || 237 ||’
atra muñca parityaja dahati apākuru iti kriyāpadeṣvāvegasaṃbhramānnadvirukteḥ | tathāhi—araṇyānīpraveśe vijigīṣudviṣāṃ yoṣiddāvāgnisaṃbhramāvegātkayāpyevamucyate, tatra prathamaṃ kañcuka evāvegasaṃbhramaḥ | sa hyāgate dāvāgnāvuttārayitumaśakyaḥ | tatastavdyāsaṅgahetau hāre, anantaraṃ parāpatitadāvāgnidīpte vāsasīti ||
nigūḍhagambhīra udvega āvegaḥ | nanu kañcukaṃ kañcukamitivanmuñcetyādikamāvegasaṃbhramaprabhavameva tatkathaṃ na dvirucyata ityata āha—atreti | kañcukasya hāreṇa hārasyottarīyavāsasā vyāsaṅgasaṃbhāvanā saṃbhramahetuḥ ||
﻿
vismayasaṃbhrameṇa yathā—
‘aho rūpamaho rūpamaho mukhamaho mukham |
aho madhyamaho madhyamasyāḥ sāraṅgacakṣuṣaḥ || 238 ||’
eteṣu samasteṣvapi saṃbhrameṣu yāvadbodhamiti dviruktiḥ ||
evaṃ triruktirapi draṣṭavyā yathā—
‘jaya jaya jaya śrīmanbhoja prabhāti vibhāvarī vada vada vada śravyaṃ vidvannidaṃ hyavadhīyate |
śṛṇu śṛṇu śṛṇu tvadvatsūryo 'nurajyati maṇḍalaṃ nahi nahi nahi kṣmāmārtaṇḍaḥ kṣaṇena virajyate || 239 ||’
saṃbhrameṣu yāvadbodhamiti yāvacchabdārthamāviṣkurvāṇaḥ pūrvoktamabhipretyāha—evaṃ triruktirapīti | upalakṣaṇaṃ cedam | caturādidviruktiradaṇḍavāritaiva ||
kriyāsamabhihāraśca kriyābhyāsaśca yaḥ purā |
yuktāvudāhṛtaḥ so 'pi nāmānuprāsa iṣyate || 100 ||
samabhihāro bhṛśatvam ||
jāyate na ca doṣāya kāvye 'laṃkārasaṃkaraḥ |
vibhūṣayati hāro 'pi stanau grīvaṃ mṛgīdṛśām || 101 ||
nanu vākyārthaprayuktyaiva kāvyasya sanāthīkaraṇātkimanuprāsenetyata āha—jāyate na ceti | udāharaṇenālaṃkāryasaṃkaravadalaṃkārasaṃkaro 'pi lokaprasiddha eva śobhāheturityabhimatamiti ||
arthābhede padāvṛttiḥ pravṛttyā bhinnayeha yā |
sa sūribhiranuprāso lāṭīya iti gīyate || 102 ||
kramaprāptaṃ lāṭānuprāsaṃ lakṣayati—arthābhede iti | lāṭajanavallabho 'nuprāso lāṭānuprāsaḥ | arthabhede kathaṃ na punaruktidoṣa ityata uktam—pravṛttyā bhinnayeti | tātparyabhedenetyarthaḥ | ata eva yamakādbhedaḥ ||
﻿
sa cāvyavahito vyastaḥ samasta ubhayaḥ punaḥ |
ubhayaṃ cakravālaṃ ca garbhaścaivābhidhīyate || 103 ||
sa cetyanuktavyavahitasamuccaye cakāraḥ | lāṭānuprāsaḥ sāmānyato dvidhā—avyavahitaḥ, vyavahitaśca | anāvṛttaśabdānantarito 'vyavahitaḥ, tadantaritaśca vyavahitaḥ | tayoravyavahitaḥ ṣọdhā bhavati | vyastaḥ samasto dvāvubhayāviti tāvacca tvāraḥ | tatrobhayadvayaṃ dviprakārakamiti sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvābhyāṃ ṣaḍbhedā vyākhyeyāḥ | ubhayaḥ punariti | punaḥśabdo vyāvṛttau | pūrvasmādanya evāyamekaśabdābhilaṣya ityarthaḥ | ādyobhayadvayamagre vakṣyate ||
yastu vyavahito nāma neyatā tasya śakyate |
kartumekādigaṇanā padavṛttyādibhaṅgibhiḥ || 104 ||
dvitiyaṃ tu cakravālai garbhaścetyukta vyavahitasya tarhi kiyanto bhedā ata āha—yastviti | tena bahubhāvāvāntaraviśeṣatayā nāyaṃ samaśīrṣikayā gaṇita ityarthaḥ ||
teṣvavyavahitabhedeṣu vyasto yathā—
‘uahissa jaseṇa jasaṃ dhīraṃ dhīreṇa garuiāi vi garuam |
rāmo ṭhiea vi ṭhiiṃ bhaṇaï raveṇa a ravaṃ samupphundanto || 240 ||’
[udadheryaśasā yaśo dhairyaṃ dhairyeṇa gurutayāpi gurutām |
rāmaḥ sthityāpi sthitiṃ bhaṇati raveṇa raveṇa ca ravaṃ samabhikrāman ||]
atrāvyayānāṃ dyotakāditvādivādibhirvyavadhānaṃ nāśrīyate | na hīvādeḥ prakṛte 'pi pṛthakpadatvamasti | yadyevāmidamihodāharaṇaṃ yujyate—
‘tvanmukhaṃ tvanmukhamiva tvaddṛśau tvaddṛśāviva |
tvanmūrtiriva mūrtiste tvamiva tvaṃ kṛśodari || 241 ||’ iti |
astyevaitat | kiṃ tu yathā—‘amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraścandraḥ—’ ityādikamabhede 'pi bhedopacārānnāmadviruktistatheyamityutprekṣate ||
teṣviti | dviruktaśabdarūpeṣu pūrvaparayornaikamapi samāsāntargatamiti vyastaḥ | etena samastādayo vyākhyātāḥ | dhairyagurutāsthitigāmbhīryānuniṣpādī vāganubhāvo rasapūrṇakumbhocchalananyāyena sākṣādiva tattatprakarṣamarpayan śobhāvikāsahetuḥ | ﻿
samupphundanto samabhikrāman | nanu jaseṇa dhīreṇa garuiāi vi i raveṇa a iti yadapañcake vibhaktyā taduttarayoścakāradvayena ca vyavadhānātkathamavyavahitabheda udāhriyata ityāha—atreti | avyayānāmityupalakṣaṇam | dyotakatvāditi vibhaktisādhāraṇo hetuḥ | pañcakaprātipadikārthatvapakṣe vikṣaktirdyotikaiva | śākalyo 'pi avyayavācakatvavādī | so 'pyasattvārthānāmivādīnāṃ svātantryeṇa vācakatvaṃ na manyate | yato na pṛthakpadatvamanuśiṣṭavān | tathā ca dyotakānāṃ paraśaktisahakāritvena tadanupraveśātsvāṅgamavyavadhāyakamiti nyāyāt | nanu kimatra kliṣṭakalpanayā | astyavyavahitodāharaṇamapyanyadapīti śaṅkate—yadyevamiti | atra pūrvārdhavartidvayamudāharaṇamuttarārdhavartino dvayasya pūrvatulyatvāt | pariharati—astīti | ananvayamātramatrodāharaṇam | tatra cāvaśyabhedakalpanayā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvī vācyastathā ca gauṇī nāma dviruktiḥ syāditi saṃkaraśaṅkanāyodāhṛtamiti siddhāntatātparyasaṃkṣepaḥ ||
samasto yathā—
‘apahastitānyakisalaya kisalayaśobhaṃ vilokayāśokam |
sakhi vijitā parasumanaḥsumanaḥ subhaga ca madhutilakam || 242 ||’
atra ‘kisalaya kisalaya’ iti, ‘sumanaḥ sumanaḥ’ iti ca samastānāmevāvyadhānādayaṃ lāṭīyo 'nuprāso 'vyavahitasamastaḥ pūrvaḥ punaravyavahitavyasta ityucyate ||
pūrvaḥ punariti | samastānantaraṃ vyastavivaraṇaṃ pratipattisaukaryārtham ||
ubhayastu dvidhā—prathamaḥ samastoparo vyastaḥ | dvitīyo vyasto 'paraḥ samasta iti ca | tayoḥ prathamo yathā—
‘jitalāṭāṅganāvakraṃ vakraṃ tasyā mṛgīdṛśaḥ |
ksya na kṣobhajanakaṃ janakaṃ puṣpadhanvanaḥ || 253 ||’
tadidaṃ lakṣaṇenaiva vyākhyātam ||
dvitīyo yathā—
‘nalinī nalinīnāthakarasaṃnatisaṃgamāt |
vikacā vikacāsyānāṃ kāntānāṃ harati śriyam || 244 ||’
﻿
asyāpi lakṣaṇenaivokto 'rthaḥ ||
svāpekṣayā vyasto 'nyāpekṣayā ca samastaḥ, dvitīyo vyasto 'paraḥ samasta iti sa dvitīyobhayaśabdavācyaḥ | so 'pi dvidhā—pratipādamantādyorgarbha ivānuprāsavinyāsāt | tayoḥ prathamaścakravālaṃ yathā—
‘jayati kṣuṇṇatimirastimirāndhaikavallabhaḥ |
vallabhīkṛtapūrvāśaḥ pūrvāśātilako raviḥ || 245 ||’
atra timiravallabhapūrvāśetiśabdāstimirādiśabdāpekṣayā vyastāḥ yathā—svapūrvottarapadāpekṣayā ca samastāḥ padāntādyorviniveśitā iti yathoktalakṣaṇānugamāllāṭīyānuprāso 'yamavyavahito vyastasamastaścakravālamityucyate ||
dvitīyamubhayaṃ vivecayati—svāpekṣayeti | timirāndhāścakravākāḥ | yatha śrutidviruktaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrveṇottaraścottareṇa samasta iti pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥ ||
etena pādamadhye 'nuprāsavinyāsādgarbho 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—
‘samādhavā mādhavadattadṛṣṭiḥ sakautukā kautukamandire stāt |
savibhramā vibhramadāyinī vaḥ sapaṅkajā paṅkajalocanā śrīḥ || 246 ||’
sakautukā kṛtakaṅkaṇabandhādipariṇayamaṅgalā ||
vyavahitabhedeṣu vyasto yathā—
‘prakāśo yaśasā devaḥ prakāśo mahasā raviḥ |
du saho vidviṣāṃ svāmī duḥsahastamasāṃ ca saḥ || 247 ||’
tadetannātidurbodhamiti na vyākriyate ||
so 'yamekaguṇo vyastaśca lāṭīyānuprāso vyavahita ityucyate | vyastaścānekaguṇo yathā—
‘kiṃcidvacmi na vacmi vacmi yadi vā kiṃ vacmi vacmīdṛśaṃ dṛśyante na bhavādṛśeṣu patiṣu sveṣāmadoṣe damāḥ | ﻿
te kiṃ santi na santi santi yadi vā ke santi santīdṛśāḥ sarvasteṣu guṇairgṛhītahṛdayo lokaḥ kuto vartate || 248 ||’
atra vacmīti santītyetayoranekaguṇāvṛttiḥ ||
anekaguṇā iti | āvṛttidvaiguṇyādinānekaguṇatvam, na ca guṇanāyāmiyattāvadhāraṇakāraṇamastītyabhisaṃdhāya tasyeyattā na śakyate kartumiti pūrvamuktam | sveṣāmātmīyānāṃ madhye yaḥ kaściddoṣastatra damā daṇḍaprakārā na dṛśyanta iti ||
samasta ekaguṇo yathā—
‘candrānana candradinaṃ mṛgalocana mṛgaśiraśca nakṣatram |
tithiratithipriyadaśamī paratastvekādaśī praharāt || 249 ||’
nanviha tithirityasamastam | na kevalamasamastaṃ bhinnārthatayā lāṭīyānuprāse 'pi na saṃgacchate | saṃgate ca kenacitpadānuprāsena | na ca lāṭīyānuprāso vā nāmānuprāso vā padānuprāsādbhidyata iti ||
yadyapyekaparihārākārodāharaṇadvayamucitameva tathāpi kiṃcidviśeṣaṃ vivakṣannākṣipya samādhatte—nanviti | mā bhūdatrāsamāso 'nyathāpi nedamudāharaṇamiha saṃgatamityāha—na kevalamiti | tatkimanuprāsa evāyaṃ na bhavatīti pṛcchati—kena tarhīti | uttaram—padānuprāseneti | padānuprāsenārthabhedābhedau vivakṣitau | kiṃtu padāśrayeṇāvṛttimātraṃ padānuprāsāvṛttiśca lāṭānuprāse 'pyastīti saṃgatyātredamudāhṛtamityarthaḥ ||
samasto 'nekaguṇo yathā—
‘brahmāṇḍacchatradaṇḍaḥ śatadhṛtibhuvanāmbhoruho nāladaṇḍaḥ kṣoṇīnaukūpadaṇḍaḥ kṣaradamarasaritpaṭṭikāketudaṇḍaḥ |
jyotiścakrākṣadaṇḍastribhuvanavijayastambhadaṇḍo 'ṅghridaṇḍaḥ śreyastraivikramaste vitaratu vibudhadveṣiṇāṃ kāladaṇḍaḥ || 250 ||’
atrānekaśo daṇḍa ityasyāvṛttiḥ | ābhyāṃ vyastasamastabhedo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—﻿
‘daśaraśmiśatopamadyutiṃ yaśasā dikṣu daśasvapi śrutam |
daśapūrvarathaṃ yamākhyayā daśakaṇṭhāriguruṃ vidurbudhāḥ || 251 ||’
atrānekadhā daśaśabda āvartate ||
śatadhṛtirbrahmā tasya bhuvanabhūtamambhoruda padmaṃ tasya, kṣoṇī pṛthvī tadrūpā yā naustaristasyāḥ kūpadaṇḍaḥ guṇavṛkṣaḥ | daśasviti | eko daśaśabdo vyastaḥ, anye trayaḥ samastāḥ ||
avyavahite 'pi dvaiguṇyāderna virodhaḥ | yathā—
‘vastrāyante nadīnāṃ sitakusumadharāḥ śakrasaṃkāśakāśāḥ kāśābhā bhānti tāsāṃ navapulinacarāḥ śrīnadīhaṃsahaṃsāḥ |
haṃsābhāmbhodamuktakṣaradamṛtarucirmedinīcandracandraścandrāṅkaḥ śāradaste jayakṛdupanato vidviṣāṃ kālakālaḥ || 252 ||’
nanu vyavahita eva kiṃ guṇanādibhedo netyāha—avyavahite 'pīti | vastrāyanta ityādau kāśapadaparihāreṇodāharaṇam | tatra hi prathamaḥ kāśaśabdo bhinnārtha eva ||
vyavahitāvyavahitabhede 'pi dṛśyate | yathā—
‘dhanairduṣkulīnāḥ kulīnāḥ kriyante dhanaireva pāpānnarā nistaranti |
dhanebhyo hi kaścitsuhṛnnāsti loke dhanānyarjayadhvaṃ dhanānyarjayadhvam 253’
yatra vyavahitāvyavahitayorekavākyānupraveśo 'sti tatrāpi guṇanābheda udāharaṇīyaḥ | dṛśyata ityanena yadvavdyavahite bhūyasī guṇanā mahākaviprabandheṣu pratīyate na tadvadavyavahite 'pīti pūrvaṃ vyavahitamātre guṇanādikamupanyastamiti tātparyam |dhanairiti | atra dhanapadavyavadhānena bahvīṃ guṇanāmavalambamānameva caturthapāde tvavyavahitā tvanuprāse 'pi praviṣṭamiti bhavati vyavahitāvyavahitabhedatā | so 'yaṃ padābhyāso darśitaḥ ||
yo 'pi cārdhābhyāsaḥ so 'pi vyavahitāvyavahitabheda eva | yathā—
‘yaistvaṃ sākṣātkṛto nātha teṣāṃ kāmeṣu ko grahaḥ |
yaistvaṃ sākṣātkṛto nātha teṣāṃ kāmeṣu ko grahaḥ || 254 ||’
﻿
atra pādāpekṣayā vyavahitatvamarghāpekṣayā punaravyavahitatvaṃ bhavati ||
evaṃ ślokārdhābhyāso vyavahitāvyavahitabheda eva bhavatītyāha—yo 'pīti ||
dvibhāgābhyāsastu vyavahita eva svadate | yathā—
‘śraddhāyatnau yadi syātāṃ medhayā kiṃ prayojanam |
tāvubhau yadi na syātāṃ medhayā kiṃ prayojanam || 255 ||’
śraddhāyatnāviti | atra yadi syātāmiti pādabhāgena saha padāvṛttistribhāgāvṛttirbhavati ||
padābhyāsaḥ punaravyavahito vyavahitaśca dṛśyate | tayoravyavahito yathā—
‘santaḥ śrṛṇudhvaṃ hṛdaye nidhaddhvamutkṣipya bāhuṃ parirāraṭīmi |
na subhruvāṃ tulyamihāsti ramyaṃ na subhruvāṃ tulyamihāsti ramyam 256’
vyavahito yathā—
‘mukhena lakṣmīrjayati phullapaṅkajacāruṇā |
dakṣiṇena kareṇāpi phullapaṅkajacāruṇā || 257 ||’
mukheneti | phullapaṅkajamiva cāru phullena paṅkajena cāruriti yadyapi vṛttyarthau bhidyete, tathāpi padānāmabhinnārthatvādudāharaṇatā ||
ivādyāvṛttayo 'pi cātraiva draṣṭavyāḥ | yathā—
‘līneva pratibimbiteva likhitevotkīrṇarūpeva ca pratyupteva ca vajralepaghaṭitevāntarnikhāteva ca |
sā naścetasi kīliteva viśikhaiścetobhuvaḥ pañjabhi- ścintāsaṃtatitantujālanibiḍasyūteva lagnā priyā || 258 ||’
arthābheda iti nārthaśabdo 'bhidheyavacanaḥ kiṃtu śabdapratipādyamātravacana ityāśayavānāha—ivādīti ||
yamakānāṃ hi yāvantyo varṇyante bhedabhaktayaḥ |
anuprāsasya lāṭānāṃ bhidāstāvantya eva hi || 105 || ﻿
nanvanye 'pi padāvṛttiprakārāḥ kimiti nodāhṛtā ityata āha—yamakānāṃ hīti | bhedabhaktayo 'vāntaraprakāravicchittayaḥ sthānāsthānapādabhedalakṣaṇā ślokāvṛttiḥ paramatra nāstīti yamakādapakarṣaḥ ||
upamādiviyuktāpi rājate kāvyapaddhatiḥ |
yadyanuprāsaleśo 'pi hanta tatra niveśyate || 106 ||
prakaraṇānte 'nuprāsavyutpādanaprayojanamāha—upamādīti | anuprāsaleśo 'pīti | varṇādyanuprāsaḥ ||
kuṇḍalādiviyuktāpi kāntā kimapi śobhate |
kuṅkumenāṅgarāgaścetsarvāṅgīṇaḥ prayujyate || 107 ||
śrutivṛttyanuprāsau tu saṃdarbhavyāpakāveva praśastāvityudāharaṇavyājenāha—kuṇḍalādīti ||
śrutivarṇānuprāsāvekavidhau kuntaleṣu gauḍeṣu |
padayorniranuprāso dvedhā tredhā ca lāṭeṣu || 108 ||
etadeva khaṇḍasarasvatīṣu kaviṣu na tathā kāvyasiddhiriti darśayandraḍhayati—śrutivarṇānuprāsāviti ||
'varṇasthānasvarākāragatibandhānpratīhayaḥ |
niyamastadbudhaiḥ ṣọdhā citramityabhidhīyate || 109 ||’
kramaprāptaṃ citralakṣaṇamavatārayati—varṇeti | citramālekhyaṃ tadiva jīvitasthānīyadhvanirahitaṃ citramiti kāśmīrakāḥ | tadasat | dhvaneḥ prādhānyānaṅgīkārātpratīyamānamātrābhāvasya kvacidapyasaṃbhavāt | yadvā ākṛtiviśeṣayuktaṃ citramiti tadapi na | avyāpakatvāt | ato varṇādiniyamena pravṛttamāścaryakāritayā citramityeva yuktam | varṇā vyañjanāni | sthānaṃ kaṇṭhādi | svarā akārādayaḥ | ākāraḥ padmādyākṛtyunmudraṇam | gatiḥ paṭhitibhaṅgaviśeṣaḥ | bandho viviḍitiprabhṛtiḥ ||
varṇaśabdena cātra svarāṇāṃ pṛthaṅ‌nirdeśāvdyañjanānyeva pragṛhyante | tatra varṇacitreṣu caturvyañjanaṃ yathā—
‘jajaujorjājijijjājī taṃ tato 'titatātitut |
bhābho 'bhībhābhibhūbhābhūrārārirarirīraraḥ || 259 ||’
﻿
pañcaprabhṛtiniyamena tathāśaktiñyutpattyorutkarṣa iti caturādi gṛhṇāti—tatreti | avaśyaṃ yoddhā jājī | jajeryuddhārthādāvaśyake ṇiniḥ | jajā yuddhaśauṇḍāsteṣāmojasā jātā yā ājiḥ saṅgrāmastaṃ jayatiti kvip | taṃ veṇudāriṇaṃ tato 'nantaraṃ atitatān caturaṅgabalena prāptavistārān ātinaḥ satatagamanaśīlān tudatīti kvip | bhānāṃ dīptatārānurūpāṇāṃ śukrabṛhaspatyādīnāmābhevābhā kāntiryasyetyupamānapūrvapadabahuvrīhau uttarapadalope ca bhāmaḥ | abhiyo bhayaśūnyānibhānabhibhavatīti kvip | abhībhābhibhūstādṛśī yā bhā tejastasyā bhūrāśrayaḥ | āra jagāma | ariḥ śatruḥ | balabhadra ityarthaḥ | arīṇāṃ rīḥ saṃcaraṇam | ‘rīṅ gatau iti dhātvanusārāt | tasyā īro dhūnanaṃ rāti dadāti arīraraḥ ||
trivyañjanaṃ yathā—
‘devānāṃ nandano devo nodano vedanindinām |
divaṃ dudāva nādena dāne dānavanandinaḥ || 260 ||’
devaḥ sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārakrīḍārataḥ, dānavanandī hiraṇyakaśipustasya dāne 'vakhaṇḍane yo nādo vakṣaḥkapāṭapāṭanakaṭakaṭāśabdastena divaṃ svargaṃ dudāva kimetadityākasmikasaṃbhrameṇetyupatāpayāmāsa | jagatkaṇṭakanirākaraṇāddevānāṃ nandana ānandakṛt | vedanindināṃ ca nodanaḥ pratikṣepakaḥ | sāmānyābhiprāyeṇaikavacanam ||
dvivyañjanaṃ yathā—
‘bhūribhirbhāribhirbhīrābhūbhārairabhirebhire |
bherīrebhibhirabhrābharabhīrubhiribhairibhāḥ || 261 ||’
bhūribhirbahubhirbhāribhiḥ prakṛtisārabhāravāhibhiratipramāṇakāyatayā bhuvo bhārabhūtairantaḥkāṃsyabhājano niḥsvāno bherī tadvadebhibhiḥ | ‘rebhṛ śabde’ iti dhātvanusārāt | abhrābhaiḥ prathamonnatameghakāntibhiribhairhastibhirbhiya rānti prayacchantīti bhīrā ibhāḥ pratidvipā abhirebhire abhiyuktāḥ ||
ekavyañjanaṃ yathā—
‘na nonanunno nunneno nānā nānānanā nanu |
nunno 'nunno nanunneno nānenā nunnanunnanut || 262 ||’
﻿
nanu nānānanā vividhākāravadanā gaṇā ūnena hīnena nunno jito nā na na puruṣaḥ | tathā nunna inaḥ prabhuryasya so 'pyātmani jīvati nānā puruṣo 'puruṣa eva | yato nanunneno 'jitaprabhurnunno 'pyanunna eva | tathā nunnanunnaḥ jita iva klībatayā parābhūta iti | ‘prakāre guṇavacanasya’ iti dviruktiḥ | tamapi yo nudati sa nānenā na niṣpāpaḥ bandhacchāyārpakānyavarṇagurutvonmeṣamātraprayojakastakāro na vṛttiśarīrāntargata iti dvivyañjanatā nāśaṅkanīyā ||
kramasthasarvavyañjanaṃ yathā—
‘kaḥ khagaughāṅacicchaujā jhāñjño 'ṭauṭhīḍaḍaṇḍhaṇaḥ |
tathodadhīnpapharbābhīrmayo 'rilvāśiṣāṃ sahaḥ || 263 ||’
kramastheti | varṇasamāmrāye yena krameṇa kādayo māvasānāḥ paṭhitāstena krameṇa vyañjananiveśaḥ | kaḥ khagaughastattatprasiddhāvadānapakṣisamūhastamañcatīti kvini saṃyogāntalope kṛte ca khagaughāṅiti rūpam | citaṃ saṃvidaṃ chyati chinattīti cicchaṃ yadojastannāsti yasyāsāvacicchaujāḥ | ‘jhamu adane’ asmāt kvip | ‘anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ 6|4|16’ ityupadhādīrghaḥ | ‘mo no dhātoḥ 8|2|64’ iti nakāra iti jhān parabalabhakṣako jñaḥ paṇḍitaḥ | ‘sto ścunā śruḥ 8|4|40’ iti nakārasya ñakārāḥ | aṭāḥ saṅgrāmāṅgaṇaparyaṭanaśīlāḥ subhaṭāstānoṭhate bādhata iti kvip | ‘uṭha gatau’ iti dhāto rūpam | teṣāmīḍīśvaraḥ | aḍaṇḍhaṇo 'capalaḥ | ḍaṇḍhaṇa ityavyutpannaṃ capalavāci prātipadikam | tathā abhīrbhayarahitaḥ evaṃvidhaḥ ko nāmāyamudadhīn papharba pūrayāmāseti praśnaḥ | uttaram—arīn lunanti yā āśiṣastāsāṃ sahaḥ kṣamo mayo daityarāja iti ||
chandokṣaravyañjanaṃ yathā—
‘saratsurārātibhayāya jāgrato jalatyalaṃ stotṛjanasya jāyatām |
smitaṃ smarārergirijāsyanīraje sametanetratritayasya bhūtaye || 264 ||’
chandokṣareti | ‘myarastajabhnagā lāntāśchandovicitivedibhiḥ | daśaiva varṇā nirṇītāśchandorūpaprasiddhaye ||’ tanmātravyañjananibaddhachandokṣaravyañjanam | subodhamudāharaṇam ||
﻿
ṣaḍjādisvaravyañjanaṃ yathā—
‘sā mamāridhamanī nidhāninī sāmadhāma dhanidhāmasādhinī |
māninī sagarimāpapāpapā sāpagā samasamāgamāsamā || 265 ||’
ṣaḍjādīti | ‘sarigāmapadhāniśca varṇāḥ sapta svarādayaḥ | ṣaḍjādikṛtasaṃketā dṛṣṭā gāndharvavedibhiḥ ||’ tanmātravyañjanamayaṃ ṣaḍjādivyañjanam | saha ena viṣṇunā vartate iti sā lakṣmīḥ | arīn dhamati tāpayati iti dhamaterlyuṭi bahulavacanamanyatrāpīti dhamādeśaḥ | evaṃvidhā mama bhūyāditi śeṣaḥ | nidhāninī padmādinidhānavatī | sāmnaḥ sāntvasya dhāma gṛham | dhanināṃ dhāmasādhinī tejaḥprasāghikā | māninī pūjāvatī | sagarimā gauravavatī | apapāpānniṣkaluṣān pātītyapapāpapā | seti prasiddhavibhavā āpagā nadī | samaḥ tattulyaḥ kṣaṇavisarpā bhaṅguraḥ samāgamo yasyāḥ sā tathā | asamā anupamā ||
murajākṣaravyañjanaṃ yathā—
‘kharagarakālitakaṇṭhaṃ mathitagadaṃ makaraketumaraṇakaram |
taḍiditi rurumuṇḍaharaṃ haramantarahaṃ dadhe ghoram || 266 ||’
murajeti | ‘pāṭhākṣarāṇi muraje lahakārau tathadadhācchamau rephaḥ | naṇakakhagaghaṅāścetthaṃ ṣoḍaśa bharatādikrathitāni ||’ tanmātraviracitaṃ murajākṣaravyañjanam | subodhamudāharaṇam ||
catuḥsthānacitreṣu niṣkaṇṭhyaṃ yathā—
‘bhūribhūtiṃ pṛthuprītimurumūrtiṃ purusthitim |
viriñciṃ sūcirucidhīḥ śucibhirnutibhirdhinu || 267 ||’
varṇavatsthāneṣvapi caturādiniyamena citram | yadyapi ca ‘aṣṭau sthānāni varṇānāmuraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śirastathā | jihvāmūlaṃ ca dantāśca nāsikoṣṭau ca tālu ca’ iti, tathāpi jihvāmūlīyasya svaratvādurasyanāsikyayoḥ kāvyapraveśābhāvāduronāsikājihvāmūlaparyudāsena sthānapañcake caturādinirūpaṇam | he sūcirucidhīḥ śucibhiḥ śuddhābhirnutibhiḥ stutibhiryathoktaviśeṣaṇa viriñciṃ brahmāṇaṃ dhinu prīṇayeti | akuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyāḥ ||
﻿
nistālavyaṃ yathā—
‘sphuratkuṇḍalaratnaughamaghavaddhanukarburaḥ |
meghanādo 'tha saṅgrāme prāvṛṭkālavadābabhau || 268 ||’
kuṇḍalaratnaugha eva maghavato dhanustena karburo meghanādanāmā rākṣasaḥ | icuyaśāstālavyāḥ ||
nirdantyaṃ yathā—
‘pāpmāpahārī raṇakarmaśauṇḍaścaṇḍīśamiśro mama cakrapāṇiḥ |
bhūyācchriyāpaśramayekṣyamāṇo mokṣāya mukhyāmarapūgapūjyaḥ || 269 ||’
caṇḍīśamiśraḥ parameśvareṇaikaśarīratāmāpannaḥ | mukhyāmarā brahmādayaḥ | lṛtulasā dantyāḥ ||
niroṣṭhyaṃ yathā—
‘nayanānandajanane nakṣatragaṇaśālini |
aghane gagane dṛṣṭiraṅgane dīyatāṃ sakṛt || 270 ||’
aghana iti | śaratkālaśobhayā dṛśyatame | upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyāḥ ||
nirmūrdhanyaṃ yathā—
‘śalabhā iva dhāvantaḥ sāyakāstasya bhūbhujaḥ |
nipetuḥ sāyakacchinnāstena saṃyugasīmani || 271 ||’
tena kapilena rājñā | tasya kosalādhipasya prasenajitaḥ | ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhanyāḥ ||
tristhānacitreṣu niroṣṭhyadantyaṃ yathā—
‘jīyājjagajjyeṣṭhagariṣṭhacāraścakrārciṣā kṛṣṇakaḍārakāyaḥ |
harirhiraṇyākṣaśarīrahārī khageśagaḥ śrīśrayaṇīyaśayyaḥ || 272 ||’
niroṣṭhyadantyamiti | anenaiva dvikāntaraparihāreṇa loṣṭaprastāvo gaveṣaṇīyaḥ | tathottaratrāpi ||
﻿
niroṣṭhyamūrdhanyaṃ yathā—
‘alinīlālakalataṃ kaṃ na hanti ghanastani |
ānanaṃ nalinacchāyaṃ nayanaṃ śaśikānti te || 273 ||’
dvisthānacitreṣu dantyakaṇṭhyaryathā—
‘anaṅgalaṅghanālagnanānātaṅkā sadaṅganā |
sadānagha sadānanda natāṅgīsaṅgasaṃgata || 274 ||’
sadānagha anavadya sadaiva priyālābhenānandayukta | natāṅgyā kasyāścidanyasyāḥ saṅge saṃgata, tava śobhanāṅganā kāmākramaṇaprāptanānārūpatayā vartate | atastāmanukampasveti sopalambhaprārthanāvākyārthaḥ ||
ekasthānacitreṣu kaṇṭhyairyathā—
‘agā gāṃ gāṅgakākāṅkagāhakāghakakākahā |
ahāhāṅgakhagāṅkāgagakaṅkāgakhagāṅkaga || 275 ||’
gāṅgakaṃ gaṅgāsaṃbandhi jalaṃ tasyākaḥ kuṭilā gatiḥ | ‘aka aga kuṭilāyāṃ gatau’ iti | tasyāṅkasya tanmadhyasya gāhako vilolakaḥ | kutsitamaghaṃ pāpamaghakaṃ sa eva kākastaṃ hatavānaghakakrākrahā | anye tu visargāntaṃ paṭhanti | tadā jahātervidhirūpam | evaṃvidhastvaṃ gāṃ svargaṃ agāḥ yāyā iti āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtapratyayaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ san | hānaṃ hāḥ na hā ahāstāñjihīte prāpnotīti ahāhaṃ tādṛśamaṅgaṃ yasya sa khago garuḍaḥ sūryo vā so 'ṅkaścihnabhūto yasya tādṛśo 'go 'rthānmerustadvartinaḥ kaṅkākhyā agakhagā vṛkṣanivāsinaḥ pakṣiṇaste 'pi ākākakā gamanaspṛhayālavo yasya sa tathā | āstāṃ tāvadanye, patattribhirapyabhinanditagamana ityarthaḥ ||
svaracitreṣu hrasvaikasvaraṃ yathā—
‘urugu dyuguru yutsu cukruśustuṣṭuvuḥ puru |
lulubhuḥ pupuṣurmutsu mumuhurnu muhurmuhuḥ || 276 ||’
svaracitreṣvekādikrameṇopanyāso granthavaicitryārthaḥ | uruguṃ vistīrṇavācam | dyuguruṃ svarvāsināmācāryam | yutsu yuddhārtham | ‘nimittātkarmayoge’ iti saptamī | gīrvāṇabhaṭāśrukruśurārtāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayācire | ata eva puru bahudhā tuṣṭuvuḥ | yuddhaprayojana﻿-
māha—mutsu harṣeṣu lulubhuḥ | pupuṣuḥ puṣṭā babhūvuḥ | nu vitarke | muhurmuhurvāraṃrvāraṃ kiṃ mumuhurmohamāsāditavantaḥ | yataḥ krośanādīnāmavyavastheti bhāvaḥ ||
dīrghaikasvaraṃ yathā—
‘vaidhairainairaiśairaindrairaijairailairjainaiḥ saiddhaiḥ |
maitrairnaikairdhairyairvairairdaiḥ svaiḥ svairairdaivaistaistaiḥ || 277 ||’
vidhirviriñciḥ, ī lakṣmīstasyā inaḥ prabhurviṣṇuḥ, īśo mahādevaḥ, indro vāsavaḥ, ījaḥ kāmo lakṣmīputratvāt, ilā pṛthvī, jino buddhaḥ, siddhā devaviśeṣāḥ, mitraḥ sūryaḥ, raido dhanadaḥ kuberaḥ, devā uktavyatiriktā marudādayaḥ, eṣāṃ saṃbandhibhidhaiṃyaiṃrdhṛtibhiḥ svairvittaiśca naikairanekavidhaistaistaiḥ prasiddharūpairahaṃ svairaiḥ suṣṭhu āsamantātsamṛddho bhavānītyāśaṃsā | vai vākyālaṃkare ||
hrasvadvisvaraṃ yathā—
‘kṣitisthitimitikṣiptividhivinnidhisiddhiliṭ |
mama tryakṣa namaddakṣa hara smarahara smara || 278 ||’
kṣitiḥ pṛthvī tasyāḥ sthitiḥ pālanaṃ mitirmānaṃ kṣiptiḥ saṃhārastadvidhiṃ vetti | nidhisiddhī lẹdhīti kvie | naman bhagnatejā dakṣo yasmāt | smarahara kāmadahana, tryakṣa trinayana, hara mahādeva, mama smara | adhīgarthayoge karmaṇi ṣaṣṭī ||
dīrghadvisvaraṃ yathā—
‘śrīdīptī hrīkīrtī dhīnītī gīḥprītī |
edhete dve dve te ye neme deveśe || 279 ||’
śrīdīptī lakṣmītejasī | hrīkīrtī lajjāyaśasī | dhīnītī buddhinayau | gīḥprītī vākpramodau | ime ye deveśe 'pi na staste dve tava edhete vardhete ||
trisvareṣu hrasvatrisvaraṃ yathā—
‘kṣitivijitisthitivihitivrataratayaḥ paragatayaḥ |
uru rurudhurguru dudhuvuḥ svamarikulaṃ yudhi kuravaḥ || 280 ||’
kṣitervijitiḥ vijayaḥ, sthitervarṇāśramamaryādālakṣaṇāyā vihitirvidhānaṃ tadeva vrataṃ ﻿
tatra ratiryeṣām | parā śreṣṭhā gatirjñānaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā | evaṃvidhāḥ kuravaḥ svadviṣāṃ kulamuru vistīrṇa rurudhuḥ | tadeva guru mahat dudhuvuḥ kampayāmāsuḥ ||
catuḥsvareṣu dīrghasvaraṃ yathā—
‘āmnāyānāmāhāntyā vāggītīrītīḥ prītībhītīḥ |
bhogo rogo moho modo dhyeye vecchetkṣeme deśe || 281 ||’
āmrāyānāṃ vedānāmantyā vāgupaniṣat sā hitāhitapratipādanaparā kimāha | yā gītayastā ītaya upasargāḥ | yāḥ prītayastā bhītayo bhayāni | yo bhogaḥ sa rogaḥ | yo modo harṣaḥ sa mohaḥ | na paramevamāha | kiṃtu yāvadhdyeye dhyātavye kṣeme kleśarahite deśe viṣaye mokṣalakṣaṇe icchedicchāṃ kuryāditi | vāśabdaḥ samuccaye | anye cakārameva paṭhanti ||
prativyañjanavinyastasvaraṃ yathā—
‘tāpenogro 'stu dehe no heye villobhinindinā |
jāyāgre hi guṇipreṣṭhe hitokṣepo 'mṛtokṣiṇi || 282 ||’
heye hātavye vastuni yā villābhaḥ | ‘vidḷlābhe’ iti dhātvanusārāt | tatra ye lobhino lobhavantastannindanaśīlena tāpena tejasārthādugraścaṇḍaraśmiḥ sa naḥ mama dehe 'stu | tejasvī bhavānīti yāvat | kimityevamāśāsyata ityata āha—amṛtasyandini kāntāgre guṇināṃ priyatame 'kṣepo 'vilamba eva hito 'rthataḥ samarasya | ‘iti datvāśiṣaṃ ko 'pi svasmai kārmukakarmaṇe | jagāma samaraṃ kartumarilakṣmīsvayaṃvaram ||’
tadevāpāstasamastasvaraṃ yathā—
‘tapana grastadahana hayavallabhanandana |
jayagraha gaṇapraṣṭha hatakṣapa matakṣaṇa || 283 ||’
grastadahana abhibhūtapāvaka | hayavallabho revantaḥ sa tanayo yasya | hatakṣapa apahṛtarātra | matakṣaṇa saṃmatotsava ||
ākāracitreṣvaṣṭadalaṃ yathā—
‘yāśritā pāvanatayā yātanacchidanīcayā |
yācanīyā dhiyā māyāyāmāyāsaṃ stutā śriyā || 284 ||’
﻿
atra—
‘karṇikāyāṃ nyasedekaṃ dve dve dikṣu vidikṣu ca |
praveśanirgamau dikṣu kuryādaṣṭadalāmbuje || 285 ||
yā śritetyādikamudāharaṇaṃ prāgeva (pa0 1 ślo0 170) vyākhyātam | ataḥ paraṃ hāriharivyākhyā | sāpyatraiva likhyate | tadyathā—yā devī pavitratvenāśritā anīcayā tuṅgyā budhdyā māyāyāmasyāvidyāvistārasyāyāsaṃ glāniṃ vicchedaṃ yācanīyā prārthanīyā yato yātanaṃ narakānubhavanīyaṃ duḥkhaṃ chinatti śriyāpi stuteti || asya nyāsamāha—karṇikāyāmiti | ādyo yāvarṇaḥ karṇikāyāṃ śriteti pāveti krameṇa dvikaṃ dvikamaṣṭapatreṣu | yāśritā śriyetyādau digdaleṣu praveśanirgamau ||
dvitīyamaṣṭadalaṃ yathā—
‘carasphāravarakṣāra varakāra garajvara |
calasphāla valakṣālavala kālagala jvala || 286 ||’
aṣṭadhā karṇikāvarṇaḥ patreṣvaṣṭau tathāpare |
teṣāṃ saṃdhiṣu cāpyaṣṭāvaṣṭapattrasaroruhe || 287 ||
carasphāretyādi | saṃcaraṇaśīlaḥ sphāro yo varastaṃ kṣarati dadāti iti | varāñchreṣṭhān kirati kṣipati kṛṇoti hinasti veti karmaṇyaṇ | garaḥ kālakūṭastasya jvaro jvaraṇāt | tāṇḍavārambhe calāḥ sphālā yasya | valakṣa dhavaladeha, alavala prāptaśakte, kālagala nīlakaṇṭha, jvala dīpyamāno bhava || nyāsamāha—aṣṭadheti | atha prathamārdhe eka eva repho 'ṣṭadhā karṇikāyām | aparārdhasyānye 'ṣṭau lakāravarjaṃ daleṣu ceṣāṃ saṃdhiṣvanye 'ṣṭau lakārāḥ ||
tṛtīyamaṣṭapattraṃ yathā—
‘na śaśīśanave bhāve namatkāma natavrata |
namāmi mānanamanaṃ nanu tvānunayannayam || 288 ||’
atra—
prākkarṇikāṃ punaḥ parṇaṃ parṇāgraṃ parṇakarṇike |
pratiparṇaṃ vrajeddhīmāniha tvaṣṭadalāmbuje || 289 ||
﻿
evaṃ catuṣpattra-ṣoḍaśapattre api draṣṭavye ||
na śaśīśetyādi | śaśīśe candre nave bhāve bhaktau | sthita iti śeṣaḥ | tvāmahaṃ na namāmi | kākvā namāmyeva | naman bhagnaḥ kāmo yasmāt | natamupanataṃ vrataṃ yasya saṃyamidhaureyatvāt | mānanamanaṃ śatrūṇāmunnatināśanam | nanviti pūjāsaṃbodhane | tvā iti tvām | anunayan vinayaṃ kurvāṇo 'yam || nyāsamāha—prākkarṇikāmiti | pūrvaṃ karṇikāyāmādyo nakāro grāhyaḥ, tataḥ śeti parṇamadhye, śīti parṇāgre, parāvṛtya parṇakarṇikayoḥ śakāranakārau, punaḥ karṇikāto dalāgragamāgame 'pi | ayameva kramaścaturdalapadme ||
tayoścatuṣpattraṃ yathā—
‘sāsavā tvā sumanasā sā natā pīvarorasā |
sāradhāmaiti sahasā sāhasardha suvāsasā || 290 ||’
karṇikāto nayedūrdhvaṃ patrākārākṣarāvalīm |
praveśayetkarṇikāyāṃ padmametaccaturdalam || 291 ||
sāsavetyādi | sāsavā āsvāditamadirā | pīvareṇa stanạ̄dhyenorasā natā sāradhāmā utkṛṣṭakāntiḥ sahasā sahāsyā akasmādvā śrṛṅgāroddīpanasvabhāvena mārgaśīrṣeṇa hetunā śobhanena vāsasā ca lakṣitā he sāhasardha sarvaniśīthābhisaraṇa sāhasarasika, tvāmeti upagacchatīti || nyāsamāha—karṇiketi | subodhametaditi ||
ṣoḍaśapattraṃ yathā—
‘namaste mahimaprema namasyāmatimaddama |
kṣāmasoma namatkāma dhāmabhīma samakṣama || 292 ||’
gomūtrikākrameṇa syurvarṇāḥ sarve samāḥ samāḥ |
madhye mavarṇavinyāsātpadmo 'yaṃ ṣoḍaśacchadaḥ || 293 ||
ṣoḍaśapattramāha—namasta ityādi | mahimani premā yasya tat | namasya amatimato dāmyatīti amatimaddama | kṣāmaḥ kalāmātreṇa cūḍāsaṃgataḥ somo yasya | naman bhagnaḥ kāmo yasmāt | dhāmnā tejasā bhīma bhayānaka | samā sakalavyutthānahetusādhāraṇī kṣamā yasya | yasyaitāni saṃbodhanaviśeṣaṇāni te tubhyaṃ namaskurute ﻿
kaściditi || nyāsamāha—gomūtriketi | varṇā makāravyatiriktāḥ samāḥ makārasahitāḥ | samāḥ samā iti vīpsā prativarṇaṃ makārasāhityabodhanārthā ||
aṣṭapattrameva kavināmāṅkaṃ yathā—
‘rātāvadyādhirājyā visarararasavivdyājavākkṣmāpakārā rākā pakṣmābhaśeṣā nayanananayanasvā [sā] khayā stavyamārā |
rāmā vyastasthiratvā tuhinananahituḥ śrīḥ karakṣāradhārā rādhā rakṣāstu mahyaṃ śivamamamavaśivyālavidyāvatārā || 294 ||’
niviṣṭāṣṭadalanyāsamidaṃ pādārdhabhaktibhiḥ |
aspṛṣṭakarṇikaṃ koṇaiḥ kavināmāṅkamambujam || 295 ||
tatrāṅkaḥ—‘rājaśekharakamala’ | etena cakramapi vyākhyātam ||
aṣṭapattrameva kavināmāṅkamāha—rātāvadyeti | ‘gīrvāṇasubhaṭaḥ kaścidyuyutsurdaityasenayā | tatkālakṛtasāṃnidhyāṃ māyādevīmapūjayat ||’ tathāhi—vyājo māyā saiva vāgrūpā vyājaśabdopapadaṃ vāgabhidhānaṃ yasyāḥ sā mahyaṃ rakṣāstviti saṃbandhaḥ | rātaṃ dattamavadyaṃ doṣabahulamādhirājyam, avadyā ādhayo yatra tādṛśaṃ vā rājyaṃ yayā | viśiṣṭaṃ saraṇaṃ visarastaṃ rāti prayacchati yo raso 'rthādvīrastaṃ vetti vindati vā | yā kṣmāyāṃ pṛthivyāmapakāraḥ putrakalatrādirūpo yasyāḥ sakāśāditi gamakatvādvahuvrīhiḥ | rākā pūrṇimā, dvādaśavarṣadeśīyakanyārūpā vā | pakṣmābhaḥ śarīrasaṃlagnaḥ śeṣaḥ sarpaḥ | yasyā nayanaṃ nītistānnayatīti yannayanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ | jñānamiti yāvat | tadeva svamātmā yasyāḥ | khe vyomni yātīti khayā | stavyo māro māraṇaṃ kāmo vā yasyāḥ | sā rāmā ramaṇīyā strīrūpā vā | vyastaṃ vināśitaṃ sthiratvaṃ yayā | tuhinaṃ nayati prāpayatīti nayaterḍapratyaye tuhinanaścandrastasya nahiturjaṭājūṭe bandhayituḥ parameśvarasya śrīḥ śaktirūpā | nahyati badhnātīti nahervici nahaṃ stutimāsādayatīti | ‘sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ kvibvaktavyaḥ’ iti kvipi tṛjantasya rūpam | kaṃ sukhaṃ rāti dadātīti karastasya kṣārabhūtā dasyavasteṣāṃ khaṅgādidhāreva dhārā chettrī | rādheti devyāḥ paurāṇikaṃ nāma | mametyavyayaṃ bhāvapradhānam | śive manatvaṃ mānti paricchindanti ye vaśino yoginasteṣāmapi vyālavidyāṃ kṣudravidyāmavatārayati yā sā tathā || nyāsamāha—niviṣṭeti | aṣṭabhiḥ pādārdhairaṣṭadalaviracanā | yadvarṇāṣṭakaṃ nāmno﻿-
ttiṣṭhati tadāha—‘rājaśekharakamala’ | kavikāvyanāmalābhādaṃvibhaktikatvamapyadoṣaḥ | eteneti | nāmāṅkapadmakathanena cakramapi nāmāṅkamavaseyam ||
cakraṃ yathā—
‘sa tvaṃ mānaviśiṣṭamājirabhasādālambya bhavyaḥ puro labdhāghakṣayaśuddhiruddharataraśrīvatsabhūmirmudā |
muktvā kāmamapāstabhīḥ paramṛgavyādhaḥ sa nādaṃ hare- rekaughaiḥ samakālamabhramudayī ropaistadātastare || 296 ||’
puraḥ puro likhetpādānatra trīnṣaḍarīkṛtān |
turyaṃ tu bhramayennemau nāmāṅkaścakrasaṃvidhiḥ || 297 ||
atrāṅkaḥ—‘māghakāvyamidaṃ śiśupālavadhaḥ' ||
sa tvamityādi | harernādaṃ siṃhanādaṃ ropairbāṇairājirabhasātsaṅgrāmaharṣāduddharataraśrīvatsabhūmirunnatahṛdayaḥ sa tvamālambya mānena tadviśiṣṭamiti viśeṣaṇam | prāptapāpavināśo mudā harṣeṇa apagatabhīḥ śatrurhariṇavyādho 'bhramākāśaṃ pidadhe tadā tasminkāle siṃhanādamuktveti saṃbandhaḥ || nyāsamāha—pura iti | puraḥ puro likhitvānyānagre likhedyathā ṣaḍarāḥ saṃpadyante ||
evaṃ caturaṅkamapi yathā—
‘śuddhaṃ baddhasurāsthisāraviṣama tvaṃ rugjayātisthira bhraṣṭoddharmarajaḥpadaṃ gavi gavākṣīṇena cañcadbhuvā |
tathyaṃ cintitaguptirastavidhidigbhedaṃ na cakraṃ śucācāro 'prāṃśuradabhramugra tanu me ramyo bhavānīrucā || 298 ||’
atrāṅkaḥ—‘śubhrataravācā baddhaciticakraṃ rājaguruṇedaṃ sādaramavādi' ||
yathā vā—śuddhamityādi | cakraṃ me mama gavi vāci śuddhamakaluṣam, dharmādutkāntamuddharmamīdṛśaṃ yadrajo rājasabhāvastasya padaṃ sthānaṃ tadbhraṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ yasmāt | astā vidhidigdaivapāratantryaṃ yatra tathāvidhaṃ, śucā śokena ca na vakrīkṛtamanapahatamadabhramupacitaṃ yadbhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ tattanu vistārayeti prārthanā | baddhairalaṃkārīkṛtaiḥ surāṇāṃ brahmādīnāṃ sāraṃ śirastadasthibhirbaddhamuṇḍamālābhirbhayānaka | rujāṃ rogāṇāṃ jayenāti-﻿
sthira | akṣīṇenopacitena cañcadbhuvā sāhlādena gavā vṛṣeṇa lakṣita | tathyamiti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | cintitā guptirbhūtānāṃ rakṣā yena | cāro ramaṇīyaḥ | ugro mahādevaḥ | tvamaprāṃśuḥ sarvasmāduccaiḥpade sthitaḥ | bhavānīrucā vāmārdhasthitapārvatīkāntyā ramyastanviti saṃbandhaḥ || atra pūrvavadeva nyāsaḥ | aṅkāstu catvāra iti viśeṣaḥ ||
gaticitreṣu gatapratyāgataṃ yathā—
‘vāraṇāgagabhīrā sā sārābhīgagaṇāravā |
kāritārivadhā senā nāsedhāvaritārikā || 299 ||’
atrāyukpādayorgatiḥ, yukpādayoḥ pratyāgatiḥ ||
idānīṃ gaticitraprastāvaḥ—vāraṇetyādi | vāraṇā eva agāḥ parvatāstairgabhīrā duravagāhā | sārā śreṣṭhā | bhiyaṃ yena yānti tādṛśānāṃ gaṇānāmāravo yatra | sāro vā bhīgagaṇāravo yatra | kāritaḥ kṛto 'rīṇāṃ vadho yayā | svārthe ṇic | āsedhaḥ paraiḥ pratiṣedhastena hīnā | varitāḥ subhaṭairyuddhārthamāhūtā arayo yasyāṃ sā tathā | ‘vara īpsāyām’ iti dhātoḥ ktapratyaye variteti rūpasiddhiḥ | atrāyukpādayoḥ prathamatṛtīyayorānulomyena varṇāvalīṃ gṛhītvā tatpratilomarūpau yukpādau dvitīyacaturthau gṛhyete | paṭhitervarṇādvarṇāntarasaṃcāro gatistanniyamanena citraṃ gaticitraṃ sa cātra yathoktarūpa eva ||
tadakṣaragataṃ yathā—
‘niśitāsirato 'bhīko nyejate 'maraṇā rucā |
cāruṇā ramate janye ko bhīto rasitāśini || 300 ||’
atra gatapratyāgatābhyāṃ sa eva ślokaḥ ||
he amaraṇā maraṇarahitāḥ, niśitakhaṅgarato bhayaśūnyaśca rucā tejasā nyejate na kampate | yo hi bhītaḥ sa kathaṃ śabdāyamānāśanaśīlarakṣaḥpiśācādisaṃkule janye saṅgrāme cāruṇā karituragādinā ramate | na kathaṃcidityarthaḥ | atra saṃdarbhasamāptiparyantaṃ yā varṇamālā gṛhītā saiva samāpterārabhya pratyāgatyā yāvadārambhaṃ samāpyata iti pūrvaṃ tvardhenaivamiti ||
ślokāntaraṃ yathā—
‘vāhanājani mānāse sārājāvanamā tataḥ |
mattasāragarājebhe bhārīhāvajjanadhvani || 301 ||’
﻿
atra prātilomyenāparaḥ śloko bhavati | yathā—
‘nidhvanajjavahārībhā bheje rāgarasāttamaḥ |
tatamānavajārāsā senā mānijanāhavā || 302 ||’
vāhaneti | tato 'nantaraṃ vāhanā senā 'namā natiśūnyājani jātā | sārājāvutkṛṣṭasaṅgrāme mānāse paramānakṣepake mattāḥ sāragāḥ sotkarṣagatiśālino rājebhā rājadantino yatra | bhāriṇaḥ svāminārpitasamarabharāḥ ata eva yathocitaceṣṭāvantasteṣāṃ janānāṃ dhvaniḥ siṃhanādo yatreti kriyāviśeṣaṇamityanulomaślokārthaḥ | nidhvanantaḥ stananto javena vegena hāriṇa ibhā yatra | tato vistīrṇo mānavajārāsaḥ sainikakṛta ārāvaḥ kolāhalo yatra | mānijanānāṃ sāhaṃkārāṇāṃ vīrāṇāmāhavo dvandvayuddhaṃ yatra | īdṛśī senā rāgarasātparalakṣmīharaṇarasena tamo bheje krodhamavāpeti pratilomaślokārthaḥ ||
bhāṣāntaragataṃ yathā—
‘iha re bahalā lāse bālā rāhumalīmasā |
sālakā rasalīlā sā tuṅgālāli kalārata || 303 ||’
atra prātilomyenāparaḥ prākṛtaśloko bhavati | yathā—
‘taralā kalilā gātuṃ sālālī sarakālasā |
sāmalī mahurālāvā selālā hava rehaï || 304 ||’
iha re ityādi | lāse nṛtye bahalā asaṃkucitā rāhumalīmasā śyāmā sālakā bhrūkarṇādiparabhāgārpakacūrṇakuntalavatī rasācchṛṅgārāllīlā yasyāḥ sā, tathā tuṅgā uccavyavahārā evaṃvidhā sā bālā he catuḥṣaṣṭikalārata, alāli lālitā tvayeti saṃskṛtaślokārthaḥ | kalā gītavādyanṛtyānāṃ saṃkarīkaraṇasahitā paṭīyasī gātuṃ taralā tvaritā sālālī nānāvṛkṣapaṅktistadīyena sarakeṇa madhunā alasā | śyāmā madhurālāpā selā uttamā nārī | ‘selā syāduttamā nārī’ iti deśīkośe | saha irayā madirayā vartante selā vā | ralayorekatvasmaraṇāditi kecit, taccintyam | alā bhūṣayitrī | hava dhaveti saṃbodhanam | rehaï rājate | prākṛtaślokārthaḥ | evaṃ bhāṣāntarāṇāmapi gatapratyāgatī boddhavye ||
﻿
tadarthānugataṃ yathā—
‘vidite divi ke 'nīke taṃ yāntaṃ nijitājini |
vigadaṃ gavi roddhāro yoddhā yo natimeti na || 305 ||’
atra prātilomyena sa eva padārthaḥ ||
vidita ityādi | vidite svarvāsināmapi prasiddhe nijitāḥ pareṣāmājayo yuddhāni yena tādṛśyanīke samare prāptaṃ gavi parāhvānarūpāyāṃ vāci vigadaṃ hṛdayajvararahitaṃ ke nāma bhaṭā yoddhāraḥ | na ke 'pi santītyarthaḥ | taṃ kam | yo yoddhā sankathamapi natiṃ namratāṃ naiti na yāti | atra tadarthaka eva pratilomaślokaḥ | sa yathā—‘natimeti na yoddhā yo roddhāro vigadaṃ gavi | nijitājinitaṃ yātaṅkenīke vidite divi' ||
turaṅgapadaṃ yathā—
‘bālā sukālabālā kā kāntilālakalālitā |
sasvā sutavatī sārā darpikā vratagardhita || 306 ||’
kramātpādacatuṣke 'sya paṅktiśaḥ parilekhite |
turaṅgapadayātena śloko 'nya upajāyate || 307 ||
yathā—
‘bālā lalitatīvrasvā sukalā rāgatarpikā |
sudantikā vardhitāvāsā kālā talalāsakā || 308 ||’
bāletyādi | bālā ṣoḍaśavarṣadeśīyā śobhanakṛṣṇakeśī kāntipradacūrṇakuntalaśobhitā sasvā ātmasaṃpadyuktā sutavatī putrayuktā utkṛṣṭābhimānātmakaśṛṅgāravatī abhilaṣitasvavivāhādivratākāṅkṣā atastaṃ bhajasveti | hṛdaye iti śeṣaḥ || nyāsamāha—kramāditi | lalito manojñastīvraḥ pravīṇaḥ sva ātmā yasyāḥ | rāgeṇa premṇā tarpayati yā | śobhanadantayuktā | vardhitāvāsā saṃpūrṇīkṛtasakalasthānā | kālo bhṛṣāvyāhārastena saha vartate yā | tale lāsakā nartakā yasyāḥ sā tathābhūtā | adhaḥkṛtasakalanartakaloketyarthaḥ | evaṃbhūtā sā bālā tvayopabhukteti vākyārthaḥ ||
﻿
āhurardhabhramaṃ nāma ślokārdhabhramaṇaṃ yadi |
tadidaṃ sarvatobhadraṃ sarvato bhramaṇaṃ yadi || 110 ||
tayorardhabhramaṃ yathā—
‘sasatvaratide nityaṃ sadarāmarṣanāśini |
tvarādhikakasannāde ramakatvamakarṣati || 309 ||’
sasatveti | sadarāḥ sabhayāḥ | tvarādhikānāṃ kasannitastataḥ saṃcarannādo yatra | ata eva vīrānprati ramakatvamakarṣati ||
sarvatobhadraṃ yathā—
‘devākānini kāvāde vāhikāsvasvakāhi vā |
kākārebhabhare 'kākā nisvabhavyavyabhasvani || 310 ||’
‘kanī dīptau’ | devānākanituṃ śīlaṃ yasya | kāvāda īṣadvādo yatra | kasya mastakasya sannā saṃgatā ādā grahaṇaṃ yatreti vā | vāhikā paryāyavahanam | ‘paryāyārhaṇotpattiṣu’ iti ṇvuc | saiva svaṃ vittabhūtā yeṣāmevaṃvidhā ye svakā ātmapakṣīyāstānājihīte iti vic | kaṃ madajalamākirati iti kākārastādṛśa ibhabharo hāstikaṃ yatra | he 'kākāḥ sāttvikā iti saṃbodhanam | kākāḥ saṅgrāmalolubhā vā | kvacitkartaryapi ghañū | niḥsvā nirātmāno bhavyā ādheyaguṇāstānapi vyayanti svabalenopabṛṃhayanti ye te nisvabhavyavyāsteṣāṃ bhasvani bhartsanaśīle | ‘bhasa bhartsane’ ityataḥ kvanip ||
bandhacitreṣu dvicatuṣkacakrabandho yathā—
‘jayadeva narendrāde lambodara vināyaka |
jagadedhana candrābhālaṅghidantavibhāyate || 311 ||’
‘iha śikharasaṃdhimālāṃ bibhṛyādardhaṃ samāśritairvarṇaiḥ |
dvicatuṣkacakrabandhe nemividhau cāparaṃ bhramayet || 312 ||
jayada ityādi | natā indrādayo yasmai sa tathā | jagatāmedhana vardhana | candrābhālaṅghinī candrakāntivijayinī dantaprabhāṇāmāyatiryasya sa tathā || nyāsamāha—iheti | śikharamālāṃ saṃdhimālāṃ ca pūrvārdhavarṇaiḥ krameṇa bibhṛyātpūrayet | nemividhau cāparamuttarārdhaṃ bhramayet ||
﻿
dviśrṛṅgāṭakabandho yathā—
‘karāsañja vaśeśaṃ khagaurava sya kalārasam |
saṃdhāya valayāṃ śaṅkāmagaurīṃ me vanātmaka || 313 ||’
‘śrṛṅgādgranthiṃ punaḥ śrṛṅgaṃ granthiṃ śrṛṅgaṃ vrajediti |
dviśrṛṅgāṭakabandhe 'sminnemiḥ śeṣākṣarairbhavet || 314 ||
atrāṅkaḥ—‘rājaśekharasya' ||
dve śṛṅgāṭake mitho vaiparītyena yatra śikharaṃ dviśṛṅgāṭakam | karaiḥ kiraṇairāsañjayatīti karāsañjaḥ | khe vyomni gauravaṃ yasya sa tathā | vanātmaka jalasvarūpa | candrakalāsu rasamanurāgaṃ saṃdhāya kṛtvā antaḥsvacchatayā dṛśyanabhobhāganemimadvalayākārollekhinīṃ me mamāgaurīṃ śyāmāṃ śaṅkāmapanaya | sya iti kriyāpadam | pūrṇo bhaveti yāvat | vaśeśamāyattaśaṃkaramiti kriyāviśeṣaṇam || nyāsamāha—śrṛṅgāditi | śeṣākṣarairiti | ādyātkakārādārabhya yāvatsamāpti śeṣāṇyakṣarāṇi tairnemiriti nyāsaḥ | atra granthivarṇaireva ‘rājaśekharasya’ iti nāmāṅkavarṇāvalī labhyate ||
viviḍitabandho yathā—
‘sā satī jayatādatra sarantī yamitātrasā |
sāraṃ paraṃ sa ca jayī śamitāsyandanenasā || 315 ||’
‘śikharādanyatarasmātpratiparva bhramati rekhayādyardham |
nemau taditaramardhe viviḍitacakrābhidhe bandhe || 316 ||
viviḍitabandhastu pañcaśṛṅgacakram | taddevatāmnāye darśitam | ‘karpūrakundagaurīṃ tanumatanuṃ kārmukabhrūkām | varadānasundarakarāṃ viviḍitacakrasthitāṃ vande ||’ seti | prasiddhānubhāvā satī gaurī sarantī nirargalaprasarā na trasyatītyatrasā | asyandanena sthireṇa enasā kalmaṣeṇa śamitā viklavībhūtā | rahiteti yāvat | ‘śama vaiklavye' | atra jagati paraṃ sāraṃ yaṃ bhagavantamitā saṃgatā | sa ca jayī maheśvaro jayatāditi || nyāsamāha—śikharāditi | ‘anyatamādvā’ iti pāṭhaḥ | ‘anyatamasmāt’ iti pāṭhe tu sarvanāmatvaṃ cintyam | kecittu ‘kiṃyattadekānyebhyaḥ’ iti paṭhitvā ḍatama﻿-
dvārikāṃ sarvanāmatāmāhuḥ | gaṇe cānyataraśabdaṃ na paṭhanti | avyutpattimātraṃ cedam | anirdhāritaikābhidhāyakastvanyatamaśabdaḥ ||
śarayantrabandho yathā—
‘namaste jagatāṃ gātra sadānavakulakṣaya |
samaste 'ja satāṃ nātra mudāmavana lakṣaya || 317 ||’
‘caturṣvapi ca pādeṣu paṅktiśo likhiteṣviha |
āderādestu raṅgasya pādaiḥ pādaḥ samāpyate || 318 ||
namasta ityādi | jagatāṃ nāmarūpaprapañcasya gātrabhūta dānavakulakṣayeṇa sahita mudāṃ harṣāṇāṃ rakṣaka aja viṣṇo, atra jagati satāṃ madhye na ko 'pi te tava samaḥ | tato lakṣaya dṛkpātenānugṛhāṇa | māmiti śeṣaḥ || nyāsamāha—caturṣvapīti | śeṣaṃ subodham ||
vyomabandho yathā—
‘kamalāvalihārivikāsaviśeṣavahaṃ janakāṅka na nagāmikaraṃ divi sāramanāramaṇaṃ jaratāṃ na |
tamasāṃ balahānivilāsavaśena varaṃ janakānta na namāmi ciraṃ savitāramanādimahaṃ jagatāṃ na || 319 ||’
aṣṭādaśaśikharacarīṃ gomūtrikayā catuṣpadīṃ paśyet |
yatrādyantairdṛṣṭāṃ sa jñeyo vyomabandha iti || 111 ||
kamalāvaliṣu padmakhaṇḍeṣu praśasteṣu hārī manojño yo vikāsa[viśeṣa]stasya vọdhāraṃ janairlokaiḥ stutyaṃ tadīyaṃ kaṃ śirastatrāṅka cihnabhūta, na nagāmikaraṃ, kiṃtu visṛtvarakiraṇameva divi vaimānikapathe sārabhūtaṃ jaratāṃ pariṇatānāmanāramaṇaṃ na, kiṃtu prītikarameva | tamasāṃ balahānau yo vilāsavaśaḥ saṃtato vyāpārastena varamutkṛṣṭaṃ, janakānta lokahṛdayaṃgama, jagatāmanādiṃ na, kiṃtvādimeva | evaṃvidhaṃ bhagavantaṃ savitāramahaṃ na namāmi kiṃtu namāmyeva || nyāsamāha—aṣṭādaśeti | ādyantairdṛṣṭāmiti | pādādyantavarṇayoraikyāditi bodhyam ||
﻿
murajabandho yathā—
‘sā senā gamanārambhe rasenāsīdanāratā |
tāranādajanā mattadhīranāgamanāmayā || 320 ||’
atra pādacatuṣke 'pi kramaśaḥ parilekhite |
ślokapādakrameṇa syādrekhāsu surajatrayī || 112 ||
anāratā avicchinnapraharaṇavyāpārā āsīt | mattadhīranāgamiti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | rasena vīreṇa | mahāprāṇaśabdajanā || atra nyāsamāha—atra pādeti | atra puṭacatuṣkakalpanayā murajatrayonmeṣaḥ ||
ekākṣaramurajabandho yathā—
‘surānana tvāṃ na na hānanaṣṭaye punaḥ stuve 'narghaghanaplavānanam |
manasyanūnavyasanapradhūnanaṃ sakānanasthānanadīnanardanam || 321 ||’
ślokasyaitasya pādeṣu likhiteṣu caturṣvapi |
trimṛdaṅgakarīha syāccaturekākṣarāvalī || 113 ||
surāṇāṃ devānāmānanaṃ mukhaṃ tadbhūta vahne | hānanaṣṭaye hānināśāya tvāṃ na na stuve, kiṃtu staumyeva | punariti devatāntaravyāvṛttau stutyāvṛttau vā | anarghye ghanaughaprāṇane yasmāt | ‘ana prāṇane’ iti dhātvanusārāt | praṇatānāṃ manasi yadanūnamanādibhavaparamparānupāti vyasanaṃ tasya pradhūnanaṃ pratikṣepakam | sakānaneṣu vanagahaneṣu sthāneṣu nadīnasya payorāśeriva nardanaṃ kolāhalo yasyeti || nyāsamāha—ślokasyaitasyeti | prathamapādasthādakṣarādārabhya caturthapādasthamakṣaraṃ yāvadekajātīyākṣaracatuṣkāvalīṃ gṛhītvā parāvṛtya tajjātīyānāmeva catuṣṭayī gṛhyate | tenaikamurajonmudraṇamaparatrāpyanenaiva prakāreṇātrodāharaṇe ekākṣaramurajatrayī bhavatīti nyāsārthaḥ ||
murajaprastāro yathā—
‘tālasāraprabhā rākā tārakāpatidaṃśitā |
māradhāma ramādhītā valayāmāsa sāgaram || 322 ||’
krameṇaivāsya pādeṣu prasṛteṣu caturṣvapi |
turyānmurajamārgeṇa śloko 'yamupajāyate || 114 ||
﻿
‘varakārapradaṃ dhīraṃ tāradhāmā 'samāsikā |
sā latāmālayā 'mā 'pa tārābhā 'tirasāgatā || 323 ||’
tālataroryatsāraṃ khādyabhāgastatprabhevāvadātā prabhā yasyāḥ | rākā pūrṇimā | tārakāpatinā candreṇa daṃśitā kavalitā | mārasya kāmasya dhāma sthānaṃ yatra | ramayā lakṣmyā adhītābhyastā | salakṣmīketyarthaḥ | valayāmāsa cālitavatī, balavantaṃ vā cakāra | ‘vinmatorluk’ ityanuśāsanāt ||—krameṇaiveti | turyācca pādaprathamākṣarādupakrame yena yena mārgeṇa murajākṛtirlabhyate tenāyamaparaḥ śloko bhavati || varasya īpsitasya vastunaḥ kāraḥ kāraṇaṃ tatpradaṃ tāraṃ dīptaṃ dhāma kāntiryasyāḥ | asamā ananyasādhāraṇī āsikā sthitiryasyāḥ sā nāyikā latāmālayā saṃketalatāmaṇḍapena amā sārdhaṃ āpa prāptavatī | tārā rohiṇīprabhṛtistadātmā, tārairnirmalamauktikairvā bhāti yā | atiśayitena rasena pūrṇā upagatā saṃgatā | prakṛtodāharaṇe 'ṣṭākṣaraprastāvāntaḥpātī yaḥ prakārastadantaḥpātī murajākṣarairlabhyate ||
udāharaṇamātraṃ caitat, tena gativicitrādigomūtrikādayo 'nye 'pi citraprakārā bhavanti |
gatiruccāvacā yatra mārge mūtrasya goriva |
gomūtriketi tatprāhurduṣkaraṃ citravedinaḥ || 115 ||
teṣu pādagomūtrikā yathā—
‘kāṅkṣanpulomatanayāstanapīḍitāni vakṣaḥsthalotthitarayāñcanapīḍitāni |
pāyādapāyabhayato namuciprahārī māyāmapāsya bhavato 'mbumucāṃ prasārī || 324 ||’
seyamayugmataḥ pādagomūtrikā ||
nanu yāvadudāhṛtameva kiṃ gatyādi citraṃ, tathā sati kiṃ gomūtrikādīnāṃ pṛthagbhāgavibhāgavyāghātaḥ syādityata āha—udāharaṇamātraṃ caitaditi | gatiḥ paṭhitisaṃcāro varṇānāmuccāvacaṃ vorghvādhaḥparyāyeṇa pravṛttā | māyāṃ saṃsārabandhamapāsya duḥkhabhayātpāyāditi saṃbandhaḥ || nyāso yathā—ayugmataḥ prathamāttṛtīyā-﻿
ccopakramya dvitīyacaturthapādasaṃdaṃśena gomūtrikayā prathamadvitīyayostṛtīyacaturthayośca parasparamunmeṣaṇamitīyamayukpādagomūtrikā ||
yugmato yathā—
‘devaḥ śaśāṅkaśakalābharaṇaḥ pinākī deyaḥ śamaikavikalebharaṇaḥ sanāgaḥ |
citte mahāsurajanena śubhaṃ vidhattāṃ cittaṃ mahāsurajanānatabhaṅgadhanvā || 325 ||’
mahāsurajanena brahmādinā citte deyo dhāraṇīyaḥ | śamenaikena vikalīkṛta ibharaṇo gajānāmuruyuddhaṃ yena | śubhaṃ kalmaṣarahitaṃ cittaṃ vidhattām, aviśeṣeṇa saṃsāriṇāmeva | atra pūrvavatsamapadamupakramya viṣamapādasaṃdaṃśena samāptiriti viśeṣasteneyaṃ yukpādagomūtrikā ||
ardhaślokagomūtrikā yathā—
‘cūḍāprotendubhāgadyutidalitatamaskandalīcakravālo devo deyādudāraṃ śamamarajanatānandano 'nanyadhāmā |
krīḍādhūteśabhāmā dyusadanatanimacchedanī ca bhruvā no dehe devī durīrandamamaratanatā nandinomānyadhāmā || 326 ||’
indorbhāgaḥ khaṇḍaṃ | śaṃ kalyāṇaṃ | amarajanatā devasamūhaḥ | nāstyanyaddhāma sthānaṃ yasya so 'nanyadhāmā | svātmārāma ityarthaḥ | na paraṃ devo devī ca | bhruvā bhrūkṣepeṇa durīrandūramapanayan no 'smākaṃ dehe damaṃ deyāditi saṃbandhaḥ | dhūteśabhāmā praṇayenāpahṛtaparameśvarapraṇayaroṣā | ‘bhāma krodhe’ iti dhātvanusārāt | dyusadanā devāḥ | aratamaviśrāntaṃ nandinā natā umā gaurī | apūrvaṃ dhāma tejo yasyāḥ ||
ślokagomūtrikāyāṃ prathamaśloko yathā—
‘pāyādvaścandradhārī sakalasuraśirolīḍhapādāravindo devyā ruddhāṅgabhāgaḥ puradanujadavastyānasaṃvinnidānam |
kaṃdarpaḥ kṣodapakṣaḥ sarasasuravadhūmaṇḍalīgītagarvo daityādhīśāndhakenānatacaraṇanakhaḥ śaṃkaro bhavyabhāvyaḥ || 327 ||’
﻿
dvitīyo yathā—
deyānnaścaṇḍadhāmā salilaharakaro rūḍhakandāravindo dehe rugbhaṅgarāgaḥ suramanujadamaṃ tyāgasaṃpannidhānam |
bhandaṃ dikkṣobhadaśrīḥ sadasadaravadhūkhaṇḍanāgīragamyo- 'daityaidhī bandhahānāvatatarasanayaḥ śaṃparo divyasevyaḥ || 328 ||’
purākhyadānavasya davo dāvāgniḥ styānāyāḥ ghanāyāḥ saṃvido nidānam | daityādhīśenāndhakenānatacaraṇaḥ | bhavyānāmuttamānāṃ bhāvyo dhyeyaḥ | rūḍhakandānyaravindāni yasmāt | praṇatānāṃ ruganurāgo yasya | surāṇāṃ manujānāṃ ca damaṃ damatīti vā | tyāgasaṃpado nidhānamāśrayaḥ | diśāṃ kṣobhadāyikā śrīryasya | sade upavane sadarā sabhayā yā vadhūstadīyānāṃ khaṇḍanāgirāṃ nirbhartsanavacasāmaviṣayaḥ | adaityaidhī na daityavardhanaḥ | saṃsārabandhavicchittaye vistīrṇarayo nayo yasya | śaṃ sukhaṃ piparti pūrayatīti śaṃparo divyaḥ sevyaśceti | evaṃvidhaścaṇḍadhāmā ravirno 'smākaṃ dehe bhandaṃ kalyāṇaṃ deyādityarthaḥ ||
viparītagomūtrikāyāṃ prathamaśloko yathā—
‘vināyakaṃ dānasugandhivaktraṃ smitānanaṃ mandacaraṃ kathāsu |
namāmi vighnāvalihārisāraṃ satīsutaṃ śaṃkaravallabhaṃ ca || 329 ||’
viparītaśloko yathā—
‘calallatārabdhaśamaṃ subhāsaṃ saṃsārahāraṃ bahuvipramānyam |
sudhākaraṃ candramasaṃ nato 'smi savarṇagarbhaṃ navakambunạ̄dhyam || 330 ||’
mandacaraṃ mandālasagamanam | kathāsu bhaktadevānāṃ vārtāsu mahāśayatayā smerānanam | vighnaparamparāhāriṇāṃ ca sāramutkṛṣṭam | calantīnāṃ latānāmārabdhaṃ sāntvanaṃ yena | bahuvipramānyaṃ dvijarājaśekharatvāt | samānavarṇamadhyagam | navena kambunạ̄dhyamupacitam | ādyaślokasyādhastādviparīto dvitīyaśloko lekhyaḥ | tataḥ kramagomūtrikayā parasparollekhaḥ ||
bhinnacchandogomūtrikāyāṃ prathamaśloko yathā—
‘namata candrakalāmayamaṇḍanaṃ nagasutābhujasaṃgatakandharam |
haramabhāgyaradaṃ stavasādaraṃ samitirāvaṇaśāsanavikramam || 331 ||’ ﻿
dvitīyaśloko yathā—
‘kāmadaṃ caṇḍakamraṃ madāmardino nāgadantājyajayyaṃ gadākarburam |
dhīraśobhābharavyastakaṃsāsuraṃ naumi nārāyaṇasyāsamaṃ vibhramam || 332 ||’
abhāgyasya radaṃ vilekhakam | nāśakamiti yāvat | samitau saṃgrāme rāvaṇasya kailāsoddharaṇabhagnaśaktikatāśāsanavikramāvājñāpauruṣe yena tam | vāñchitapradam | caṇḍamugraṃ kamraṃ kamanīyaṃ ca | pareṣāṃ darpamardanaśīlasya nāgasya kāliyākhyasya daṃṣṭrābhiḥ, kuvalayāpīḍākhyasya hastino vā viṣāṇābhyāṃ yā ājiḥ saṅgrāmaḥ tatrājayyaṃ jetumaśakyam | gadayā nānāratnakhacitayā karburam | citramiti yāvat ||
saṃskṛtaprākṛtagomūtrikāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśloko yathā—
‘skando rundarddhimiṣṭāṃ vitaratu saralo dāritārātivarge saspando mandasajjo bhavabhayakalane saṅgare kelikārī |
saṃdohollāghalāsī jana iha balihā caṇḍatābhūrakharvo devaujorājadehe mahimani nirato vikramāḍambareṇa || 333 ||’
skandaḥ kārtikeyaḥ | rundāṃ vipulām | dārite śatrusamūhe saspandaḥ sphuradrūpo mandaḥ svasthacittaḥ bhavabhayasya saṃsāratrāsasya kalane kṣepaṇe ihajane martyaloke saṃdohena ya ullāghaḥ sāmarthyaṃ nīrogatvāttena lasanaśīlaḥ | balināṃ hantā | caṇḍatāyāstaikṣṇyasya bhūrāśrayaḥ | akharvaḥ sarveṣāmupari vartamānaḥ | devaujasāṃ rājñāṃ khaṇḍayitrī īhā ceṣṭā yatra tādṛśe mahimni nirataḥ ||
prākṛtaśloko yathā—
‘cando kandappamittaṃ viharaṇasahalo hāritārāpabandho sacchando vandaṇijjo kuvalayadalano saṅkare melikārī |
kandodollāsalāsī jaaï sivasihāmaṇḍanībhūdakhaṇḍo dentājoṇhājaloho vihiaṇiaraī vibbhamāṇaṃ baleṇa 334’
[candraḥ kandarpamittraṃ viharaṇasaphalo hāritārāprabandhaḥ svacchando vandanīyaḥ kuvalayadalanaḥ śaṃkare melikārī |
kandodollāsalāsī jayati śivaśikhāmaṇḍanībhūtakhaṇḍo dattajyotsnājalaugho vihitanijaratirvibhramāṇāṃ balena ||]
viharaṇe saṃcaraṇe saphalaḥ | udbhūtaḥ śubhāśubhasūcakatvāt | melikārī saṃgamakārī, cūḍāmaṇitvāt | aikyakārī vā, tanmūrtitvāt | kandodaṃ kumudamihābhimataṃ tadvikāsena lasanaśīlaḥ | jyotsnājalaughāndadat | vibhramāṇāṃ balena vihitā nije ātmani ratiryena sa tathā ||
samasaṃskṛtena pādagomūtrikā yathā—
‘bālā vilāsāvalihārihāsā lolāmalā bhāvasahā sahāvā |
dehaṃ harantī sahasā surāmā gehaṃ carantī sahasābhirāmā || 335 ||’
vilāsāvaliṣu hārī hāso vikāso yasyāḥ | lolā calā | amalā nirmalā | bhāvānanekavidhānyā sahate sā bhāvasahā | hāvaḥ krīḍāviśeṣaḥ ||
ardhagomūtrikāprastāro yathā—
‘namo divasapūrāya sutāmarasabhāsine |
natabhavyāridārāya susāralayabhāvine || 336 ||’
