atra yadi tvamevaṃ kuryāstadaivaṃ syāditi vidhiniṣedhayoranavagaterayamanubhayaviṣayaḥ saṃbhavaḥ ||
atra yadi tvamevaṃ kuryā iti | na tāvadatrābhāvaḥ pratīyata iti na niṣedhasaṃbhavaḥ | vidhisaṃbhavo 'pi nāsti | yo hi vyavasthitakāraṇadarśanena vyavasthitasyaiva bhavanasya saṃbhavaḥ sa vidhisaṃbhavaśabdenābhidhīyate, naceha tathā | tadidamuktaṃ anavagateriti ||
etena vidhiniṣedhayorvikalpaviṣayo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—
‘yadi bhavati mukhānāṃ vākpaṭūnāṃ sahasraṃ nirupamamavadhānaṃ jīvitaṃ cātidīrgham |
kamalamukhi tathāpi kṣmāpatestasya kartuṃ sakalaguṇavicāraḥ śak‍yate vā naveti || 70 ||’
tadetannigadenaiva vyākhyātam ||
tadetannigadeneti | parasparavyabhicāriṇorekatra saṃbhāvyamānatvāditi vyaktau vikalpa ityarthaḥ || ﻿
pūrveṣāṃ saṃbhavalakṣaṇamupanyasya dūṣayati—
droṇasya saṃbhavaḥ khāryāṃ śate pañcāśato yathā |
tathānye saṃbhavaṃ prāhuḥ so 'numānānna bhidyate || 26 ||
bhidyate tu yadyaniścayaḥ syāt |
droṇasyeti | samudāyajñānādekadeśajñānasaṃbhava iti prācyānāmabhiprāyaḥ | tathā ca samudāyasya samudāyivyāptatvādiyaṃ khārī droṇavatī khārītvāditi sulabham | anumāna evāsyāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi tavāpi saṃbhavo bhidyate sāmagrī kāryavyāpteti tatrāpyanumānameva bhaviṣyatītyata āha—bhidyata iti | nahi sāmagrī dṛṣṭā yataḥ kāryamanumīyate, kiṃtu prabhūtakāraṇadarśanena kāryasya jñānamanyadevotpadyata iti vaktavyam | tathā cāsmākaṃ darśane yuktaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ ||
yastūdāharaṇaviśeṣaṃ na pratisaṃdhatte taṃ bodhayitumudāharaṇāntaramāha—
yathā—
‘ruddhāpāṅgaprasaramalakairañjanasnehaśūnyaṃ pratyādeśādapi ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam |
tvayyāsanne nayanamuparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā mīnakṣobhākulakuvalayaśrītulāmeṣyatīti || 71 ||’
atra yathā khāryāṃ droṇaḥ śate pañcāśaditi niyamo naivaṃ vipralambhe 'lakānāmakalpanamanañjanamakṣṇormadhuno vā pratyādeśaḥ, suhṛdudantalābhārambhe vā nayanaspandanāni, saṃbhāvyante ca prabhūtakāraṇalokādityeṣo 'pi vidhirūpa eva saṃbhava iti ||
rūddhāpāṅgetyādi | evaṃ viśleṣaduḥkhena karśitā yathā 'cetanāmapyalakānāṃ karuṇotpannaiva lakṣyate | tasmādiyaṃ mā jaladharaṃ drākṣīditi nisargacapalasyāpāṅgasya prasaramavarundhanti | snehapadena nayanāñjanayoranupadhiranubandho vyajyate | tena mitho maitrīyogyatvam | tena tannayanādanyatra nāñjanaṃ kāntimāpnotīti ko 'pi lāvaṇyaprakarṣastathābhūtasyāpyañjanasya tyāge yadekatānatayā nātmānamapi pratisaṃdhātuṃ samartheti vyanakti | evaṃ saṃpadāntareṣvapi svaraso 'nusaṃdheyaḥ | vipralambharūpakāraṇālokāccopari-
nayanaspandanaṃ saṃbhāvyata iti saṃbhavadvayamatreti vyākhyānena sphuṭayati—atra yathā khāryāmiti ||
parasparopakārakayorekasya viśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvāparasya viśeṣo jñāyata iti saṃbhavasāmyātta- danantaramanyonyalakṣaṇamāha—
anyonyamupakāro yastadanyonyaṃ tridhā ca tat |
vācyaṃ pratīyamānaṃ ca tṛtīyamubhayātmakam || 27 ||
anyonyacūlikānyobhrāntiranyonyamekatā |
anyonyālaṃkṛterantastrayametadiheṣyate || 28 ||
anyonyamiti | viśeṣārpaṇamupakāro na ceyaṃ parivṛttiḥ sthitasyānapanayanāt dānapratidānābhāvācca | viśeṣastu nānārūpastadvākyārthībhūtarasānugāmitayā tatra tatronnīyate | vibhāgaṃ darśayati—tridheti | abhidhīyamānaṃ viśeṣataḥ śabdenopāttaṃ sāmānyataḥ śabdena viṣayīkṛtaṃ viśeṣatastu pratīyamānamevetyubhayātmakam | dvābhyāmanyato 'pratīyamānam | anyānyacūlikādilakṣaṇāni granthakāra eva sphuṭīkariṣyati ||
teṣvabhidhīyamānamanyonyamiha yathā—
‘kaṇṭhasya tasya stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca nistalasya |
anyonyaśobhājananādbabhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ || 72 ||’
atrānyonyaśobhājananetyādinopakāryopakārakabhāvasya dvayorapyabhihitatvādabhidhīyamānamidamanyonyam ||
kaṇṭhasyeti | bandhuro namraḥ | nistalo vartulaḥ ||
pratīyamānaṃ yathā—
‘uddhaccho piaï jalaṃ jaha jaha viralaṅgulī ciraṃ pahio |
pāāvaliā vi taha taha dhāraṃ taṇuampi taṇueī || 73 ||’
[uddharṣaḥ pibati jalaṃ yathā yathā viralāṅguliściraṃ pathikaḥ |
prapāpālikāpi tathā tathā dhārāṃ tanumapi tanūkaroti ||]
﻿
atra pathikaprapāpālikayormitho 'nurāge yadekasya viralāṅgulinā kareṇa pānīyapānamanyasyāḥ sutarāṃ vāridhārātanūkaraṇaṃ tena parasparamupakāryopakārakabhāvātpratīyamānamidamanyonyam ||
atra pathiketi | mitho 'nurāga ityanena parasparānurāgasaṃvardhanamevātra viśeṣārpaṇamiti matam | tathā hi karasya viralāṅgulikaraṇe kathamahametāṃ cirāya paś‍yāmīti prapāpālikābhiprāya eva vardhito bhavati | evamapi vāridhārātanūkaraṇe boddhavyam | na cāyamevaṃvidho 'rthaḥ kenāpi śabdenābhihita iti bhavati pratīyamānatā vaktṛpratipādyādiviśeṣaparyālocanenaiva dhvananamunmiṣati ||
pratīyamānābhighīyamānaṃ yathā—
‘golāvisamoāracchaleṇa appā urammi se mukko |
aṇuampāṇiddosaṃ teṇa vi sā gāḍhamuaụ̄dhā || 74 ||’
[godāviṣamāvatāracchalena ātmā urasi asya muktaḥ |
anukampānirdoṣaṃ tenāpi sā gāḍhamupagụ̄dhā ||]
atra godāvarīviṣamāvatāravyājena tayā tasyorasi ātmā kṣiptastenāpyanukampā nirdoṣā sā gāḍhamupagụ̄dhetyabhidhīyamānaḥ parasparamanurāgādupakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ pratīyata ityubhayātmakamidamanyonyam ||
atra godāvarīti | pūrvavatpratīyamāno 'pi parasparamupakārasthalenānukampānirdoṣaśabdābhyāmabhidhayā spṛś‍yata ityubhayarūpam | na ca śabdopātte kiṃ dhvananeneti vācyam | bhinnaviṣayatvāt ||
anyonyacūḍikā yathā—
‘śaśinā ca niśā niśayā ca śaśī śaśinā niśayā ca yathā gaganam |
bhavatā ca sabhā sabhayā ca bhavān sabhayā bhavatā ca tathā bhuvanam || 75 ||’
atra niśāśaśinoḥ sabhābhavatośca parasparamupakāryopakārakabhāve vartamānayoryadidaṃ gaganaṃ jagatī ca prasiddhayorupakārakatvacūḍikevoparyupari labhyate seyamanyonyacūḍikā | ﻿
atra niśāśaśinoriti | cūḍikā śikhā | sā yathā śarīratadavayavebhyo bhinnaivopalakṣyate tathātrāpi niśāśaśinoḥ sabhābhavatoḥ parasparamupakārakatvamabhisaṃdhāya dvayordvayorgaganajagatī pratyupakārakatvamanyadevābhidhīyate | na caitāvataiva viśeṣeṇa pṛthagbhāvo 'nyonyālaṃkārakavalīkṛtasyaiva tasya saṃbhavāt ||
anyonyabhrāntiryathā—
‘jambūnāṃ kusumotkare navamadhunyārabdhapānotsavāḥ kīrāḥ pakvaphalāśayā madhukarīścumbanti muñcanti ca |
‘eteṣāmapi nīlakiṃśukadalairebhiḥ samānatviṣāṃ puṣpabhrāntibhirāpatanti sahasā cañcūṣu bhṛṅgāṅganāḥ || 76 ||’
atra jambūkusumakuñjasthitamadhukarīṣu śukaśakuntānāṃ yā pakvajambūphalabhrāntiryā ca madhukarīṇāṃ śukacañcuṣu kiṃśukakusumabhrāntiḥ seyamanyonyabhrāntiranyonyasmādapṛthageva ||
atra jambūkusumeti | na hi taimirikakeśapratyayavadbhrānteralaṃkāratāpi tadbhūtasādṛś‍yamūlāyā eva | tathā ca camatkārivastvantaropamāparyavasāyitvamiti bhrāntisaṃsarga eva viśeṣārpaṇa upakāraḥ | anyonyavacanena parasparagāmitā tasya tenaiva darśitetyanyonyalakṣaṇāśleṣātkathaṃ pṛthagbhavatīti | etenānyonyaikatā vyākhyātā ||
anyonyātmakatā yathā—
‘praphullatāpicchanibhairabhīṣubhiḥ śubhaiśca saptacchadapāṃsupāṇḍubhiḥ |
paraspareṇa cchuritāmalacchavī tadekavarṇāviva tau babhūvatuḥ || 77 ||’
atra ś‍yāmapāṇḍutayoḥ parasparavyatirekeṇaikavarṇakaraṇādanyonyamekatā nāma bhrāntibhedo 'nyonyātpṛthageva ||
parasparanirūpyatāsāmyātkramaprāptāṃ parivṛttiṃ nirūpayati—
vyatyayo vastuno yastu yo vā vinimayo mithaḥ |
parivṛttirihoktā sā kāvyālaṃkāralakṣaṇe || 29 ||
﻿
vyatyaya iti | vastusthitiviparyāsavacanaṃ parivṛttiriti sphuṭameva lakṣaṇam ||
sā tridhā vyatyayavatī tathā vinimayātmikā |
tṛtīyā cobhayavatī nirdiṣṭā kāvyasūribhiḥ || 30 ||
sā tridhā-ekasthānasthitasya vastunaḥ sthānāntaraprāptivacanena, dānapratidānavacanena, ubhayavacanena vā | tadāha—sā tridheti ||
sarvatra mukhyavṛttyā gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayeṇa vā tathābhāvoktiriti ṣaṭa‍prakāratvaṃ darśayati—
tridhāpi cāsau mukhyāmukhyabhedāddvidhābhūya ṣọdhā saṃpadyate |
tāsu vyatyayavatī mukhyā yathā—
‘kumudavanamapaśri śrīmadambhojaṣaṇḍaṃ tyajati mudamulūkaḥ prītimāṃścakravākaḥ |
udayamahimaraś‍miryāti śītāṃśurastaṃ hatavidhilasitānāṃ hī vicitro vipākaḥ || 78 ||’
atra yatkumudavanādīnāmapaśrīkatvādikaṃ yaccāmbhojakhaṇḍādīnāṃ śrīmattvādikaṃ mukhyameva prātarupalabhyate, seyaṃ vyatyayavatī mukhyā nāma parivṛttiḥ ||
tridhāpi cāsāviti | kumudavanamiti | kumudavanādulūkāddhimaraś‍meḥ śrīmattvaṃ prītirudayaścāpasṛtāni prāptāni punarambhojakhaṇḍacakravākīhimāṃśūnāmitivyakto vyatyayaḥ | mukhyatvaṃ grantha eva vyaktam ||
vyatyayavatyamukhyā yathā—
‘jo tīa ahararāo rattiṃ uvvāsio piaameṇa |
soccia dīsaï gose savattiṇaaṇesu saṅkanto || 79 ||’
[yastasyā adhararāgo rātrāvudvāsitaḥ priyatamena |
sa eva dṛś‍yate prātaḥ sapatnīnayaneṣu saṃkrāntaḥ ||]
atra priyatamena rātrāvudvāsitasyādhararāgasyeyaṃ sapatnīlocaneṣu saṃkrāntiḥ || ﻿
atra priyatameneti | tāmbūlādihetuko 'nya evādhararāgo 'nyaśca matsarahetukaḥ kaṣāyatālakṣaṇo nayanagāmīti tayorabhedādhyavasāyo yattatpadābhyāṃ pratīta iti gauṇī vṛttiḥ | prakāśate ca śabdavṛttyādharasthānasthitasya nayanasthānaprāptiriti tāvataivālaṃkāranirvāhaḥ ||
vinimayavatī mukhyā yathā—
‘praścyotanmadasurabhīṇi nimnagāyāḥ krīḍanto gajapatayaḥ payāṃsi kṛtvā |
kiñjalkavyavahitatāmradānalekhai- rutteruḥ sarasijagandhibhiḥ kapolaiḥ || 80 ||’
atra karikapolamadāmodasyāmbhojarajaḥ parimalasya ca saritsaliladvipakapolapālyormukhyatvenaiva parasparopakaraṇādiyaṃ vinimayavatī mukhyā nāma parivṛttiḥ ||
atra karikapoleti | gajendrāṇāṃ madayāsamacandrakayoḥ(?) svāśritayornadīṣu saṃkrāmaṇaṃ nadīsthitayośca kiñjalkāmbhojaparimalayorgrahaṇaṃ tena dānapratidānavattayā vinimayo bhavati ||
vinimayavatyamukhyā yathā—
‘tasya ca pravayaso jaṭāyuṣaḥ svargiṇaḥ kimiha śocyate 'dhunā |
yena jarjarakalevaravyayātkrītamindukiraṇojjvalaṃ yaśaḥ || 81 ||’
atra jarjarakalevaraṃ datvā śaśikiraṇaśubhraṃ yaśaḥ krītamityamukhyayaiva vṛttyā vinimayokteramukhyeyaṃ vinimayavatī parivṛttiḥ ||
atra jarjareti | mūlyārpaṇakrayaṇayoratra bādhāvdyakta evopacāraḥ, śabdavṛttistu pūrvavadeva kuṇṭhaiveti bhavati vinimayaḥ ||
ubhayavatī mukhyā yathā—
‘locanādharakṛtāhṛtarāgā vāsitānanaviśeṣitagandhā |
vāruṇī paraguṇātmaguṇānāṃ vyatyayaṃ vinimayaṃ ca vitene || 82 ||’
﻿
atra vāruṇyā yadadharādrāgo 'pahṛtya cakṣuṣornikṣiptasteneyaṃ vyatyayavatī, yacca mukhāmodavāsitayā svāmodena mukhāmodo viśeṣitastena vinimayavatī | tadiyamubhayathāpi mukhyavṛttyaivokteti mukhyeyamubhayavatī parivṛttiḥ ||
locanādhareti | locanādharayoryathāsaṃkhyaṃ kṛta āhṛto rāgo yayā tena locane kṛto 'dharādapanīta iti vyatyayaḥ | vāsite ānane viśeṣito gandho yasyāḥ sā tathā | tena tayā mukhaṃ vāsitaṃ mukhena ca seti bhavati vinimayaḥ | paraguṇātmaguṇānāmiti | paraguṇānāmiti paraguṇānāṃ vyatyayaḥ, ātmaguṇānāṃ vinimaya iti saṃbandhaḥ | kartṛtvamutprekṣitaṃ tadetaddarśayati—atreti ||
ubhayavatyamukhyā yathā—
‘kiṃ catraṃ yadi devena bhūbhṛtaḥ karadīkṛtāḥ |
devo 'pi dāpitaḥ kiṃ tairna punaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ karam || 83 ||’
atra bhūbhṛtāmakaradānāṃ yatkarapradānaṃ jigīṣośca yatpṛṣṭhe hastanikṣepaḥ sa eva dravyaguṇādīnāṃ sthānādiparivṛttau vyatyayo, yacca devena bhūbhṛtaḥ karadīkṛtāḥ devo 'pi taiḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ karaṃ dāpita iti so 'yaṃ dānapratipādanalakṣaṇo 'pi vinimaya ityetadubhayamapīha śliṣṭapadābhidheyatvādamukhyavṛttyaivocyamānamupalabhyata ityubhayavatīyamamukhyā parivṛttiḥ ||
ekatra pratītasyānyatra pratyayaḥ parivṛttau; tathā nidarśane 'pīti tadanantaraṃ nida- rśanaṃ lakṣayati—
dṛṣṭāntaḥ proktasiddha‍yai yaḥ siddhe 'rthe tannidarśanam |
pūrvottarasamatve tadṛju vakraṃ ca kathyate || 31 ||
dṛṣṭānta iti | proktasya prākaraṇikasya siddhirniścayaḥ | nanvanumānāṅgamapi dṛṣṭāntābhidhānaṃ pṛthagalaṃkāraḥ syādityata āha—siddhe 'rtha iti | siddha evārthe kaṃcidviśeṣamāvedayituṃ dṛṣṭāntoktirnidarśanam, sādhye tvarthe 'numānamiti vibhāgaḥ | pūrvaṃ dārṣṭāntikoktiṃ samāpya paścāddṛṣṭāntoktiriti dvitīyaḥ | ekayaivoktyā dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoriti tṛtīyaḥ | tadāha—pūrvottarasamatva iti | yatra śabdata ﻿
eva tulyetivṛttatā dṛṣṭāntadarṣṭāntikayoranugamyate tadṛju nidarśanam | yatra tu paryavasitāyāmuktau sahṛdayaparyālocanayā tadvakram | tadetadāha—ṛju vakraṃ ceti | tena nidarśanasya ṣaḍ bhedāḥ ||
teṣu pūrvamṛju yathā—
‘udayanneva savitā padmeṣvarpayati śriyam |
vibhāvayati bhūtīnāṃ phalaṃ suhṛdanugrahaḥ || 84 ||’
atra ṛjūttk‍yaiva pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ paścāddārṣṭāntikaṃ pradarśitamitīdamṛ- jupūrvaṃ ca nidarśanaṃ sūryadṛṣṭāntena vibhūtīnāṃ suhṛdanugrahaḥ phalamiti jñāpayati ||
sūryadṛṣṭānteneti | ṛddhibhiḥ suhṛdanugṛhyata iti siddho 'rthaḥ, kiṃtu tadetadeva tāsāṃ phalamiti viśeṣamabhidhātuṃ sūryadṛṣṭāntopanyāsaḥ | atra samṛddhatāphalaṃ suhṛttvamanugrahatvaṃ ceti śabdata eva sūryādiṣu dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikābhimateṣu pratīyata iti ṛjutvamityarthaḥ ||
tadevaṃ vakraṃ yathā—
‘pāṇaüḍī avi jaliuṇa huavaho jalaï jaṇṇavāummī |
ṇahu te parihariavvā visamadasāsaṇṭhiā purisā || 85 ||’
[pānakuṭīmapi jvālayitvā hutavaho jvalati yajñavāṭamapi |
nahi te parihartavyā viṣamadaśāsaṃsthitāḥ puruṣāḥ ||]
atrāpi pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ paścāddārṣṭāntikam | kiṃtu yathā pūrvatrodayamānaḥ savitā suhṛtpadmeṣu śriyamarpayatīti tulyetivṛttatā ṛjūktyā śabdenaivābhidhīyate, naivamatra kiṃ tarhi jvalanetivṛttena tulyaṃ tattu tatpuruṣāṇāmitivṛttamaśābdaṃ yukticāturyātpratīyate tadidaṃ pūrvaṃ ca vakraṃ nidarśanam ||
pāṇaüḍīti | pāṇapadaṃ mlecchadeśīyam | pāne kuṭī śauṇḍikakuṭī vā | atrāpīti | dṛṣṭānte 'pi pānakuṭījvalanādikaṃ viśeṣaṇamupāttam | ca ca taddārṣṭā-﻿
ntike saṃbhavati śabdena vā pratyāyyate; kiṃtu bimbapratibimbanyāyenātra bhavati | tathā hi yathā pānakuṭyāṃ hutavahasya jvalanaṃ yajñavāṭe ca tathā 'vyavasthitacittatayā grāmīṇāvidagdhayuvatiprasakto bhūtvānyatra nāgarikāsu vidagdhāsu rajyate so 'pi na tyājya ityukticāturyāttulyetivṛttatā gamyate 'to vakratvamityāha—kiṃtu yatheti ||
uttaramṛju yathā—
‘hiaa tiracchīyaï saṃmuhapacchā gahiakaḍakkhāssa |
pahia ekkejje goraḍī ṇaṃ caühaṭṭa uvaccha || 83 ||’
[hṛdaye tiraścīnā saṃmukhaprāptā paścādgṛhītakaṭākṣāsya |
pathikasyaikaiva gauratarā nanu catuṣpathe vrajati ||]
atra ṛjūttkyā śabda evābhidhīyamānasādharmyaṃ dārṣṭāntikamabhidhāyottarakālaṃ dṛṣṭānto 'bhihitastadidamuttaramṛju nidarśanam ||
hiaeti | vicchittipathikasyābhilāṣitā yā yoṣitsā ekaiva | hṛdaye smaraṇārụ̄dhā satī lagnā ataeva tiracchīyaï tiryak‌śalyāyamānā pathikasaṃmukhābhimukhasya tasya calitatvāt | paścācca gṛhītakaṭākṣā paścādbhūtena gṛhītaścamatkṛtaḥ kaṭākṣo yasyāḥ | ekkejje ekaiva | jiravadhāraṇe | ṇaṃ nanu catuṣyathe kaścitsaṃmukhatāṃ kaścittiraścīnatāṃ kaścitpaścādbhāvaṃ dhatte; gaurī tu pathikasyaikaiva tatheti | atra ṛjūttkyā śabdata eveti | tiryaktvādīnāmubhayagāmināṃ śabdenopādānātpratītimātreṇa cālaṃkāranirvāhaḥ ||
tadeva vakraṃ yathā—
‘upari ghanaṃ ghanapaṭalaṃ dūre dayitā kimetadāpatitam |
himavati divyauṣadhayaḥ kopāviṣṭaḥ phaṇī śirasi || 87 ||’
atrāpi dārṣṭāntikamabhidhāyottarakālameva dṛṣṭānto vihitastadidamuttaraṃ ṛju nidarśanam; kiṃtu yathā pūrvasmin hṛdaye tiryagityādibhiḥ śabda eva ṛjūktyā sādharmyābhidhānam, naivamatra tathā; api tu kimetadāpatitamityukticāturyeṇa viparyayeṇa ca liṅgasaṃkhyā yathāsaṃkhyānām | tadetaduttaraṃ vakraṃ ca nidarśanam | ﻿
api tu kimetadāpatitamityukticāturyeṇeti | nanu ca uparītyanena vyavadhānamupāttaṃ dṛṣṭānte 'pi śabda eva pratiphalati tatkathaṃ vakratvamityata āha—viparyayeṇeti | ghanapaṭalaṃ napuṃsakam, phaṇī pumān, dayitā caikavacanavatī, oṣadhayo bahuvacanāliṅi‍gatāḥ | ghanapaṭalaṃ pūrvaṃ dārṣṭāntikamupakramya dṛṣṭāntoktau na pūrvaṃ phaṇī nirdiṣṭaḥ | tato liṅgasaṃkhyānāṃ viparyayo bhavati, tadayamarthena śabdata evopari paryavasthānaṃ dūratvaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntayoḥ pratīyate; śirasi himavatītyetābhyāmanyathākāraṃ bodhitatvāt | phalatastu sa evārtha iti vakrataiveti |
samamṛju yathā—
‘yāti candrāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭā dhvāntarājī parābhavam |
sadyo rājaviruddhānāṃ darśayantī durantatām || 88 ||’
atra rājaviruddhānāmiti śliṣṭapadena darśayantīti vartamānakālalakṣaṇātsadya iti taddhitena ca samakālameva dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ śabdato ṛjūktyaivoktatvādidamṛju samaṃ ca nidarśanam |
yatīti | rājā candro nṛpatiśca | tadanayoḥ śliṣṭoktiviṣayatayā na pūrvāparabhāvo vibhāvyate | candrāṃśuparābhūtadhvāntarājīnṛpativiruddhadurantayorapi darśayantīti śatrā, sadya iti taddhitena ca samatvam | kiṃtu dhvāntarājī parabhavaṃ yātīti dṛṣṭāntoktau satyāṃ madhye rājaviruddhānāmiti darṣṭāntikamuktvā punarapi dṛṣṭāntaviśeṣaṇaṃ darśayantītyuktam | ataevoktikavalīkṛtatvādda‍ṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ samatvamityāśayavānvyācaṣṭe—atra rājaviruddhānāmiti |
tadeva vakraṃ yathā—
‘ṇa uṇa varakoaṇḍadaṇḍae yutimāṇusevi emea |
guṇavajjieṇa jāaï vaṃsuppaṇṇe vi ṭaṅkāro || 89 ||’
[na punarvarakodaṇḍadaṇḍake putri mānuṣe 'pyevameva |
guṇavarjitena jāyate vaṃśotpanne 'pi ṭaṅkāraḥ||]
atra na kevalaṃ kodaṇḍadaṇḍake mānuṣe 'pyevamevetītaretarayogavadvakratayā yugapadabhidhānaṃ guṇavarjitavaṃśotpanne 'pi ṭaṅkāro na jāyata iti ﻿
śliṣṭapadatve 'pi vyatirekamukhena guṇavṛttyā cābhidhānāddhanuṣīva mānuṣe 'pi guṇavatyeva mahāñśabdo bhavatīti vakroktyā sādharmyāvagatiḥ | tadidamaśabdatvādibhiḥ pūrvādbhidyamānaṃ samaṃ vakraṃ ca nidarśanam |
ṇa uṇa vareti | guṇo dhairyādistantrī ca, vaṃśaḥ kulaṃ veṇuśca, ṭaṅkāro 'vyaktānukaraṇaṃ khyātiśca | itaretarayogavaditi | tathāhi—‘tvanmukhaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca phulle’ ityatra phullaṃ cetītaretarayogenaikaśeṣe ekayoktyā phulleti dvābhyāṃ saṃbadhyate | tathā vināpyekaśeṣaṃ guṇavajjieṇa vaṃsuppaṇṇe ṭaṅkāra iti yugapadanvīyante | nanu yathā rājaviruddhānāmityatra śeṣeṇa ṛjutvaṃ tathātrāpi bhaviṣyatītyata āha—śliṣṭapadatve 'pīti | dhanuṣīva mānuṣe 'pi mahāñśabdo bhavatīti vivakṣitam | na ca vyatirekamukhenopanaye 'yamarthaḥ śabdādavagamyate, pratīyate cārtha iti yuktaṃ vakratvam | nanu vyatirekeṇaiva kathaṃ na tulyavṛttitā saṃmatetyata āha—guṇavṛttyā ceti | satyametattathāpi dvayorvarṇanīyayorguṇādikayorabhedādhyavasāyo vaktavyaḥ | tathā gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayeṇaiva vakratvam | tadidamuktaṃ vyatirekamukhena guṇavṛttyā ceti |
vyatirekaṃ vinā dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikabhāvābhāvāvdyaद्वाभ्यामिति युक्तं प्रतिभाति ।tirekābhyāṃ tallakṣaṇamāha—
śabdopātte pratīte vā sādṛśye vastunordvayoḥ |
bhedābhidhānaṃ bhedaśca vyatirekaśca kathyate || 32 ||
śabdopātta iti | bhedābhidhānaṃ vaidharmyakathanam | evaṃ cet merusarṣapayorapitathābhidhānamalaṃkāraḥ syādata uktam—sādṛśye vastunoriti | upamānopameyayorityarthaḥ | sādṛśyaṃ dvidhā | śabdopāttaṃ pratītaṃ ca | aśabdopāttamapi dhvananānumānādibhiravagamyata iti na virodhastadidamuktam—pratīte veti | tadayamarthaḥ—udbhūtacamatkārisādṛśyayorvairasyoktirvyatirekaḥ, svarūpākhyastu pṛthag bhedo nāstyevetyuktam ||
vibhāgaṃ darśayati—
svajātivyattkyupādhibhyāmekobhayabhidā ca saḥ |
sādṛśyādvaisādṛśyācca bhitraḥ ṣọdhābhijāyate || 33 ||
svajātīyeti | yena rūpeṇa vaiyatirekyamupādīyate tadrūpavantaṃ vyatirekaprati-﻿
yoginaṃ parikalpya tato vyatireko 'pīti svajātivyatirekaḥ prathamaḥ prakāraḥ | dvitīyastu saiva vyaktirvidharmeti | etatprakāradvayaṃ yathāsaṃkhyamabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoriti mūlabhedadvayaṃ tathaivāparamekānekalakṣaṇaṃ prakāradvayaṃ tatraivānyatsādṛśyavaisādṛśyarūpaṃ dvayamiti krameṇa ṣọdhā bhedo vivakṣitaḥ | yathā ca svajātivyatireṃkayoḥ pratīyamānābhidhīyamānasādṛśyagāmitā na saṃbhavati tathāgre vakṣyate ||
tatra śabdopāttasādṛśye svajātivyatireko yathā—
‘aratnālokasaṃhāryamavāryaṃ sūryaraśmibhiḥ |
dṛṣṭirodhakaraṃ yūnāṃ yauvanaprabhavaṃ tamaḥ || 90 ||’
atra yauvanaprabhavasya tamasastamojātyā saha dṛṣṭirodhakaramiti sādṛśyamuktvā, aratnālokasaṃhāryamavāryaṃ sūryaraśmibhiriti vyatireko vihitaḥ, so 'yaṃ svajātivyatirekaḥ ||
atra yauvanaprabhavasyeti | yauvanakṛtamajñānalakṣaṇamanyadeva tamo 'nyaccāndhakārarūpaṃ tayostadbhāvāpattiriyameva kalpanāsmābhiruktā | anena tu prakāreṇa rasaḥ puṣyatītyalaṃkāramadhye gaṇanam ||
pratīyamānasādṛśye svavyaktivyatireko yathā—
‘aṇṇoṇṇehiṃ sucariasaahiṃ aṇudiṇa vaḍ̣dhiia māṇu |
appaṇavi ṇa hu mahuvi aha appāṇeṇa samāṇu || 91 ||’
[anyonyaiḥ sucaritaśatairanudinaṃ vardhate mānaḥ |
asyāpi na khalu mahānapi athātmanā samānaḥ ||]
atra pratīyamānopamānasādṛśyopacaritabhedādātmavyakteranyairanyaiśca sucaritaśataiḥ svavyaktita eva bhedo 'bhihitaḥ | so 'yaṃ svavyaktivyatirekaḥ ||
aṇṇoṇṇehiṃ anyonyairmāno 'haṃkāraḥ pūjā vā | yau tu kalpitabhedādhikaraṇatve- nopāttau virodhidharmavattayā śabdātpratīyeti tayorniryantraअत्र ‘निर्यत्नं णत्वा-’ इति पाठ आसीत्तत्र निर्थन्त्रणत्वादिकमिति कल्पितोऽस्ति ।ṇatvādikamiti bhavati sādṛśyaṃ pratīyamānam || ﻿
śabdopāttasādṛśya ekavyatireko yathā—
‘preyāneva vṛṣastavāpi satataṃ bhūtistavāpi sthirā durgāyā bhavatāpi bhūgharabhuvaḥ samyaggṛhītaḥ karaḥ |
nirvyājaṃ parameśvaratvamiyatā no yāsi vaktuṃ janai- rhelollāsitavāhinīśamathane yatro viṣadī bhavān || 92 ||’
atra priyavṛṣatvādibhirabhihitasādṛśyayorupamānopameyayorupameyasyaiva yathoktasādṛśyaviṣaye viṣāditvaṃ yuktamityekavyatireko 'yam ||
preyāneveti | vṛṣo gaurdharmaśca | bhūtiḥ sampad bhasma ca | durgā gaurī viṣamā ca | bhūdharabhūrgirijā parvatabhūmiśca | karo hasto rājadaṇḍaśca | vāhinīśaḥ samudraḥ senāpatiśca | viṣādī viṣabhakṣako 'vasādavāṃśca | yadyapyatrānurūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nāsti tathāpi śabdasādṛśyenāpyupamā pravartata eva | yathā—‘sakalaṅkaṃ purametajjātaṃ saṃprati sitāṃśubimbamiva’ iti | ata evobhayālaṃkāratvamupamāyāḥ ||
sa eva pratīyamānasādṛśyo yathā—
‘sakalaṅkena jaḍena ca sāmyaṃ doṣākareṇa te kīdṛk |
abhujaṅga samanayanaḥ kathamupameyo hareṇāsi || 93 ||’
atra pratīyamānasādṛśyasya pūrvārghe candropamānasya sakalaṅkatādiruttarardhena varṇanīyopameyasyābhujaṅgatvādirekasyaiva bhedakaḥ svadharmo 'bhihitaḥ so 'yamapyekavyatireka eva ||
sakalaṅkeneti | kalaṅko 'pavādo lāñchanaṃ ca | jaḍo mūrkhaḥ śītalaśca | abhujaṅgo na veśyāpatiravidyamānasarpaśca | samanayano yuganayanaḥ sarvān samaṃ nayatīti ca | āhlādakatvādikaṃ candreṇāniruddhaiśvaryādikaṃ parameśvareṇa sādṛśyaṃ pratīyate ||
śabdopāttasādṛśye ubhayavyatireko yathā—
‘abhinnavelau gambhīrāvamburāśirbhavānapi |
asāvañjanasaṃkāśastvaṃ ca cāmīkaradyutiḥ || 94 ||’
atra dvayorapyabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayorubhayavyatirekaḥ || ﻿
abhinneti | velā maryādā tīraṃ ca | gambhīro 'talasparśo 'calitacittavṛttiśca ||
sa eva pratīyamānasādṛśyayoryathā—
‘tvanmukhaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca dvayorapyanayorbhidā |
kamalaṃ jalasaṃrohi tvanmukhaṃ tvadupāśrayam || 95 ||’
tadetannigadenaiva vyākhyātam | so 'yaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorubhayorvyatirekaḥ ||
abhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ sadṛśavyatireko yathā—
‘tvanmukhaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca phulle surabhigandhinī |
bhramadbhramaramambhojaṃ loladṛṣṭi mukhaṃ tu te || 96 ||’
atra mukhāmbhojayoḥ 'phulle surabhigandhinī' iti padābhyāmabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ sadṛśameva bhramadbhramaratvaṃ loladṛṣṭitvaṃ ca bhedakamupanyastamiti so 'yaṃ śabdopāttasādṛśyayoḥ sadṛśavyatirekaḥ ||
sa eva pratīyamānasādṛśyayoryathā—
‘candro 'yamambarottaṃso haso 'yaṃ toyabhūṣaṇam |
nabho nakṣatramālīdamidamutkumudaṃ payaḥ || 97 ||’
atra pūrvārdhe candrahaṃsayoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorambarottaṃsatvatoyabhūṣaṇatve, uttarārdhe tu nabhaḥpayasornakṣatramālitvotkumudatve sadṛśe eva bhedake | so 'yaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ sadṛśavyatirekaḥ ||
abhihitasādṛśyayorasadṛṃśavyatireko yathā—
‘śaśāma vṛṣṭirmeghānāmutsaṅge tasya bhūbhṛtaḥ |
virarāma na rāmasya dhārāsantatiraśruṇaḥ || 98 ||’
atra bhūbhṛta ityanena sākṣādupāttasādṛśyayo rāmamālyavatoryo 'yamutsaṅge samasto 'śrudhārāpāto yasya meghavṛṣṭerabhāvastadidamubhayorasadṛśameva bhedakam | so 'yamabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayorasadṛśavyatirekaḥ || ﻿
śaśāma vṛṣṭiriti | bhūbhṛto rājñaśca ||
sa eva pratīyamānasādṛśyayoryathā—
‘abhrūvilāsamaspṛṣṭamadarāgaṃ mṛgekṣaṇam |
idaṃ tu nayanadvandvaṃ tava tadguṇabhūṣitam || 99 ||’
atra kāntāmṛgekṣaṇayoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorbhrūvilāsamadarāgau tadabhāvau ca visadṛśau bhedakāviti so 'yaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorasadṛśavyatirekaḥ ||
sadṛśāsadṛśavyatirekābhyāmeva tadubhayavyatireko 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—
‘nirmalendu nabho reje vikacābjaṃ babhau saraḥ |
paraṃ paryaśruvadanau mamlaturbhrātarāvubhau || 100 ||’
atra nabhaḥsarasoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayornirmalendutvaṃ vikacābjatvaṃ ca prāgvadeva sadṛśe bhedake; tābhyāṃ ca mukhacandramukhakamalābhyāṃ manoharāhlādakatvābhyāṃ ca pratīyamānasādṛśyayoreva rāmalakṣmaṇayoryeyaṃ mukhaparyaśrutā, tanau ca mlānirnirmalendutāvirājamānayorvikacābjatvaśobhamānatvayośca sā visadṛśīti so 'yaṃ sadṛśāsadṛśabhedakatvakṛtabheda eva tadubhaya- vyatirekaḥ ||
tābhyāṃ ca mukhacandreti | mukhasya candrakamalabhāvo 'nādikavikalpanāsiddha iti tenāpi rūpeṇa pratīyamānasādṛśyatvamuktam ||
nanu mitho vyatirekabhedagaṇanamanupapatraṃ sadṛśāsadṛśavyatirekasyāpi saṃbhavā- dityata āha—
etenaikavyatirekādisaṃbhedo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—
‘mithyā deva bhujena te 'lpavibhavaḥ kalpadrumaḥ spardhate nahyenaṃ bhuvanatrayābhayamahāsatrī kṛpāṇo 'ñcati |
﻿
tulyastatrabhavānprayāgaviṭapī yasyaitadekārṇave kāyāntarviniveśya viśvamakhilaṃ śākhāsu śete hariḥ || 101 ||’
atra varṇanīyabāhukalpadrumayorabhimataphaladāyitvādibhiḥ pratītasādṛśyayorbhuvanatrayābhayapradāyī varṇanīyabāhau kṛpāṇo bhedaka ityekavyatirekaḥ | tathā varṇanīyabāhoḥ prayāgavaṭasya ca prāgvadeva pratīyamānasādṛśyayorekasya bhuvanatrayābhayamahāsatrī kṛpāṇaḥ śākhāsu śete, anyasya tu mahāpralaye svakāyāntarniveśitārakhilaviśvo vaikuṇṭhaḥ | tāvimau tayoḥ sadṛśāveva bhedakau harikṛpāṇayorvā śyāmatādibhiḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorimāveva dharmau bhedakau so 'yamevaṃprakāro vyatirekasaṃkara utreyaḥ | svajātivyatireke pratīyamānasādṛśyam, svavyaktivyatireke cābhidhīyamānasādṛśyaṃ yadyudāharaṇaṃ dṛśyate saṃbhavati vā tadā tadapyudāhāryam ||
eteneti | prāgvadeveti | amimataphaladāyitvādibhiḥ | evaṃprakāra iti | na hyekavākyasthatāmātreṇa tathā camatkaroti yathāṅgāṅgaṅigabhāvādibhiḥ parasparagrathanayeti | saiva prakārapadenābhihitā | yadyudāharaṇaṃ dṛśyate saṃbhavati veti | na hi svajātivyatireke dvayorabhedādhyavasāyaḥ sādṛśyamantareṇa camatkāramarpayatīti kalpitameva vācyam | na ca kalpanāśabdamantareṇa pratīyamānasādṛśyasaṃbhavaḥ; sādṛśyasya bhedādhiṣṭānatvāt | svavyaktivyatireke 'pyasaṃbhavastathābhūtameva tu śabdenopādīyata iti syādata uktaṃ yadi dṛśyate iti ||
sahakāritvaṃ vyatirekanirūpyamato vyatirekānantaraṃ samāhitalakṣaṇamāha—
kāryārambhe sahāyāptirdaivādaivakṛteha yā |
ākasmikī buddhipūrvobhayī vā tatsamāhitam || 34 ||’
tatrākasmikī daivakṛtā yathā—
‘mānamasyā nirākartuṃ pādayorme patipyataḥ |
upakārāya diṣṭyedamudīrṇaṃ ghanagarjitam || 102 ||’
﻿
atra mānanirākaraṇopakrame kālotpannasyākasmikaghanagarjitasya mānavidhvaṃse sahakāritvādākasmikīyaṃ daivakṛtā sahāyasaṃpattiḥ ||
kāryārambha iti | sahāyaḥ prakṛtakāryakāraṇasya sahakārī, tenālaṃkāratā ākasmikyacintitapūrvā buddhipūrvādviparītā | ākasmikyādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ daivādaivakṛtasaṃbandhe ṣaṭprakāraṃ samāhitamityarthoktam ||
ākasmikyevādaivakṛtā yathā—
‘anuśāsatamityanākulaṃ nayavartmākulamarjunāgrajam |
svayamartha ivābhivāñchitastamabhīyāya parāśarātmajaḥ || 103 ||’
atra bhīmānuśāsanakālopakrama eva vyāsāgamanasya tadupakāritvādākasmikīyamadaivakṛtā sahāyāptiḥ ||
vyāsāgamanasyeti | vyāsena saṃpādyamānasya | tenādaivakṛteti ||
buddhipūrvā daivakṛtā yathā—
‘kalpānte śamitatrivikramamahākaṅkāladaṇḍasphura- ccheṣasyūtanṛsiṃhavakranakharaprotādikolāmiṣaḥ |
viśvaikārṇavatāviśeṣamuditau tau matsyakūrmāvubhau karṣandhīvaratāṃ gataḥ syatu jaganmohaṃ mahābhairavaḥ || 104 ||’
atra pralayasamaye maheśvareṇa samāpayitumupakrāntānāṃ trivikramādīnāṃ yo 'yaṃ tadbhuvā baḍiśādinā matsyakūrmayorākarṣaṇaprakāraḥ sa bhagavatā bhairaveṇa buddhipūrvakamupakalpyamāno daivāttathābhūtaireva taiḥ saṃpadyata iti buddhipūrveyaṃ daivakṛtā sahāyāptiḥ ||
daivāttathābhūtaireveti | narasiṃhanakhādīnāṃ baḍiśādyucitamūrtiśālināṃ daivameva nimittam, baḍiśādicintā ca viṣayīkṛteti buddhipūrvatā ||
buddhipūrvā 'daivakṛtā yathā—
‘mūle pañca tataścatuṣṭayamiti sraksaṃniveśaiḥ śiraḥ- puṣpairanyatamāvalokanamitairucchoṇitairarcite |
﻿
hastasparśavaśena mūrdhni daśamaṃ mūrdhānamāropayan śaṃbhoradbhutasāhasaikarasikaḥ kairna śruto rāvaṇaḥ || 105 ||’
atra yo 'yaṃ daśavadanena svayaṃ chinnaiḥ śirobhirbhagavataḥ śaṃbhorarcanāprakāra upakrāntastatra mūle pañca tataścatuṣṭayamiti śiroviracanāprapañcobuddhipūrvako 'daivakṛtaḥ kriyamāṇo 'sya karmaṇaḥ samāptau sahakārikāraṇatāmāsādayatītyayamadaivakṛto buddhipūrvakaḥ samāhitabhedaḥ ||
mūle pañceti | adho 'dhaḥ sthūlapuṣpasya saṃniveśa uparyupari tanuriti dūrvāpūjāprakāraḥ prasiddhaḥ | anyatamālokananimittairāropitaiḥ | atra lokaprasiddhapūjāprakāraḥ kāryabhūtaḥ | uparyupari tanusaṃniveśaniṣpādanaṃ sahakāri | idaṃ ca rāvaṇaprayatnaniṣpādyatvādadaivakṛtaṃ buddhipūrvaṃ ca bhavatītyanyatamena mūrdhnānyatamasyāropaṇaṃ na navamacchedaparyantamāsīt | pūjāsvarūpeṇaiva bhagavāṃstuṣyati na tathā viditenetyabhiprāyavato nistaraṅgā bhaktistena sāhasasyādbhutatvam ||
ākasmikī buddhipūrvā daivakṛtā yathā—
‘sā kaumudī nayanayorbhavataḥ sujanmā tasyā bhavānapi manorathabandhabandhuḥ |
tatsaṅgamaṃ prati sakhe nahi saṃśayo 'sti yasminvidhiśca madanaśca kṛtābhiyogau || 106 ||’
atra yo 'yaṃ mādhavasya mālatīṃ prati samāgamābhilāṣastatreyaṃ mālatyā ākasmikī buddhipūrvā ca tathā pravṛttiḥ sobhayyapi daivakṛtā ca sahāyāptiḥ samāhitabhedaḥ ||
atra yo 'yaṃ mādhavasyeti | vidhiśca madanaśca kṛtābhiyogāvityanena mālatyāḥ pṛrvānubhāvāḥ kathyante | te ca dvidhā bhavantītyākasmikī daivapūrvā sahāyasaṃpattiḥ ||
ākasmikī buddhipūrvā cādaivakṛtā yathā—
‘dṛṣṭirvandanamālikā stanayugaṃ lāvaṇyapūrṇau ghaṭau śubhrāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitaḥ sumanasāṃ vakraprabhā darpaṇaḥ |
﻿
romāñcodgama eva sarṣapakaṇaḥ pāṇī punaḥ pallavau svāṅgaireva gṛhaṃ priyasya viśatastanvyā kṛtaṃ maṅgalam || 107 ||’
atrāgacchataḥ priyasyeyaṃ vandanamālikādimaṅgalakriyā manaḥparitoṣahetustasyāstanvaṅgyā iṅgitākāraireva yannivartanaṃ so 'yamākasmikaḥ svabuddhipūrvakaśca tatsahakārikāraṇatvādadaivakṛtaśca samāhitabhedaḥ ||
atrāgacchataḥ priyasyeti | maṅgalakriyāmātraṃ na camatkārāspadamata uktaṃ manaḥparitoṣaheturiti | smitaṃ buddhipūrvam | romāñco na buddhipūrvaḥ | evaṃ dṛṣṭyādau yathāyathaṃ veditavyamiti ||
buddhipūrvāyāṃ sahāyāptau kvacidbhrāntirapyasti tatastadanantaraṃ tāṃ lakṣayati—
bhrāntirviparyayajñānaṃ dvidhā sāpi prayujyate |
atattve tattvarūpā ca tattve cātattvarūpiṇī || 35 ||
atattve tattvarūpā yā trividhā sāpi paṭhyate |
abādhitā bādhitā ca tathā kāraṇabādhitā || 36 ||
bhrāntiriti | atasmiṃstaditi niścayo bhrāntiḥ | saiva viparyayaḥ | na caivaṃ saṃśayādaya ityuktapūrvam | sā dvidhā—yasya yatrāsadbhāvastasya tatra sadbhāvāropaḥ, yasya vā yatra sadbhāvastasya tatrāsadbhāvāropaḥ | so 'yaṃ bhāvābhāvakṛto niyamo bhrānterbādhaniyame 'pi kvacidvāropanyāso bhavati kvacinna bhavati | upanyāso dvirūpo 'bhidhayā vṛttyantareṇa ca | yatra bādhopanyāse bādhitānupanyāse vā 'bādhitā tasminneva vākye 'vijñātabādhetyarthaḥ | upanyāsetaraprakāreṇa jñātabādhakā bādhitā | bādhakāraṇokterbādhaparyavasānābhiprāyatvāt tadetaddarśayati—abādhitā bādhitā ceti ||
tatrātattve tattvarūpā 'bādhitā yathā—
‘mohavirame sarosaṃ thoratthaṇamaṇḍale suravahūṇam |
jeṇa karikumbhasambhāvaṇāi diṭṭhī pariṭṭhaviā || 108 ||’
[mohavirame saroṣaṃ sthūlastanamaṇḍale suravadhūnām |
yena karikumbhasaṃbhāvanayā dṛṣṭiḥ paristhāpitā ||]
﻿
atra suravadhūstanamaṇḍale karikumbhatvena gṛhīte 'tattvarūpe yanmithyaiva tattvāropaṇaṃ na cānantaraṃ vādhakopanyāsaḥ kṛtasteneyamabādhitā atattve tattvarūpā bhrāntiḥ ||
mohavirama iti | pariṭṭhaviā sapallavaṃ vyavasthāpitā | tatraiva paripūrvasya tiṣṭateḥ prasiddhatvāt | saroṣamiti samavāyiviśeṣaṇam | na ca tadantareṇa kriyāsadbhāvaḥ | tena mohe 'pi na prakrāntarasānubhāvasvarūpatāmahāsīditi vyajyate | itthaṃ ca dṛ̣dhānubandho 'sau raso yadbalavattaravirodhisaṃparke 'pi na kārkaśyamagāditi sthūlamaṇḍalasuravadhūpadaiḥ prakāśyate saṃbhāvanayā na tu pūrvotpannajñānena | karikumbhānāṃ dṛḍhataravāsanatvāt | abādhitetyatra yathārtho 'bhimatastathā darśayati—bādhakopanyāsa iti ||
atattve tattvarūpā bādhitā yathā—
‘hasiaṃ sahatthatālaṃ sukkhavaḍaṃ uvagaehi pahiehi |
pattapphalasāricche uḍḍīṇe pūsavaṃdammi || 109 ||’
[hasitaṃ sahastatālaṃ śuṣkavaṭamupagataiḥ pathikaiḥ |
pattraphalasadṛśe uḍḍīne śukavṛnde 'smin ||]
atra pattraphalito 'yaṃ nyagrodha ityatattvarūpe tattvabuddhāvutpannāyāṃ ya uttarakālamapattratāniṣphalatāpratyayasteneyamatattve tattvarūpākhyā bādhitā bhrāntiḥ ||
hasiamiti | pūsaḥ śukaḥ | vandaṃ vṛndam | śukacañca‌upucchānāṃ pakvanyagrodhaphalanavapalāśasādṛśyam | yadyapi nātra bādho 'bhihitastathāpi uḍḍīṇa ityanenārthābhāvaviṣayā pratītiḥ kriyate | kathamanyathā hasitahastatālarūpakāryasyopanyāsaḥ syāt ||
atattve tattvarūpā kāraṇabādhitā yathā—
‘kanakakalaśasvacche rādhāpayodharamaṇḍale navajaladharaśyāmāmātmadyutiṃ pratibimbitām |
asitasicayaprāntabhrāntyā muhurmuhurutkṣipa- ñjayati janitavrīḍāhāsaḥ priyāhasito hariḥ || 110 ||’
﻿
atra śyāmāyāmātmadyutāvasitasicayaprāntabuddhiratattve tattvarūpā priyāhasitena ca kāraṇena yadbādhitā saiṣātattve tattvarūpā kāraṇabādhitā bhrāntiḥ ||
atra śyāmāyāmiti | nātra pūrvodāharaṇavacchabdena kayācidapi vṛttyārthābhāvo viṣayīkṛtaḥ kiṃtu prakārāntareṇonnīyate | tathāhi nāyakenāṃśukāpaharaṇalīlāyite 'pi yadidaṃ rādhāyāḥ sicayāvarodhāṅgacalanabhrūkṣepādi mugdhāṅganocitavibhramavirodhi hasitaṃ tatkāraṇaṃ bādhasyeti ||
atattvarūpā tattve yā sāpi traividhyasiddhaye |
hānopādānayorheturūpekṣāyāśca jāyate || 37 ||
tatra tattve 'tattvarūpā hānaheturyathā—
‘so muddhamio miatahṇiāhiṃ taha dūmi tuha āsāhim |
jaha saṃbhāvamaī ṇavi ṇaīṇa paraṃmuho jāo || 111 ||’
[sa mugdhamṛgo mṛgatṛṣṇikābhistathā dūnastvadāśābhiḥ |
yathā sadbhāvamayīṣvapi nadīṣu parāṅmukho jātaḥ ||]
atra pāramārthikīṣvapi nadīṣu mṛgatṛṣṇāpratāritaḥ sanyanna mṛgaḥ payaḥ pātuṃ pratipadyate pratyuta tyajati teneyaṃ tattve 'pyatattvarūpā hānaheturbhrāntiḥ ||
hānaṃ dvividham | pravṛttyabhāvo viparītaśca prayatnaḥ | dvidhāpyatrābhimatamiti vyā- khyānena sphuṭayati—na pratipadyate pratyuta tyajatīti ||
tattve 'tattvarūpopādānaheturyathā—
‘samarthaye yatprathamaṃ priyāṃ prati kṣaṇena tanme parivartate 'nyathā |
ato vinidre sahasā vilocane karomi na sparśavibhāvitāpriyaḥ || 113 ||’
atrāṅgīkṛtalatārūporvaśīpariṣvaṅgasukhanimīlitākṣasya purūravasaḥ śāpāntāvirbhūtasatyarūpāyāmapi tasyāṃ yeyaṃ pūvānubhūtevaṃvidhānekavidhavipralambhasaṃbhāvanayā nayanayoranunmīlanabuddhiḥ seyaṃ tattve 'pyatattvarūpopādānaheturbhrāntiḥ || ﻿
samarthaye iti | vibhāvitāpriya iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ, priyādiṣu puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhāt | nātrābhāvāropaḥ sphuṭo 'vagamyata iti prakaraṇamādāya vyācaṣṭe—atrāṅgīkṛteti | na ca vācyaṃ dolāyamānatayā saṃśayarūpamidaṃ jñānamiti | yato nāstyevātra priyatamā tathāpi tadāropeṇa manastāpātivāhanamucitamiti jānataḥ purūravaso 'nubandhaprakarṣaḥ puṣyati nānyatheti sahṛdayahṛdayasākṣikamidam | tadetanmanāk sphuṭayati—pūrvānubhūtaivaṃvidheti ||
tattve 'pyatattvarūpopekṣāheturyathā—
‘cikraṃsayā kṛtrimapatripaṅkteḥ kapotapālīṣu niketanānām |
mārjāramapyāyataniścalāṅgaṃ yasyāṃ janaḥ kṛtrimameva mene || 113 ||’
atra tattvarūpe 'pi mārjāre kṛtrimo 'yamiti buddhau jātāyāṃ tasyāṃ prayojakatvena yadupekṣaṇaṃ seyaṃ tattve 'pyatattvarūpopekṣāheturbhrāntiḥ ||
prayojakatvena yadupekṣaṇamiti | yā pravṛttiṃ nivṛttiṃ vā na prasūte 'pekṣā- buddhiṃ vetyarthaḥ ||
bhrāntimānbhrāntimālā ca bhrānteratiśayaśca yaḥ |
bhrāntyanadhyavasāyaśca bhrāntireveti me matam || 38 ||
bhrāntimāniti | bhūmni matup | bhūmārtho dvividho bahūnāṃ bhrāntīnāmekaviṣayato bhinnaviṣayāṇāṃ vā samānakartṛtā | ādyo bhrāntimato viṣayo, dvitīyo bhrāntimālāyāḥ | na hi bhrāntimati mālākramaniyamo 'sti yugapadapi bhinnakartṛkāṇāṃ jāyamānatvāt | bhrānteratiśayaḥ śabdopanītaprakarṣā bhrāntiriti svakāryabhūtaṃ vitarkamādāya pratīyamāno viparyayaheturbhramāntarānubandhī ||
tatra bhrāntimān yathā—
‘kapole mārjāraḥ paya iti karāṁllẹdhi śaśina- starucchidraprotānbisamiti karī saṃkalayati |
ratānte talpasthānharati dayitāpyaṃśukamiti prabhāmattaścandro jagadidamaho vibhramayati || 114 ||’
﻿
atrendumarīciṣu payaḥprabhṛtibhrāntibhūmnāyaṃ bhrāntimān nāma bhrāntereva bhedaḥ ||
bhrāntimālā yathā—
‘nīlendīvaraśaṅkayā nayanayorbandhūkabuddha‍yādhare pāṇau padmadhiyā madhūkakusumabhrāntyā tathā gaṇḍayoḥ |
līyante kabarīṣu bāndhavajanavyāmohajātaspṛhā durvārā madhupāḥ kiyanti taruṇi sthānāni rakṣiṣyasi || 115 ||’
atra yuvatyavayaveṣu nayanādiṣu madhuvratānāṃ yeyaṃ nīlotpalādibuddhiḥ seyaṃ mālākrameṇopajāyamānā bhrāntimālā bhrāntereva bhedaḥ ||
bhrāntyatiśayo dvedhā—vitarkaheturviparyayahetuśca | tayoḥ pūrvamupamābhrāntimācakṣate, dvitīyaṃ tu bhrāntyatiśayameva |
tatropamābhrāntiryathā—
‘hṛtoṣṭharāgairnayanodabindubhirnimagnanābhernipatadbhiraṅkitam |
cyutaṃ ruṣā bhinnagaterasaṃśayaṃ śukodaraśyāmamidaṃ stanāṃśukam || 116 ||’
atra śādvale 'pi samutpannastanāṃśukabhramasya purūravaso yo 'yaṃ sādṛśyātiśayito vitarkaḥ seyamupamābhrāntiḥ ||
tayoḥ pūrvamiti | tattvena pratīyato madhye manāk‌tavdyatirekamullikhito nūnaṃ bhedābhedatulyatayā manasi sādṛśyaṃ pravartata iti bhāvaḥ | asaṃśayamiti padena prakarṣo vitarkaśca pratyāyitaḥ ||
bhrāntyatiśayo yathā—
‘diśyāddhūrjaṭijūṭakoṭisariti jyotsnālavodbhāsinī śāśāṅkī kalikā jalabhramivaśāddrāgdṛṣṭanaṣṭā mudam |
yāṃ cañcacchapharībhrameṇa mukulīkurvanphaṇālīṃ muhu- rmuhyaṁllakṣyamahirjighṛkṣatitamāmākuñcanaprāñcanaiḥ || 117 ||’
﻿
atra gaṅgāmbhaḥpratiphalitāṃ rajanikarakalāmālokayato vāsukeryeyaṃ śapharībhrameṇa mukulīkurvan phaṇālīṃ śapharīyamityadhyāsitā viparyayabuddhiḥ so 'yaṃ bhrāntyatiśayo nāma bhrāntereva bhedaḥ ||
jighṛkṣatitamāmiti | ‘tiṅaśca 5|3|56’ iti tamapi ‘kimettiṅavyayaghādāmvadravyaprakarṣe 5|4|11’ ityām ||
bhrāntyanadhyavasāyo 'pi dvidhā—sālambano nirālambanaśca | tayoḥ sālambano yathā—
अत्र श्लोके—‘विरहिणीजणण’ इति, ‘दअन्तेण’ इति, ‘णावइ’ इति, ‘चैत्तेण’ इति टीकाकारसंमतः पाठः.‘virahiṇihiaakaantahiṃ ṇiṇṇāaï takkhaṇi chāijjaï aliṇivahehiṃ caitteṇa cūavaṇī |
aha tāsu vi maarandahiṃ saṃdāṇiaï jaha ṇa kalamba ṇa amba ṇa jambū jāṇiaï || 118 ||’
[virahiṇīhṛdayakṛtāntairnirṇīyate tatkṣaṇe chādyate 'linivahaiścaitreṇa cūtavanī |
atha tāsvapi makarandairvadhyate yathā na kadambo nāmro na jambūrjñāyate ||]
na kadambo nāmro na jambūriti jñāyata iti trayāṇāmevāvalambanabhūtatvātsālambano nāmāyaṃ bhrāntyanadhyavasāyo bhrāntibhedaḥ ||
bhrānteranadhyavasāyo 'nirdhāryamāṇaviṣayatā | virahiṇījaṇaṇa iti | virahiṇījanasya | ‘adhīgartha-2|3|52|’ ityādinā karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī | daanteṇa dayamānena rakṣatā | ṇāvaï pratibhāti | takkhaṇi tatra kṣaṇe | chāijjaï aliṇivahehiṃ chādyate 'linivahaiḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ | caitteṇa caitreṇa kartrā | cūavaṇī cūtavanī | taha tathā | tāsu vi tasyā api | saṃdāṇiaï badhyate | anirdhāritaviṣayatayā kathamālambananirālambanayorbheda ityata āha—trayāṇāmevāvalambanabhūtatvāditi | uktibhaṅgyā viṣayopādānādityarthaḥ || ﻿
nirālambo yathā—
‘ubhau rambhāstambhāvupari viparītau kamalayo- stadūrdhvaṃ ratnāśmasthalamatha durūhaṃ kimapi yat |
tataḥ kumbhau paścādbisakisalaye kandalamaye tadanvindāvindīvaramadhukarāḥ kiṃ punaridam || 119 ||’
atrorvādiṣu yuvatyavayaveṣūtpanno rambhāstambhabhrānteryo 'yametatsamudāye kimidamityālambanaṃ vinā kṛto 'nadhyavasāyaḥ sa eṣa nirālambano nāma bhrāntyanadhyavasāyo bhrāntereva bhedaḥ ||
ālambanaṃ vineti | viṣayānirdhāraṇaṃ vyaktīkṛtam ||
ūho vitarkaḥ saṃdehanirṇayāntaradhiṣṭhitaḥ |
dvidhāsau nirṇayāntaścānirṇayāntaśca kīrtyate || 39 ||
mithyāpratītisāmānyādanantaraṃ vitarkalakṣaṇam—ūha iti | yasya prasiddhiḥ sa ityarthaḥ | paryāyaśabdenāpi lakṣaṇaṃ kriyata eva | yathā—ghaṭapadārthatayā vyāvṛttau saṃdihānasya kalaśapadārthatayā niścayavato yaḥ kalaśaḥ sa ghaṭa iti | kathamasau saṃśayaviparyayābhyāṃ bhidyata ityata āha—saṃdeheti | saṃdeho nānākoṭikastathābhūtāmeva jijñāsāṃ prasūte, tarkastu tadanantarabhāvī niyatakoṭikastathābhūtāmiti | kālasvarūpakāryabhedāt saṃśayato bheda iti | evaṃ viparyayato 'pi | sa hi tarkāntarabhāviniścayātmakaḥ pravṛttyādihetubhūtaśca | tadayaṃ tarkābhāsasya viparyayāparyavasāyino viṣayavibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ, sa tu tarkasya viṣayavibhāgaḥ sphuṭa eva saṃdehanirṇayayormadhyamadhiṣṭitaḥ sa tadvartī | vibhāgamāha—dvidhāsāviti | nirṇayāntaropanyastaḥ phalabhūtāniścayo 'tathābhūto nirṇayānto niścayaḥ ||
pramitiviparyayarūpatayā dvividha ityāśayavānnirṇayārthaṃ vibhajate—
tattvānupātyatattvānupātī yaścobhayātmakaḥ |
sa nirṇayānta itaro mithyāmithyobhayātmakaḥ || 40 ||
tattvānupātīti | nigadenaiva vyākhyātam || ﻿
teṣu nirṇayāntastattvānupātī yathā—
‘mainākaḥ kimayaṃ ruṇaddhi gagane manmārgamavyāhataṃ śaktistasya kutaḥ sa vajrapatanādbhīto mahendrādapi |
tārkṣyaḥ so 'pi samaṃ nijena vibhunā jānāti māṃ rāvaṇaṃ ā jñātaṃ sa jaṭāyureṣa jarasā kliṣṭo vadhaṃ vāñchati || 120 ||’
atra nirūpitalakṣaṇe vitarke jaṭāyureṣa iti tattvānupātī nirṇayānto vitarkaḥ ||
mainākaḥ kimayamiti | kimayamiti kākvā pūrvaṃ dolāyamānacittasya niyatakoṭisparśī jñānaviśeṣa upanīyate sa eva tarkaḥ | evamanyatrāpi ||
sa evātattvānupātī yathā—
‘asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ |
vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ || 121 ||’
atra kimidaṃ rūpaṃ nirmātuṃ yathoktaḥ purāṇo muniḥ prabhavet, ataścandrādiṣvanyatamena prajāpatinā bhavitavyamityatattvānupātitvādatattvānupātyayaṃ nirṇayānto vitarkaḥ ||
sa evobhayātmako yathā—
‘citte niveśya parikalpitasattvayogā- nrūpoccayena racitā manasā kṛtā nu |
strīratnasṛṣṭiraparā pratibhāti sā me dhāturvibhutvamanucintya vapuśca tasyāḥ || 122 ||’
so 'yaṃ tattvānupātitvādatattvānupātitvāccobhayātmā nirṇayānto vitarkaḥ || ﻿
ubhayātmaka iti | strīratnasṛṣṭirityanena tattvānupātī, aparetyanenātattvānupātī prakāśitaḥ ||
anirṇayānto mithyārūpo yathā—
‘adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃsvidityunmukhībhi- rdṛṣṭocchrāyaścakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ |
sthānādasmātsarasaniculādutpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharansthūlahastāvalepān || 123 ||’
atra kimidamadreḥ śṛṅgaṃ pavano haratīti meghaṃ prati kalpanāyāṃ mithyātvādvastunaścānirṇayādanirṇayānto mithyārūpo vitarkaḥ ||
mithyāmithyārūpau bādhitābādhitaviṣayau | abādhito 'pi tarko bhavatyeva | yathā yadyasya nīlaṃ rūpaṃ nīlotpalamiti ||
sa evāmithyārūpo yathā—
‘ayamasau bhagavānuta pāṇḍavaḥ sthitamavāṅmuninā śaśimaulinā |
samadhirūḍhamajena nu jiṣṇunā sviditi vegavaśānmumuhe gaṇaiḥ || 124 ||’
atra bhagavatpārthayoramithyārūpatvena vegavattvādekasyānirṇayānto 'mithyārūpo vitarkaḥ ||
atha bhagavatpārthayoriti | bhagavatpārthayoravasthānayoḥ samadhirohārohayośca na kiṃcidbādhakamasti cakṣurjñānasya viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣata iti ||
anirṇayānta ubhayātmā yathā—
‘māyā svideṣā mativibhramo vā dhvastaṃ nu me vīryamutāhamanyaḥ |
gāṇḍīvamuktā hi yathāpurā me parākramante na śarāḥ kirāte || 125 ||’
atra māyādīnāṃ vikalpānāṃ mithyārūpatvānmama śarāḥ kirāte na vyāpriyanta ityasyā mithyārūpatvādanirṇayāntatvāccāyamanirṇayānta ubhayarūpo vitarkaḥ || ﻿
atra māyādīnāmiti | na parameśvarasya māyā chadma, na śaktau matibhramaḥ, na dhvaṃso vīryasya, navārjunādevārjunasyānyatvamiti viṣayabādhāt ||
mīlite bhrāntirastīti bhrāntyanantaraṃ mīlitalakṣaṇamāha—
vastvantaratiraskāro vastunā mīlitaṃ smṛtam |
pihitāpihite caiva tadga‌uṇātadga‌uṇau ca tat || 41 ||
vastvantareti | vastūnāmiti śliṣṭaṣaṣṭhī | vastvantareṇa tiraskāre iti karmaṇi | vastvantarasya tiraskāra iti kartari | phalataḥ sa evārthaḥ | tathācotkṛṣṭaguṇenāpakṛṣṭaguṇasya tiraskaraṇaṃ nyagbhāvanamiti lakṣaṇārthaḥ | pṛthagrūpatiraskāreṇaikarūpatāpattirmīlitamucyate | tathāca kātantram—‘mīlitaṃ yuktamucyate’ iti | abhiprāyapūrvastiraskāro dvividhaḥ—siddhābhiprāyaphalo 'siddhābhiprāyaphalaśca yathākramaṃ pihitāpihite | na caitāvatā viśeṣeṇa pṛthagbhāvaḥ; sāmānyalakṣaṇavyāptatvādavāntarabhaṅgīnāmānantyācca | sa rūpaguṇena tiraskārastadguṇo virūpaguṇenātadguṇaḥ | etāvapi mīlitaviśeṣāviti sphuṭam ||
atra mīlitamabhidhīyamānaguṇena pratīyamānaguṇena ca vastunā saṃbhavati | tayorādyo( 'bhidhīyamānaguṇena) yathā—
‘entovi ṇa saccavio gose pasarattapallavāruṇacchāo |
majjaṇataṃbesu mao taha maataṃbesu loaṇesu amariso || 126 ||’
[āgacchannapi na dṛṣṭaḥ prātaḥ prasaratpallavāruṇacchāyaḥ |
majjanatāmrayormadastathā madatāmrayorlocanayoramarṣaḥ ||]
atra majjanatāmrayorlocanayormadarāgo madatāmrayoḥ kopānurāgaḥ sākṣādabhidhīyamānenaiva guṇena tiraskriyamāṇo nidarśita ityabhidhīyamānaguṇena vastunaitanmīlitam ||
vibhāgamāha—atra mīlitamiti | entovīti | saccavio dṛṣṭaḥ | gose prātaḥ | tasyāḥ majjanaṃ snānam | atra tāmrapallavāruṇarāgapadābhyāmabhidhīyate guṇaḥ || ﻿
pratīyamānaguṇena yathā—
‘pi adaṃsaṇeṇa suharasamuulia jaïse ṇa honti ṇaaṇāim |
tā keṇa kaṇṇaraïaṃ lakkhijjaï kuvalaaṃ tassā || 127 ||’
[priyadarśanena sukharasamukulite yadyasyā na bhavetāṃ nayane |
tatkena karṇaracitaṃ lakṣyeta kuvalayaṃ tasyāḥ ||]
atra priyadarśanasukhena mukulitayoreva locanayostasyāḥ karṇakuvalayaṃ lakṣyate natvamukulitayoriti vastunā vastvantaratiraskāraḥ pratīyamānaguṇatayopapādita iti pratīyamānaguṇena vastunā mīlitamidam ||
nanu piadaṃsaṇeṇetyādi kathaṃ mīlitaṃ, na hyatra tiraskāraḥ kenāpi śabdena pratyāyyata ityata āha—natvamukulitayoriti | yadi mukulite na syātāṃ kathaṃ kuvalayaṃ lakṣyata iti tarkasya tiraskāraparyavasānāditi bhāvaḥ | mūrtirūpādikaḥ pratīyamāno guṇaḥ ||
pihitaṃ yathā—
‘paaḍiasaṇehasaṃbhāvavibbhamantia jaha tumaṃ diṭṭho |
saṃvaraṇavāvaḍāe aṇṇovi jaṇo taha ccea || 128 ||’
[prakaṭitasnehasadbhāvavibhramatayā yathā tvaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ |
saṃvaraṇavyāpṛtayā anyo 'pi janastathā caiva ||]
atra prakaṭitasnehavibhramatayā tvāmavalokya naitadanyo jano jānātviti sarvatra snigdhadṛṣṭipātena pihitamapyetanmīlitabheda eva ||
apihitaṃ yathā—
‘diṭṭhāivi jaṇṇa diṭṭho ālaviāevi jaṇṇa ālavio |
uvaāro jaṇṇa kao teṇa a kaliaṃ chaïllehim || 129 ||’
[dṛṣṭayāpi yanna dṛṣṭa ālapitayāpi yannālapitaḥ |
upacāro yanna kṛtastena ca kalitaṃ chekaiḥ ||]
﻿
atra dṛṣṭayā yanna dṛṣṭaḥ saṃbhāṣitayā yanna saṃbhāṣito na cābhyāgatopacāro bihitastena tadanurāgaḥ paraṃ na pihitaḥ pratyuta chādanena chekānāṃ prakaṭita ityapihitākhyo 'yaṃ mīlitabhedaḥ ||
nanu dṛṣṭayāpi na dṛṣṭa ityapi kathamalaṃkāraḥ | na hyatra śaktirastītyata āha— pratyuteti | chekā vidagdhāstairāsvādyamānatvādāvarjakatvaṃ kāvyasyetyarthaḥ ||
tadguṇo yathā—
‘goraṅgaü taruṇiaṇo johṇāiṃ ahisaraï siaṇevacchapaḍiccheo vallahavaddharaï |
tacchāāhiṃ puṇa caliaü sāmala- gatto taha maaṇu manti ahim || 130 ||’
[gaurāṅgastaruṇījano jyosnāyāmabhisarati sitanepathyaparicchanno vallabhabaddharatiḥ |
tacchāyāsu punaścalitaḥ śyāmalāṅgastatra madano mantryabhūt ||]
atra gaurāṅgastaruṇījanaḥ sitanepathyo jyotsnāyāṃ śyāmastu nīlanepathyastasyāśchāyāsu gacchatīti tadguṇāśrayamīlanāttadguṇākhyaṃ mīlitamidam |
goraṅgaü iti | gaurāṅgaḥ | johṇāiṃ jyotsnāyām | ṇevacchaṃ nepathyaṃ vastrāṅgarāgādiparigrahaḥ | paḍiccheo pratīkṣya gṛhītvā | vallahavaddharaï vallabhabaddharatiḥ | tacchāāhiṃ tāsāṃ gaurāṅgīṇāṃ chāyāyām | caliaü calitam ||
atadguṇo yathā—
‘karkandhūphalamuccinoti śabarī muktāphalākāṅkṣiṇī kruddholūkakadambakasya purataḥ kāko 'pi haṃsāyate |
kīrtyā te dhavalīkṛte tribhuvane kṣmāpāla lakṣmīḥ puraḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vīkṣya balo 'yamityupahitavrīḍaṃ śanairjalpati 131 ||’
atra karkandhūphalānāmapagatanijaguṇatvādatadguṇatvādatadguṇākhyaṃ mīlitamidam ||
atra karkandhūphalānāmiti | virupaguṇānāmityarthaḥ || ﻿
sadṛśādṛṣṭacintāderanubhūtārthavedanam |
smaraṇaṃ pratyabhijñānasvapnādyapi na tadbahiḥ || 42 ||
mīlite jñānamastīti sājātyādanantaraṃ smṛtiṃ lakṣayati—sadṛśeti | sadṛśā jñāyamānasādṛśyāt prayatnajā smṛtiścintādiryasyārthamagre kathayiṣyati—anubhūtārthavedanaṃ samānaviṣayānubhavaniyatajñānaviśeṣarūpaṃ smaraṇam | pratyabhijñānamapi pūrvānubhūtaviṣayameva | evaṃ svapno 'pi ||
tatra sadṛśādyathā—
‘adṛśyanta purastena khelatkhañjanapaṅktayaḥ |
asmaryanta viniḥśvasya priyānayanavibhramāḥ || 132 ||’
atra svañjanapaṅktidarśanāttatsadṛśapriyānayanavibhramasmaraṇāttatsadṛśadarśanajaṃ smaraṇamidam ||
atra khañjaneti | atraśabdenakhañjanapaṅktiścedavalokitānantarameva priyāsmaraṇamāsīditi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'vagamyate | sa ca kāraṇatāsādṛśyamanantarbhāvya khañjanajñānasyāstīti ca pratītaṃ sādṛśyamiti bhāvaḥ ||
adṛṣṭādyathā—
‘munisutāpraṇayasmṛtirodhinā mama viyuktamidaṃ tamasā manaḥ |
manasijena sakhe prahariṣyatā dhanuṣi cūtaśaraśca niveśitaḥ ||133 ||’
atra munisutāpraṇayasmṛtirodhinā tamasā me mano viyuktamityadṛṣṭakṛtaṃ smaraṇamidam ||
atra munisuteti | tamolakṣaṇasya pratibandhakasyāpagame smaraṇarūpaṃ kāryamāvaśyakamityarthaḥ ||
cintāyā yathā—
‘purā yatra srotaḥ pulinamadhunā tatra saritāṃ viparyāsaṃ yāto ghanaviralabhāvaḥ kṣitiruhām |
bahordṛṣṭaṃ kālādaparamiva jātaṃ vanamidaṃ niveśaḥ śailānāṃ tadidamiti buddhiṃ draḍhayati || 134 ||’
﻿
atra pratyakṣeṣvapi srotastaruvipinādiṣu smaraṇasya cintājanyatvādidaṃ cintodbhūtaṃ smaraṇam ||
ādigrahaṇātparaprayatnādyathā—
‘darśanapathamāyātā sākṣādiva tanmayena hṛdayena |
smṛtikāriṇā tvayā me punarapi citrīkṛtā kāntā || 135 ||’
atra parakṛtātprayatnaviśeṣāccintāyāḥ pravṛttatvādidamapi smaraṇameva ||
svapnādyathā—
‘jāne svapnavidhau mamādya culukotsekyaṃ purastādabhū- tpratyūṣe pariveṣamaṇḍalamiva jyotsnāsapatnaṃ mahaḥ |
tasyāntarnakhanistuṣīkṛtaśaraccandraprabhairaṅgakai- rdṛṣṭā kāpyabalā balātkṛtavatī sā manmathaṃ manmatham || 136 ||’
atra svapnasya cintādijanyatvātsvapnasmṛtirapi smaraṇameva ||
yadi svapnasmṛtirapi smaraṇameva tadā katamadatra sādṛśyādiṣu kāraṇamata uktam—cintādīti ||
pratyabhijñānaṃ yathā—
‘gṛhīto yaḥ pūrvaṃ pariṇayavidhau kaṃkaṇadharaḥ sudhāmūrteḥ pādairamṛtaśiśirairyaḥ paricitaḥ |
sa evāyaṃ tasyāstaditarakaraupamyasubhago mayā labdhaḥ pāṇirlalitalavalīkandalanibhaḥ || 137 ||’
atra gṛhīto yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa evāyaṃ tasyāḥ pāṇiriti pratyabhijñānamapi smaraṇameva ||
pratyabhijñānasvarūpaṃ darśayati—yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa evāyamiti | nanu sūtre svapnātpūrvaṃ pratyabhijñānamuddiṣṭaṃ paścādudāhriyata iti kathametat | atrodāharaṇakrame 'pi lipipramādo 'yamityārādhyapādāḥ || ﻿
abhiprāyānukūlyena pravṛttirbhāva ucyate |
sodbhedo 'tha nirudbhedaścaikataścābhitaśca saḥ || 43 ||
abhimatamuktādivastucintananiyamādanantaraṃ bhāvalakṣaṇam | tadāha—abhiprāyeti | abhimatavastucintā abhiprāyaḥ | tadanukūlatayā pravṛttiḥ kriyālakṣaṇābhāvaḥ | ata eva sūkṣmādbhedaḥ | pravṛttipratipādakena svārthaprakāśanadvārā prakāśyamāno 'bhiprāyaḥ kvacitpadāntaravṛttisahakṛtena prakāśyate, kvacitkevalena | tāvimau sodbhedanirudbhedau | mitho 'nubandhaviṣayaścāyaṃ camatkaroti | tatra pravṛttirucyamānānena tasyocyate tayorvā | tadidamāha—ekataścābhitaśceti | abhiprāyodbhāvanādaśāyāṃ rūḍhaḥ svādapadavīmāsādya camatkāramāvahati | ata eva tatkāryayoḥ pravṛtteranubhāvarūpatayā tadyāvānakuṇṭha iti hṛdayam (?) ||
tatraikataḥ sodbhedo yathā—
‘gehṇa paloeha imaṃ viasiaṇaaṇā piassa appei |
ghariṇī suassa paḍhamubbhiṇṇadantajualaṃkiaṃ boram || 138 ’
[gṛhāṇa paryālokayemaṃ vikasitanayanā priyāyārpayati |
gṛhiṇī sutasya prathamodbhinnadantayugalāṅkitaṃ badaram ||]
atra sutasya dantodgamādahamupabhogayogyāsmīti gṛhiṇyā evamabhiprāyaḥ prakarṣavikāsitanayanatayodbhidyate; na punaḥ patyurityekataḥ sodbhedo 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ ||
abhitaḥ sodbhedo yathā—
‘sāloe ccia sūre ghariṇī gharasāmiassa ghettūṇa |
ṇecchantassavi pāe dhuaï hasantī hasantassa || 139 ||’
[sāloka eva sūrye gṛhiṇī gṛhasvāmino gṛhītvā |
anicchato 'pi pādau dhāvayati hasantī hasataḥ ||]
atra sāloka eva sūrye gṛhapatergṛhāgamanaṃ gṛhiṇyāśca yatpādadhāvanaṃ ttadāvābhyāmadya veśmano na nirgantavyamiti bhāvaḥ | sa ca dvayorapi hāsenābhita udbhidyata ityabhittaḥ sodbhedo 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ || ﻿
ekato nirudbhedo yathā—
‘sālivaṇagoviāe uḍ‌ḍīyantīa pūsavindāim |
savvaṅgasundarī evi pahiā acchīi pecchanti || 140 ||’
[śālivanagopikāyā uḍḍāyayantyāḥ śukavṛndāni |
sarvāṅgasundaryā api pathikā akṣiṇī eva prekṣante ||]
atrātisaundaryeṇa devībhrāntyā śālivanagopikāmālokayatāṃ pathikānāṃ tadakṣinirīkṣaṇe 'yamabhiprāyaḥ—‘śālivanatiraskāreṇa devamānuṣayorviśeṣabhūtaḥ pabhdyāmeva bhūmisparśo bhūmyasparśo vā na lakṣyata iti tadakṣiṇī eva paśyāmo yadiyaṃ nimiṣati tadā mānuṣīyaṃ yadi na nimiṣati tadā devīyam |’ iti sarvāṅgasundaryā api pathikānāmeva jāyamāno bhāvo neha kenacitkarmaṇodbhidyata ityekato nirudbhedaścāyaṃ bhāvaḥ ||
neha kenaciditi | tathā cātra śabdāntarasya vyāpāro nāstītyarthaḥ ||
abhito nirudbhedo yathā—
‘golāaḍaṭṭhiaṃ pecchiūṇa gaïbaïsuaṃ haliasohvā |
āḍhattā uttariuṃ dukkhuttārāi paavīe || 141 ||’
[godātaṭasthitaṃ prekṣya gṛhapatisutaṃ hālikasnuṣā |
ārabdhā uttartuṃ duḥkhottarayā padavyā ||]
atrāgacchantīṃ hālikasnuṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā gṛhapatisūnorgodāvarītaṭe yadavasthānam, yaśca tamavalokya tasyā duruttaramārgeṇāvataraṇārambhastatrāyaṃ tayorabhiprāyo hastāvalambadānenāvayoraṅgasaṅgamaḥ saṃpadyatāmiti | sa cābhito dvayorapi jāyamāno neha kenacitkarmaṇodbhidyata ityabhito nirudbhedaścāyaṃ bhāvaḥ |
hṛdyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca bhidyeta na hi bhāvātkathaṃcana |
hṛdyodāharaṇaṃ tatra tairidaṃ pratipādyate || 44 ||
﻿
‘hiae rosugghuṇṇaṃ pāappaharaṃ sireṇa patthanto |
ṇaha udao(?) māṇaṃsiṇīe a thoraṃ suaṃ ruṇṇam || 142 ||’
atra hṛdaye roṣoddhūrṇapādaprahāraṃ yadayaṃ śirasā prārthitavān, yacca tayāsau na tāḍitastatra hṛdaye vallabhā vasatīti bhāvaḥ | sa ca prārthanārodanābhyāmudbhidyamānaḥ sodbhedo bhāvo hṛdya ityucyate ||
hṛdyamiti | abhimatasya vastuno hṛdayāvacchedena vṛttimatisaṃdhāya pravṛttiḥ | tatra yadyapi viśeṣo 'sti tathāpi bhāvasāmānyalakṣaṇākrāntastatraivāntarbhaviṣyati ||
nirudbhedastu yo bhāvaḥ sa sūkṣmastairnigadyate |
iṅgitākāralakṣyātsa sūkṣmātsyādbhūmikāntaram || 45 ||
yathā—
‘kadā nau saṃgamo bhāvītyākīrṇe vaktumakṣamam |
avetya kāntamabalā līlāpadmaṃ nyamīmilat || 143 ||’
atra vaktumakṣamatāyāmiṅgitākārayorapratīyamānatvād bhāvagaterbhūmikāntaramidaṃ bhavati |
nanu ca sūkṣmaḥ kathaṃ pūrvoktātsūkṣmādbhidyata ityata āha—iṅgitākāralakṣyā- diti | kadā nau saṃgamo bhāvītyabhiprāyasya vyañjakaṃ neṅgitaṃ na vikāro vā kāntasya kaścidupāttaḥ, avetyetyādiprakāśitābhiprāyānuguṇā kācidasti kriyā vā | kathamanyathā tamuddiśya līlāpadmanimīlanaṃ saṃgacchate | tasmādanyamevedaṃ sūkṣmaṃ bhāvalakṣaṇākrāntam ||
‘padmasaṃmīlanāccātra sūcito niśi saṅgamaḥ |
āśvāsayitumicchantyā priyamaṅgajapīḍitam || 144 ||’
atrānukāryānukaraṇe 'pi bhūmikāntarite eva bhavata iti so 'yaṃ nirudbhedo bhāva eva sūkṣma ityucyate |
uttarārdhasyodāharaṇaṃ vyutpādayati—atra padmasaṃmīlanācceti | evaṃ cet prāptamiṅgitalakṣyatvamata āha—tatra ceti | ājānikaṃ padmamīlanamanukāryaṃ ﻿
kāntāhastāṅgulījanitamanukaraṇaṃ rātrau samāgamo bhaviṣyatīti kāntāgato 'bhiprāyaḥ | na tu nimīlanamanukāryāvdyabhicaritametamarthamavabodhayatītyarthaḥ ||
pratyakṣamakṣajaṃ jñānaṃ mānasaṃ cābhidhīyate |
svānubhūtibhavaṃ caivamupacāreṇa kathyate || 46 ||
jñānasaṃgatyanantaraṃ pramāṇarūpālaṃkāraprastāvastatrānyeṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ pratyakṣamūlakatvāt prathamaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇamāha—pratyakṣamiti | sākṣātkāraḥ pratyakṣamiti prasiddhaṃ tasya vibhāgamāha—akṣajamiti | akṣaṃ bahirindriyaṃ tasmājjātam, mānasaṃ bāhyendriyānapekṣeṇa manasā janitam | svānubhūtiḥ sahajā cicchaktistasyā utpannam | śarīrābhighātādyabhibhūte pratyāhāratiraskṛte vā manasi yat kadācidatisphuṭābhaṃ jñānamutpadyate na tasya manonibandhanatā śakyate 'bhidhātumiti cicchaktimevāśrayate | nanu indriyajanya eva loke sākṣātkāritāprasiddheḥ kathamanubhūtibhavaṃ tathetyata āha—upacāreṇeti | yadīndriyajanye sākṣātkāritāniyamastadopacāreṇa parigaṇanam | atha bhāvanādibalena vināpīndriyaṃ bhavatīti pakṣastadā mukhyata eveti bhāvaḥ ||
tatrākṣajaṃ dvidhā | yugapadekaśaśca | tayoryugapadyathā—
‘krāntakāntavadanapratibimbe magnabālasahakārasugandhau |
svāduni praṇaditālini śīte nirvavāra madhunīndriyavargaḥ || 145 ’
atra madirāśrayāṇāṃ mukhapratibimbasaugandhyasvādutāśravyatvaśaityānāṃ dṛgghrāṇarasanaśravaṇatvagindriyapratyakṣatā pratīyate ||
yugapaditi | ekasminvākye ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvak‌śrotrāṇāṃ pañcānāmapi yugapatpravṛttyabhidhānādyaugapadyaṃ rasānuguṇatayā yaugapadyāccamatkāritāmāvahatīti dvidhāpyalaṃkārakāṇḍe parisaṃkhyānamucitam ||
ekaśo yathā—
‘mandamandavigalattrapamīṣaccakṣurullasitapakṣma dadhatyā |
vīkṣyate sma śanakairnavavadhvā kāmino mukhamadhomukhayaiva 146 ’
tadetaccākṣuṣam | evaṃ śrāvaṇādīnyapyudāharaṇīyāni || ﻿
mānasamapi dvidhā | sukhādiviṣayamanubhūtārthaviṣayaṃ ca | tayoḥ susvādiviṣayaṃ yathā—
‘astokavismayamavismṛtapūrvavṛtta- mudbhūtanūtanabhayajvarajarjaraṃ naḥ |
ekakṣaṇatruṭitasaṃghaṭitapramoda- mānandaśokaśabalatvamupaiti cetaḥ || 147 ||’
etannigadenaiva vyākhyātam ||
mānasamapi dvidheti | saṃyuktasamavāyaniyamitamekamaparaṃ tu saṃskāraniyamitam | saṃskāralakṣaṇayā hi pratyāsattyā yathā smaraṇātiriktaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ tathedamapīti na kiṃcidanupapannam || nigadenaiveti | yadi vismayādīnayaṃ na sākṣātkṛtavāṃstarhi kathamudvelatāmācakṣītetyarthaḥ ||
anubhūtārthaviṣayaṃ yathā—
‘pihite vāsāgāre tamasi ca sūcīmukhāgrasaṃbhedye |
mayi ca nimīlitanayane tathāpi kāntāmukhaṃ vyaktam || 148 ||’
idamapi nātidurbodhamiti na vyākhyātam ||
idamiti | vyaktamityanena sākṣātkāro darśitaḥ | nahi smaraṇena vyaktatā bhavati kiṃtu ātmanyevāvatiṣṭhate | svānubhūtimāśrayata ityarthaḥ ||
svānubhūtibhavaṃ dvidhā | mithyātmakamamithyātmakaṃ ca | tayormithyātmakaṃ yathā—
‘atha dīrghataraṃ tamaḥ pravekṣyansahasā rugṇarayaḥ sasaṃbhrameṇa |
nipatantamivoṣṇaraśmimurvyāṃ valayībhūtataruṃ dharāṃ ca mene || 149 ||’
tadidamindriyeṣu manasi cānavatiṣṭhamānamātmanyevāvatiṣṭhate ||
amithyātmakaṃ yathā—
‘manaḥ pratyaka‌‌citte savidhamavadhāyāttamarutaḥ prahṛṣyadromāṇaḥ pramadasalilotsaṅgitadṛśaḥ |
﻿
yadālokyāhlādaṃ hrada iva nimajjyāmṛtamaye dadhatyantastattvaṃ kimapi yaminastatkila bhavān || 150 ||’
asyātmaviṣayatā vyaktaiva yogibhirudgīyate ||
yogibhiriti | nididhyāsanabalalabdhātmano jñānasya yogimātre prasiddha- viṣayatvānna hyasmadādayastathā taṃ paricinvanti yathā yogina ityarthaḥ ||
anumānalakṣaṇamāha—
liṅgādyalliṅgino jñānamanumānaṃ taducyate |
pūrvavaccheṣavaccaiva dṛṣṭaṃ sāmānyataśca yat || 47 ||
liṅgāditi | yasya yena sahāvinābhāvalakṣaṇā vyāptiḥ saṃdigdhasādhyadharmadharmirūpapakṣavṛttitārūpā pakṣadharmatā ca gṛhyate tasmāttasya pratītiranumānaṃ yathā dhūmādvahneḥ | sa hi yathāvidhe siddhastathāvidhasaṃnidhānaṃ sūcayati | tatra yasmātpratītirutpadyate tat liṅgaṃ cihnam | vyāptiviśiṣṭapakṣe dharmatāsaṃjñāpakamityarthaḥ | itaraliṅgaṃ jñāpakamasyāstīti kṛtvā | pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyatodṛṣṭabhedātrividhamanumānamagre granthakṛtaiva vyākhyātamiti na vitanyate ||
phalasāmagryabhedena dvidhaitadbhidyate pṛthak |
udāharaṇamevaiṣāṃ rūpavyaktyai bhaviṣyati || 48 ||
phalasāmagryeti | yadyapi jñānamanumānamityuktaṃ tathāpi tasya sādhāraṇameva kvacidanupanyāsapradhānaṃ vācyam, kvacitkaraṇībhūtaliṅgaparāmarśopanyāsapradhānamiti bhavati yathokto viśeṣaḥ | anumānaśabdo hi bhāvalyuḍantaḥ karaṇe lyuḍanto vā | ādye phalaṃ dvitīye sāmagryakaraṇamityarthaḥ | upanyāsapradhānatā durūhetyata āha—udāharaṇameveti ||
teṣu yatra kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭa‍vā kāryamanumīyate tatpūrvavadyathā—
‘praviralavilolajaladaḥ kuṭajārjunanīpasurabhivanavātaḥ |
ayamāyātaḥ kālo hanta hatāḥ pathikagehinyaḥ || 151 ||’
atra varṣartoḥ kāraṇabhūtāt kāryabhūtavirahiṇīnāṃ maraṇamanumīyate | tenaitatpūrvaṃ kāraṇamihāstīti pūrvavaducyate || ﻿
kāryabhūtavirahiṇīnāmiti | pathikagehinīnāṃ daśamyavasthā jñāyamānā vākyārthaḥ | ataḥ phalopanyāsadattabharamevedaṃ kāvyamityabhiprāyaḥ | āyātaścejjaladāgamastadā pūrvapravṛtta iva pathikanārīvināśo lakṣyata iti niṣṭhāpratyayena dyotyate ||
yatra kāryaṃ dṛṣṭa‍vā kāraṇamanumīyate taccheṣavadyathā—
‘sāvajñamāgamiṣyannūnaṃ patito 'si pādayostasyāḥ |
kathamanyathā lalāṭe yāvakarasatilakapaṅktiriyam || 152 ||’
atra yāvakarasatilakapaṅkte kāryabhūtāyāḥ kāraṇabhūtaṃ pādapatanamanumīyate | tenaitaccheṣaḥ kāryamihāstīti śeṣavaducyate ||
kathamanyatheti | neyamarthāpattiḥ; kiṃtu tathābhūtā nāyakasya lalāṭe 'laktakabinduviśeṣapaṅktiḥ pramadāpadāvapātapratibaddheti | na cālaktakabindupaṅktijñānaṃ tathā svadate yathā vipakṣacaraṇāvanamanānumeyasya jñānaṃ phalabhūtam, tatkila vipakṣagocarāmīrṣyāṃ vyañjayadvipralambhaprakarṣaṃ puṣṇāti ||
yatra na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ kevalamavinābhāvamātraṃ pratīyate tatsāmā- nyato dṛṣṭaṃ yathā—
‘gajjante khe mehā phullā ṇīvā paṇaddiā morā |
ṇaṭṭho candujjoo vāsīranto halā patto || 153 ||’
[garjanti khe meghāḥ phullā nīpāḥ pranartitā mayūrāḥ |
naṣṭaścandroddayoto varṣartuḥ sakhi prāptaḥ ||]
atra varṣarturavinābhūtairmeghagarjitādibhiḥ sāmānyenaivānumīyata iti sāmānyato dṛṣṭamidam | tānyetāni bhāvasādhane 'numānaśabde phalapakṣe udāharaṇāni bhavanti ||
gajjanta iti | atra samasamaye meghagarjitādibhiḥ kālopādhibhiranumānaṃ tena kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | atra hi na pṛthaṅrameghagarjitādijñānaṃ tathā camatkrāramāvahati yathā varṣārātrijñānapratibaddham | sa hi jñātaḥ ketakakarṇapūrādividagdhanepathyaparigrahautsukyaṃ pravāsināyakāgamanautsukyaṃ vā janayatīti phala eva bharaḥ || ﻿
yadā punaḥ karaṇasādhano 'numānaśabdastadānumīyate 'nenetyanumānaśabdena yathoktaṃ liṅgamucyate | yadāha—
‘anumeyena saṃbaddhaṃ prasiddhaṃ ca tadanvite |
tadabhāve ca yannāsti talliṅgamanumāpakam || 154 ||’
anumeyeneti | anumeyena pakṣeṇa tasyaiva sādhyavattayānumeyatvāt | yadāha—‘sa eva cobhayātmāyaṃ gamyo gamaka iṣyate | prasiddhenaikadeśena gamyaḥ siddhena bodhakaḥ ||’ iti | tadanvite sādhyānvite | prasiddhaṃ prakarṣeṇa siddham | vyāpyatayādhigatam | tadabhāve sādhyābhāve | yato 'numāpakaṃ tato liṅgam ||
tatpūrvavati yathā—
‘aï sahi vakkullāviri cchuhihisi gottassa matthae chāram |
accaṃtadattadiṭṭheṇa sāmi valieṇa hasieṇa || 155 ||’
[ayi sakhi vakrālāpaiśchādayiṣyasi gotrasya mastake bhasma |
atyantadattadṛṣṭena sāmi valitena hasitena ||]
atraivaṃprakārayā vakroktyā evaṃvidhena hasitenopalakṣitatvamagrato gotraṃ dūṣayasīti kāraṇato yatra kāryānumānaṃ tadidaṃ sāmagrīpakṣe pūrvavadityucyate ||
pūrvavatīti | pūrvaṃ kāraṇamanumāpakaṃ yasyāsti tatpūrvavalliṅgaṃ tasmin | nanu māpayitavye liṅgajñānaviṣayatayā pūrvaṃ kāraṇamāśrayatīti pūrvavat | so 'yamarthaḥ saptamyā dyotitaḥ | kāraṇata iti | yathāhi vakra ālāpo mugdhāṅganāprakṛtyaucityāgataṃ hasitaṃ dhvananaśaktyā viṣayatayā kāntimarpayati na tathā śabdābhilapitaṃ cāritryakhaṇḍanamiti sāhityamudrāvidāmatiprakāśameva ||
śeṣavati yathā—
‘dīsaï ṇa cūamaülaṃ attā ṇa a vāi malaagandhavaho |
ettaṃ vasantamāso sahi jaṃ utkaṇṭhiaṃ ceam || 156 ||’
[dṛśyate na cūtamukulamadya na ca vāti malayagandhavahaḥ |
eti vasantamāsaḥ sakhi yadutkaṇṭhitaṃ cetaḥ ||]
﻿
atrotkaṇṭhālakṣaṇena kāryeṇa vasantaḥ kāraṇabhūto 'numīyata iti sāmagrīpakṣe idaṃ śeṣavadityucyate ||
ettamiti | cūtamañjarīmalayapavanayoragre samutkaṇṭhitamatra camatkārāspadam | tathāhi | yathā priyasya saṃnidhāsyataḥ saṃbhāvanā lokottarābhimānapratiṣṭhitā bhavati na tathā saṃnidhānamiti sahṛdayasākṣiko 'yamarthaḥ | evaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭodāharaṇe bodhyam ||
sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ yathā—
‘āvirbhavantī prathamaṃ priyāyāḥ socchvāsamantaḥkaraṇaṃ karoti |
nidāghasaṃtaptaśikhaṇḍiyūno vṛṣṭeḥ purastādaciraprabheva || 157 ||’
seyaṃ vidyudiva dṛṣṭiṃ kāmandakyapi prathamata upalabhyamānā avinābhāvena mālatyāgamanaṃ gamayatīti sāmagrīpakṣe sāmānyato dṛṣṭametat ||
yadāptavacanaṃ taddhi jñeyamāgamasaṃjñayā |
uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ cātha jaghanyaṃ ceti tatridhā || 49 ||
yadāptavacanamiti | āpto yathārthaśabdavaktā | uttamaṃ śrutimūlam | ata eva tasyāvaśyānuṣṭheyatvābhidhānam | madhyamamanādilokavyavahāramūlaṃ tadeva nāvaśyānuṣṭheyamityanena prakāśayiṣyate | ubhayavidhābahiḥphalasaṃvādi jaghanyam ||
tatrottamaṃ dvidhā | vidhirūpaṃ niṣedharūpaṃ ca | tayorvidhirūpaṃ yathā—
‘damaṃ dānaṃ dayāṃ śikṣeḥ stanayitnurvadatyasau |
dadadhva iti vāgdaivī dayadhvaṃ datta dāmyata || 158 ||’
atra caiṣā daivī vāganuvadati, yat stanayitnurdadadhva iti dayadhvaṃ datta dāmyateti ‘tadetattrayaṃ śikṣeta damaṃ dānaṃ dayām’ iti śrutestadetadvidhirūpamāptavacanam ||
dadadhva iti | jaladadhvanitanānānādasyānukaraṇaṃ tattritayavyājena jaladharo vadati | dayadhvaṃ datta dāmyateti daivī vāgato damadānadayāḥ kartavyā iti vidhiḥ paryavasyati | buddhīndriyaniyamo damaḥ | dānadaye prasiddhe | mūlabhūtāṃ śrutiṃ darśayati—atra caiṣeti | ﻿
niṣedharūpaṃ yathā—
‘nivāryatāmāli kimapyayaṃ baṭuḥ punarvivakṣuḥ sphuritottarādharaḥ |
na kevalaṃ yo mahato 'pabhāṣate śṛṇoti tasmādapi yaḥ sa pāpabhāk 159’
atrottarārdhoktaniṣedhānuvādavardhitavyutpattervayasyāyā yo 'yamapavadamānabaṭunivāraṇopadeśastasya mahānto nāpabhāṣitavyā iti vākyārthe tātparyādayaṃ niṣedharūpa āgamaḥ | tadetadubhayamapyavaśyānuṣṭheyatvāduttamam ||
nanu 'na kevalaṃ yo mahato 'pabhāṣate' ityādi vartamānāpadeśātkathaṃ vidhitvamata āha—atrottarārdheti | apabhāṣaṇasya nindārthavādena niṣedhavidhiḥ kalpyate, tena mahānto nāpabhāṣitavyā iti vacanavyaktirunnīyata iti ||
madhyamaṃ dvidhā | nirdiṣṭavaktṛkamanirdiṣṭavaktṛkaṃ ca | tayorādyaṃ yathā—
‘kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti mā |
eti jīvantamānando naraṃ varṣaśatādapi || 160 ||’
atra jīvannaraḥ paśyati bhadramityayamevārtho nirdiṣṭavaktṛkastadetatsarvāvākyānāṃ vidhiniṣedhayoḥ paryavasānāt prāṇeṣaṇāyāṃ yatitavyamiti vidhirūpamāptavacanam ||
atra jīvannara iti | eṣā ciraṃtanī lokagāthā | tanmūlatvaṃ ‘eti jīvantam-’ ityāderāgamasya | atrāpi prāgvadeva stutyarthavādena jīvanāya yatitavyamiti vidhiḥ kalpyate | tadidamuktaṃ sarvavākyānāmiti ||
dvitīyaṃ yathā—
‘akṣe vasati piśācaḥ picumande dinapatirvaṭe yakṣaḥ |
viśrāmyati padme śrīstiṣṭhati gaurī madhūkatarau || 161 ||’
tadidamanirdiṣṭavaktṛkamanādilokaprasiddhiparamparāyātamaitihyam | atrāpi sarvavākyānāṃ vidhiniṣedhayoḥ paryavasānāt—‘tasmādakṣaṃ na seveta, picumandaṃ na kṛnteta, vaṭaṃ na chindyāt, padmaṃ na mūrdhni bibhṛyāt, madhūkaṃ ﻿
na padā spṛśet’ ityadhyāhāro bhavati | so 'yaṃ niṣedharūpa āgamaḥ | ubhayamapyetannāvaśyānuṣṭheyamiti maghyamam ||
tadidamanirdiṣṭavaktṛkamiti | etenaitihyamāgama evāntarbhūtamiti darśitam; ajñātavaktṛkasyāgamasyaiva tathā prasiddheriti | atrāpīti | piśācavāsādibhiranuvādaiḥ pūrvavadvidhayaḥ kalpyante ||
jaghanyaṃ dvidhā | kāmyaṃ niṣiddhaṃ ca | tayoḥ kāmyaṃ yathā—
‘muṇḍaïācuṇṇakasāasāhiaṃ pāṇaṇāvaṇaviīṇam |
telaṃ paliatthaṇīṇaṃvi kuṇei pīṇuṇṇae thaṇae || 162 ||’
[muṇḍitikācūrṇakaṣāyasādhitaṃ pānanāvanavitīrṇam |
tailaṃ patitastanīnāmapi karoti pīnonnatau stanau ||]
tadetatpūrvavadvidhirūpaṃ kāmyamāptavacanam ||
muṇḍaïā iti | muṇḍitikā alambusā | kaṣāyaḥ kvātho jalam | nāvanaṃ nasyam | kāmyamiti | pīnonnatastanakāmanāvatībhireva kriyamāṇatvāt ||
niṣiddhaṃ yathā—
‘vayaṃ bālye bālāṃstaruṇimani yūnaḥ pariṇatā- vapīcchāmo vṛddhānpariṇayavidhau naḥ sthitiriyam |
tvayārabdhaṃ janma kṣapayituma1kāṇḍena vidhinā na no gotre putri kvacidapi satīlāñchanamabhūt || 163 ||’
tadetanniṣedharūpaṃ niṣiddhamevāptavacanam | ubhayamapi caitanmūlakāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyetetyādidoṣānnānuṣṭheyamiti jaghanyam ||
tvayārabdhamityādau gaṇikayā satīcāritryavatyā na bhavitavyamiti sphuṭo niṣe- dhavidhirjaghanyatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe—ubhayamapi caitanmūlakāribhiriti ||
sadṛśātsadṛśajñānamupamānaṃ dvidheha tat |
syādekamanubhūte 'rthe 'nanubhūte dvitīyakam || 50 ||
1. 'manenaikapatinā' iti pāṭhaḥ pustakāntare. ﻿
sadṛśāditi | iha mīmāṃsakā varṇayanti | upamānamapi sādṛśyamasaṃnikṛṣṭe 'rthe buddhimutpādayati | asyārthaḥ | sādṛśyaṃ sādṛśyajñānam | jñāyamānasādṛśyamiti yāvat | tadevopamānaṃ kuta ityata āha | asaṃnikṛṣṭe sadṛśāntararūpe 'rthe yato buddhimutpādayati tena bhavati sadṛśātsadṛśapratipattirupamānam | na sadṛśādananubhūtajñānamutpadyate; atiprasaṅgāt | tenedamanubhūtaviṣayameva | naiyāyikānāṃ tu ananubhūtaviṣayamevopamānam | tathāhi—nāgarikeṇa yadā āraṇyakaḥ pṛṣṭa ācaṣṭe ‘yathā gaustathā gavayaḥ’ iti | tadā khalu nāgarikasyātideśavākyārthamanusmarato gāṃ ca sādṛśyapratiyoginaṃ jānato yadgavaye gosādṛśyajñānaṃ tadupamānaṃ pramāṇaṃ; tenāyaṃ gavayaśabdavācya iti saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhajñānaṃ paścādupajanyate sopamitiriti | tatra sadṛśādbuddhau viparivartamānādyatsadṛśajñānaṃ sadṛśe gavaye saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhajñānamityarthaḥ | udāharaṇādikaṃ nigadavyākhyātam ||
tayoranubhūtaviṣayaṃ yathā—
‘sarvaprāṇapravaṇamaghavanmuktamāhatya vakṣa- statsaṃghaṭṭādvighaṭitabṛhatkhaṇḍamuccaṇḍarociḥ |
evaṃ vegātkuliśamakarodvyoma vidyutsahasrai- rbharturvajrajvalanakapiśāste ca roṣāṭṭahāsāḥ || 164 ||’
atra rāmakarākṛṣyamāṇabhagnadhūrjaṭidhanurvimuktajyotiśchaṭāsahasrasaṃkulamākāśaṃ paśyato rāvaṇadūtasyeyaṃ svayaṃ dṛṣṭeṣu prabhuvakṣaḥsthalavidīrṇavajraśakalavisphūrjathuṣu tadroṣāṭṭahāseṣu viyadvyāpiṣu tatsādṛśyabuddhistadidamanubhūtaviṣayaṃ nāmopamānaṃ mīmāṃsakā varṇayanti ||
ananubhūtaviṣayaṃ yathā—
‘tāṃ rohiṇīṃ vijānīhi jyotiṣāmatra maṇḍale |
samūhastārakāṇāṃ yaḥ śakaṭākāramāśritaḥ || 165 ||’
atra yathāvidhaḥ śakaṭākārastathāvidho rohiṇītārakāsamūhākāra ityevamavadhāritāptopadeśasya tadākāratārakācakradarśanādidaṃ tadrohiṇīśa-﻿
kaṭamiti yeyaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhapratipattistadidamananubhūtaviṣayamupamānaṃ naiyāyikāḥ samunnayanti ||
tadābhūtārthavijñānajanakatvena hetunā |
nāsmādabhinayālekhyamudrābimbādayaḥ pṛthak || 51 ||
teṣvabhinayo yathā—
‘vaïvivaraṇiggaadalo eraṇḍo sāhaï vva taruṇāṇam |
ettha ghare haliavahū eddahamettatthaṇī vasaï || 166 ||’
[vṛtivivaranirgatadala eraṇḍaḥ sādhayatīva taruṇebhyaḥ |
atra gṛhe halikavadhūretāvanmātrastanī vasati ||]
atra payodharātipariṇāhasūcakottānaprasāritāṅgulihastābhinayasaṃnibhairaṇḍadalasaṃniveśanātkhayamuddiṣṭe 'pi hālikavadhūstanapariṇāhe pūrvānubhūtaivaṃvidhastanapariṇāhasaṃbandhapratipattistadidamanubhūtārthaviṣayamupamānamevābhinaya ityutprekṣyate ||
vaïvivareti | grāmataruṇairananyabaddhāntaḥkaraṇairhālikavadhūstanābhogo musalollāsanādau vāraṃvāramanubhūtaḥ sa tulyākāradhṛtavivaraprasūnairaṇḍadaladarśanādeva buddhimārohatīti sā buddhirmīmāṃsakopamitimadhyamadhyāste | kathameraṇḍadalasaṃniveśasyābhineyatā | anukāro hyabhinayaḥ | na cāsau tatra saṃbhavati | ata āha—hastābhinayasaṃnibheti | uttānaprasāritāṅgulihastasaṃniveśena vastvantarapariṇāhapratibimbanaṃ lokaprasiddhaṃ tadihāpyeraṇḍadalavistāradarśanāttadantaritameva jāyata ityarthaḥ ||
ālekhyaṃ yathā—
‘tavālekhye kautūhalataralatanvīviracite vidhāyaikā cakraṃ racayati suparṇāsutamadhaḥ |
atha svidyatpāṇistvaritamapamṛjyaitadaparā kare pauṣpaṃ cāpaṃ makaramupariṣṭācca likhati || 167 ||’
﻿
atra yadānubhūtanāyakasaṃdarśanāyāstadrūpālekhyapradarśanādevaṃbhūtaḥ sa iti vijñānamutpadyate, gopanārthaṃ ca tathābhūtayoreva devakulādidṛṣṭaviṣṇukāmayoḥ pratītirbhavati, tadaitadanubhūtārthaviṣayaṃ bhavati | yadā punarananubhūtanāyakādisaṃdarśanāyā itthamāptopadeśaḥ | evaṃbhūtaḥ suparṇaketuścakrapāṇirviṣṇurbhavati, evaṃbhūto makaradhvajaḥ puṣpacāpaḥ kāmo bhavati, yādṛśāvimau tādṛśaśca te manorathabhūmiḥ; kevalamasya garutmadādayo na vidyante | tadā taduttarakālamālekhyagatatadākāradarśanāt so 'yaṃ mama preyāniti madvidhayā kayāpi likhito bhaviṣyatīti tadgopāyāmyenaṃ viṣṇucihnābhyāmiti garutmaccakre adhaḥpradeśahastayoḥ ketuhastayorniveśayati | athāparā pratividhitsurgopāyantī prakāśayantī ca pratyāsannopamānaṃ manmathākāramācikhyāsuḥ kare pauṣpaṃ cāpaṃ makaramupariṣṭācca likhati | atrākṛtau padārthe yā imāstayorlokānāṃ so 'yamiti viṣṇuriti kāma iti ca saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhapratipattayastadidamanubhūtārthaviṣayamupamānamālekhyamākhyāyate ||
tavālekhya iti | tadaprāptikarśitā citrapratimādinā parinodanena kathaṃcidātmānaṃ dhārayatīti tanvīpadena dhvanyate | na ca jīvitamātrārthinī sā kiṃtu tvadākṛtidarśanakutūhalenodvignā satī nigūḍhamapyabhiprāyamālekhyanirmāṇena vyanaktīti kautūhalataraṃlapadābhyāṃ vyajyate | eketi | yā rādhādipraṇayapātraṃ vaśīkṛtatribhuvanamājānasukumāraṃ devakīnandanamāgameṣu bahudhāśrauṣīt | atheti | sā niryantraṇaprārthanīyatāvirodhinaṃ devatābhāvamanusaṃdhatte, tayā trailokyātiśāyisaubhāgyaprakarṣasya puṣpeṣościhnabhūtau cāpamakarau likhitāviti, atha svidyatpāṇistvaritamityetervyajyate | atrodāharaṇe dvividhamapyupamānaṃ darśayati | tatra mīmāṃsakapakṣe tāvattanvyālekhyamunmṛditaṃ dṛṣṭvā kācidanubhūtapūrvaṃ nāyakaṃ jānāti | sādṛśyāviśeṣācca kṛṣṇakāmāvapi pratyeti tadā sadṛśātpratiyattirupamānaṃ bhavati | naiyāyikapakṣe yadā sāmānyato nāyakāgame utpannapūrvānurāgāyā viśeṣataśca pratyaṅgalāvaṇyamajānantyā itthaṃbhūtākārau kṛṣṇa kāmau yādṛśau tādṛśastava preyānityāptopadeśaśnabaṇānantaraṃ gṛhīta-
citrākārāyāstattacchabdābhidheyatāpratipattirupamānamiti | kathaṃ citre kāmādipadaprayoga ityita āha—ākṛtāviti | rekhoparekhādisaṃniveśe citraturaganyāyeneti bhāvaḥ ||
mudrā yathā—
‘sacakitamiva vismayākulābhiḥ śucisikatāsvatimānuṣāṇi tābhiḥ |
kṣitiṣu dadṛśire padāni jiṣṇorupahitaketurathāṅgalāñchanāni || 168 ||’
atra cakradhvajāṅkitajiṣṇupādamudrādarśanātseyamamānuṣī pādamudrā bhavatīti saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhapratipattistadidamananubhūtārthaviṣayamupamānameva mudretyucyate | yadapi cādṛṣṭe 'pi jiṣṇupade mṛgīdṛśāmīdṛśaḥ sa ityanumānajñānaṃ tadapyupamānārthanibandhanameva | yadāha—
‘api cāstyanumāne 'pi sādṛśyaṃ liṅgaliṅginoḥ |
padena yatra kubjena kubjapādo 'numīyate || 169 ||’
sacakiteti | nanu caraṇamudrayā jiṣṇucaraṇānumānamatra pratibhāti tatkathamupamāne 'ntarbhāva ityata āha—yadapi ceti | atrāviśeṣasya caraṇaviśeṣapratibandhe satyapi sadṛśātsadṛśajñānamutpannaṃ [tkaṭaṃ] tādṛśena ca vyapadeśo bhavatītyarthaḥ | etadeva dārvācāryasaṃmatyā draḍhayati—api ceti |
pratibimbaṃ yathā—
‘darpaṇe ca paribhogadarśinī pṛṣṭhataḥ praṇayino niṣeduṣaḥ |
vīkṣya bimbamanubimbamātmanaḥ kāni kānyapi cakāra lajjayā || 170 ||’
atra yadā tāvadevaṃ saṃbandhagrahaḥ kīdṛśaṃ svaṃ mukhaṃ yādṛśamādarśe pratibimbaṃ tadālokanādadṛṣṭe 'pi svamukhe yeyamīdṛśaṃ me mukhamiti pratipattistadidamanubhūtārthaviṣayam | yadā punaritthamāptopadeśādyādṛśaṃ vastu tādṛśamādarśādau pratibimbaṃ tadāpi priyapratibimbālokanādidaṃ tanmama priyapratibimbamitīyaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhapratipattistadapyananubhūtārthaviṣa-﻿
yam | yadā tu citrādiṣvanubhūtasvamukhadarśanāyāḥ pratibimbadarśanādanena sadṛśaṃ me mukhamiti pratipattirdṛṣṭapriyatamākārāyāśca pratibimbākāradarśanādetadākāro mama preyāniti pratipattiḥ pratibimbasaṃnidhau pratibimbodayo dṛṣṭastadiha saṃnihitena tena bhavitavyamiti yo vrīḍāvikārabhūtastadānubhūtaviṣayametadupamānaṃ pratibimbamityācakṣate ||
pratibimbasaṃnidhāviti | prasaṅgādyadarthamanumānaṃ vyākhyātaṃ taddarśayati—vrīḍāvikāra iti | ataeva pradhānamātrasyopasaṃhāraḥ ||
‘pratyakṣādipratīto 'rtho yastathā nopapadyate |
arthāntaraṃ ca gamayatyarthāpattiṃ vadanti tām || 52 ||’
arthāpattiṃ lakṣayati—pratyakṣādīti | pramāṇapratītasyārthasyānyathākaraṇānupapattijñānena prasūtaṃ jñānamarthāpattiḥ | anupapadyamānārthapratyāyakaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣādibhedāt ṣaṭprakāram | tatastatpūrvārthāpattirapi ṣọdhā saṃpadyate, yadarthāntaraṃ gamayati tāmarthāpattiṃ vadantīti | arthāntaragatirevārthāpattiriti vyaktam ||
sarvapramāṇapūrvatvādekaśo 'nekaśaśca sā |
pratyakṣapūrviketyādibhedaiḥ ṣọdhā nigadyate || 53 ||
ekaśa iti | ekaśa ekapramāṇapūrvā | anekaśo 'nekapramāṇapūrvā | kathaṃ tarhi ṣọdhā | ata uktam—pratyakṣapūrviketyādibhedairiti | vyākhyātametat ||
tāsvekaśaḥ pratyakṣapūrvikā yathā—
‘nirṇetuṃ śakyamastīti madhyaṃ tava nitambini |
anyathānupapattyaiva payodharabharasthiteḥ || 171 ||’
atra stanabharanitambayormadhyaṃ nopalabhyate, stanabharāvasthānaṃ ca dṛśyate, tatra yeyaṃ payodharabharasthitiḥ sānyathānupapadyamānā dhārakaṃ madhyamanupalabhyamānaṃ bodhayati | seyaṃ pratyakṣapūrvikārthāpattirekaśa eveha vivakṣitā | iyamapi hyevaṃ bahuśo bhavati yattadarthāpattilabdhaṃ madhyaṃ tadapi ﻿
dhāraṇaśaktimantareṇa tatkarmāsamarthamiti tasyapi śaktiḥ kalpyate | seyamarthāpattipūrvikārthāpattiḥ | yaścāyamarthāpattivikalpasya madhyasyopalambhābhāvaḥ so 'pi prakārantareṇāsaṃbhavan kāntikārśyayorutkarṣaṃ brūte | sā ceyamabhāvapūrvikānupapattirbhavati | na caitadiha śābdamapi tu vākyārtha- sāmarthyādgamyate ||
atra stanabhareti | stanabharasthitiḥ pratyakṣagṛhītā sā cādhāramantareṇānupapadyamānā madhyaṃ kalpayati | sā ca kalpanārthāpattiḥ | anupalabhyamānamiti | anyathā pratyakṣagṛhīte 'rthe kimarthāpattyā | atraivodāharaṇe 'nekaśo vyākhyātuṃ śakyata ityāha—iyamapīti | śaktirmīmāṃsakanaye nityātīndriyā, abhāvo 'bhāvenaiva gṛhyata iti madhyānupalambho 'bhāvapramāṇapūrvakaḥ | kāntīti | adbhutaprabhāvatiraskṛtaṃ hi nayanamāsannamapi na madhyagrahaṇasamarthamiti bhāvaḥ ||
pratyakṣādipūrvikā anekaśaḥ yathā—
‘etadālokya lolākṣi rūpamapratimaṃ tava |
kalpayāmaḥ kalātattvagurutāmādivedhasaḥ || 172 ||’
tatredaṃ rūpamapratimaṃ taveti pratyakṣapūrvatā abhāvapūrvatā ca vyaktameva pratīyate | teneyamanekaśaḥ | atrāpi yeyaṃ rūpasyāpratimatānyathānupapadyamānā kalātattvaguruvinirmitatvamātmano 'vasthāpayati sorvaśyahalyādirūpopamānajñānapūrvikā, yā tatkarturarthāpattikalpitā kālātattvagurutā sāpi tathāvidhaśaktikalpanāpūrviketyupamānapūrvikārthāpāttipūrvikā ceyamarthāpattiḥ | sāpi tatkarturvedhasaḥ kalātattvagurutā tathābhūtaśaktyādhāratā vā, sāpyanumānata āgamato vājñasya kalpyata ityanumānapūrvikā ceyamarthāpattiḥ | na caitaccatuṣṭayamihāpi śābdamapi tu vākyārthasāmarthyādgamyate ||
apratimamiti | pratimāśūnyaṃ rūpaṃ viśiṣṭameva tatra viśeṣaṇāṃśe 'bhāvasya vyāpāraḥ, viśeṣyāṃśe pratyakṣasya | pūrvavadihāpi vyākhyānamāha—atrāpīti | pratimābhāvajñānaṃ pratimājñānapūrvakama, pratimā ca sādṛśyaṃ, tacca sahaśabdadvayadarśanavedyāmityasti pūrvamupamānam || ﻿
ekaśo 'numānapūrvikā yathā—
‘kapolapulakenāsyaḥ sūcito madanajvaraḥ |
mano nirantarāsaktaṃ sakhyaḥ kathayati priye || 173 ||’
atra yo 'yaṃ kapolapulakānumīyamāno manobhavajvaraḥ sa manasaḥ priye nirantarāsaktimantareṇānupapanna ityanumānapūrvikeyamarthāpattiḥ ||
anekaśa upamānādipūrvikā yathā—
‘tvadāsyendū samau dṛṣṭvā tadidaṃ kalpayāmahe |
anyonyagāmilāvaṇyamanayoreva kevalam || 174 ||’
atra tvadāsyendū samau dṛṣṭvetyupamānapūrvakatā arthāpatteḥ pratyakṣapūrvatā ca śabdata eva pratīyate | yā ca mithaḥ sādṛśyānupapattilabhyā lāvaṇyānyonyagāmitā sāpi tathāvidhaṃ vidhātāramantareṇa na saṃgacchata ityādīhāpi pūrvavadvākyārthasāmarthyato 'vagantavyam ||
ekaśo 'bhāvapūrvā yathā—
‘etadāsyaṃ vinā hāsyaṃ nivedayati subhruvaḥ |
priyāparādhadaṇḍanāṃ mano bhājanatāṃ gatam || 175 ||’
atra subhruva ityanena vilāsavatyāḥsamastapraśastalakṣaṇayogo lakṣyate | tathāvidhāyāśca vakravilāsahāsasyābhāvo 'nupapadyamānaḥ śokavyatiriktamātmakāraṇaṃ kalpayatītyabhāvapūrvikeyamarśapattiḥ ||
hāsyabhāvasyānyathāpyupapatteḥ kathamarthāpattirityata āha—atra subhruva iti ||
anekaśo 'rthāpattyādipūrvikā yathā—
‘dṛṣṭvā vibhramiṇīmetāṃ vidmo līlāguruṃ smaram |
smaraṃ ca mṛgaśāvākṣyā manasyasyāḥ kṛtāspadam || 176 ||’
atra vibhramiṇīmiti praśaṃsāyāṃ matvarthīyastena vibhramāṇāmutkarṣo ﻿
lakṣyate | te cānyopadeśādasaṃbhavanto manmathamupādhyāyaṃ bodhayanti | tasyāgrataḥ pārśvato vānupalabhyamānasya tanmanasyavasthānaṃ lakṣyate | seyamādyā pratyakṣapūrvikā dvitīyā cārthāpattipūrvikārthāpattirbhavati | iyameva ca manobhūrmanasi kāminīnāṃ saṃbhavatītyāptopadeśādāgamapūrvikāpi bhavati ||
itthamevānyathopapattimāśaṅkyāgre vyācaṣṭe—atra vibhramiṇīmiti | matva- rthīyārthamāha—praśaṃsāyamiti ||
asattā yā padārthānāmabhāvaḥ so 'bhidhīyate |
prāgabhāvādibhedena sa ṣaḍ‍‌vidha iheṣyate || 54 ||
abhāvaṃ lakṣayati—asatteti | prāgasattvamuttarāsattvamityasattārūpeṇaiva prāgabhāvādayo vyavatiṣṭhante itaretarābhāve 'pyanyarūpatayānyasyābhāva ityasattātmakatvam | prāgabhāvādayaḥ pūrvoditāścatvāraḥ | atyantābhāvaviśeṣasāmānyābhāvābhyāṃ saha ṣaḍabhāvāḥ | tayorviśeṣamagre vakṣyāmaḥ ||
teṣu prāgabhāvo yathā—
‘saggaṃ apārijāaṃ kotthuhalacchīvirahiaṃ mahumahaassa uram |
sumarāmi mahaṇapurao amuddhacandaṃ ca haraaḍāpabbhāram || 177 ||’
[svargamapārijātaṃ kaustubhalakṣmīvirahitaṃ madhumathanasyoraḥ |
smarāmi mathanapurato 'mugdhacandraṃ ca harajaṭāprāgbhāram ||]
saggaṃ apārijāamiti | nigadavyākhyātaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ | yathā abhāvapūrvikāyāmarthāpattau karaṇaṃ bhedānumānamuktaṃ tathātrāpi boddhavyam | pārijātaprāgabhāvasya prameyarūpatā vyaktaiva | abhāvo 'bhāvenaiva pratīyata iti | darśane tatkaraṇatayā śabdā nupātto 'pi yogyapramāṇabhāvo 'vagamyate | evamuttareṣvapi svayamūhanīyam ||
pradhvaṃsābhāvo yathā—
‘dhṛtirastamitā gatiścyutā vigataṃ geyamṛturnirutsavaḥ |
gatamābharaṇaprayojanaṃ pariśūnyaṃ śayanīyamadya me || 178 ||’
﻿
itaretarābhāvo yathā—
‘karṇotpalaṃ na cakṣuste na cakṣuḥ śravaṇotpalam |
iti jānannapi jano manyate netradīrghatām || 179 ||’
atyantābhāvo yathā—
‘jaṃ jassa hoi sāraṃ taṃ so daïtti kimattha accheram |
aṇahottaṃ vi hu diṇṇaṃ taï dohaggaṃ savattīṇam || 180 ||’
[yadyasya bhavati sāraṃ taṃ sa dadāti kimatrāścaryam |
abhavadapi khalu dattaṃ tayā daurbhāgyaṃ sapatnīnām ||]
anye punaranyathā atyantābhāvamācakṣate | yatā—
‘prasīda sadyo muñcemaṃ caṇḍi mānaṃ manogatam |
dṛṣṭamātre 'pi te tatra roṣaḥ khakusumāyate || 181 ||’
sthānāntarapramitasya sthānāntare traikāliko 'bhāvaviśeṣo 'tyantābhāva iti darśanamāśritya catuṣṭayamadhyapātī tāvadatyantābhāva udāhṛtaḥ | idānīṃ pañcamābhāvocitaviśeṣamatyantābhāvaṃ darśayati—anye punariti | anye saugatādayaḥ | atyantāsatpratiyogiko 'bhāvo 'tyantābhāvaḥ | yathā khapuṣpasyābhāva ityudāharaṇaṃ sphuṭam ||
sāmarthyābhāvo yathā—
‘mānuṣīṣu kathaṃ vā syādasya rūpasya saṃbhavaḥ |
na prabhātaralaṃ jyotirudeti vasudhātale || 182 ||’
ta ete ṣaḍapi nigadaireva vyākhyātāḥ ||
sāmarthyābhāvo yogyatābhāvaḥ | anenaiva rūpeṇa sa rasatāmāsādayannupāttaḥ ||
abhāvābhāvo 'pyabhāva eva | tatra prāgabhāvapradhvaṃso yathā—
‘udyānasahakārāṇāmanudbhinnā na mañjarī |
deyaḥ pathikanārīṇāṃ satilaḥ salilāñcāliḥ || 183 ||’
abhāva eveti | abhāvavyavahārapātrameva tathābhūtasyaiva lakṣaṇamityuktaṃ purastāt || ﻿
pradhvaṃsaprāgabhāvo yathā—
'na martyalokastridivātprahīyate mriyeta nāgre yadi valabho janaḥ |
pradhvaṃsadhvaṃso yathā—
nivṛttameva tridivaprayojanaṃ mṛtaḥ sa cejjīvita eva jīvati || 184 ||’
vallabhajanamaraṇaṃ pradhvaṃsaḥ sa nañā niṣidhyate sa tu niṣedhaḥ prāgasattvarūpa eva | mṛtaḥ sa cediti maraṇottaramabhāvo bhavatpradhvaṃso bhavati sa cāsaṃbhavannapiśabdena saṃbhāvyamānaḥ kāntikāraṇaṃ bhavatītyalaṃkārakakṣāmārohati ||
pradhvaṃsaprāgabhāvapradhvaṃso yathā—
‘nāmilitamasti kiṃcitkāñcīdeśasya sarvathā nātha |
prasaratu karastavāyaṃ prakṛtikṛśe madhyadeśe 'pi || 185 ||’
pradhvaṃsaprāgabhāvapradhvaṃsa iti | maraṇena pradhvaṃsanaṃ tasyābhāvaḥ samastena na jātasyāpyabhāvo bhinnena pratipāditaḥ ||
pradhvaṃsasya pradhvaṃsābhāvo yathā—
‘eṣā pravāsaṃ kathamapyatītya yātā punaḥ saṃśayamanyathaiva |
ko nāma pākābhimukhasya jantordvārāṇi daivānyapidhātumīṣṭe || 186 ||’
pradhvaṃsasya pradhvaṃsāmāva iti | kathamapītyanena pravāse daśamyavasthā kaṭākṣitā tasyātyayaḥ pradhvaṃsapradhvaṃsaḥ | punaḥ saṃgamamityanena tasyāpi pradhvaṃsaḥ | subodhamanyat ||
itaretarābhāvābhāvo yathā—
‘śāsane 'pi guruṇi vyavasthitaṃ kṛtyavastuni niyuṅkṣva kāmataḥ |
tvatprayojanadhanaṃ dhanaṃjayādanya eṣa iti māṃ ca māvagāḥ || 187 ||’
atyantābhāvasya sāmarthyābhāvasya ca pradhvaṃsābhāvo yathā—
‘anāptapuṇyopacayairdurāpā phalasya nirdhūtarajāḥ savitrī |
tulyā bhavaddarśanasaṃpadeṣā vṛṣṭerdivo vītabalāhakāyaḥ || 188 ||’
ete nātidurbodhā iti na vyākṛtāḥ || ﻿
