vālītyādi | ‘bālī(lā) bhumbhurabholī(?) skhalitanivasanā grahaṇakaṃ śrutvā viniṣkāntā nidrayā bhembhalī(jaḍā) | rāhurapi tasyā mukhaṃ vilokate punarvilokate gagane bhrānto na khalu jānāti dvayoścandraḥ kaḥ ||’ iha bālikā bhumbhurabholī ajñā | ﻿
ullasitaṃ skhalitaṃ nitambopari nivasanaṃ yasyāḥ sā | uparīti yogyatayā vaktavyam | ni drayā bhembhalī vihvalā grahaṇaṃ candroparāgaṃ śrutvā viniṣkrāntā | arthāt gṛhāt | rahurapi tasyā mukhaṃ vilokate punarvilokate | gagane bhrāntaḥ saṃśayānaḥ san naiva jānāti kāntāmukhacandrayordvayormadhye kaścandra iti | khalu evārthe | atra saṃśayaśuddhatānyāmiśraṇena ||
abhidhīyamānasādṛśyo miśro yathā—
‘dvāvapyetāvabhinavajapāpuṣpabhāsāṃ nivāsau tiṣṭhatyante dvayamapi viyanmaṇḍalasyopasaṃdhyam |
astaṃ ko yātyudayati ca kaḥ ko raviḥ kaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ kā ca prācī tadiha na vayaṃ kā pratīcīti vidmaḥ || 76 ||’
atra dvayorabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ sūryācandramasoḥ prācīpratīcyorvā tadanyatamamekameva vastu paryāyato viśaṅkyata ityanekaviṣayo 'yaṃ miśraḥ saṃśayaḥ | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tena vitarkoktyādayo 'pi saṃśayoktāveva draṣṭavyāḥ ||
dvāvityādi | dvāvapyetau raviśaśaṅkau navīnajapākusumadīptīnāmāśrayau staḥ | upasaṃdhyaṃ saṃdhyāsamīpe dvayamapi ravicandrarūpaṃ viyanmaṇḍalasyākāśamaṇḍalasyānte 'vasāne tiṣṭhati | tadiha ko 'staṃ yāti, ko vodayati | kaḥ sūryaḥ, kaścandraḥ, kā prācī pūrvā dik, kā pratīcī paścimā digiti na vayaṃ vidmaḥ | atra raktarūpatayā gaganāntagamanena cābhidhīyamānaṃ sādṛśyam | anekaviṣayatayaiva miśratā | tarhi vitarkoktiḥ pṛthak kathaṃ noktetyata āha—upalakṣaṇamiti | saṃśayoktāvevāntarbhāvānna pṛthaguktā setyarthaḥ ||
tad yathā—
‘sarojapatre ‘nu vilīna’parilīnaṣaṭpade viśāladṛṣṭeḥ‘viloladṛṣṭeḥ’ svidamū vilocane |
śiroruhāḥ svinnatapakṣmasaṃtaterdvirephavṛndaṃ nu niśabdaniścalam || 77 ||’
‘agūḍhahāsasphuṭantakeśaraṃ mukhaṃ svidetadvikacaṃ‘vikasannu’ iti ca pāṭhāntarāṇi nu paṅkajam |
iti pralīnāṃ nalinīvane sakhī vidāmbabhūvuḥ sucireṇa yoṣitaḥ ||’
(yug‍mam) ﻿
sarojetyādi | nilīnāḥ saṃbaddhāḥ ṣaṭpadā bhramarā yayoste padmapatre nu | ime viśāladṛṣṭernāyikāyā amū netre | svit | vitarke | śiroruhāḥ keśāḥ svit | natā pakṣmasaṃtatiryasya tat | niśabdaṃ śabdaśūnyaṃ niścalaṃ sthiraṃ ca bhramaravṛndaṃ nu || agụ̄dhetyādi | etanmukhaṃ svit | kīdṛśam | agụ̄dhena prakāśena hāsena sphuṭo vyakto danta eva kesaro yatra tat | etadvikacaṃ praphullaṃ paṅkajaṃ nu | ityanena prakāreṇa nalinīvane padminīmadhye pralīnāmavasthitāṃ sakhīṃ yoṣitaḥ sriyo bahukālena vidāmbabhūvurjñātavatyaḥ | vidāmbabhūvurityatra ‘uṣavida 3|1|38’ iti liṭyām ||
yathā ca—
‘muhe maakhaliullāve ṇhāṇollae ciure veṇīaṃsaṇasāre samottiahāre ure |
kālāntare taralācchihumaaṇa samullasaï māhaü puma tthaṇaguḍare ṇa muṇaï kahiṃ vasaï || 79 ||’
[mukhe madaskhalitollape srānoptlute cikure veṇīnivasanasāre samauktikahare urasi |
kālāntare taralākṣṇormadanaḥ samullasati māghe punaḥ stanagṛhe na jñāyate kutra vasati ||]
kaḥ punarvitarkasaṃśayayorviśeṣaḥ | ucyate | nirṇayāsanno vitarkaḥ, vitarkāsannaśca saṃśayaḥ | saṃśayāno hi vitarkasya koṭimāruhya tato vibhraṣṭastattvamabhiniviśate | yathā pūrvavākye vidāmbabhūvuriti | saṃśayameva vā vigāhate yathā—'māhaü puṇa tthaṇaguḍare ṇa muṇaï kahiṃ vasaï |’ iti | śabdāśca kiṃsvidādayastulyarūpā eva saṃśayaviparyayayoriti duravabodhastadviśeṣaḥ | nanvevaṃ vitarkādayo 'pyubhayālaṃkārāḥ syuḥ | styam | kiṃtūktipakṣe parārthānumānavat, svarūpapakṣe svārthānumānavaditi | ayameva coktiśabdasyārthaḥ, tena svarūpamātroktau saṃśayavitarkādayo 'pyarthālaṃkārāḥ | uktiprādhānye tūbhayālaṃkārāḥ || ﻿
muhe ityādi | ‘mukhe madaskhalitollape srānārdre cikure veṇīnivasanasāre samuktāhāre urasi | kālāntare taralākṣṇi madanaḥ samullasati māghe punaḥ stanagṛhe na jñāyate kutra vasati ||’ iha kālāntare māghātiriktakāle madaskhalitollāpe mukhe srānārdre keśe veṇīnivasanena kañcukavasreṇa sāre muktāhārasahite vakṣasi taralanetre ca madanaḥ kāmaḥ samullasati dīpyate | māghe punaḥ stana eva gṛhaṃ tatra na jñāyate kutra vasatīti | ubhayatra viruddhakoṭidvayaviṣayatayaikāmāśaṅkya pṛcchati—ka iti | nirṇayāsanno nirṇayāvyavahitapūrvaḥ, vitarkānantaraṃ nirṇayāt | vitarkāsanno vitarkāvyavahitapūrvaḥ | saṃśayānantaraṃ vitarkāt | etadevāha—saṃśayeti | saṃśayāno vitarkakoṭyavalambī vitarkānantaramuktameva jānāti | ata eva vidāmbabhūvuriti saṃśaya uktaḥ | tathā māhahu ityādāvapi śabdakārito 'nayorbheda ityāha—śabdāśceti | tarhyubhayālaṃkāratā vitarkādīnāmityāśaṅkya samādhatte—uktīti | yathā parārthānumāne śabdaprayogakārito viśeṣastathā śabdapakṣe svarūpamarthastatpakṣe svārthānumānavatpravṛttiḥ | sāmyoktādāvuktiśabdasyāyamevārtho yaduktinibandhanaṃ nāma | tathā ca svarūpamātrasyoktau nirvacane 'rthālaṃkāratā saṃśayatarkāderuktiprādhānye punarubhayālaṃkārateti || iti saṃśayoktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
apahnutyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
apahnutilakṣaṇamāha—
apahnutirapahnutya kiṃcidanyārthadarśanam |
aupamyavatyanaupamyā ceti sā dvividhocyate || 41 ||
vācye pratīyamāne ca sādṛśye prathamā tayoḥ |
tathābhūte dvitīyā syādapahnotavyavastuni || 42 ||
anaupamyavatī bhūyaḥ pūrvāpūrvā ca kathyate |
tāsāmudāhṛtiṣveva rūpamāvirbhaviṣyati || 43 ||
apahnutiriti | kiṃcitprasiddhaṃ dharmiṇaṃ dharmaṃ vāpahnutyāpalapyānyasyārthaṃsya prasiddhasya dharmāderdarśanaṃ prakaṭanamapahnutiḥ | na cāsyā ākṣepādabheda iti vācyam | tatra hi pratiṣedhamātramartho 'tra tu pratiṣedhapūrvakamanyārthakathanamiti bhedaḥ | aupamyamupamā tadvatīti vācye 'bhidhīyamāne | apahnotavyavastunyapahnutiviṣayapadārthe ||
﻿
tatrābhidhīyamānaupamyavatī yathā—
‘gimhe davaggimasimaïliāiṃ dīsanti vijjhasiharāiṃ |
āsasu paütthavaïe ṇa honti ṇavapāusabbhāiṃ || 80 ||’
[grīṣme dāvāgnimasīmalināni dṛśyante vindhyaśikharāṇi |
āśvasihi proṣitapati ke na bhavanti navaprāvṛḍabhrāṇi ||]
atra navaprāvṛḍabhrāṇāṃ vindhyaśikharairabhidhīyamānasādṛśyairapahnutatvādabhidhīyamānaupamyavatyapahnutiḥ ||
gimhe ityādi | ‘grīṣme dāvāgnimasīmalinitāni dṛśyante vindhyaśikharāṇi | āśvasihi proṣitapatike na bhavanti navaprāvṛḍabhrāṇi ||’ iha virahiṇī dāvāgninā digdhe vindhye meghabhrāntyā ārtā sakhyā samāśvāsyate—grīṣma iti | he virahiṇi, vindhyaśikharāṇi grīṣme vanāgninā śyāmitāni dṛśyante | natu nūtanavarṣākālīna(lika)meghā amī bhavantīti samāśvāsaṃ kuru | atra śyāmikayā vindhyaśikharanavame ghayoḥ sāmyamabhihitamata aupamyavatīyam ||
pratīyamānaupamyavatī yathā—
‘na ketakīnāṃ vilasanti sūcayaḥ pravāsino hanta hasatyayaṃ vidhiḥ |
taḍillateyaṃ na cakāsti cañcalā puraḥ smarajyotiridaṃ vijṛmbhate 81’
atra ketakīsūcīnāṃ vidhivihasitaiḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyaistaḍillatāyāśca smarajyotiṣāpahnutatvādiyaṃ pratīyamānaupamyavatyapahnutiḥ ||
netyādi | ketakīnāṃ sūcayo 'grāṇi na vilasanti śobhante | hanta viṣāde | ayaṃ vidhiḥ sraṣṭā pravāsinaḥ pānthān hasatyupahasati | ketakīsūcīrūpeṇa | iyaṃ cañcalā capalā taḍillatā na śobhate | puro 'gre iyaṃ smaradīptiṃrvijṛmbhate prakāśate | 'sūcyagre sīmanadravye’ iti viśvaḥ | atra kiṃcitprakāśena ketakīsūcīvidhihasitayoḥ sāmyapratītirevamitaratra | aupamyamapyubhayatra vyaktameva ||
anaupamyābhidhīyamānāpahnotavyavastuḥ pūrvā yathā—
‘rājakanyānuraktaṃ māṃ romodbhedena rakṣakāḥ |
avagaccheyurāṃ jñātamaho śītānīlaṃ vanam || 82 ||’
atra rājakanyānurāgalakṣaṇasya romāñcakāraṇasya rakṣakāvagatihetoḥ ﻿
pūrvamevābhihitasya ca vanānilaśaityalakṣaṇena kāraṇāntareṇāpahnavaḥ | na caitayoḥ sādṛśyamasti seyamanaupamyābhidhīyamānāpahnotavyavastuḥ | kāryātpūrvaṃ kāraṇopanyāsena pūrvetyucyate |
rājetyādi | romodbhedena romāñcena rājakanyānuraktaṃ bhūpakanyānurāgiṇaṃ māṃ rakṣakāstadavekṣakā avagaccheyurjñāyeran | āṃ smaraṇe, jñātam | aho vanaṃ śītalānilam | ato romāñcaḥ | ‘āṃ jñānaniścayasmṛtyoḥ’ iti medinīkāraḥ | atra pūrvābhidhānena pūrvatvamubhayorasādṛśyādanaupamyatā ||
saivāpūrvā yathā—
‘ānandāśru pravṛttaṃ me kathaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva kanyakām |
akṣi me puṣparajasā vātoddhūtena pūritam || 83 ||’
atrānandāśrupravṛttamiti pūrvaṃ kāryasya, paścāt dṛṣṭvaiva kanyakāmiti kāraṇasyopanyāsaḥ | śeṣaṃ pūrvavat | seyamabhidhīyamānāpahnotavyavasturanaupamyāpahnutirapūrvetyucyate |
ānandetyādi | kanyakāmeva dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ mamānandāśru pravṛttamasti | vātodbhūtena rajasā vāyucālitadhūlyā mamākṣi pūritam | śeṣamapahnavādikaṃ pūrvavatpūrvāpahnutivat | abhidhānamanaupamyamapi pūrvavadeva pūrvaṃ kāraṇānupanyāsenāpūrvatvam ||
anaupamyaiva pratīyamānāpahnotavyavastuḥ pūrvā yathā—
‘urapelliavaïkārillaāiṃ uccesi daïavacchalie |
kaṇṭaavilihiapīṇuṇṇaatthaṇi uttammasu ettāhe || 84 ||’
[uraḥpreritavṛtikāravellīphalānyuccinoṣi dayitavatsale |
kaṇṭakavilikhitapīnonnatastani uttāmyedānīm ||]
atra naitasyāḥ stanayorupapatinā nakhakṣataṃ kṛtamapi tu kaṇṭakairiti pratīyamānāpahnotavyaṃ vastu prakāśate | pūrvavadeva ca pūrvārdhe kāraṇasyopanyāsaḥ, paścimārghe tu kāryopadeśo dṛśyate | seyamanaupamyā pratīyamānāpahnotavyavastuḥ pūrvā nāma—‘apahnutirapahnutya kiṃcidanyārthadarśanam’ iti lakṣaṇayogājjāyate | ﻿
ura ityādi | ‘uraḥpreritavṛtikāravellīphalānyuccinoṣi dayitavatsale | kaṇṭakavilikhitapīnonnatastani tāmya idānīm ||’ iha he dayitavatsale priyapremavati kaṇṭakalikhitapīnonnatastani, idānīṃ tāmyodvignā bhava | kiṃ kṛtvā | urasā vakṣasā preritā yā vṛtirveṣṭanaṃ tatra kāravellīphalāni uccinoṣi troṭayasi | kāravellī karavellī | atra pūrvārdhe kāraṇakathanātpūrvatā | uktayoranaupamyaṃ vyaktameva | nanu nātra sāhajiko 'pahnavastatkathamapahnutirata āha—apahnutyeti | āropeṇāpahnavalakṣaṇayogādapahnutirityarthaḥ ||
saivāpūrvā yathā—
‘kassa va ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piāi savvaṇaṃ aharam |
sabhamarapaümagdhāiṇi ‘vāritā adharadarśanaparyavasāyisabhramara padmāghrāṇaṃ nidhuvanaṃ ca mā kṛthā iti nivāritāpi vāmā nivāritācaraṇā pratikūlā’ ityudāharaṇacandrikāvāriavāme sahasu eṇhim || 85 ||’
[kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam |
sabhramarapadmāghrāyiṇi vāritavāmye sahasvedānīm ||]
atrāpi nāsyā upapatinādharo vraṇitaḥ kiṃ tarhi bhramareṇeti pratīyamānāpahnotavyaṃ vastu | pūrvārdhe tu savraṇamadharamiti kāryamupanyasya, paścimārdhe sabhramarakamalāghrāyiṇīti kāraṇamupanyastam | seyamanaupamyā pratīyamānāpahnotavyavasturapūrvā ca yathoktalakṣaṇayogājjāyate |
kassa va ityādi | ‘kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam | sabhramarapadmāghrāyiṇi vāritavāmye sahasvedānīm ||’ iha preyāyā adharaṃ sakṣataṃ dṛṣṭvā kasya roṣo na bhavati | tato hetorbhramarasahitapadmasyāghrāṇakārike, he vāritavāmye dākṣiṇyavati, saṃprati tvaṃ sahasva sahiṣṇurbhava | atrottarārdhe kāraṇopanyāsādapūrvatā | pūrvavadāśaṅkāsamādhāne ityāha—yathokteti | ityapahnutyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
samādhyuktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
samādhilakṣaṇamāha—
samādhimanyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ viduḥ |
nirudbhedo 'tha sodbhedaḥ sa dvidhā paripaṭhyate || 44 ||
﻿
samādhiriti | anyadharmasyānyatra viśeṣe ya āropaḥ sa samādhiḥ | nirudbhedo 'vyaktaḥ, sodbhedaḥ sphuṭaḥ ||
tayornirudbhedo yathā—
‘dūrapaḍibaddharāe avaūhattammi diṇaare avaradisam |
asahantivva kilimmaï piaamapaccakkhadūsaṇaṃ diṇalacchī 86’
[dūrapratibaddharāge 'vagūhamāne dinakare 'paradiśam |
asahamāneva klāmyati priyatamapratyakṣadūṣaṇaṃ dinalakṣmīḥ ||]
atra dinakaradinalakṣmīpratīcīnāṃ samāropitanāyakanāyikāpratināyikādharmāṇāṃ dūrapratibaddharāga ityādibhiḥ śliṣṭapadairanudbhedaḥ | evamanyadharmādhyāropādayaṃ nirudbhedaḥ samādhibhedaḥ ||
dūra ityādi | ‘dūrapratibaddharāge 'vagūhamāna eva dinakare 'paradiśam | asahamāneva klāmyati priyatamapratyakṣadūṣaṇaṃ dinalakṣmīḥ ||’ ihātyarthadhṛtalauhitye 'tyarthaṃkṛtānurāge ca dinakare sūrye vallabhe cāparadiśaṃ pratīcīmaparanāyikāṃ cāvagūhamāne saṃbadhnātyāśliṣyati ca sati dinaśobhā vallabhasphuṭadūṣaṇamasahamāneva klāmyati mlānā bhavati | atra ca nāyakatvādyāropaṇaṃ rāgādipadaiḥ śliṣṭaiḥ kriyata iti nirudbhedatā ||
soddhedo yathā—
‘vallahe lahu volantaï ettaï puṇu bahu bali kijjami tāmarasiṇi tujjha rosahu thirahu |
jeṇa ṇiraggalu jampaï kimpi ṇa jāva jaṇu(ṇa) tāva himeṇa visitti jhatthi(tti) puluṭṭhataṇu || 87 ||’
[vallabhe laghu vyapakrāmatyāgacchati punarbahu baliḥ kriye tāmarasini tava roṣasya sthirasya |
yena nirargalaṃ jalpati kimapi na yāvajjanas tāvaddhimena viśīrṇā jhaṭiti pluṣṭatanuḥ ||]
atrāpi priyatamavyalīkāsahiṣṇuḥ kāpi kāminī himānīpluṣṭāṃ ﻿
kamalinīmālokya tasyāmātmadharmān, priye ca sūryadharmānāropayati | te ca baliḥ kriye 'haṃ tava roṣasyetyādibhiḥ padairudbhidyamānā iha pratīyanta ityayaṃ sodbhedaḥ samādhibhedaḥ | anyaścānyadharmāścānyadharmā arthapradarśanametat | vyutpattistu ‘anyaśca dharmaśca’ ityevaiti vyutpattyā dharmiṇo 'pyadhyāse samādhiriṣyate ||
vallahe ityādi | ‘vallabhe laghu vyapakrāmati punarāgacchati cireṇa baliḥ kriye tāmarasini tava roṣasya sthirasya | yena nirākulaṃ jalpati kimapi na yāvajjanastāvaddhimena viśīrṇā jhaṭiti pluṣṭatanuḥ ||’ iha he tāmarasini padmini, vallabhe sūrye laghu śīghraṃ vyapakrāmatyapagacchati sati himasamaye rātredīṃrghatvāccireṇa punarāgacchati sati tava roṣasya sthirasya balirupahāro 'haṃ kriye iti kācitkhaṇḍitā padminīmuddiśya vadati | yena hetunā nirākulo jano yāvadeva kimapi na jalpati tāvadeva himena viśīrṇā jhaṭiti tvaṃ dagdhatanurasi | vyalīkamapriyam | ‘himānī himasaṃhatiḥ’ ityamaraḥ | pluṣṭāṃ dagdhām | te dharmāḥ | dharmāroparūpe samādhāvavyāptirata āha—anya iti | anyo dharmīha vivakṣito dharmapadasaṃnidheḥ ||
sadharmāṇāṃ dharmiṇaśca yathā—
‘candrajyotsnā viśadapuline saikate 'sminsarayvā vādadvaitaṃ suciramabhavatsiddhayūnoḥ kayościt |
eko brūte prathamanihataṃ keśinaṃ kaṃsamanyaḥ sa tvaṃ tattvaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatastatra pūrvam || 88 ||’
atra saṃbodhya varṇanīye viṣṇusvarūpasya dharmiṇastaddharmāṇāṃ cādhyāsādayaṃ dharmidharmādhyāsarūpaḥ samādhiḥ ||
candretyādi | kayościt siddhayūnoḥ sarayvā nadībhedasyāsmin saikate bahukālaṃ vādadvaitaṃ vacanavivādo 'bhavat | ‘vādadyūtam’ iti pāṭhe vādo vivāda eva dyūtamityarthaḥ | saikate kīdṛśe | candrajyotsnayā viśadaṃ svacchaṃ pulinaṃ toyotthitabhāgo yatra tatra | anena ramyatoktā | vādasvarūpamāha—ekaḥ keśinaṃ prathamanihataṃ brūte, anyaḥ kaṃsaṃ prathamanihataṃ brūte | he bhagavan, sa prasiddhastvaṃ tattvaṃ yathārthaṃ kathaya | ﻿
bhavatā tatra tayoḥ keśikaṃsayormadhye kaḥ pūrvaṃ hata iti | siddhau ca tau yuvānau ceti siddhayuvānau | keśī asurabhedaḥ | kaṃso 'pyasurabhedaḥ | atra viṣṇostaddharmāṇāṃ ca cakradharatvādīnāmāropaḥ sphuṭa eva ||
dharmiṇa evādhyāso yathā—
‘prāptaśrīreṣa kasmātpunarapi mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyānnidrāmapyasya pūrvāmanalasamanaso naiva saṃbhāvayāmi |
setuṃ badhnāti kasmātpunarayamakhiladvīpanāthānuyātastvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ || 89 ||’
atra prāptaśrīreṣa kasmādityādibhirmanthakhedādidharmāṇāṃ nivartitatvāt prāptaśrīrityādīnāṃ ca śleṣeṇaivābhidhānāt tvayīti varṇanīyapade viṣṇusvarūpasya dharmiṇa evādhyāsāt taddharmāṇāṃ cānadhyāsādayaṃ dharmyadhyāsarūpaḥ samādhiḥ ||
prāptetyādi | he rāmadeva, samudrasya kampa ābhāti | kīdṛśasya | svavyāghāte sati iti vitarkān dadhata iva | eṣa prāptalakṣmīḥ ko 'pi kasmātpunarapi madviṣaye manthena manthanadaṇḍena khedaṃ vidaghyātkuryāt | analasamanasa ālasyahīnasyāsya nidrāmapyapūrvāṃ naiva saṃbhāvayāmi | akhiladvīpanātho rāvaṇastamanulakṣyīkṛtya yātaḥ prayātaḥ punarayaṃ kasmāddhetoḥ setubandhaṃ badhnāti | mathyate 'neneti manthaḥ | karaṇe 'halaśca 3|3|12’ iti ghañ | atra prāptaśrīrityādiśliṣṭapadairdharbhiṇa eva viṣṇurūpasyāropo na tu taddharmāṇāmasuraghātakatvādīnām ||
samādhimelitayorabhedamāha—
samādhimeva manyante 1. ‘ādhārapustakadvaye ṭīkāpustake ca melitamiti pāṭhaḥ samupalabhyate | paraṃ kāvyaprakāśādiṣu tathā sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇātprācīne rudraṭaviracite kāvyālaṃkāre 'pi 'mīlitam’ ityeva varīvartīti tadanurodhādatrāpi ‘mīlitaṃ, ‘militaṃ’ vā yuktaṃ pratibhāti.me(mī)litaṃ tadapi dvidhā |
dharmāṇāmeva cādhyāse dharmiṇāṃ vānyavastuni || 45 ||
samādhireva melitamubhayatrāpi dharmādhyāsāt || ﻿
atrānyadharmāṇāmevānyavastunyadhyāsānmelitaṃ yathā—
‘pallaviaṃ via karapallavehiṃ papphulliaṃ via ṇaaṇehiṃ |
phaliaṃ via pīṇapaoharehiṃ ajjāe lāvaṇṇam || 90 ||’
[pallavitamiva karapallavābhyāṃ praphullitamiva nayanābhyām |
phalitamiva pīnapayodharābhyāmāryāyā lāvaṇyam ||]
atra pallavitamiva puṣpitamiva phalitamivetyutprekṣayā latādharmāṇāṃ lāvaṇyadharmiṇi dharmādhyāropo dṛśyate | karapallavādīnāṃ cānupāttavyāpārahetutvena sādhakatamatvena vā prādhānyaṃ lakṣyate | so 'yamanyavastuni punaranyadharmāṇāmevāropeṇa melitaṃ nāma samādhereva bhedo bhavati | sa tūddeśe samādhyuktirityuktigrahaṇāllabhyate |
pallaviamityādi | ‘pallavitamiva karapallavābhyāṃ praphullitamiva nayanābhyām | phalitamiva pīnapayodharābhyāmāryāyā lāvaṇyam ||’ ihāryāyā gṛhapatiputryā nāyikāyā lāvaṇyaṃ saukumāryaṃ hastapallavābhyāṃ pallavitamiva netrābhyāṃ phullitamiva pīnastanābhyāṃ phalitamivāsti | adhyārope bījamāha—utprekṣayeti | tarhi karapallavādīnāmadhyāropādbahirbhāva eva bhavedata āha—kareti | anupātto 'nukto yo vyāpāro 'dhyāsaviṣayastaddhetutvena tadupasthitikāraṇatvena tatkaraṇatvena vā | ata eva kartrapekṣayā pradhānatayā svātantreṇānvayasteṣāmityarthaḥ | tarhi samādhyuddeśe 'nuddeśaḥ kathamastyata āha—sa tviti | samādhyuktirityatra samādhiriti kartavye uktigrahaṇamadhikārthasūcakamityuktipadenaiva melitoddeśaḥ kṛta ityarthaḥ ||
dharmāṇāṃ dharmiṇaśca yathā—
‘deho vva paḍaï diaho kaṇṭhaccheo vva lohio hoi raī |
galaï ruhiraṃ vva saṃjhā gholaï kesakasaṇaṃ sirammia timiram || 91 ||’
[deha iva patati divasaḥ kaṇṭhaccheda iva lohito bhavati raviḥ |
galati rudhiramiva saṃdhyā ghūrṇate keśakṛṣṇaṃ śira iva timiram ||]
atra dehādayo yathoktakriyāvanto jantuvadhakriyāyāṃ nibaddhā divasādibhirupameyā divasāvasānakriyāyāṃ melitāstadetat guṇakriyāvatāṃ ﻿
dravyāṇāṃ pradhānakriyādhyārope dharmidharmādhyāse melitaṃ nāma samādhereva bhedo bhavati |
deho vva ityādi | ‘deha iva patati divasaḥ kaṇṭhaccheda iva lohito bhavati raviḥ | galati rudhiramiva saṃdhyā ghūrṇate keśakṛṣṇaṃ śira iva timiram ||’ iha dinamaṅgamiva patati, raktaḥ sūryaḥ kaṇṭhaccheda iva bhavati, raktamiva saṃdhyā galati, timiraṃ keśaśyāmaṃ śira iva ghūrṇate itastato yāti | atra patanādayaḥ kriyāḥ, lauhityādayo guṇāḥ, pradhānakriyāḥ patatītyādikāḥ, tadadhyāropo divasādiṣu | iti samādhyuktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
samāsoktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
samāsoktiṃ lakṣayati—
yatropamānādevaitadupameyaṃ pratīyate |
atiprasiddhestāmāhuḥ samāsoktiṃ manīṣiṇaḥ || 46 ||
pratīyamāne vācye vā sādṛśye sopajāyate |
ślāghāṃ garhāmubhe nobhe tadupādhīnpracakṣate || 47 ||
viśeṣyamātrabhinnāpi tulyākāraviśeṣaṇā |
astyasāvaparāpyasti tulyātulyaviśeṣaṇā || 48 ||
saṃkṣepeṇocyate yasmātsamāsoktiriyaṃ tataḥ |
saivānyoktirananyoktirubhayoktiśca kathyate || 49 ||
yatreti | yatrātiprasiddhatayopamānādevaitasyopameyasya jñānaṃ sā samāsoktiḥ | samasanaṃ samāsaḥ saṃkṣepastaduktirityanvarthatāpi | pratīyamāne jñāyamāne vācye 'bhidhīyamāne ca sādṛśye | ślāghāṃ praśaṃsām, garhāṃ nindām | ubhe ślāghāgarhe ca, nobhe aślāghāgarhe caitānupādhīnprayojakān samāsoktau vadanti | viśeṣyamātrābhyāṃ yuktāyuktābhyāṃ bhinnāpi viśeṣaṇadvayabhedavatī ekā tulyākāraviśeṣaṇā, uparā tulyātulyaviśeṣaṇā | saṃkṣepoktau ca prakāradvayaṃ bhavati tadāha—anyetyādi ||
tatra pratīyamānasādṛśyā ślāghāvatī yathā—
‘uttuṅge kṛtasaṃśrayasya śikhariṇyuccāvacagrāvaṇi nyagrodhasya kimaṅga ‍tasya vacasā ślāghāsu paryāpyate |
﻿
bandhurvā sa purākṛtaḥ kimathavā satkarmaṇāṃ saṃcayo mārge rūkṣavipattraśākhini jano yaṃ prāpya viśrāmyati || 92 ||’
atra nyagrodhenaivopamānena pratīyamānasādṛśyasya varṇanīyavadānyopameyasyoktatvāttacchlāghayaiva tacchlāghā pratīyata iti seyaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyā ślāghāvatī samāsoktiḥ ||
uttuṅge ityādi | tasya nyagrodhasya vaṭavṛkṣasya ślāghā svapraśaṃsā svavacasoktyā kiṃ samāpyate | kiṃtu na | tasya ślāghā vaktumaśakyetyarthaḥ | aṅgeti sānunayasaṃbodhane | kīdṛśasya | uttuṅge ucchrite | uccāvacā nimnonnatā ye grāvāṇaḥ pāṣāṇāstadyukte ca śikhariṇi girau kṛtāvāsasya | ślāghāhetumāha—sa vaṭo bandhurmitraṃ vā purā pūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ | arthājjanena | athavā satkarmaṇāṃ śreṣṭhavyāpārāṇāṃ saṃcaya upacayaḥ kim | arthājjanasya | rūkṣā asnigdhā vipatrāḥ patraśūnyāḥ śākhino vṛkṣā yatra tādṛśe mārge yaṃ vaṭavṛkṣaṃ prāpya jano viśrāmyati | uccāvacetyatra bahuvrīhyanantaraṃ matubiti bhramo na kāryaḥ | uccāvacagrāvāṇo 'tra santīti viśiṣṭasyaiva matvarthasaṃbandhādbisakisalayacchedapātheyavanta itivatkevalādviśiṣṭasya bhinnabuddhiviṣayatvāt | ata evādaṇḍītyādayo nistaraṅgaṃ prayogā ityavadheyam | ‘grāvopalāśmānaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra paropakāritayā nyagrodhavadānyayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ pratīyamānaṃ tata evobhayoḥ ślāghāpi ||
saiva garhāvatī yathā—
‘kiṃ jāto 'si catuṣpathe yadi ghanacchāyo 'si kiṃ chāyayā saṃpannaḥ phalito 'si kiṃ yadi phalaiḥ ‘ạ̄dhyo 'si’ iti ṭīkākārasaṃmataḥ pāṭhaḥpūrṇo 'si kiṃ saṃnataḥ |
he sadvṛkṣa sahasva saṃprati śikhāśākhāśatākarṣaṇa- kṣobhonmoṭanabhañjanāni janataḥ svaireva duśceṣṭitaiḥ || 93 ||’
atropamānabhūtasya sadvṛkṣasya vyājagarhaṇayā tadupameyaḥ ko 'pi satpuruṣo vigarhyata iti seyaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyā garhāvatī nāma samāsoktiḥ |
kimityādi | he sadvṛkṣa, catuṣpathe kimarthaṃ jāto 'syutpanno 'si | yadi tvaṃ ﻿
ghanā nibiḍā chāyā yasya tādṛśo 'si tadā chāyayā kiṃ vṛthā | yadi saṃpannaḥ samṛddhaḥ san phalito 'si tadā phalabharaistava kim | kiṃtu na tava kimapi | yadyāḍhayo 'si mahānasi tadā samyakprakāreṇa nataḥ kim | saṃpratyadhunā svairnijaireva duśceṣṭitairjanato lokāttvaṃ śikhāyāmagrabhāge śākhāśatasyākarṣaṇamākṛṣṭiḥ, kṣobhaścālanam, āmoṭanaṃ saṃkocanam, bhañjanaṃ chedanametāni sahasvānubhava | ‘ạ̄dhya ibhye mahatyapi’ iti viśvaḥ | sahasveti ‘ṣaha marṣaṇe’ iti loṭi madhyamapuruṣaikavacane rūpam | ‘agramātre śikhā matā’ iti dharaṇiḥ | janata iti pañcamyantāttasiḥ | vyājagarhaṇā kapaṭanindā vaṭavṛkṣanindāṃ vyājīkṛtya satpuruṣanindopakramāt ||
saivobhayavatī yathā—
‘niṣkandāmaravindinīṃ sthapuṭitoddeśāṃ sthalīṃ palvale jambālāvilamambu kartumaparā sūte varāhī sutān |
daṃṣṭrāyāṃ caturarṇavormipaṭalairāplāvitāyāmiyaṃ yasyā eva śiśoḥ sthitā vipadi bhūḥ sā putriṇī potriṇī 94’
atra pūrvārdhe garhā, uttarārdhe ślāghā gamyate, seyaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyobhayavatī samāsoktiḥ |
niṣkandāmityādi | itarānyā varāhī sūkarī sutān sūkarān sūte janayati | kiṃ kartum | aravindinīṃ niṣkandāmunmūlitamūlāṃ kartuṃ, sthapuṭito nimnonnatīkṛta uddeśo yasyāstādṛśīṃ sthalīṃ kartuṃ, palvale 'lpasarasi ambu jalaṃ jambālena kardamenāvilamanacchaṃ kartum | sā potriṇī varāhī putriṇī praśastaputravatī | yasyāḥ śiśoreva bālakasyaiva daṃṣṭrāyāmiyaṃ bhūrvipadi pralaye sthitā | daṃṣṭrāyāṃ kīdṛśyām | caturṇāmarṇavānāṃ samudrāṇāmūrbhipaṭalaiḥ kallolasamūhairāplāvitāyāṃ pūritāyām | vyāptāyāmiti yāvat | ‘jambālaḥ paṅko 'strī’ ityamaraḥ | varāhīti ‘puṃyogādākhyāyām 4|1|48’ iti ṅīṣ | putriṇīti praśaṃsāyāminiḥ | ‘varāhaḥ sūkaro gṛṣṭiḥ kolaḥ potrī’ ityamaraḥ | atrobhayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ varāhatvādinā pratīyamānam ||
﻿
anubhayavatī yathā—
‘itaḥ svapiti keśavaḥ ṭīkākṛtā tu ‘puramitastadīyadviṣā—’ iti pāṭho dhṛtaḥkulamitastadīyadviṣāmitaśca śaraṇārthinaḥ śikharipakṣiṇaḥ śerate |
ito 'pi vaḍavānalaḥ saha samastasaṃvartakairaho vitatamūrjitaṃ bharasahaṃ ca sindhorvapuḥ || 95 ||’
atra garhā ślāghā vā vismayoktāvevāstamayate | seyaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyānubhayavatī nāma samāsoktiḥ |
ita ityādi | sindhoḥ samudrasya vapurāśayo vitataṃ vistīrṇamūrjitaṃ balavat bhāravahanakṣamaṃ ca | atraivāścaryam | ito 'traiva harirvasati, atraiva keśavaripūṇāmasurāṇāṃ puraṃ nagaramasti | atraiva śaraṇaṃ prāptaḥ śikhariṇāṃ parvateṣu madhye pakṣiṇaḥ sapakṣā mainākādayaḥ śerate svapanti | naca śikharipakṣiṇa ityatra ‘na nirdhāraṇe 2|2|10’ iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaniṣedha iti vācyam | tanniṣedhasyānityatvānnirdhāraṇasyāvivakṣaṇādvā nirdhāraṇadyotakajātyāderabhāvena tadunnayanāt, yadvā śikhariṇaśca te pakṣiṇaśceti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ | pūrvanipāte tu bahuṣvekatra niyama iti vyavasthitiḥ | atraiva vaḍavānalo 'sti sakalameghaiḥ saha | ‘puṣkarāvartasaṃvartakālakāntijalaplavāḥ | iti vārimucāṃ vaṃśa ścaturdhā parikīrtitaḥ ||’ iti purāṇam | atra ślāghāgarhayorastamanādanubhayavatīyam ||
abhidhīyamānasādṛśyā ślāghāvatī tulyākāraviśeṣaṇā yathā—
‘nālasya prasaro jaleṣvapi kṛtāvāsasya koṣe rucirdaṇḍe karkaśatā mukhetimṛdutā mitre mahānpraśrayaḥ |
āmūlaṃ guṇasaṃgrahavyasanitā dveṣaśca doṣākare yasyaiṣā sthitirambujasya vasatiryuktaiva tatra śriyaḥ || 96 ||’
atrāmburuhasatpuruṣayoḥ parasparamupamānopameyabhāvasyātiśayaprasiddherupamānenaiva śleṣavattulyaviśeṣaṇapadābhidhīyamānasādṛśyamupamānamupameyamevāva-﻿
gamyate | seyamabhidhīyamānasādṛśyā ślāghāvatī tulyaviśeṣaṇā nāma samāsoktiḥ ||
nālasyetyādi | yasyāmbujasya padmasyaivamanenākāreṇa sthitiravasthitistatrāmbuje śriyo lakṣmyā vasatirvāso yukta eva | tadāha—nālasya nālāyāḥ prasaro vistāraḥ, atha ca na ālasyasyālasatāyāḥ prasara ādhikyam | jaleṣvapi toyeṣu kṛtāvāsasya, atha ca mūrkheṣvapi kṛtāvāsasya | koṣe kuṅmale ruciḥ kāntiḥ, atha ca koṣe pātre 'rthasārthe vā ruciḥ prītiḥ | daṇḍe prakāṇḍe karkaśatā kāṭhinyam, atha ca daṇḍe śāsane karkaśatā kārkaśyam | mukhe upakrame mṛdutā komalatā, atha ca mukhe vadane mṛdutā madhuravāṇīkatā | mitre sūrye mahān praśrayaḥ prītiḥ, atha ca mitre suhṛdi mahāprītiḥ | āmūlaṃ mūlādārabhya guṇasya tantoḥ saṃgrahe grahaṇe vyasanitā āsaṅgaḥ, atha cāmūlamādipuruṣādārabhya guṇānāṃ śīlādīnāṃ saṃgrahe vartulīkaraṇe vyasanitā prayatnaḥ | doṣākare rajanikare dveṣo 'sūyā, atha ca doṣāṇāmākareutpattisthāne jane dveṣo 'prītiḥ | ‘nālo nālamathāstriyām’ ityamaraḥ | ‘jalaṃ nīre ca mūrkhe ca’ iti viśvaḥ | ‘koṣo 'strī kuṅmale pātre hyarthasaṃghātadivyayoḥ |’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘daṇḍaṃ prakāṇḍe śāstau ca’ iti | ‘mukhamāsye ca prārambhe’ iti | 'mitraṃ suhṛdi mitro 'rke’ iti | ‘śiphāyāṃ kāraṇe mūlam’ iti | ‘guṇastantau ca śīlādau’ iti | ‘doṣaḥ syāddūṣaṇe doṣā rātrau bāhau ca kīrtitā |’ iti | ‘vasatiḥ syādavasthāne’ iti viśvaḥ | atra padmasajjanayoḥ prasiddhisiddhamupamānopameyatvamata ubhayārthakaviśeṣaṇapadairaśleṣa iva sādṛśyamabhidhīyate | praśaṃsāparatayā ca ślāghāvattvam ||
pratīyamānābhidhīyamānasādṛśyā ślāghāgarhāvatī tulyātulyaviśeṣaṇā yathā—
‘upādhvaṃ tatpānthāḥ punarapi saro mārgatilakaṃ yadāsādya svecchaṃ vilasatha vilīnaklamabharāḥ |
itastu kṣārābdherjaraṭhakamaṭhakṣiptapayaso nivṛttiḥ kalyāṇī na punaravatāraḥ kathamapi || 97 ||’
atra pūrvārghe 'bhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ ślāghā, paścimārghe tu pratīyamāna﻿-
sādṛśyayorgarhāvagamyate; seyamubhayavatī tulyātulyaviśeṣaṇābhidhīyamānapratīyamānasādṛśyā samāsoktiḥ ||
upādhvamityādi | he pānthāḥ, tatsarastaḍāgamupādhvaṃ sevadhvam | kīdṛśam | mārgasya tilakabhūtamalaṃkārībhūtam | yatsara āsādya gataśramabharā yūyaṃ svecchaṃ vilasatha yathecchaṃ krīḍadhvam | ito 'smātkṣārābdhernivṛttireva kalyāṇī kuśaladā na punaḥ kathamapyavatāro 'tra kuśaladaḥ | atrāvataraṇaṃ na kartavyamiti bhāvaḥ | kṣārābdheḥ kīdṛśāt | jaraṭhena jīrṇena kamaṭhena kacchapena kṣuṇṇaṃ payo jalaṃ yasya tasmāt | upādhvamiti upapūrva ‘āsa upaveśane’ loṇmadhyamapuruṣabahuvacane ‘dhi ca 8|2|25’ iti sakāralopaḥ | ‘kamaṭhakacchapau’ ityamaraḥ | kalyāṇīti gaurāditvānṅīṣa | atra pūrvārdhe saraḥsajjanayoḥ paropakāratvādiguṇaistulyaireva sādṛśyamabhihitam | ślāghā tu vyaktaiva | uttarārdhe tu kṣārābdhestādṛśasyānupakārakatayā garhā vyaktaiva jñāyate, ihāsajjanagatā nindāpi pratīyate; kiṃtu sā viśeṣaṇadvārā netyatulyaviśeṣaṇatā ||
anyoktirdvidhā svajātau jātyantare ca | tayoḥ svajātau yathā—
‘lakṣmīpayodharotsaṅgakuṅkumāruṇito hareḥ |
balireṣa sa yenāsya bhikṣāpātrīkṛtaḥ karaḥ || 98 ||’
atra hariśabdena baliśabdena vā kaścit samānetivṛttaḥ puṃviśeṣa evocyate; seyaṃ svajātiviṣayānyoktiḥ saṃkṣepoktirūpatvātsamāsoktireva |
lakṣmītyādi | sa balireva vadānyaḥ | yena balināsya harerviṣṇoḥ karo hasto bhikṣāpātrīkṛto bhikṣāpātratvamāpāditaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ karaḥ | lakṣmīstanakroḍakuṅkumenāruṇito lohitīkṛtaḥ | atra svajātitvaṃ tulyacaritatvam | haribalyorapekṣayānyatvamapi || tarhi samāsoktitā kathamata āha—saṃkṣepeti | saṃkṣepeṇopasthāpanādeva samāsoktitvamityarthaḥ ||
jātyantare yathā—
‘pibanmadhu yathākāmaṃ bhramaraḥ phullapaṅkaje |
apyasaṃnaddhasaurabhyaṃ paśya cumbati kuḍmalam || 99 ||’
atra bhramaraśabdena kaścit kāmī, phullapaṅkajaśabdena kāpi praụdhā﻿
ṅganā, kuṅmalaśabdena kāpi mugdhāṅganābhidhīyate; seyamanyajātiviṣayānyoktiḥ samāsoktireva bhavati ||
pibannityādi | bhramaro yathākāmaṃ yathecchaṃ praphullapaṅkaje madhu piban san asaṃnaddhasaurabhyamaprāptasaugandhyamapi kuṅmalaṃ cumbati | tatpaśya | atra vākyārthasyaiva karmatā | atra bhinnabhinnajātitayānyajātitā ||
ananyoktiśabdenehādhyāsaviṣayā tadbhāvāpattirucyate | yathaiṣa brahmadatta iti | sā dvidhā śuddhā citrā ca |
tayoḥ śuddhā yathā—
‘ṭīkākṛtātu ‘mudhā baddhagrāsaiḥ’ iti pāṭho dhṛtaḥsudhābaddhagrāsairupavanacakorarainusṛtāṃ kirañjyotsnāmacchāṃ navalavalipākapraṇayinīm |
upaprākārāgraṃ prahiṇu nayane tarkaya manāganākāśe ko 'yaṃ galitahariṇaḥ śītakiraṇaḥ || 100 ||’
atra kasyāścinmukhe candramasamadhyāsya kaścidevaṃ brūte | sā ceyaṃ pūrvārdhe 'bhidhīyamānatulyaviśeṣaṇā, paścimārdhe punaranākāśe ko 'yaṃ galitahariṇa ityatra tulyaviśeṣaṇā samāsoktirevānanyoktiḥ | ekasyaiva cādhyāsādiyaṃ śuddhetyucyate ||
nānyasyoktirananyoktiḥ | tathācānanyoktipadena tadbhāvāpattistattā viṣayataivocyate | eṣo 'yamityākārastasyāḥ | mudhetyādi | he sakhe, upaprākārāgraṃ prākārāgrasamīpe nayane netradvayaṃ prahiṇu dehi | manāk tvaṃ tarkaya | anākāśe ākāśātiriktadeśe galitahariṇastyaktalāñchanaḥ ko 'yaṃ śītakiraṇaścandra iti | kīdṛśaḥ | jyotsnāṃ kiran vikṣipan | kīdṛśīm | mudhā mithyā baddho 'nubaddho grāsaḥ kavalo yairevaṃbhūtairupavanasthitacakorairanusṛtāmanugatām | svacchām | navā nūtanā yā lavalī latābhedastasyāḥ pākasya praṇayinīṃ praśrayavatīṃ ca | ‘lavalī ca latābhidā’ iti viśvaḥ | lavalīvācako lavaliśabdo 'pi | ‘lavaliḥ śvetapārthapī‘pādapī’ iti syāt (?) iti śabdabhedaḥ | upaprākārāgramityatra sāmīpye 'vyayībhāvaḥ | atra adhyāsya āropya | pūrvārdhe tulyaviśeṣaṇatvamuktam, uttarārdhe 'tulyaviśeṣaṇatvam | tasyaivābhidhānādananyoktirekasyaivābhidhānācchuddhatā ca ||
﻿
citrā yathā—
‘kamalamanambhasi kamale kuvalaye tāni ca kanakalatikāyām |
sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyam || 101 ||’
atrādhyāsaḥ pūrvavadvaicitryaṃ ca nigadenaiva vyākhyātam | seyamananyoktiḥ samāsoktirevānekādhyāsavaicitryāccitretyucyate ||
kamalamityādi | anambhasi jalaśūnye deśe kamalamasti | kamale punaḥ kuvalaye nīlanalinadvayam, tāni ca kamalakuvalayāni kanakalatikāyāṃ suvarṇalatāyām, sā ca kanakalatikā sukumārā komalā satī subhagā ramyetyanena prakāreṇa keyamutpātaparamparāriṣṭapaṅktiḥ | ‘utpāto 'riṣṭamityapi’ ityamaraḥ | pūrvavaditi | kasyāścinmukhādau kamalādyāropaḥ, vicitratā ca kamalādau kuvalayādyabhidhānenaivoktā tasyā evābhidhānādananyatayoktiḥ ||
ubhayoktiryathā—
‘lāvaṇyasindhuraparaiva hi keyamatra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha saṃplavante |
unmajjati dviradakumbhataṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalikāṇḍamṛṇāladaṇḍāḥ || 102 ||’
atrāpūrveyaṃ lāvaṇyasindhurityanyoktiḥ, yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha saṃplavanta ityādirananyoktiḥ, seyamubhayayogādubhayoktirapadiśyate | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tenānyāpi yopamānopameyaviṣaye saṃkṣepoktiḥ sāpi samāsoktireva bhavati |
lāvaṇyetyādi | atra deśe 'paraivāpūrvaiva keyaṃ lāvaṇyasindhuḥ saukumāryanadī | yatra candreṇa saha padmāni saṃplavante saṃmilitāni bhavanti | yatra kumbhikumbhataṭī unmajjati utthitā bhavati | yatrāpare 'nye kadalīprakāṇḍabisadaṇḍāḥ santi | 'sindhurabdhau pumānnadyāṃ striyām’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘tīradeśe taṭī matā’ iti ca | atra siṃdhūktyānyoktitā, yatretyādinā sindhurevoktetyananyoktitā | anyānanyātiriktasamāsoktiṃ saṃgṛhṇāti—upalakṣaṇamiti ||
﻿
yathā—
‘indurlipta ivāñjanena jaḍitā dṛṣṭirmṛgīṇāmiva pramlānāruṇimeva vidrumadalaṃ śyāmeva hemaprabhā |
pāruṣyaṃ kalayā ca kokilavadhūkaṇṭheṣviva prastutaṃ sītāyāḥ purataśca hanta śikhināṃ barhāḥ sagarhā iva 103’
atra saṃkṣepataḥ sītāśabdavācyasya mukhāderavayavasamūhasyāśrayata indurañjanenaiva liptaḥ, jaḍiteva mṛgīṇāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ, pramlānamivāruṇyaṃ vidrumasya, śyāmeva hemakāntiḥ, paruṣā iva kokilālāpāḥ, sagarhā iva śikhināṃ barhā ityutprekṣokteranuktānyapi tadupameyāni mukhādīni pratīyante, seyamapi saṃkṣepoktiḥ samāsoktireva bhavati | kaḥ punaḥ samāsokteḥ samādhyuktervā viśeṣaḥ | ucyate | yatra prākaraṇike 'prākaraṇiko dharmo 'dhyāsyate sā samādhyuktiḥ yathā—'asahantibba kilimmaï piaamapacchakkhadūsaṇaṃ diṇalacchī |’ iti | yatra punaraprākaraṇike prākaraṇikadharmaḥ sā samāsoktiḥ | yathā—'pibanmadhu yathākāmaṃ bhramaraḥ phullapaṅkaje |’ iti | nanu dharmiṇo 'dhyāse samānamiti cet | na | ‘sa tvaṃ tattvaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatastatra pūrvam—’ ityādiṣu ‘anākāśe ko 'yaṃ galitahariṇaḥ śītakiraṇaḥ’ ityādiṣu ca pravyakta evādhyāsaviśeṣo dṛśyate | ekatra manasānyatra tu vacaseti so 'yaṃ samādhyukteḥ samāsokteśca bhedo bhavati |
indurityādi | sītāyāḥ purato 'gre 'ñjanena kajjalena lipta iva candraḥ | hariṇīnāṃ dṛṣṭirjaḍitaiva jaḍībhūtaiva | pravāladalaṃ vimlānalauhityamiva | kalakokilavadhūkaṇṭheṣu pāruṣyamatikramavacana miva prastutamupakrāntam | hanta harṣe viṣāde vā | śikhināṃ mayūrāṇāṃ barhāśca sagarhā iva jātāḥ | ‘pāruṣyamativādaḥ syāt’ ityamaraḥ | atra sītāpadena mukhādyavayavasamūha uktastadagre upamānānāṃ tattaddṛśā utprekṣābhidhānādanuktā﻿
nyapi tadupameyāni mukhādīni jñāyanta ityupamānopameyaviṣaye saṃkṣepoktiriyam | samādhyuktisamāsoktyorabhedaṃ manvāno bhedakaṃ pṛcchati—ka iti | uttaram—yatreti | yatra prakaraṇapariprāpte viśeṣye 'prakaraṇapariprāptadharmādhyāsaḥ sā samādhyuktiḥ | [yathā— ] asahamāneva klāmyatītyādi | atra priyatamapratyakṣadūṣaṇādhyāropo 'prākaraṇikaḥ | yatrāprastute prastutadharmādhyāsaḥ sā samāsoktiḥ | yathā—pibanmadhu yathākāmamiti | atra bhramare 'prakṛte prakṛtasya kāmino 'dhyāsaḥ tarhi dharmyadhyāsatulyataivāsyetyāha—nanviti | prākaraṇikāprākaraṇikatvābhyāmeva viśeṣastayoriti dharmyadhyāse 'pi na doṣa ityāha—neti | sa tvaṃ tattvamityādau dharmidharmayoradhyāsaḥ, anākāśa ityādau dharmiṇa evādhyāsa iti bheda ityarthaḥ | sa tvaṃ tattvamityādau manasā, anākāśa ityādau ca vacanenādhyāsaḥ || iti samāsoktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
utprekṣālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
anyathāvasthitaṃ vastu yasyāmutprekṣyate 'nyathā |
dravyaṃ guṇaḥ kriyā cāpi tāmutprekṣāṃ pracakṣate || 50 ||
utprekṣālakṣaṇamāha—anyatheti | prakārāntareṇāvasthitaṃ vastu yatra prakārāntareṇotprekṣyate parikalpyate sotprekṣā | asadāropaṇamutprekṣeti lakṣaṇam | kiṃrūpaṃ vastbityākāṅkṣāyāmāha—dravyamiti | dravyaṃ pṛthivyādi, guṇo rūpādiḥ, kriyā pākādiḥ ||
tāsu dravyotprekṣā yathā—
‘dehasthā darpaṇe yasya paśyati pratimāmumā |
anyārdhārdhamivotpannamardhanārīśvarāntaram || 104 ||’
atra pratibimbarūpeṇa darpaṇe 'nyathāvasthitasyārdhanārīśvararūpalakṣaṇasya dravyasya yadaparārdhotpannārdhanārīśvararūpāntareṇa dravyāntararūpeṇotprekṣaṇaṃ seyamutprekṣā dravyotprekṣeti bhavati |
dehasthetyādi | yasya darpaṇe pratimāṃ pratibimbaṃ dehasthā gaurī paśyati anyārdhābhyāmutpannamardhanārīśvarāntaramiva | atrevaśabda utprekṣāvyañjakaḥ | ardhanārīśvarāntararūpaṃ dravyamiha kalpyata ityutprekṣā dravyagatā ||
﻿
guṇotprekṣā yathā—
‘pallaviaṃ via karapallavehiṃ papphuliaṃ via ṇaaṇehiṃ |
phaliaṃ via pīṇapaoharehiṃ ajjāe lāvaṇṇam || 105 ||’
[pallavitamiva karapallavābhyāṃ praphullitamiva nayanābhyām |
phalitamiva pīnapayodharābhyāmāryāyā lāvaṇyam ||]
atra karapallavādirūpeṇānyathāvasthitasyāṅgalāvaṇyalakṣaṇasya yadetat pallavitatvādirūpeṇānyathotprekṣaṇaṃ seyamutprekṣā guṇotprekṣeti bhavati |
pallaviamityādi | vivṛteyaṃ samādhyalaṃkāre | atra saundaryasya guṇasya pallavitatvādinā kalpanaṃ guṇotprekṣā ||
kriyotprekṣā yathā—
‘senāgajāḥ mūlasaṃmatastu ‘pallava’ iti pāṭhaḥsvakarapuṣkaralekhanībhirgaṇḍasthalānmadamaṣīṃ muhurādadānāḥ |
manye narendra taba toyadhitīratālīpatrodareṣu vijayastutimālikhanti || 106 ||’
atra senāgajānāṃ gaṇḍasthalebhyo lekhanyākāraiḥ karairmaṣīrūpasya madapayaso yadādānam, yaścāsya tīratālīpatrodareṣu mahāvarṇatayā nikṣepaḥ sa uktarūpeṇānyathotprekṣyata iti seyamutprekṣā kriyotprekṣā bhavati |
senetyādi | he narendra, senāgajāstava vijayastutimālikhantīti manye | kīdṛśāḥ | svakarāṇāṃ hastihastānāṃ yāni puṣkarāṇyagrāṇi tānyeva lekhanyaḥ bhāṣāntaraśabdo 'yamkāpa iti khyātāstābhirgaṇḍasthalāt madameva maṣīṃ vāraṃvāramādadānā gṛhṇantaḥ | kutra likhantītyata āha—samudratīratālapatramadhyeṣu | manyeśabda utprekṣāvyañjakaḥ | ‘puṣkaraṃ karihastāgre’ iti viśvaḥ | na ca likheḥ kuṭādipāṭhāt ṅittve guṇābhāve likhanīti syāditi vācyam | ‘rada vilekhane’ iti nirdeśena ṅittvavidheranityatvabodhanāt | ata eva ‘lekhanīkṛtakarṇasya kāyasthasya na viśvaset |’ ityādiprayogāḥ | ‘lekhanī ﻿
lipisādhikā’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | (‘kariṇāṃ bandhanastambha ālānam’ ityamaraḥ | ‘śarīraṃ varṣma vigrahaḥ’ iti ca |) atra puṣkarāderlekhanyāditvenotprekṣaṇaṃ kriyotprekṣā | na ceha dravyotprekṣaiveti vācyam; likhanarūpakriyāyāmeva sarveṣāṃ tātparyāt | tasyā eva sarvairnirvāhāt yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti nyāyāt ||
utprekṣāvayavo yaśca yā cotprekṣopamā matā |
mataṃ ceti na bhidyante tānyutprekṣāsvarūpataḥ || 51 ||
utprekṣāvayavādīnāmutprekṣāto na bheda ityāha—utprekṣeti ||
tatrotprekṣāvayavo yathā—
‘aṅgulībhiriva keśasaṃcayaṃ ‘sanniyamya’ iti pāṭhaḥsaṃnigṛhya timiraṃ marīcibhiḥ |
kuṅmalīkṛtasarojalocanaṃ cumbatīva rajanīmukhaṃ śaśī || 107 ||’
atrāṅgulībhiḥ keśeṣu gṛhītvā priyāmukhaṃ cumbyate sā ca locane nimīlayatīti prāyovādaḥ | tatra mukhacumbanādikriyā pradhānamaṅgibhūtā pratīyate, keśagrahaṇākṣinimīlane cāṅgabhūte 'pradhāne | tatrāṅgibhūtāyāḥ kriyāyā utprekṣaṇenāvayavabhūtā kriyotprekṣitā bhavati | yathā hi ‘kuṅmalī kṛtasarojalocanam’ ityatra notprekṣāpadam, evaṃ ‘aṅgulīmarīcibhistimirakeśasaṃcayaṃ saṃnigṛhya’ ityatrāpi tanna prāpnoti; marīcyaṅgulisaṃnigṛhītatimirakeśasaṃcayamityevaṃ vā vaktavyaṃ bhavati | tatra yo 'yamavayavakriyāyāmapyanyapadārthoktadvitīyāvayavakriyāvilakṣaṇa iva prayogeṇa pṛthakpadatayā vākyakalpaḥ sa ivāsyāpi vyākhyānaparatvenāpyanuyojyamānaḥ kavibhirutprekṣāvayava ityucyate | anye punaryatra pradhānakriyā notprekṣyate, avayavakriyā tūtprekṣyate tamutprekṣāvayavaṃ varṇayanti |
aṅgulībhirityādi | śaśī rajanīmukhaṃ cumbatīva | kuṅyalīkṛtāni sarojānyeva locanāni yatra cumbane tadyathā syādevam | kiṃ kṛtvā | marīcibhiraṅgulībhistimiraṃ keśasaṃcayaṃ saṃnigṛhya gṛhītveva | prāyovādo bhāratādau darśanāt | atra dvitīyenevapadena bhinnapadatayā vākyakalpanamitarapadasyāpi tacchūnyapadasyāpi tadartha-﻿
paratvamityutprekṣāvayavatvam | ata evotprekṣābhedatvam | avayavakriyāmātrasyāvayavikriyotprekṣaṇādavayavāvayavibhāvaḥ | tatrāṅgāṅgibhāva eva | yadvā avayavamātrakriyotprekṣaṇamevāvayavitvotprekṣetyāha—anya iti ||
yathā—
‘līneva pratibimbiteva likhitevotkīrṇarūpeva ca pratyupteva ca vajralepaghaṭitevāntarnikhāteva ca |
sā naścetasi kīliteva viśikhaiścetobhuvaḥ pañcabhiścintāsaṃtatitantujālanibiḍasyūteva lagnā priyā || 108 ||’
teṣāṃ mate pūrvodāharaṇamutprekṣāvayavo na bhavati |
līnevetyādi | vivṛto 'yamanuprāse | etanmate pūrvodāharaṇam ‘aṅgulībhiriva-’ ityādi | utprekṣopamāyāmantarbhavatītyāha—teṣāmiti ||
utprekṣopamā yathā—
‘kiṃśukavyapadeśena tarumāruhya sarvataḥ |
dagdhādagdhāmaraṇyānīṃ paśyatīva vibhāvasuḥ || 109 ||’
atra vyapadeśaśabdena kiṃśukakusumānāmagnisādṛśyamabhidhāya darśanakriyotprekṣyata iti seyamutprekṣopamā | pūrvasminnapyudāharaṇe marīcibhiraṅgulībhiriva timiraṃ keśasaṃcayamiva saṃnigṛhyetyupamānārthānupraveśa utprekṣāyāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ | seyamutprekṣāvayava utprekṣopamā cotprekṣaiva bhavati ||
kiṃśuketyādi | vibhāvasuragniraraṇyānyā mahāraṇyasya dagdhādagdhaṃ dagdhamadagdhaṃ ca bhāgaṃ paśyatīva | kiṃ kṛtvā | kiṃśukavyapadeśena kiṃśukakusumavyājena sarvatra vṛkṣamāruhya | ‘mahāraṇyamaraṇyānī’ ityamaraḥ | ‘citrabhānurvibhāvasuḥ’ iti ca | atra vyājapadena kiṃśukakusumāgnyoḥ sādṛśyamabhipretamata upamāgarbhotprekṣeyam ||
mataṃ yathā—
‘yadetaccatdrāntarjaladalavalīlāṃ vitanute tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśaka iti no māṃ prati tathā |
﻿
ahe tvindu manye tvadarivirahākrāntataruṇī- kaṭākṣolkāpātavraṇakiṇakalaṅkāṅkitatanum || 110 ||’
atra kaṭākṣolkāpātavraṇakiṇakalaṅkāṅkitatanumindumahaṃ manye ityanena svamatadvārakamutprekṣāyāḥ samarthanaṃ kṛtamityayaṃ matābhidhānamutprekṣāyā eva prakāraḥ ||
yadetadityādi | yadetaccandrasyāntarmadhye meghakaṇavilāsaṃ kurute lokastacchaśaka ityācaṣṭe vadati | māṃ prati tathā naitat | ahaṃ punarinduṃ manye | kīdṛśam | tvadīyaśatruvirahagrastāyā yuvatyāḥ kaṭākṣa evolkāpātastasya vraṇakiṇa eva kalaṅkastenāṅkitā tanuḥ śarīraṃ yasya tādṛśam | ‘lavaleśakaṇāṇavaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | ‘amānonāśca pratiṣedhavacanāḥ’ iti ca | atra nijamatopanyāsādutprekṣāsamarthanamiti matotprekṣeyam || ityutprekṣālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
aprastutapraśaṃsālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
aprastutastutilakṣaṇamāha—
aprastutapraśaṃsā syādastotavyasya yā stutiḥ |
kuto 'pi hetorvācyā ca pratyetavyā ca socyate || 52 ||
sā tu dharmārthakāmānāṃ prāyo 'nyatamabādhayā |
svābhiprāyaprasiddha‍yā ca jāyamāneha dṛśyate || 53 ||
aprastuteti | astotavyasya ninditasya kuto 'pi kāraṇātstutiḥ praśaṃsā aprastutastutiḥ ata eva samāsokterbhedaḥ | tatra hyupamānopameyatā, atra tu ninditamarthāntaram, anyasya stutiriti | sā tvabhidhīyamānā pratīyamānā cetyāha—vācyeti | tatra hetudvārakamapi vibhāgamāha—sā tviti | dharmaścārthaśca kāmaśca teṣāmanyatasamasya prāyo bāhulyena bādhayā sarvatra svābhiprāyasya prakṛṣṭasidhdyā sotpadyamānā pratīyata ityarthaḥ ||
tāsu dharmabādhayā vācyā tathā—
‘medacchedakṛśodaraṃ laghu ‘tyutthānayogyaṃ’ iti pāṭhaḥbhavatyutsāhayogyaṃ vapuḥ sattvānāmapi lakṣyate vikṛtimaccittaṃ bhayakrodhayoḥ |
﻿
utkarṣaḥ sa ca dhanvināṃ yadiṣavaḥ sidhyanti lakṣye cale mithyaiva vyasanaṃ vadanti mṛgayāmīdṛgvinodaḥ kutaḥ 111’
atra yathoktairhetubhiḥ svābhiprāyasādhanena yadidamīdṛgvinodaḥ kuta iti sākṣānmṛgayābhinandanaṃ seyaṃ vācyā nāmāprastutastutiḥ ‘ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ’ iti dharmaṃ bādhate ||
bheda ityādi | santo mṛgayāmākheṭakaṃ vyasanamakartavyaṃ vadanti yattanmithyā | īdṛgvinoda utsāhaḥ kutaḥ kutra | kiṃtu na kutrāpi | hi yato vapurlaghu bhavati ninditamiva bhavati | kīdṛśam | medaso balasya chedena saṃcalanena kṛśamudaraṃ yatra | medasāṃ sthityā sthaulyaṃ bhavati | kṛśodaratayaivotsāhayogyam | ata eva tundileṣvanutsāhaḥ | sattvānāṃ prāṇināṃ bhayakrodhayorvikārayogi cittamapi lakṣyate | bhaye cittamīdṛk, krodhe cedṛgiti | sa ca dhanvināṃ dhanurdharāṇāmutkarṣo yadiṣavaścale lakṣye sighyanti ca bhedakā bhavanti | ‘medastu vapā vasā’ ityamaraḥ | atroktahetudvārā nijābhiprāyasya sidhdyā mṛgayābhinandanaṃ dharmabādhanayābhidhīyamānamata iyamaprastutastutiḥ || dharmabādhanāmāha—ahiṃseta | mṛgayā hiṃsājanikā | ato dharmabādhātretyarthaḥ ||
dharmabādhayaiva pratyetavyā yathā—
‘kālākkharadu ssikkhia bālaa re lagga majjha kaṇṭhammi |
doṇ‍ha vi ṇaraaṇivāso samaaṃ jaï hoi tā hou || 112 ||’
[kālākṣaraduḥśikṣita bālaka re laga mama kaṇṭhe |
dvayorapi narakanivāsaḥ samakaṃ yadi bhavati tadbhavatu ||]
atra kālākṣaraduḥ śikṣiṇetyanena lipijñānādibhiradhītadharmaśāstrābhimatarūpakapogaṇḍaḥ ko 'pi kayāpyavinayavatyā sopālambhamehi re kaṇṭhe lagetyabhiyujyate | tatra te matamevaṃ kṛte yadi narakaḥ syāt; sa yadyāvayoḥ sahaiva, nāsau naraka iti; kiṃ tarhi s‍varga iti | so 'yaṃ svābhiprāyasādhanānmahāsāhase niyogastasyeha sākṣādastutasyāstotavyasya stutiḥ pratīyate | seyaṃ pratyetavyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsā ‘parasya dārānmanasāpi necchet’ iti dharmaṃ bādhate || ﻿
kālākkharetyādi | ‘kālākṣaraduḥśikṣita bālaka re laga mama kaṇṭhe | dvayorapi narakanivāsaḥ samako yadi bhavati tadā bhavatu ||’ iha re kālākṣareṣu duḥśikṣita durupadeśa bālaka ṣoḍaśavarṣavayaska, mama kaṇṭhe laga | māmāliṅgayetyarthaḥ | dva‍yorāvayostathā sati narakanivāsaḥ samakastulyo yadi bhavati tadā bhavatu | tatrāpyāvayoḥ samāna eveti narako 'pi svargaḥ | kālākṣareti laukikī saṃjñā | re iti nīcasaṃbodhanam | ‘bāla āṣoḍaśādvarṣāt’ iti manuḥ | samaka iti svārthe kan | pogaṇḍo vyavahārānabhijñaḥ | pogaṇḍastu tataḥparam |’ ‘parato vyavahārajñaḥ’ iti manuḥ | adhīteti | adhītaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ manvādismṛtiryena saḥ | abhimatamākāṅkṣitaṃ rūpaṃ saundaryaṃ yasya saḥ | tādṛśaścāsau pogaṇḍaśceti karmadhārayaḥ | rūpaka ityatra ‘śeṣādvibhāṣā 5|4|154’ iti kap | avinayavatī veśyā | atra nijābhiprāyasidhdyā mahāsāhase suratarūpe niyogasya sākṣādanabhidhānātpratīyamāne vā prastutastutiḥ | dharmabādhāmāha—parasyeti | dārān patnīm ||
arthabādhayā vācyā yathā—
‘paṅgo vandyastvamasi na gṛhaṃ yāsi yo 'rthī pareṣāṃ dhanyo 'ndha tvaṃ dhanamadavatāṃ nekṣase yanmukhāni |
ślādhyo mūka tvamapi kṛpaṇaṃ stauṣi nārthāśayā yaḥ stotavyastvaṃ badhira na giraṃ yaḥ khalānāṃ śrṛṇoṣi || 113 ||’
atra stotavyānāṃ paṅgvandhamūkabadhirāṇāṃ vandyadhanyaślāghyastotavyapadaiḥ sākṣādabhinandanādiyaṃ vācyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsābhimānino 'rthasiddhiṃ bādhate ||
paṅgo ityādi | he paṅgo khañja, tvaṃ vandyo 'si; yastvamarthī san pareṣāṃ gṛhaṃ na yāsi | he andha dṛṣṭiśūnya, tvaṃ dhanyaḥ, yaddhanagarvavatāṃ mukhāni tvaṃ nekṣase na paśyasi | he mūka, tvaṃ ślādhyo 'si; yastvaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ janamarthāśayā na stauṣi | he badhira śravaṇaśūnya, tvaṃ stotavyo 'si; yastvaṃ khalānāṃ durjanānāṃ giraṃ vārṇī na śrṛṇoṣi | ‘paṅguḥ khañja iti smṛtaḥ’ iti hārāvalī | ‘avāci mūkaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra paṅg‍vādīnāṃ vandyādipadaiḥ sākṣādabhinandanādabhidhīyamānatā | arthabādhāmāha—abhīti | anena mānināmarthasiddhibādha evoktaḥ ||
﻿
arthabādhayaiva pratyetavyā yathā—
‘kāmaṃ vaneṣu hariṇāstṛṇāni khādantyayatnasulabhāni |
vidadhati dhaniṣu na dainyaṃ te kila paśavo vayaṃ sudhiyaḥ || 114 ||
atra te kila paśavo vayaṃ sudhiya iti mṛgāṇāmasākṣādaminandanaṃ teneyamastotavyānāmamīṣāṃ vākyārthatvena stutipratīteḥ pratyetavyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsā manasvino 'rthasiddhiṃ bādhate ||
kāmamityādi | hariṇā vaneṣvaprayatnataḥ sulabhena tṛṇena kāmamatyarthaṃ jīvanti | dhaniṣu dhanikeṣu dainyaṃ na vidadhati na kurvanti | tathāpi te hariṇāḥ paśavo vayaṃ punaḥ sudhiyaḥ paṇḍitāḥ | kila prasiddhau niścaye vā | ‘atyarthe 'numatau kāmam’ iti viśvaḥ | atra mṛgāṇāṃ na sākṣādabhinandanam, kiṃtu tatpratīyata itīyaṃ pratyetavyā | atrāpyarthabādhā manasvina eva ||
kāmabāghayā vācyā yathā—
‘ṇa muanti dīhasāsaṃ ṇa ruanti ṇagāthāsaptaśatyāṃ ‘ciraṃ ṇa honti kisiāo’ iti pāṭhabhedaḥ, ‘ciraṃ na bhavanti kṛśāḥ’ iti chāyābhedaśca honti virahakisiāo |
dhaṇṇāo tāo jāṇaṃ bahuvallaha vallaho ṇa tumam || 115 ||’
[na muñcanti dīrghaśvāsaṃ na rudanti nagāthāsaptaśatyāṃ ‘ciraṃ ṇa honti kisiāo’ iti pāṭhabhedaḥ, ‘ciraṃ na bhavanti kṛśāḥ’ iti chāyābhedaśca bhavanti virahakṛśāḥ |
dhanyāstā yāsāṃ bahuvallabha vallabho na tvam ||]
atra dhanyāstā yāsāṃ tvaṃ na vallabha iti yeyamatiraktāyāḥ sākṣādastotavyastutiḥ seyaṃ vācyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsā tasyā eva kāmasiddhiṃ bādhate ||
ṇetyādi | ‘na muñcanti dīrghaśvāsaṃ na rudanti na bhavanti virahakṛśāḥ | dhanyāstā yāsāṃ bahuvallabha vallabho na tvam ||’ nāyikāṃ nāyakaviśeṣavatīṃ dṛṣṭa‍vā tatsakhī nāyakamupagamya tasyā anurāgaṃ daśāṃ cāha—na muñcatīti | he bahuvallabha, tā nāthikā dhanyā dīrghaśvāsaṃ virahajaṃ na tyajanti, na rūdanti, virahakṛśāśca na ﻿
bhavanti | yāsāṃ tvaṃ vallabho nāsi | atra dhanyā ityādinā anurāgiṇyāḥ sākṣātstutirabhihitā tasyā eva kāmasiddhibādhikā ||
kāmabādhayaiva pratyetavyā yathā—
‘suhaücchaaṃ jaṇaṃ dullahaṃ vi dūrāhi amha āṇanta |
uaāraa jara jīaṃ vi ṇenta ṇa kaāvarāhosi || 116 ||’
[sukhapṛcchakaṃ janaṃ durlabhamapi ‘dūrānmamānayamāna’ iti vyākhyādṛtaḥ pāṭhaḥdūrādasmākamānayan |
upakāraka jvara jīvamapi ‘gṛhṇanna’ iti pāṭhaḥnayanna kṛtāparādho 'si ||]
atra pūrvoktāsmadabhiprāyasidhdyaivaṃnāma tvayāsmākamupakṛtaṃ yena jīvitamapi harannāparādhyasīti jvaraṃ prati yadatiraktatayā vākyaṃ tenehāstotavyasya jvarasya stutiḥ pratīyate; seyaṃ pratyetavyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsā tasyā eva śarīrabādhayā sarvānapi kāmān bādhate ||
suhetyādi | "sukhapṛcchakaṃ janaṃ durlabhamapi dūrānmamānayamāna | upakāraka jvara jīvamapi gṛhṇanna kṛtāparādho 'si ||" kācidatyanurāgiṇī nāyakamanyānuraktamapi vārtākaraṇāyātaṃ doṣagarbhamāha—sukheti | he jvara, sukhapṛcchakaṃ tavāṅge sukhamadhuneti praśnakārakaṃ janaṃ durlabhamapi mama kṛte dūradeśādānayamāna prāpaka, ata evopakāraka, jīvamapi gṛhṇan tvaṃ na kṛtāparādho 'si | sukhaṃ suṣṭhu pṛcchati sukhapṛcchakaḥ | ‘kriyāsamabhihāre vun’ iti yogavibhāgādvun | atra sukhapṛcchaketyādinā svābhiprāyasidhdyānuraktāyā jvaraṃ prati vākyam | tenāprastutastutirjāyate na tvabhidhīyata iti | kāmabādhāmāha—śarīreti || ityaprastutapraśaṃsālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
tulyayogitālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
tulyayogitālakṣaṇamāha—
vivakṣitaguṇotkṛṣṭairyatsamīkṛtya kasyacit |
kīrtanaṃ stutinindarthaṃ sā matā tulyayogitā || 54 ||
vivakṣiteti | vivakṣito vaktumiṣṭo yo guṇastenotkṛṣṭā adhikā ye taiḥ saha stutyarthaṃ nindārthaṃ vā kasyacitsutyasya nindyasya vā tena guṇena tasya yatsamīkṛtya ﻿
kīrtanamabhidhānaṃ sā tulyayogitā | guṇo 'tra dharmaḥ sādhurasādhurvā | atra eva stutirvā nindā vā syāt ||
sā abhidhīyamānatulyaguṇatvena stutyarthā yathā—
‘śeṣo himagiristvaṃ ca mahānto guravaḥ sthirāḥ |
imāṃ laṅghitamaryādāṃ calantīṃ bibhṛtha kṣitim || 117 ||’
atrābhidhīyamānamahattvādiguṇotkṛṣṭābhyāṃ śeṣāhituṣāraśailābhyāṃ saha stutyarthaṃ tulyayogena kṣitipaterabhihitatvādiyaṃ stutyarthā tulyayogitā ||
śeṣa ityādi | śeṣaḥ sarpaṃbhado himālayastvaṃ ca sarve yūyamimāṃ kṣitiṃ bibhṛtha dhārayatha | kīdṛśāḥ | mahānto mahattvavantaḥ guravo gurutvāśrayāḥ sthirāḥ sthairyavantaśca | kīdṛśīm | laṅghitātikrāntā maryādā yayā tāmata eva calantīmitastato gāminīṃ ca | atra mahattvādikamabhihitam | bhūpasya ca śeṣahimādribhyāṃ tulyatākhyāpanenotkṛṣṭasāmyakathanātstutiyogaḥ ||
abhidhīyamānatulyaguṇatva eva nindārthā yathā—
‘saṃgatāni mṛgākṣīṇāṃ taḍidvilasitānyapi |
kṣaṇadva‍yaṃ na tiṣṭhanti ghanārabdhānyapi svayam || 118 ||’
atra ghanārabdhānyapītyādibhirabhidhīyamānatulyaguṇānāṃ mṛgākṣīsaṃgatānāṃ taḍidvilasitānāṃ ca nindārthaṃ tulyayogenābhidhānādiyaṃ nindārthā tulyayogitā ||
saṃgatānītyādi | mṛgākṣīṇāṃ saṃgatāni saṃgamāḥ svayaṃ ghanaṃ nirantaramārabdhānyapi kṛtānyapi, tathā taḍitāṃ vidyutāṃ vilasitāni ca ghanairmedhairārabdhānyapi kṣaṇadvayamārambhakṣaṇādūrdhvamaparamapi kṣaṇaṃ na tiṣṭhanti; kuto dīrghakālam | atra prasiddhacāpalayā vidyutā s‍trīṇāṃ saṃgamasya capalatā samīkṛtyocyata iti nindātulyayogiteyam ||
pratīyamānatulyaguṇatve stutyarthā yathā—
‘yamaḥ kubero varuṇaḥ sahasrākṣo bhavānapi |
bibhratyananyaviṣayāṃ lokapāla iti śrutim || 119 ||’
﻿
atra yamādayaḥ pañca bhavanto lokapālā ityanuktamapi tulyavastuyogitayaiva stutyarthameṣāṃ mithaḥ sādṛśyaṃ pratīyate; seyaṃ pratīyamānatulyaguṇatve stutyarthā tulyayogitā ||
yama ityādi | yamādayo bhavanto 'nanyaviṣayāmananyagāminīṃ lokapāla ityanenākāreṇa śrutiṃ khyātiṃ bibhrati dhārayanti | sahasrākṣa indraḥ | ‘śrutiḥ khyātau ca vede ca’ iti viśvaḥ | atra catvāro yamādayo lokapālāḥ, idānīṃ bhavān pañcamo lokapālaśabdavācya iti yamādisamānatākhyāpanenotkṛṣṭasāmyakathanādrājñaḥ stutiḥ | sā tu pratīyamānatulyaguṇenaiva ||
pratīyamānatulyaguṇatva eva nindārthā yathā—
‘rājānamapi sevante viṣamapyupabhuñjate |
ramante ca parastrībhirviṣamāḥ‘raho sāhasikā narāḥ’ iti pāṭhaḥ khalu mānavāḥ || 120 ||’
atra yo 'yaṃ sevādirmānavānāṃ rājaviṣaye strīṣu ca vaiṣamyahetutulyatvena yogo rājādīnāṃ vā ‘karmatvādirūpasya’ iti ka khakarmāditulyatayā tatkriyāyāṃ samāveśaḥ so 'mīṣāṃ mithaḥ sādṛśyaṃ pratyāyayan rājasevāparastrīratyorviṣopabhogatulyatāṃ gamayatīti seyaṃ pratīyamānatulyaguṇatve nindarthā tulyayogitā ||
rājānamityādi | bhūpamapi sevante, viṣamapyupabhuñjate khādanti, anyastrībhiḥ saha ramante vilasanti | ato manuṣyā viṣamāḥ sāhasikāḥ | khalu hetau | atra viṣamatāyāṃ vā tulyayogastatkriyāviṣayatayā vā rājasevāparastrīratyorviṣopamogatulyatāṃ bodhayati sa ca pratīyamāna eva ||
matāntareṇa tulyayogitāmāha—
anye sukhanimitte ca duḥkhahetau ca vastuni |
stutinindārthamevāhustulyatve tulyayogitām || 55 ||
anye iti | sukhahetuduḥkhahetuvastunoḥ stutinindāryaṃ sāmye tulyayogitāmanye prāhuḥ ||
﻿
sā stutyarthā yathā—
‘āhūtasyābhiṣekāya visṛṣṭasya vanāya ca |
na mayā lakṣitastasya svalpo 'pyākāravibhramaḥ || 121 ||’
atra rāmasya rājyābhiṣekavanagamanayoḥ piturādeśena tulyarūpatayā stutiḥ pratīyate ||
āhūtasyetyādi | abhiṣekāya rājyābhiṣekāyāhūtasya kṛtāhvānasya, vanāya vanaṃ gantuṃ visṛṣṭasya ca tasya rāmasya svalpo 'pyākāravibhrama ākārānyathātvaṃ mayā na lakṣitaḥ | ‘anyathātve 'pi vibhramaḥ’ iti dharaṇiḥ | atra rājyābhiṣekaḥ sukhahetuḥ, vanagamanaṃ duḥkhahetuḥ, tayoḥ pitṛbhakta‍yā tulyatvena stutitvam ||
nindārthā yathā—
‘yaśca nimbaṃ paraśunā yaścainaṃ madhusarpiṣā |
yaścaina gandhamālyābhyāṃ sarvasya kaṭureva saḥ || 122 ||’
atra yaḥ paraśunā chinatti, yo 'muṃ madhusarpiṣā siñcati, yo vā gandhamālyābhyāmarcati taṃ prati tulyameva nimbasya kaṭutvamiti samāsoktyā tadupameyasya nindā pratīyate ||
yaścetyādi | yo nimbavṛkṣaṃ paraśunā kuṭhāreṇa chinatti, yaścainaṃ nimbaṃ madhusarpiṣā madhusahitena ghṛtena siñcati, yaścainaṃ gandhamālyābhyāmarcati sarvasya kṛte sa nimbaḥ kaṭureva tikta eva | ‘puṣpapuṣpasrajormālyam’ ityamaraḥ | atra samāsoktayā samasanena | sāmyāpādaneneti yāvat | upameyanindajñānam || iti tulyayogitālaṃkārānirūpaṇam ||
leśālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
leśalakṣaṇamāha—
doṣasya yo guṇībhāvo doṣībhāvo guṇasya yaḥ |
sa leśaḥ syāttato nānyā vyājastutirapīṣyate || 56 ||
doṣasyeti | doṣasya guṇatvam, guṇasya ca doṣatvaṃ yattadeva leśalakṣaṇam | tarhi vyājastutāvapyevam | tathā cātivyāptiḥ | ata uktam—tata iti | tato leśāvdyājastutirabhinnaiveti | nātivyāptirityarthaḥ ||
﻿
tatra doṣasya guṇībhāvo leśo yathā—
‘yuvaiṣa guṇavān‍rājā yogyaste patirūrjitaḥ |
raṇotsave manaḥ saktaṃ yasya kāmotsavādapi || 123 ||’
atra yeyamuttarārdhena rājño vīryaprakarṣasya stutiḥ sā kanyāyā nirantarānbhogān nirvivikṣordoṣatvena pratibhāsiṣyata ityabhipretya yo 'yaṃ vidagdhasakhyā rājaprakopaparijihīrṣayā doṣo 'pi guṇarūpeṇoktaḥ; so 'yaṃ doṣasya guṇībhāvo nāma leśato 'lpatayā śanairananyavidita ucyamāno leśa ityucyate ||
yuvetyādi | svayaṃvare kasminnapi nṛpe darśitabhāvāṃ sakhīṃ nivartayituṃ kāpi stutivyājāttaṃ nindati | yuvatvaguṇitvanṛpatvabalavattvebhya eṣa tava patiryogyaḥ | yasya kāmotsavādapi viṣayotsavamanādṛtya raṇotsave manaḥ saktamāsaktam | nirvivikṣorupabhoktumicchoḥ kanyāyāḥ | ‘nirveśa upabhogaḥ syāt’ ityamaraḥ | atra vidagdhayā sakhyā rājakopaśāntaye bhogecchuṃ prati vīryaprakarṣarūpastavasya doṣatve 'pi guṇatvenālpatayopanyasanālleśo 'yaṃ doṣasya guṇībhāvalakṣaṇaḥ | alpatayaivātra leśatā ||
guṇasya doṣībhāvo yathā—
‘capalo nirdayaścāsau janaḥ kiṃ tena me sakhi |
āgaḥ pramārjanāyaiva cāṭavo yena śikṣitāḥ || 124 ||’
atra pūrvārghena mānaparigrahānuguṇaṃ sakhīnāmagrataḥ prakāśaṃ pratijñāya tadanirvāhamāśaṅkamānā tadupahāsaṃ parijihīrṣurdoṣābhāsaṃ tadguṇagrāmamāha —āgaḥpramārjanāyaiva cāṭavo yena śikṣitā iti; so 'yaṃ guṇasya doṣībhāvo nāma leśabhedo bhavati | anye punaḥ samastameva leśalakṣaṇamācakṣate—yatra doṣasya guṇībhāvo guṇasya ca doṣībhāva iti | so 'pi dvidhā—samāsoktyā, asamāsoktyā ca ||
capala iti | he sakhi, capalo nirbhayaścāsau jano bhavatu tena mama kim | kiṃtu na kimapi | yena janenāgaḥpramārjanāyāparādhaproñchanāya paraṃ cāṭavaḥ priyavādāḥ ﻿
śikṣitāḥ | ‘āgo 'parādho mantuśca’ ityamaraḥ | atra doṣavadābhāsate pratibhātīti doṣābhāso na tvayaṃ paramārthato doṣaḥ | cāṭukāritā hi guṇo yena kṛtāparādho 'pi māmanukūlayanmānabhaṅgaṃ karoti | ata eva ca tatrānurāgaḥ | tathā ca capala ityādinā sakhījanoddiṣṭaṃ mānaṃ rāgātkartumaśaktatayā bālayā cāṭukāritā doṣābhāso guṇaḥ ko 'pi darśita iti guṇasya doṣatātra | guṇadoṣayormilitayoreva tattvaṃ leśa iti matamāha—anye iti | samāsoktirgopanena bhaṇanam, asamāsoktiḥ sphuṭabhaṇanam ||
tayoḥ samāsoktyā yathā—
‘guṇānāmeva daurātmyāddhuri dhuryo niyujyate |
asaṃjātakiṇaskandhaḥ sukhaṃ svapiti gaurgaliḥ || 125 ||’
ayamapi prakopabhayālleśenaivocyata iti leśaḥ ||
guṇānāmityādi | guṇānāṃ vahanakṣamatvādīnāṃ daurātmyāddoṣāddhuryo dhuraṃdharo gaurvṛṣo dhuri dhurāyāṃ niyujyate | galiḥ punargaurasaṃjāto 'nutpannaḥ kiṇo mṛtaśoṇitamāṃsapiṇḍo yatredṛśaḥ skandho sasya sa sukhaṃ yathā syādevaṃ svapiti | dhuraṃ vahatīti dhuryaḥ | ‘dhuro yaṅḍhakau 4|4|77’ iti yat | ‘kiṇaḥ syānmṛtaśoṇite’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | 'galistu vahanāśakte’ ityapi | atra roṣabhayādeva samāsena guṇadoṣayorabhidhānālleśaḥ ||
asamāsoktyā yathaā—
‘santaḥ saccaritodayavyasaninaḥ prādurbhavadyantraṇāḥ sarvatraiva janāpavādacakitā jīvanti duḥkhaṃ sadā |
avyutpannamatiḥ kṛtena na satā naivāsatā vyākulo yuktāyuktavivekaśūnyahṛdayo dhanyo janaḥ prākṛtaḥ || 126 ||’
atrāpi prakopabhayādi pūrvavat | athaiṣa vyastalakṣaṇatvena kasmānna leśa ityucyate | doṣaguṇībhāvasyāprastutastutyā guṇadoṣībhāvasya tu vyājastutyāpahārāt ||
santa ityādi | santaḥ sadā duḥkhaṃ yathā syādevaṃ jīvanti | kīdṛśāḥ | saccaritasya savdyāpārasyodaye vyasanina āsaktāḥ | prādurbhavantyāvirbhavanti yantraṇā anāpattayo yeṣāṃ te | sarvatra karye janānāmapavāde dūṣaṇoktau cakitāḥ satarkāḥ | ata ﻿
eva duḥkhamayatā | prākṛto 'vivikto jano dhanyo 'sti | kīdṛśaḥ | avyutpannā aviśeṣavatī matiryasya saḥ | na satā sādhunā kṛtena kāryeṇa naivāsatā asādhunā kāryeṇa vyākulaḥ | sādhvasādhukāryarahita ityarthaḥ | ata eva idaṃ kṛtyamidamakṛtyamiti vicāraśūnyahṛdayaśca | atrāpi roṣabhayādeva leśato 'bhidhānam | doṣaguṇībhāvo guṇadoṣībhāvaśca vyasto 'tra kathaṃ na leśa iti pṛcchati—atheti | attaram | doṣeti | ādyasyāprastutastutyām, antyasya vyājastutyāṃ viṣayīkaraṇāttayorevāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ ||
vyājastutirapi dvidhā—śuddhā miśrā ca | tayoḥ śuddhā yathā—
‘puṃsaḥ purāṇādācchidya śrīstvayā paribhujyate |
rājannikṣvākuvaṃśyasya kimidaṃ tava yujyate || 127 ||’
atra śuddhaparadārāpaharaṇalakṣaṇanindāvyājena stutervihitatvādiyaṃ śuddhānāma vyājastutirguṇadoṣībhāvalakṣaṇālleśānna pṛthak ||
puṃsa ityādi | purāṇātpuṃsaḥ purāṇapuruṣādviṣṇoḥ śrīḥ kamalā ācchidya gṛhītvā tvayā paribhujyate sevyate | he rājan, ikṣvākurnṛpaviśeṣo vaṃśyo yasya tasya tavedaṃ kiṃ yujyate | kiṃtu nārhatīti nindābhāsaḥ | atha ca purāṇātpuṃso vṛddhātpuruṣācchrīḥ saṃpadācchidya tvayā bhujyata iti tātparyārthaḥ | atra śrīpade vyājaḥ | sa ca śuddha eva | tena ca śuddhiriha || leśābhedamāha—guṇeti |
miśrā yathā—
‘priyo 'si prājño 'si prabhurasi kulīno 'syasi yuvā yuvatyastvāmevaṃ kati na patimurvīśa vṛṇate |
ataścaitāṃ kīrtiṃ raghunahuṣamāndhātṛmahiṣīṃ parāmraṣṭuṃ vṛddhāmadhigatanayo nārhati bhavān || 128 ||’
atra stutipadamiśraiva vyājagarhayā stutiritīyaṃ miśrānāma vyājastutirleśabhedaḥ ||
priya ityādi | he rājan, priyaḥ prīto 'si | prājña utkṛṣṭamatirasi | īśvaro 'si | śuddhavaṃśo 'si | taruṇo 'si | evaṃ sati kiyatyastaruṇyastvāṃ patiṃ na vṛṇate na svīkurvanti | ato hetoretāṃ kīrti parāmraṣṭumākramituṃ bhavānnārhati | kīdṛśīm | raghunahuṣamāndhātṝṇāṃ nṛpaviśeṣāṇāṃ mahiṣīṃ mahādevīmata eva vṛddhāmativayaskāṃ ca | ﻿
‘kṛtābhiṣekā mahiṣī’ ityamaraḥ | atra mahiṣīvṛddhāpadayorvyājāt kapaṭānnindāstutirleśata eva || iti leśālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
sahokta‍yalaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
sahoktilakṣaṇamāha—
kartrādīnāṃ samāveśaḥ sahānyairyaḥ kriyādiṣu |
viviktaścāviviktaśca sahoktaḥ sā nigadyate || 57 ||
vaisādṛśyavatī ceyamucyamānā manīṣibhiḥ |
sahevādiprayogeṣu sasādṛśyā ca dṛśyate || 58 ||
kartreti | kriyādiṣu kartrādīnāmanyaiḥ saha yaḥ samāveśo 'vasthānaṃ sā sahoktiḥ | ādipadātkarmādiparigrahaḥ | sa samāveśo viviktaḥ kevalaḥ, avivikto miśraḥ ||
sā kartṛviviktakriyāsamāveśe yathā—
‘kokilālāpamadhurāḥ sugandhivanavāyavaḥ |
yānti sārdhaṃ janānandairvṛddhiṃ surabhivāsarāḥ || 129 ||’
atra surabhivāsarā iti kartṛpadārthaḥ kevala eva janānandaiḥ saha vṛddhiprāptikriyāyāṃ samāviṣṭa iti seyaṃ viviktakartṛkriyāsamāveśā nāma vaisādṛśyavatī sahoktiḥ ||
kokiletyādi | surabhivāsarā vasantadivasāḥ janaharṣaiḥ saha vṛddhiṃ yānti | kīdṛśāḥ | kokilālāpo madhuro manoharo yeṣu te, sugandhayaḥ śobhanagandhavanto vanavāyavo malayānilā yeṣu te | atra kevalasya karturvasantadinasya janānandaiḥ saha vṛddhiprāptikriyāsamāveśaḥ | sa ca visadṛśa eva | dinavṛddherdaṇḍādhikyarūpatvāt, ānandavṛddheratisukharūpatvāt ||
karmaṇo viviktakriyāsamāveśe yathā—
‘ujjhasi piāi samaaṃ taha vi hu re bhaṇasi kīsa kisiaṃ tti |
uvaribhareṇa a aṇṇua muaï vaïllo vi aṅgaïṃ || 130 ||’
[uhyase priyayā samadaṃ tathāpi khalu re bhaṇasi kimiti kṛśeti |
uparibhareṇa ca he ajña muñcati vṛṣabho 'pyaṅgāni ||]
﻿
atra saṃbodhyamānayuṣmadarthaḥ karmatāmāpanna uhyasa iti kriyāyāṃ kevala eva kriyāpadārthena saha samāviṣṭaḥ; seyaṃ viviktakarmakriyāsamāveśā nāma vaisādṛśyavatī sahoktiḥ ||
ujjhasītyādi | "uhyase priyayā samadaṃ tathāpi khalu re bhaṇasi kimiti kṛśeti | uparibhareṇa ca he ajña muñcati vṛṣabho 'pyaṅgāni ||" aparādhavatā kenacidabalā durbalā kimiti tvaṃ kṛśeti pṛṣṭā | tamuddiśyāha—uhyasa iti | priyayā samadaṃ sagarvaṃ yathā syādevaṃ tvamuhyase bhriyase | tathāpi re tvaṃ vadasi kimiti kṛśāsi tvamiti | he ajña jñānahīna, uparibhareṇa goṇyādigauraveṇa vṛṣabho 'pyaṅgāni muñcati tyajati | kiṃ punaravaleti bhāvaḥ | uhyasa iti ‘vaha prāpaṇe’ karmaṇi lakāraḥ | vaïllo vṛṣabhaḥ | reśabdaḥ sākṣepasaṃbodhane | atra vahanakriyāyāṃ tvamiti bodhyo 'rthaḥ karmībhūtaḥ kevala eva priyāpadārthena saha samāśliṣṭastayośca visadṛśatā vyaktaiva ||
viviktāyā eva lakṣaṇāntaramāha—
yatrāneko 'pi kartrādiḥ praviviktaiḥ kriyādibhiḥ |
viviktabhāvaṃ labhate viviktā sāpi kathyate || 59 ||
yatreti | yatrānekaḥ kartrādirbhinnai kriyādibhirbhedaṃ labhate sā vivikteti kathyate ||
sā kartṛdva‍yasya pṛthak kriyāsamāveśe yathā—
‘varghate saha pānthānāṃ mūrcchayā cūtamañjarī |
vahanti ca samaṃ teṣāmaśrumirmalayānilāḥ || 131 ||’
atra cūtamañjarī mūrcchayā saha varghanakriyāyām, malayānilāścāśrubhiḥ saha vahanakriyāyāṃ pṛthak pṛthagvivekenaiva kartāraḥ samāviṣṭāḥ, seyamapi viviktakartṛkriyāsamāveśaiva vaisādṛśyavatī sahoktiḥ | evaṃ karmaṇo 'pi viveke draṣṭavyā |
vardhata ityādi | cūtamañjarī pānthānāṃ mūrcchayā saha vardhate, malayānilāsteṣāṃ pānthānāmaśrubhiḥ saha vahanti vānti bhraśyanti ca | ‘pathikaḥ pāntha ityapi’ ityamaraḥ | atra cūtamañjaryādestatkriyāyāṃ vivekenaiva kartṛtvena samāveśaḥ | visadṛśatā tu vyaktaiva ||
﻿
kartṝṇāmaviviktakriyāsamāveśe yathā—
‘dhīreṇa ‘ṇisāāmā’ iti setubandhe pāṭhaḥsamaṃ jāmā hiaeṇa samaṃ aṇiṭṭhiā uvaesā |
ucchāheṇa saha bhuā bāheṇa samaṃ galanti se ullāvā || 132’
[dhairyeṇa samaṃ yāmā hṛdayena samamaniṣṭhitā upadeśāḥ |
utsāhena saha bhujau bāṣpeṇa samaṃ galantyasyā ullāpāḥ ||]
atra yāmādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ dhairyādibhiḥ saha galanakriyāyāmekasyāmevāviviktaḥ samāveśo dṛśyate; seyamaviviktakartṛkriyāsamāveśā nāma vaisādṛśyavatī sahoktiḥ ||
dhīreṇetyādi | "dhairyeṇa samaṃ yāmā hṛdayena samamaniṣṭhitā upadeśāḥ | utsāhena saha bhujau bāṣpeṇa samaṃ galantyasyā ullāpāḥ ||" asya rāmasya dhairyeṇa samaṃ yāmā rātripraharā galanti | hṛdayena samamaniṣṭhitā anirvyụ̄dhā aniścitā vā upadeśā galanti | utsāhena saha bhujā bāhavo galanti | bāṣpeṇa samamullāpā ālāpā vacanāni galanti | dhairyavigamānucite sadupadeśāvasthitiḥ | tato manaḥśūnyatā, tata utsāhatyāgaḥ, tato bhujaskhalanam, tato 'śruṇā saha vacanateti krameṇādhikārtito manmathadaśādhikyamuktam | utsāho 'dhyavasāyaḥ | atra galanakriyāyā ekatvenāviviktatā | vaisādṛśyaṃ ca vyaktameva ||
karmaṇāmaviviktakriyāsamāveśe ivaśabdena sahaśabdasya sthāne sasādṛśyā yathā—
‘dhīraṃ va jalasamūhaṃ timiṇivahaṃ via sapakkhapavvaaloam |
ṇaïsotteva taraṅge raaṇāiṁ va garuaguṇasaāiṁ vahantam || 133 ||’
[dhairyamiva jalasamūhaṃ timinivahamiva sapakṣaparvatalokam |
nadīsrotāṃsīva taraṅgān ratnānīva gurukaguṇaśatāni vahantam ||]
atra dhairyeṇa saha jalasamūhasya, timinivahena sapakṣaparvatalokasya, nadīsrotobhistaraṅgāṇām, ratnaiśca gurukaguṇaśatānāṃ mithaḥ pratīyamānaṃ sādṛśyamivena dyotyate | sahārthaśca vākyārthasāmarthyena labhyata iti seyaṃ ﻿
dhairyādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ vahanakriyāyāmekasyāmevāvivekataḥ karmabhūtānāmāveśenāviviktakarmakriyāsamāveśā nāma sasādṛśyā sahoktiḥ ||
dhīraṃ vetyādi | "dhairyamiva jalasamūhaṃ timinivahamiva sapakṣaparvatalokam | nadīsrotāṃsīva taraṅgān ratnānīva gurukaguṇaśatāni vahantam ||" iha samudraṃ kīdṛśam | dhairyamiva jalasamūhaṃ vahantam, timinivahamiva matsyaviśeṣasamūhamiva sapakṣaṃ pakṣayuktam, svapakṣaṃ svamitraṃ vā parvatalokaṃ mainākādikaṃ vahantam, nadīpravāhāniva taraṅgān vahantam, ratnānīva gurukaguṇaśatāni mahattvādīni vahantam || ‘asti matsyastimirnāma śatayojanavistṛtaḥ |’ iti rāmāyaṇam | ‘samūhe 'pi mato lokaḥ’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | guruketi svārthe kan | atra dhairyajalasamūhādīnāṃ mithaḥ sādṛśyaṃ vyaktameva pratīyamānamivaśabdena dyotyate, sāhityaṃ ca vākyārthatayā gamyata iti sahoktiriyaṃ sādṛśyavatī ||
grahaṇaprayojanamāha—
ādigrahaṇādguṇasamāveśe 'pi guṇinaḥ sasādṛśyā yathā—
‘saha dīrghā mama śvāsairimāḥ saṃprati rātrayaḥ |
pāṇḍurāśca mamaivāṅgaiḥ saha tāścandramūṣaṇāḥ || 134 ||’
atra rātrayo dīrghāḥ pāṇḍurāśceti dairghyapāṇḍuratvaguṇayoravivekena rātriṣu rātrīṇāṃ ca tayoḥ śvāsairaṅgaiśca saha samāveśo dṛśyate; seyamaviviktaguṇasamāveśānāmevādyaprayoge 'pi sasādṛśyā sahoktiḥ |
ādīti || sahetyādi | imā rātrayaḥ saṃprati virahāvasthāyāṃ mama saha dīrghāḥ, mamaivāṅgaiḥ saha candrabhūṣaṇāścandrālaṃkārāstā rātrayaḥ pāṇḍurāśca | candrabhūṣaṇatvaṃ rātrīṇāṃ pāṇḍuratve hetuḥ | virahadaśāyāṃ khedānniḥ śvāsadīrghatā, aṅgapāṇḍimā, rātridīrghatā ca bhavati | atra dīrghatvapāṇḍutvaguṇayoḥ samāveśaḥ sādṛśyagarma eveti sasādṛśyeyaṃ sahoktiḥ || iti sahoktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
samuccayālakāranirūpaṇam |
samuccayalakṣaṇamāha—
dravyakriyāguṇādīnāṃ kriyādravyaguṇādiṣu |
niveśanamanekeṣāmekataḥ syātsamuccayaḥ || 60 ||
﻿
itaretarayogo yaḥ samāhāro ya ucyate |
anvācaya ihānyo yaḥ so 'pi nānyaḥ samuccayāt || 61 ||
dvipadāśrayaścāpi sa syātsa syādbahupadāśrayaḥ |
ubhayāśrayaśca sa syātsa syādanubhayāśrayaḥ || 62 ||
trayaḥ pratipadaṃ vā syurdyotakairuttaratra vā |
padaiḥ śuddhāśca miśrāśca turīyo dyotakaṃ vinā || 63 ||
dravyeti | dravyādīnāmekakriyādisamāveśaḥ samuccayaḥ | itaretarayogādīnāṃ samuccayāmedamāha—itareti | itaretarayogaḥ parasparāpekṣāvayavabhedānugataḥ samuccayaḥ | samāhārastirohitāvayavabhedaḥ saṃhatipradhānaḥ samuccaya eva, anvācayo yatraikaṃ pradhānamanyadapradhānamanvīyate saḥ | samuccayaṃ vibhajate—dvipadeti | ubhayaṃ dvipadabahupade | anubhayamadvipadabahupade | eṣu madhye ādyāstrayaḥ pratipadaṃ vottaratra vā padadyotakaiḥ saha saṃbhavantītyāha—traya iti | traya eva śuddhā miśrāśca bhavanti | turīyo 'nubhayāśrayaḥ samuccayo dyotakaṃ cakārādikaṃ vinaiva bhavati ||
tatra dvipadāśrayaḥ pratipadāśritadyotakatvena dravyayoḥ kriyāsamuccayo yathā—
‘niryatā parijanena bodhitaḥ sphūrjamānarucirullasaddaśaḥ |
dvārasaṃvalanamāṃsalo 'dhikaṃ dīpakaśca madanaśca didyute || 135 ||’
atra dīpakaśca madanaśceti dve dravye pratipadaṃ cakāreṇaikasyāṃ didyute iti kriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśite; tena didyutāte iti dvivacanam, dīpakamadanāviti cārthe dvandvaśca na bhavati ||
niryatetyādi | dīpakaḥ praśastadīpaśca madanaḥ kāmaścādhikaṃ didyute dīpto babhūva | kīdṛśaḥ | niryatā gacchatā sevakena sakhyādinā ca bodhitaḥ prakāśito jāgaritaśca | sphūrjamānā sphurantī rucirdīptiranurāgaśca yasya saḥ | ullasantī daśā vartiravasthā ca sya saḥ | dvāre gṛhadvāre madanabodhakabhāve ca saṃvalanaṃ milanaṃ tena māṃsalaḥ sphītaḥ | dīpaka iti praśaṃsāyāṃ kan | didyuta iti ‘dyuta dīptau’ ityasya liṭi rūpam | ﻿
atra cakārābhyāṃ dravyayorekakriyāniveśanātsamuccayaḥ | yadi samuccayena niveśanaṃ na syāttadā doṣamāha—teneti | anyonyanirapekṣatayā dvivacanaṃ dvandvaśca syādityarthaḥ ||
dvipadāśraya evottarapadāśritadyotakena kriyayordravyasamuccayo yathā—
‘nikāmaṃ kṣāmāṅgī sarasakadalīgarbhasubhagā kalāśeṣā mūrtiḥ śaśina iva netrotsavakarī |
avasthāmāpannā madanadahanoddāhavidhurā- miyaṃ naḥ kalyāṇī ramayati manaḥ kampayati ca 136’
atra ramayati kampayati ceti dve kriye uttarapadavartinā cakāreṇaikasminmanolakṣaṇe dravye karmaṇi samuccayenaikakālameva niveśite; tenāyamanvācayo na bhavati ||
nikāmamityādi | iyaṃ mālatī no 'smākaṃ mano ramayati kampayati ca | kīdṛśī | madana eva dahano 'gnistasmāduddāhaḥ prakṛṣṭadāhastena vidhurā vihvalāmavasthāṃ daśāmāpannā prāptā | ata e nikāmamatyarthaṃ kṣīṇāṅgī | saraso yaḥ kadalyā garbho majjā tadvatsubhagā manoharā | anena pāṇḍuratā tīkṣṇatā coktā | candrasya kalāśeṣā kalanāmātrāvasthitā mūrtiriva netrānandajanikā kalyāṇī kuśalavatī | kadalyā garbhapadenātipāṇḍuratvakomalatve dhvanite | prakṛtakāryasaṃpādakatayā ramayati | atipīḍayāriṣṭāśāṅ‍kitvānmanaḥkampanamihetyāśayaḥ | atra kampayati cetyuttarapadasthena cakāreṇaikatra manolakṣaṇe dravye kriyādvayaniveśanātsamuccayaḥ | samuccayena niveśanābhāve doṣamāha—teneti | parasparanairapekṣye uttarapadasthacakāreṇānvācayāpattirityarthaḥ ||
bahupadāśrayaḥ pratipadāśritadyotakatvena guṇānāṃ kriyāsamuccayo yathā—
‘aprākṛtastu kathamastu na vismayāya yasminnuvāsa karuṇā ca kṛtajñatā ca |
lakṣmīśca sāttvikaguṇajvalitaṃ ca tejo dharmaśca mānavijayau ca parākramaśca || 137 ||’
atra karuṇā ca kṛtajñatā cetyādayo guṇāḥ pratyekaṃ bahupadāśrayatvena ﻿
cākareṇaikasyāmuvāseti kriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśyante | tena guṇeṣu bahuvacanaṃ na bhavati, karuṇākṛtajñatādīnāṃ dvandvasamāsaśca na bhavati yasminnityapekṣāyāṃ cāyameva guṇānāṃ dravyasamuccayo bhavati ||
aprākṛta ityādi | sa nṛpatirvismayāya kathaṃ nāstu | kīdṛśaḥ | aprākṛto 'nīcaḥ | mahājana iti yāvat | ‘nīcaḥ prākṛtaśca pṛthagjanaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | yasmin karuṇā dayā, kṛtajñatā vijñatā, lakṣmīḥ saṃpattiḥ, sāttvikaguṇena jājvalyamānaṃ tejaśca, dharmaḥ sukṛtaṃ, māno vinayaḥ, parākramaścovāsa vasati sma | iha kāruṇikasya karuṇāmātrapravṛttyā kṛtajñatāyāḥ sāhajiko 'bhāva iti | tathā cāsminnubhayamiti mahājanatāsya sūcitā | tathāpyalakṣmīkasya na kimapi ślāghāviṣaya iti salakṣmīkatoktā | tathāpi niḥsāttvikasya kuto mahājanatvamataḥ sāttvikaguṇādhikyamuktam | niṣpratāpasya sarvamuktaṃ lakṣaṇalaśobhākarameva bhavatīti tejasa ādhikyamuktam | bhavatu yathoktaguṇasaṃpattiḥ, adhārmike sarve guṇā viguṇāyante | tadartamāha—dharmaśceti | mānavinayaparākramāḥ pratyekaṃ mahāpuruṣe viśeṣaguṇā iti te 'pyuktā iti | atrānekapadāśritacakārairekākriyāyāṃ nānāguṇāḥ samuccayena niveśitā iti samuccayatā || tadabhāve doṣamāha—teneti | asamuccayaniveśe karuṇādaya ūṣuriti syādityarthaḥ | yasminniti | yadi yasminnityaikadravye guṇasamuccayavivakṣātra tadā so 'pi bhavatītyarthaḥ ||
bahupadāśraya evottarapadāśritadyotakatvena guṇānāṃ kriyāsamuccayo yathā—
‘rūpamapratividhānamanojñaṃ prema kāryamanapekṣya vikāśi |
cāṭu cākṛtakasaṃbhramamāsāṃ kārmaṇatvamagamadramaṇeṣu || 138 ||’
atra rūpaṃ prema cāṭu ceti bahavo guṇā uttarapadāśrayeṇa cakāreṇāgamadityekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśyante, tenāgamanniti bahuvacanaṃ dvandvo vā na syāt | kārmaṇatvamityapekṣāyāṃ cāyameva guṇānāṃ jātisamuccayo bhavati ||
rūpamityādi | āsāṃ srīṇāṃ ramaṇeṣu viṣaye idamidaṃ kārmaṇatvaṃ vaśīkaraṇe mūlakarmatvamāgamat yayau | apratividhānenānirbandhena | sahajeneti yāvat | manojñarūpaṃ kāryamanapekṣya vikāśi sahajaprakāśavatprem, akṛtakaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbhrama ﻿
ādaro yatredṛśaṃ cāṭu kauśalaṃ ca | ‘mūlakarma tu kārmaṇam’ ityamaraḥ| atra rūpādayo guṇā antyapadasthitacakāreṇa gamanarūpākriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśitā iti samuccayaḥ | tadabhāve doṣamāha—agamanniti | asamuccaye bahuvacanaṃ dvandvaśca syādityarthaḥ | idameva guṇānāṃ kārmaṇatvam | jātyā samuccayena jātisamuccayo 'pītyāha—kārmaṇatvamiti |
ubhayapadāśraya uttarapadāśritadyotakatvena dravyaguṇānāṃ kriyāsamuccayo yathā
‘vicintyamānaṃ manasāpi dehināmidaṃ hi lokeṣu cakāsti durlabham |
niśā sacandrā madirā ca sotpalā priyānurāgo 'bhinavaṃ ca yauvanam ||’
atra niśā madirā ca dravye, anurāgo yauvanaṃ ca guṇau, bahuṣvapi padeṣu dvandve satyapi uttarapadāśrayaniveśinā cakāreṇa cakāstītyekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ niveśyante; tena cakāsatīti bahuvacanaṃ samāsaśca na syāt | ayameva ca durlabhamityapekṣāyāṃ dravyaguṇānāṃ guṇasamuccayo bhavati | te 'mī trayo 'pi śuddhāḥ ||
vicintyetyādi | idaṃ lokeṣu bhuvaneṣu madhye dehināṃ prāṇināṃ vicintyamānaṃ manasāpi dulabhameva cakāsti | hiravadhāraṇe | kiṃ tat | sacandrā rātriḥ, sakamalaṃ madyam, priyāyā anurāgaḥ prītiḥ, abhinavaṃ yauvanaṃ ca | atra dvandvaśo yugalatvenāntyapadasthitacakāreṇaikakriyāniveśaḥ | tadabhāve doṣamāha—teneti | durlabhatvavivakṣayā duḥkhamayatve guṇasamuccayo 'pītyāha—ayamiti ||
miśraḥ punarubhayapadāśrayavadbahupadāśrayaśca bhavati | yathā—
‘ādityacandrāvanilo 'nalaśca dyaurbhūmirāpo hṛdayaṃ yamaśca |
ahaśca rātriśca ubhe ca saṃdhye dharmaśca jānāti narasya vṛttam 140’
atrādityacandrādayo dravyaviśeṣā uttarapadaniveśinā pratipadaniveśinā ca cakāraṇa jānātītyekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ saṃniveśyante | tena ca bahuvacanābhāve samāsābhāve caiṣa miśraḥ samuccayabhedo bhavati || ﻿
ādityetyādi | anilo vāyuḥ, analo 'gniḥ dyaurākāśaḥ, āpo jalam, hṛdayam, yamaḥ, aho dinam, ubhe prātaḥsāyam, dharmo vidhātā cāyaṃ janasya vṛttaṃ caritraṃ jānāti | ādityacandrau jānīta iti vibhaktivipariṇāmenānvayaḥ | ‘dharmo guṇādau lokeśe’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | atrādityādaya uttarapadapratipadaniveśitacakāreṇaikakriyāyāṃ niveśitā iti miśratā | tadabhāve doṣamāha—teneti |
anubhayāśrayastu samuccayo 'nvācayaśca na bhavati | dva‍yorapi dīpakena viṣayāpahārāt | tenetaretarayogasamāhārayoḥ sa udāhriyate tatretaretarayogo yathā—
‘sāvaśeṣapadamuktamupekṣā srastamālyavasanābharaṇeṣu |
gantumutthitamakāraṇataḥ sma dyotayanti madavibhramamāsām || 141 ||’
atroktam, upekṣā, utthitamityete kriyādravyaviśeṣā itaretarayogena madavilāsadyotanakriyāyāṃ niveśyante; tena dyotayantīti bahuvacanaṃ dvandvasamāsaśca tadvivakṣāyāṃ syāt | na ceha dyotakaścakāra uttarapade pratipadaṃ vā vidyata iti so 'yamanubhayāśrayaḥ samuccayamedaḥ ||
anubhayeti | yatra dvipade bahupade vā cakāro nāsti samuccayo 'nvācayo 'pi na bhavati | dīpakalakṣaṇena tasya viṣayīkaraṇādekatravartinā kriyādivācakapadena sarvavākyopakārakatvasya dīpakatvāt, tādṛśasamuccayānvācayayośca tatsattvādityāśayaḥ || sāvaśeṣetyādi |āsāṃ strīṇāmetāni madavibhramaṃ mattatāvilāsaṃ dyotayanti sma | tānyāha —sahāvaśeṣairavaśiṣṭabhāgairvartate sāvaśeṣaṃ sakhaṇḍaṃ padaṃ yatredṛśamuktaṃ vacanam | khaṇḍākṣaravacanamityarthaḥ | srastāni skhalitāni yāni mālāvastrālaṃkaraṇāni teṣūpekṣā asaṃvaraṇam | akāraṇato hetuṃ vinaiva gantuṃ gamanaṃ kartumutthitamutthāna ca | uktamiti bhāve ktaḥ | utthitamityapi bhāve ktaḥ | akāraṇata iti pañcamyāstasiḥ | atroktādervacanādirūpakriyātmakasya tadāśrayasya dravyasya mitho yogena pradhānakriyāyāṃ niveśaḥ | ata eva dyotayantīti bahuvacanam | samuccayasvīkāre doṣamāha—dvandveti ||
samāhāro yathā—
‘vapurvirūpākṣamalakṣyajanmatā digambaratvena niveditaṃ vasu |
vareṣu yadbālamṛgākṣi mṛgyate tadasti kiṃ vyastamapi trilocane 142’
﻿
atra ‘yadvareṣu mṛgyate tatkiṃ trilocane vyastamapyasti’ iti bruvan vapurvayovasūnāṃ samudāyaṃ samastamevābhisaṃdhatte | tasya cāvirbhūtāvayavabhedatvenetaretarayogaḥ, tirohitāvayavabhedatvena samāhāraḥ | sa iha yadityekavacanāntena napuṃsakena ca kathyate | na ceha kvacidapi cakāro 'stīti so 'yamapyanubhayāśrayaḥ samuccayamedaḥ ||
vapurityādi | he bālamṛgākṣi śiśuhariṇanetre gauri, vareṣu yanmṛgyate 'nviṣyate tattrilocane śive vyastamapyekaikamapyasti kim | kiṃtu nāstyeva | tadāha—vapuḥ śarīraṃ virūpamakṣi yatra tādṛśaṃ virūpaṃ virūddhasvarūpam | netre dvitvasaṃbandhasyāviruddhatvāt, tritvasya viruddhatvāt | alakṣyamalakṣaṇīyaṃ janma utpattiḥ kulamiti yāvat | yasya so 'lakṣyajanmā tasya bhāvo 'lakṣyajanmatā | akulīnatetyarthaḥ | diśa evāmbaraṃ yasya tadbhāvena vasu dhanaṃ niveditaṃ kathitam | ‘nagno 'vāsā digambaraḥ’ ityamaraḥ | bhṛgyata iti mṛga anveṣaṇe karmaṇi lakāraḥ | atra vapurādisamuccaye yadā sphuṭāvayavabhedatāṃ tadetaretarayogaḥ | yadā tu tirohitāvayavabhedatā tadā samāhāraḥ | yadityekatvaklībatvābhyāmiha samāhāra evoktaḥ | cakārayoge 'pītaretarayogamāha—na ceti ||
cayoge 'pītaretarayogaḥ | sa uttarapadayoge 'pi yathā—
‘tatkṣaṇaṃ viparivartitāhriyorneṣyatoḥ śayanamiddharāgayoḥ |
sā babhūva vaśavartinī dva‍yoḥ śūlinaḥ suvadanā madasya ca || 143 ||’
atra śūlino madasya cetyattarapadāśrayeṇa cakāreṇa dvau dravyaviśeṣau ‘vaśavartinī’ ityetasmin guṇapade yadītaretarayogena saṃniveśyete tadā ‘viparivartitahriyoḥ’ ityādiṣu ‘dva‍yoḥ’ itiparyanteṣu dvivacanamekaśeṣo vā na syāt | so 'yamapi dvipadāśraya uttarapadāśritadyotakaśca samuccayabhedaḥ ||
tatkṣaṇamityādi | sā suvadanā gaurī śūlino harasya madasya mattatāyāśca dva‍yorvaśavartinī āyattā babhūva | dva‍yoḥ kīdṛśayoḥ | tatkālaṃ viparivartitā vigatā hrīrlajjā yayostayoḥ | iddha upacito rāgo yayostayoḥ | ata eva śayanaṃ neṣyatoḥ śavyāṃ necchatoḥ | atra śūlimadayorvaśavartitva itaretarayogena saṃniveśe doṣamāha—﻿
tadeti | bahupadāśraya uttarapadāśritacakāreṇetaretarayogo bhavatītyāha—evamiti | samāhāramiti | vicintyamānamiti śloke idamityekatvaklībatvābhyāṃ samāhāra ukta ityarthaḥ | dravyādiviṣayatve itaretarayogasamāhārayoḥ sattvādanvācaye viṣayāntaramāha—kriyeti ||
evamapare 'pītaretarayoge 'pi cayogā udāhāryāḥ | samāhārastu cayogaviṣayo vicintyamānamityādinaivoktaḥ, anvācayastu kriyāviṣaya evopapadyate | tatra cottarapadāśraya eva cakāro bhavati || yathā—
‘gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ rūddhāloke narapatipathe sūcibhedyaistamobhiḥ |
saudāminyā kanakanikaṣasnigdhayā darśayorvī toyotsargastanitamukharo mā ca bhūrviklavāstāḥ || 144’
atra pūrvaṃ ‘darśaya’ ityurvīkarmaviṣayatvena kriyāmupanyasya ‘toyotsargastanitamukharo mā ca bhūḥ’ iti tatkartaryeva dharmiṇyakarmakaṃ kriyāntaramanvācīyate, so 'yaṃ bhinnakālatvabhinnaviṣayatvābhyāmanvācayaḥ samuccayādbhinno bhavati ||
nanvevaṃ yadi samuccaye 'pi bhinnaviṣaye kriye tulyakālameva prayujyete; ko doṣaḥ syāt | na kaścit | kiṃtu tasya samuccayamudrayā viṣayo 'pahṛta iti nodāhriyate ||
gacchantīnāmiti | tatra strīṇāṃ saudāminyā vidyutā tvamurvī bhūmiṃ darśaya | kīdṛśīnām | naktaṃ rātrau patigṛhaṃ gacchatīnām | kasmin sati | sūcyagrabhedanīyairandhakārai rājamārge 'varuddhadarśane sati | saudāminyā kīdṛśyā | kanakasya hiraṇyasya nikaṣaḥ kaṣapaṭṭikāyāṃ kaṣaṇarekhā tadvatsnigdhayā ramyayā toyatyāgastanitamukhastvaṃ mā bhūḥ mā bhava | yatastā anāthā viklavā vihvalāḥ syuḥ | ‘nikaṣaḥ kaṣarekhāyāṃ paṭṭikāyāṃ kaṣasya ca’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘stanitaṃ ghanagarjitam’ ityamaraḥ | mābhūrityatra ‘na māṅyoge 6|4|74’ ityaṅ‌niṣedhaḥ | atrādyakriyāmuktvā dvitīyakriyāyā anvācayaḥ | samuccayādbhedamāha—bhinneti | samuccaye ekakālika ﻿
ekaviṣaye 'nvayaḥ, atratvanvaye kālabhedo viṣayabhedaśceti bhedādityarthaḥ | uktavaidharmyayoḥ samuccaye sattvamāśaṅkya pariharati—kiṃtviti | samuccaye ubhayadharmavattve 'pi samuccayatvenaiva viṣayaparihāraḥ, iha tu vivakṣayaiva vinigamanetyāśayaḥ ||
samāse 'pītaretarayogādanubhayāśrayaḥ samuccayabhedo yathā—
‘vāgarthāviva saṃpṛktau vāgarthapratipattaye |
jagataḥ pitarau vande pārvatīparameśvarau || 145 ||’
atra ‘vāgarthāviva’ iti paravalliṅgatā ‘saṃpṛktau pitarau’ ityatra yo 'yaṃ ‘pumān striyā 1|2|67’, ‘pitā mātrā 1|2|70’ iti caikaśeṣastenaiṣa viśeṣalakṣaṇayogādvakroktitve satyalaṃkāratā labhata iti; na dhavakhadirādiṣvatiprasaṅga ityayamapi samuccayabhedaḥ ||
vāgarthāvityādi | ahaṃ gaurīharau vande namāmi | kimartham | vāk cārthaśca tayoḥ pratipattaye niścayāya | kīdṛśau | vāgarthāviva śabdatadabhidheyāviva saṃpṛktau saṃbaddhau | yathā śabdastadvācyo 'rthaśca dvau nityasaṃbaddhau vācyavācakatvasaṃbandhena tathā yau nityasaṃbaddhāvityarthaḥ | jagato lokasya pitarau mātṛjanakau | pitā ca mātā ceti dvandve ‘pitā mātrā 1|2|70’ ityekaśeṣe pitarāviti | pārvatyā mātṛtvena mātuścātigauraveṇābhyārhitatvātpūrvanipātaḥ | ‘sahasreṇa piturmātā gauraveṇātiricyate |’ iti smṛtiḥ | anenārdhanārīśvara uktaḥ | yadvā pārvatīṃ pātīti pārvatīpo haraḥ, ramāyā lakṣmyā īśvaro haristau vande | yadvā pārvatīparo haro māyā lakṣmyā īśvaro haristau haraharī vande | kīdṛśau | lokasya pitarau janakau | anyattulyameva | etena harihararūpamuktamiti kuvyākhyā | ‘ramā lakṣmyāmapīṣyate’ iti viśvaḥ | ‘mā ca lakṣmīrnigadyate’ ityekākṣaraḥ | paravalliṅgatā arthaśabdaliṅgatā | saṃpṛktā ca saṃpṛktaścetyatra ‘pumān striyā 1|2|67’ ityekaśeṣaḥ | ataevoktervakratayehālaṃkāratā | na ca dhavakhadirāvityādiṣu vakroktirato nālaṃkāratā ||
samāhārayogādapi yathā—
‘strīṇāṃ hāvaiḥ kṛte yatra nijakārye manobhuvā |
akṣibhruvanibhaṃ nyastaṃ tanmukhe śarakārmukam || 146 ||’
﻿
atrāpi yo 'yaṃ ‘akṣibhruvam', ‘śarakārmukam', ityetayoḥ ‘dvandvaśca prāṇitūryasenāṅganām 2|4|2’ iti, ‘vāṅmanasākṣibhruva—5|4|77’ iti ca viśeṣalakṣaṇayogastena dhavakhadirapalāśamityevamādiṣu nātiprasaṅgā bhavati ||
strīṇāmityādi | yatra nagare manobhuvā kāmena tanmukhe strīṇāṃ mukhe 'kṣibhruvanibhaṃ netrabhrūvyāja śarakārmukaṃ nyastamāropitam | strīṇāṃ hāvaiḥ śṛṅgārajakriyāmirnijakārye manaścāpalādau kṛte sati | ‘hāvāḥ kriyāḥ śṛṅgārabhāvajāḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atrāpi viśeṣalakṣaṇābhyāmeva vakroktitā || iti samuccayālakāranirūpaṇam ||
ākṣepālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
ākṣepaṃ lakṣayati—
vidhinātha niṣedhena pratiṣedhoktiratra yā |
śuddhā miśrā ca sākṣepo rodho nākṣepataḥ pṛthak || 64 ||
vidhineti | vidhinā hetunā pratiṣedhena vā hetunā yā pratiṣedhasyoktirnirvacanaṃ sā ākṣepaḥ | rodhaḥ punarākṣepa evetyāha—rodha iti | ākṣepalakṣaṇenaiva gṛhītatvādrodho na tato bhinna ityarthaḥ ||
tatra vidhyākṣepaḥ śuddho yathā—
‘gaccha gacchasi cetkānta panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ |
mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyādyatra gato bhavān || 147 ||’
atra ‘gaccha’ ityasya vidhivākyasya ‘mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyāt’ ityāśiṣānukūlatayaiva maraṇasūcanānniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti śuddho 'yaṃ vidhyākṣepaḥ ||
gacchetyādi | iha he kānta vallabha, cedyadi gacchasi tadā gaccha | videśamiti śeṣaḥ | mayā na rodhaḥ kriyate | kiṃtu bhavānyatra gato bhūyāttatraiva mamāpi janma bhūyāditi | paraṃ vadāmiti śeṣaḥ | atra gamanasya vidhirūpasya janma bhūyādityanena vidhirūpeṇaiva tvayi gate mayā martavyamiti maraṇasūcanādvidhinā gamanapratiṣedhoktiḥ anyāsaṃkareṇa ca śuddhatā ||
﻿
miśro yathā—
‘alaṃ vivādena yathā śrutaṃ tvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ |
mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate 148’
atra ‘alaṃ vivādena’ iti niṣedhena, ‘tathāvidhaḥ so 'stu—’ iti vidhinā ca tanmatamavasthāpya, ‘mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitam’ iti vidhinā, ‘na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate’ iti pratiṣedhena ca yatpunarākṣipati, so 'yaṃ vidhiniṣedhābhyāṃ vidhimiśra ākṣepo bhavati ||
