‘rāmamanmathaśareṇa tāḍitā duḥsahena hṛdaye niśācarī |
gandhavadrudhiracandanokṣitā jīviteśavasatiṃ jagāma sā || 497 ||’
atra bībhatso rasaḥ śleṣarūpakasāmarthyādavidyamānenāpi śrṛṅgārarasena saṃkīrṇa iva pratīyate ||
śleṣānuviddhārthāntaranyāsena yathā—
‘‘asyārthastatra vīrarase tāvat—ho ityāścaryasaṃbodhane | daṣṭauṣṭhaasilatāghātaḥ khaṅgaprahārastavāpi mukulayati locanabhruvau dve api | atha ca suṣṭhu pānti ye yodhāstān rāṃtyādatte tādṛśāneva mahāvīrānsvīkaroti īdṛśī yā kuvalayaprāptā sakalamedinīmaṇḍalaprāptā lakṣmīḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ na na janayati | lagrā vakṣasi kākvā janayatyevetyarthaḥ | api ca vipralambhaśrṛṅgāre he daṣṭauṣṭha pītādharāmṛta bhogaśīlaka, ghātaḥ arthāttava prāṇasamāyā nakhāghāto 'pi te tava mukulayati locanabhruvau dve api atha ca suṣṭhupayodharau stanau yasyāḥ sā | kuvalayapattrālākṣī nīlotpaladalasamānanayanā na lagnā vakṣasi kathaṃ na mohaṃ na janayati | api tu janayatītyarthaḥ | sahṛdaya hṛdayaṃgama |’ gha ṭippaṇīdaṭṭhoṭṭha ho asilaaghāo‘asilavāaccāo’ kha devi maülāvaï loaṇabhaüho‘loaṇabhaünto’ ka, ‘loaṇabhaoho’ ga gha ve |
supaohara‘kuvalaapattilacchi’ ka, ‘kuvalaya’ khakuvala apattalacchi ‘kahamonubhāiṇagājaṇavacchi’ kakaha moha ṇa jaṇaï ṇa laggavacchi ||’
[daṣṭauṣṭha ho asilatādhāto devi mukalayati locanabhruvau dve api |
supayodharakuvalayapattralakṣmīḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ na janayati na lagnā vakṣasi ||]
atra vīro rasaḥ śleṣasāmarthyādavidyamānenāpi vipralambhaśrṛṅgāreṇa saṃkīryate ||
śleṣopamā yathā—
‘kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ 'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇankeśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃkrameṇa |
āliṅganyo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa ‘haratu’ khadahatu duritaṃ śāmbhabo vaḥ śarāgniḥ 499’
atra karuṇo rasaḥ śleṣopamāsāmarthyenāvidyamānenāpi vipralambhaśṛṅgāreṇa saṃkīryate ||
śleṣavyatirekeṇa yathā—
‘padbhyāmūruyugaṃ vibhajya bhujayorbhadhyaṃ nipīḍyorasā pārśveṣu prasabhaṃ prahṛtya nakharairdantairvilūyādharam‘vilupyādharam’ kha |
suptānapyavabodhya yuṣmadahitānbhūyo 'pi bhukte’ khabhuṅke vane kiṃ kāntā surataiṣiṇī nahi nahi vyāghrī karālānanā || 500 ||’
‘iha’ ka khaatra śleṣasāmarthyādapāramārthikī śṛṅgāra‘pratītiḥ’ ghapratītiḥ pāramārthikena bībhatsarasena vyāvartamānā taddharmāṇāṃ mithaḥ ‘saṃsargavadbuddhim’ kasaṃsargabuddhimutpādayati ||
śleṣarūpakeṇa yathā—
‘antraiḥ kalpitamaṅgalapratisarāḥ strīhastaraktotpalavyaktottaṃsabhṛtaḥ pinahya śirasā hṛtpuṇḍarīkastrajaḥ |
etāḥ śoṇitapaṅkakuṅkumajuṣaḥ saṃbhūya kāntaiḥ pibantyasthisnehasurāḥ kapālacaṣakaiḥ prītāḥ piśācāṅganāḥ || 501 ||’
atra vībhatso rasaḥ śabdasāmarthyākṣiptena śṛṅgarābhāsena saṃkīryate ||
samādhirūpakeṇa yathā—
‘śikhaṇḍe khaṇḍenduḥ śaśidinakarau karṇayugale dṛśastārāstārāścalamuḍupacakraṃ ca kucayoḥ |
taḍitkāñcī sandhyā sicayarucayaḥ kāli tadayaṃ tavākalpaḥ kalpavyuparamavidheyo vijayate || 502 ||’
atra bhayānako rasaḥ samādhirūpakādyupakalpitākalparāmaṇīyakākṣiptena śṛṅgārābhāsena saṃkīryamāṇaḥ śrotuḥ preyorasāṅgatāṃ gacchansaṃgacchate | evamiyamama‘anekaprakārasaṃsṛṣṭiḥ’ khanekaprakārasaṃsṛṣṭirguṇālaṃkārasaṃkaraprabhavābhimantavyā tatrāpi pradhānāṅgabhāvena samakakṣatayā ca vyaktāvyaktobhayātmakarūpāstilatandula‘taṇḍula’ ka khakṣīrajalācchāyādarśakādayo bhedā ‘yathāyogyaṃ’ khayathāyogamavagantavyāḥ | te kiṃ vaktavyā na vaktavyāḥ | kathamanuktā gamyante | ukteṣvevāntarbhāvāt | tadyadhā--arthobhayālaṃkārābhidhāne ‘khaṃ vaste’ iti ‘carcāṃ pārayati’ iti vibhaktimudrā, kalaviṅkaṇṭhamalinaṃ kādambinīkambalam iti padamudrā ca śabdālaṃkārāvapi saṃkīryamāṇau pratīyete |
evamanyatrāpi |
aṅgāṅgibhāvāvasthānaṃ sarveṣāṃ samakakṣatā |
ityalaṃkāra‘saṃsṛṣṭiḥ’ ghasaṃsṛṣṭerlakṣaṇīyā dvayī gatiḥ || 176 ||
tatrāṅgāṅgibhāvenāvasthānaṃ yathā—
‘ākṣipantyaravindāni mugdhe tava mukhaśriyam |
koṣadaṇḍasamagrāṇāṃ kimeṣāmasti duṣkaram‘atiduṣkaraṃ’ gha || 503 ||’
‘atra—’ ityārabhya ‘duṣkaram’ ityantaḥ pāṭho ga gha nāstiatrāravindāni ‘mugdhe tava mukhaśriyamākṣipantīti’ upamā, ‘koṣa-
daṇḍasamagrāṇāṃ kimeṣāmasti duṣkaram’ iti śleṣopasarjanārthāntaranyāsaḥ | ‘prabhavanti’ ka khabhavanti cāravindāni koṣadaṇḍasamagrāṇi ‘tena kiṃ teṣāṃ’ ka khatena teṣāṃ na kiṃcidaśakyamasti koṣadaṇḍayorvijayasādhanatvāt | etena śleṣasya ‘sādhanamānabhūtārtha’ khasādhanabhūtārthasamarthakatvādupamāyāstu prastutasādhyavastuviśeṣakatvādarthāntaranyāsaṃ pratyaṅgabhāvo vijñāyate |
sarveṣāṃ samakakṣatāṃ yathā—
‘limpatīva tamo 'ṅgāni varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ |
asatpuruṣaseveva dṛṣṭirni‘viphalatāṃ gatā’ ka khaṣphalatāṃ gatā || 504 ||’
‘nanu ca tamasaśca nabhasaśca asataśca saṃbandhasamatvāt’ ka khananu cābandhaḥ samatvātsyāditi kathaṃ sarveṣāṃ tulyakakṣatayā saṃbandhotpattiḥ evaṃ manyate ye utprekṣopamādayo 'laṃkārā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhi‘vyabhicārivarṇanāparā’ ka khacāryādivarṇanāparatayā rasāderaṅgatāṃ pratipadyante tadā bhavatyeva teṣāṃ tulyakakṣateti | tatra ‘limpatīva tamo 'ṅgāni varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ’ iti dve‘dve’ kha nāsti utprekṣe, ‘asatpuruṣaseveva dṛṣṭirniṣphalatāṃ gatā’ ityupamā ca varṇanīyasya tamasa uddīpanavibhāvabhūtasya samatayaivotkarṣapratipādakatvenā‘prāgabhāvam’ khaṅgabhāvamupagateti nāsti lakṣaṇānupapattiriti | nanūpamā imāstisro 'pi kasmānnocyante | ivo hi vākyāntareṣūpamāyā eva dṛśyate | ‘naivam’ ka maivam | upamānopameyaśabdapratipannasya‘upamānopameyaṃ prati yattasya’ kha sādṛśyārthasya dyotanamivena kriyate na ca limpatītyādāvupamānamupameyaṃ vāsti yatsādṛśyadyotanaya ivaḥ ‘prayujyate’ khaprayujyet | na ca tiṅantenopamānamasti tasya sādhyārthābhidhāyitvenāsattvārthatvāt‘asattvārthakatvāt’ kha ||
tadāha—
‘siddhasya hi samānārthamupamānaṃ vidhīyate |
tiṅantārthasya sādhyatvādupamārtho na vidyate ||’
na copamāyāmevevaśabdo bhavati | tadyathā kathamivaitadbhaviṣyati | astu vā limpatitamasorupamānopameyabhāvastathāpi tulyadharmo na dṛśyate ya upamānopameyabhāvāya prabhavati | kimanyaina lepanameva bhavati tarhi limpatinā‘nalimpatinā’ ka kena bhāvyam | na hi lepanaṃ limpeḥ pṛthagmavitumīṣṭe | nanu ceha dvayaṃ cakāsti thāturlimpati tadarthaśca‘śabdārthaśca’ ka lepanam | maivam | evaṃ sati limpatiriveti syāt na tu limpatīveti | atha yathā rāhoḥ śiraḥ iti bhedābhāve 'pyavayavāvayavibhāvastatheha dharmadharmibhāvo bhaviṣyati | maivam | upamānopameyabhāvasya bhedasādṛśyapratipattinibandhanatvāt tadabhāve 'pi yastanmanute sa kathaṃ nonmattaḥ syāt |
taduktam—‘sa eva dharmo dharmī cetyunmatto 'pi na bhāṣate |’ astu tarhi tiṅvācyaḥ‘tiṅāṃ yaḥ’ kha kartā upamānamiti cet nyagbhūto 'sau kriyāpade | kathaṃ punarasau kriyāpade‘kriyāvayave’ kha nyagbhūto bhavati | śrūyatāṃ, ṣaḍarthāstiṅantena pratīyante kriyā kālaḥ upagrahaḥ sādhanaṃ saṅkhyā puruṣaśceti | teṣu kriyākālātmanepadaparasmaipadanimittāni prakṛtirabhidhatte pratyayaḥ sādhanaṃ, saṅkhyāṃ puruṣaṃ ca | eteṣāṃ tu kriyārthatvātkriyā pradhānaṃ, kālātmanepadanimitte kriyāviśeṣaṇatvena, saṅkhyāpuruṣau sādhanaviśeṣaṇatvena tayoreva nyagbhavataḥ | sādhanaṃ punaḥ ‘prakṛtipratyayau‘prakṛtipratyayārthau’ kha ‘yatra sahārtha brūte’ kasvārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ’ iti nyāyāt ‘pradhānabhūtamapi bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata’ iti nyāyena kriyāsiddhāvutpa-
nnavyāpāraṃ parārthaṃ tasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ nyagmavati | tenāyaṃ kartā svakriyāsidbhābākulaḥ‘svakriyāsiddhā vā kutaḥ’ kha kathamupamānatvenopameyatvena ‘cānyadapekṣitaṃ’ ka, ‘vānyadapekṣitaṃ’ khavānyadapekṣituṃ kṣamate | evaṃ tarhi yo 'ṅgāni limpati tena kriyopalakṣitena kartrā tulyaṃ tama ityarthaḥ pratipatsyate | maivam | kriyopalakṣitasya karturupamānabhūtasya śabdanvāyabalāpratipattiḥ | śabdo hi mukhyāgauṇīlakṣaṇābhirarthaprakaraṇādisaṃpāditasācivyādā‘sācivyādibhiḥ’ ka khabhistisṛbhireva vṛttibhirarthaviśeṣapratipattinimittaṃ bhavati | tadyathā—gaurityayaṃ śabdo mukhyayā vṛttyā sāsnādimantamarthaṃ pratipādayati sa eva tiṣṭhanmūtratvādiguṇasaṃpadamapekṣya vāhīkādau prayujyamāno gauṇīṃ vṛttimanubhavati | yadā tu mukhyayā gauṇyā vopāttakriyāsiddhau sādhanabhāvaṃ gantumasamarthastadā lakṣaṇayā svārthāvinābhūtamarthāntaraṃ lakṣayati yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasatīti gaṅgāśabdo viśiṣṭodakapravāhe nirụ̄dhābhidhānaśaktirghoṣakartṛkāyāḥ prativasanakriyāyā adhikaraṇabhāvaṃ gantumasamarthaḥ svārthāvinābhūtaṃ taṭaṃ‘yattaṭaṃ’ ka lakṣayatīti | na caitāsāmihānyatamāpi vṛttiḥ saṃgacchate | tathā hi limpateḥ kriyāvacanatvānna mukhyā‘kriyāvacanatvānmukhyā nāpi kriyākartāraḥ sādṛśyena’ ka | nāpi kriyākartrorasādṛśyena śuktikādau rajatādivattadbhāvāpattiḥ kriyāguṇānāṃ kartaryasaṃbhavāt | sākṣādiva prayogācca na gauṇī kriyāyāśca svayameva dharmarūpatvāt | buddhiḥ paśyatītivadanyadharmāṇāmanyatrādhiropaṇamupacāra iti na gauṇībheda upacāritā‘upacaritā’ ka, ‘upacaritaḥ’ kha | ivaśabdasya cāsādṛśye 'pi darśanānna lakṣyeta | yadi hīvaśabdaḥ sādṛśyameva vidyotayati tadā limpatikriyāyāḥ sattvabhūtena tamasā sādṛśyaṃ na saṃbhavatīti svārthāvinābhūte kartāra-
mākṣipati | na ceha lakṣitalakṣaṇāviruddha‘iha lakṣaṇāviruddha—’ khalakṣaṇādayo 'pi vartante, yathā ‘priye jane nāsti punaruktaṃ’, ‘svalpairasāvapi na dṛśyata eva kālaiḥ’ iti | na ca ‘śabdānyavilambinī’ ka, ‘śabdānyapavilambitaprāyavilambinī’ khaśabdanyāyavilaṅghinī padārthavyutpattiḥ prekṣāvadbhirādriyate | yadyapyadhyāhārādibhiridamapi syāttathāpi tulyadharmo mārgaṇīyastadvadeva vipratipatteḥ || na cendumukhādivadanabhidhīyamānasyāpi tulyaguṇasya pratyayo bhavatīti vācyam |
yathenduriva te vakramiti kāntiḥ pratīyate |
‘tadyathā’ khana tathā limpaterlepādanyadatra pratīyate || 177 ||
tadupaśleṣaṇārtho 'yaṃ limpatirdhvāntakartṛkaḥ |
varṣaṇārthaśca vidvadbhirutprekṣyata itīkṣyatām || 178 ||
manye-śaṅke-dhruvaṃ-prāyo-nūnamityevamādibhiḥ |
utprekṣā vyajyate śabdairivaśabdo 'pi tādṛśaḥ || 179 ||
vākyavadeva prabandheṣvanaucityaparihāreṇa guṇālaṃkārasaṃkaraniveśo bhavati | tatrānaucityaparihāro yathā—māyayā kaikeyīdaśarathābhyāṃ rāmaḥ pralambhito na mātāpitṛbhyāmiti nirdoṣadaśarathe; rāmameva yodhayan rāmeṇa vālī nihato na sugrīveṇeti mahāvīracarite; rudhirapriyarākṣasena duḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ pītaṃ na bhīmaseneneti veṇīsaṃhāre; durvāsaso 'padhyānādduṣyantaḥ śakuntalāsvīkāraṃ visasmāra, ‘nānavasthitānurāgatayā’ ka khanānāvasthititānurāgatayeti śākuntale; lavaṇaprayuktarākṣasābhyāṃ vā sopaskareṇa ‘tadanabhidhāya’ kha nāstitadabhidhāya sītā parityājitā na kaikeyīmantharābhyāmiti chalitarāme; kiṃca dagdhāyāmapi
vāsavadattāyāṃ vairapraticikīrṣayā padmāvatī mayọdhā, avasite ca samīhite tathā vinā kṣaṇamapi na jīvāmītyavijñātavāsavadattāsaṃnighervatsarājasyāgnipraveśādhyavasāyaḥ priyāhṛdayato vyalīkaśalyamuccakhāneti tāpasavatsarāje; ‘macīcākṣaḥ’ khanīcākṣaḥ svāmikāryaṃ sādhayāmīti prabhubhaktyā niraparādhāmapi preyasīṃ hitvā svāmikāryāpekṣayāhamevaitāvanti dināni jīvitaḥ, adya tu kṛtasvāmikāryastāmevānugacchāmīti śivagaṇaḥ śūdrakanimittāṃ māyāmayīṃ citāṃ priyāsamakṣaṃ praviveśa, sāpi tatpremāvadānadarśanāpahnutapriyabyalīkā‘priyavyalīkāt’ kha tadviyogakātarā tatraivātmānaṃ praticikṣepeti vikrāntaśūdrake, iti tadetaddoṣahānam || guṇopādānaṃ tu samyag guṇayogena saṃvidhāne susūtratā, api ca caturvṛttyaṅgasaṃpannamiti catasro vṛttayo bhāratī ārabhaṭī kaiśikī sāttvatī ceti | tatra—
yā vākpradhānā nṛpatiprayojyā strīvarjitā ‘saṃskṛtayā prayuktā’ khasaṃskṛtayātha yuktā |
svanāmadheyairbharataprayojyā sā bhāratī nāma bhavettu vṛttiḥ ||
yatrāvapātakṣutalaṅghitāni chedyāni māyākṛtamindrajālam |
citrāṇi yuddhāni ca tatra vṛttimetādṛśīmārabhaṭīṃ vadanti ||
yā ślakṣṇanepathyaviśeṣayuktā strīsaṃgatā yā bahugītavṛttā |
kāmopabhogapracuropacārā tāṃ kaiśikīṃ vṛttimudāharanti ||
yā sāttvikenātmaguṇena yuktā tyāgena vṛttena samanvitā ca |
harṣotkaṭā saṃhṛtaśokabhārā sā sāttvatīti prathiteha vṛttiḥ ||
āsāmaṅgāni ṣoḍaśa—teṣu prarocanā, vīthī, prastāvanā, prahasanamiti catvāri bhāratyaṅgāni ||
tatra vaktavyārthapraśaṃsāparaṃ vacaḥ prarocanā; yathā—
‘jayati bhuvanakāraṇaṃ svayambhurjayati purandaranandano murāriḥ |
jayati girisutāniruddhadeho duritabhayāpaharo haraśca devaḥ 505
prastutavastūpapādanāvasarasūcakaṃ vacaḥ prastāvanā; yathā ratnāvalyām |
‘dvīpādanyasmādapi madhyādapi jalanidherdiśo 'pyantāt |
ānīya jhaṭiti ghaṭayati vidhirabhimatamabhimukhībhūtaḥ 506’
uddhātyakādīnāmaṅgānāṃ pravṛttiḥ vīthī uddhātyakaḥ kathoddhātaḥ prayogātiśayaḥ pravartako 'valagitamiti |
tatroddhātyako yathā—
‘ko jayati jayati śarvaḥ kena jitaṃ jitamanaṅgadahanena |
tripurāriṇā bhagavatā bālaśaśāṅkāṅkitajaṭena || 507 ||’
kathoddhāto yathā—
‘sākaṃ paṅkajajanmanā surapaterabhyarthanāyā vaśā- dikṣvākoḥ śaradindubimbavimale vaṃśe 'vatīrya svayam |
niḥśeṣāttapadaṃ ‘trayīpadajuṣāṃ’ khatrayīpathajuṣāṃ vidveṣiṇaṃ rākṣasaṃ yaḥ paulastyamahan sa pātu bhavato rāmābhidhāno hariḥ 508
prayogātiśayo yathā—
‘‘utthāpitam’ ka, ‘atyāhitam’ khayūthāyitamavatu hareḥ kṣmāmuddharato varāhavapuṣo vaḥ |
‘śeṣaphaṇā, ratnadarpaṇa’ ka khaśeṣaphaṇaratnadarpaṇasahasrasaṃkrāntabimbasya || 509 ||’
pravartako yathā—
‘āsāditaprakaṭanirmalacandrahāsaḥ prāptaḥ śaratsamaya ‘eva’ kaeṣa viśuddhakāntaḥ‘viśuddhakīrtiḥ’ ka kha |
utkhāya gāḍhatamasaṃ ghanakālamugraṃ rāmo daśāsyamiva saṃbhṛtabandhujīvaḥ || 510 ||’
avalagitaṃ yathā,—amumeva śaratsamayamāśritya gīyatām, tathā hyasyām‘tathā hyasyāḥ’ kha 'tathā hyasyām’ gha nāsti
‘satpakṣā madhuragiraḥ prasādhitāśā madoddhatārambhāḥ |
nipatanti dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kālavaśānmedinīpṛṣṭhe || 511 ||’
‘svadharmavipracalitānām’ ka, ‘svadharmavitpracalitānāṃ’ khasvadharmātpracalitānāṃ tāpasādīnāmupahāsaparaṃ vacaḥ prahasanam | yathā—
‘śramaṇaḥ śrāvakavadhvāḥ suratavidhau daśati nādharaṃ dattam |
madirākṣi māṃsabhakṣaṇamasmatsamaye niṣiddhamiti || 512 ||’
saṃkṣiptikā, avapātaḥ, vastūtthāpanam, saṃsphoṭaḥ, iti catvāri ārabhaṭyaṅgāni ||
teṣu māhendrajālanepathyādibhirvastusaṃkṣepaḥ saṃkṣiptikā | yathā—
‘rakṣasā mṛgarūpeṇa vañcayitvā sarāghavau |
jahāra sītāṃ pakṣīndraprayāsakṣaṇavighnitaḥ || 513 ||’
bhayādibhirvidravādikarmānupraveśanirgamanamavapātaḥ | yathā—
‘mṛgarūpaṃ parityajya vidhāya vikaṭaṃ vapuḥ |
nīyate rakṣasā tena lakṣmaṇo yudhi saṃśayam || 514 ||’
avidravaḥ savidravo vā sarvarasabhāvasamāso vastūtthāpanam | yathā—
‘rāhoścandrakalāmivānanacarīṃ daivātsamāsādya me dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayādācchindataḥ preyasīm |
ātaṅkādvikalaṃ drutaṃ karuṇayā vikṣobhitaṃ vismayā- tkrodhena jvalitaṃ mudā vikasitaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ vartatām 515’
nānāstrayuddhaniyuddhādibhiḥ sasaṃrambhasaṃprahāraḥ saṃsphoṭaḥ | yathā—
‘kṛṣṭā yena śiroruheṣu paśunā pāñcālarājātmajā yenāsyāḥ paridhānamapyapahṛtaṃ rājñāṃ gurūṇāṃ puraḥ |
yasyoraḥsthalaśoṇitāsavamahaṃ pātuṃ pratijñātavā- nso 'yaṃ madbhujapañjare nipatitaḥ saṃrakṣyatāṃ kauravāḥ || 516 ||’
narma, narmasphijaḥ, narmasphoṭaḥ, narmagarbha, iti catvāri kaiśikyaṅgāni ||
teṣu sthāpitaśṛṅgāraṃ vaco viceṣṭitaṃ vā saparihāsaṃ narma | yathā—
‘vayaṃ tathā nāma yathāttha kiṃ vadāmyayaṃ tvakasmādvikalaḥ kathāntare |
kadambagolākṛtimāśritaḥ kathaṃ viśuddhamugdhaḥ kulakanyakājanaḥ 517’
prathamasaṃbhoge navāvasthānaṃ saṃbhogāśrayavākyādi karma narmasphijaḥ | yathā—
‘prāptāsau vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ priyasutā saṅketakhaṇḍe nave vṛṣṭiḥ seyamanambudā 'mṛtamayī yātrāṇi me siñcati |
kiṃ jānāsi vinodayiṣyati manaḥ saṃtaptamevādya me durvātyeva nivartayiṣyati na bhostāṃ devayānīṃ prati || 518 ||’
āvirbhūtābhilāṣānubhāvayorakāṇḍasaṃbhogabhaṅgo narmasphoṭaḥ | yathā—
‘itaḥ parānarbhakahāryaśastrānvaidarbhi paśyānumatā mayāsi |
evaṃvighenāhavaceṣṭitena, tvaṃ prārthyase hastagatā mamaibhiḥ 519’ ﻿
kāryahetoḥ svarūpavijñānādipracchādanaṃ narmagarbhaḥ | yathā—
‘athājināṣāḍhadharaḥ pragalbhavāgjvalanniva brahmamayena tejasā |
viveśa kaścijjaṭilastapovanaṃ śarīrabaddhaḥ prathamāśramo yathā || 520 ||’
utthāpakaḥ, parivartakaḥ, saṃlāpakaḥ, saṃghātyakaḥ, iti catvāri sātvatyaṅgāni |
teṣu parasparībhūtārtheṣūtthāpanamutthāpakaḥ | yathā—
‘prahara mama tu kāyaṃ prākprahārapriyo 'haṃ ‘api tu’ khamayi tu kṛtavighāte kiṃ vidadhyāḥ parasmāt |
jhaṭiti vitatabahvaṅgārabhāsvatkuṭhāra- pravighaṭitakaṭhauraskandhabandhaḥ kabandhaḥ || 521 ||
prastutārthatyagādanyārthabhajanaṃ, parivartakaḥ | yathā—
‘munimabhimukhatāṃ ninīṣavo yāḥ samupayayuḥ kamanīyatāṃ guṇena |
madanamupadadhe sa eva tābhyo duradhighamā hi gatiḥ prayojanānām || 522 ||
sadasi nānāvākyairmitho 'dhikṣepaḥ saṃlāpakaḥ | yathā—
‘kathamapi na niṣiddho duḥkhinā bhīruṇā vā drupadatanayapāṇistena pitrā mamādya |
tava bhujabaladarpādhdyāyamānasya vāmaḥ śirasi caraṇa eṣa nyasyate dhārayainam || 523 ||’
kāryamantrānubhāvadaivādibhiḥ saṃghātabhedaḥ saṃghātyakaḥ | yathā—
‘apaśyadbhiriveśānaṃ raṇānnivavṛte gaṇaiḥ |
muhyatyeva hi kṛcchreṣu saṃbhramādhigataṃ manaḥ || 524 ||’
‘catura’ ityanena śāstrīyalaukikavyavahāravedino nāyakasya dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu vaicakṣaṇyamucyate | ‘udātta’ ityanena āśayavibhūtyorābhijātyayauvanādīnāṃ cotkarṣaḥ prakāśyate | caturvargaphalaṃ ‘prabandhe’ khaprabandhaṃ ko vā na bāndhavīyatītyanena śrotṝṇāṃ rāmādivadvartitavyam, na rāvaṇādivaditi vidhiniṣedhanibandhanasya‘nibandhasya’ ka prabandhasyābhīṣṭatamatvamākhyāyate | ‘mukhaṃ pratimukham' ityādinā pañcāṅgaṃ prabandhaśarīramabhidhīyate | tadaṅgāni copakṣepaparikarādīni catuḥṣaṣṭirapi mukhādiṣvevāntarbhavanti | atastadvadeva pañcasaṃdhyekamapi vākyaṃ prabandhavyapadeśamāsādayati | tadyathā—
‘kathamapi kṛtapratyāsattau priye’ iti mukham, ‘skhalitottare’ iti pratimukham, ‘virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prajalpitamaśrutam’ iti garbhaḥ, ‘asahanasakhīśrotraprāptiprasādasasaṃbhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā’ iti vimarśaḥ, 'śūnye gehe samucchvasitaṃ ‘tadā’ ka, ‘(muhuḥ)’ khasametam’ iti nibarhaṇam | etena prācīnaprabandhārthe 'pi ekavākyoktena prabandhatvamityākhyātaṃ na bhavati | tadyathā—
‘turaganicayavyagrānūrvībhidaḥ sagarādhvare kapilamahasā roṣātpluṣṭānapi prapitāmahān |
agaṇitatanūtāpastaptvā tapāṃsi bhagīratho bhagavati tava spṛṣṭānadbhiścirādudadīdharat || 525 ||’
‘avistṛtamasaṃkṣiptam’ ityanena vistārabhīrūṇāṃ kathārasavicchedaśaṅkināṃ ca cittamāvarjyate | ‘‘śravyāntairityanena’ khaśravyavṛttam’ ityanena vṛttāntarairāśvāsakādi-
parisamāptiriti pariśrāntāḥ śrotāra aśvāsyante, sragādisaṃniveśādivatsaṃdarbhe cāśvādayo vibhāvyante | ‘puropavane’ ityādinā ca deśakālapātrasaṃpadupavarṇanādālambanoddīpanavibhāvāḥ kathyante | udyānasalilakrīḍādyupalakṣaṇena kāminīnāṃ divāceṣṭāḥ, madhupānaratotsava ityanena ca rātriceṣṭā ucyante | vipralambhā ityanena catvāro 'pi prathamānurāgādayaḥ parāmṛśyante | ‘vivāha‘vivāhā’ ka kha’ ityupalakṣaṇena prathamānurāgo vivāhāntaḥ, mānaḥ premāntaḥ, pravāsaḥ, saṃgamāntaḥ, karuṇaḥ, pratyujjīvanāntaḥ, ‘prabandhaḥ’ khaprabandhe kartavya ityupadiśyate | ‘mantradūta’ ityādipuruṣakārāyatta‘puruṣākārāyatta’ kasiddhi‘sūcanena dyūtatādinirāsāt’ khasūcanenādyūnatādinirāsānnāyakasya sattvotkarṣaḥ prakāśyate | ‘nāvarṇanaṃ nagaryāderdoṣāya’ ityādinā tu puruṣārthāsattvopakāritvena‘puruṣārthāsannopakārakāritvena’ ka, ‘puruṣārthāsannopakāritvena’ kha śailartūdyānacandrodayamadhupānaratotsavādīnāṃ mantradūtaprayogājināyakābhyudapādīnāṃ‘mantradūtaprayogādyanāyakābhyudayādīnāṃ ca’ ka, ‘mantradūtaprayogātināyakābhyudayādīnāṃ ca’ kha ca niyamena prayogaḥ, śeṣāṇāṃ tu prabandhaśarīrānurodheneti pratipādyate | ‘guṇataḥ’ prāgupanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām | nirākaraṇam’ ityanena guṇavatā bhāvyaṃ na guṇadveṣiṇeti jñāpyate | ‘vaṃśavīryaśrutādīni’ ityādinā punarābhijātyauddhatyaśauṇḍīryavīryādaya‘śauṭīryavīryādayaḥ’ ka kha eva śatrorvarṇanīyā na tvavacchedahetavo nyāyyācaraṇabinayādaya iti pratyāyyate | ‘dhinoti naḥ’ iti tvayameva pakṣaḥ śreyāniti granthakāreṇa svābhiprāyaḥ prakāśyate ||
iti nigaditabhaṅgyānaṅgasarvasvametad vividhamapi manobhirbhāvayanto 'sya bhedam‘khedam’ ka |
tadanubhavasamutthānandasaṃmīlitākṣāḥ pariṣadi paritoṣaṃ hanta santaḥ prayāntu || 526 ||
yāvanmūrdhni himāṃśukandalabhṛti svarvāhinī dhūrjaṭeryāvadvakṣasi kaustubhastabakitā lakṣmīrmuradveṣiṇaḥ |
yāvaccittabhuvastrilokavijayaprauḍhaṃ dhanuḥ kausumaṃ bhūyāttāvadiyaṃ kṛtiḥ kṛtadhiyāṃ karṇāvataṃsotpalam || 527 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇālaṃkāre rasavivecano nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ |
samāpto 'yaṃ granthaḥ |
śubhamastu |
